[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde ha pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D340}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_karma sha ta ka/_bod skad du/_las brgya tham pa pa/_bam po dang po/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang las 
[\[1b.2\]]'jig rten bla ma bde gshegs thos pa'i sgo nas rab snyan brtan pa'i gsung ldan gyis/_/sems can rnams la phan pa 'ba' zhig bzhed phyir bshad pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang nyid kyis/_/
[\[1b.3\]]log par lta ba'i mun nag chen po thibs por 'thoms shing 'khrugs pa rnams la rab gsungs pa/_/de yi ming ni las rnam brgya pa zhes bya yongs su tshang ba bdag gis bshad kyis 
[\[1b.4\]]nyon/_/spyi sdom ni/_khyi mo dang ni shing rta dang /_/ka tsang ka la byams mi sdug_/bya dang 'phye bo gang po dang /_/bu rnams dang ni brgya byin no/_/sdom ni/_khyi mo mig chung 
[\[1b.5\]]rdzogs byed dang /_/sgur gnyis 'char ka rgyal mtshan dang /_/bde byed ma dang nor bu'i 'od/_/sna ma'i me tog nga byin dang /_/'dus mo dang ni tshem bu mkhan/_/khyi mo zhes bya 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran 
[\[2a.2\]]pa zhig gnas te/_mu stegs can la dga'o/_/de nas des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am 
[\[2a.3\]]bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can/_mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba sna legs pa smin ma stug pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de'i 
[\[2a.4\]]btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe 'gro nus par gyur pa de'i tshe de rtser gzhug pa'i phyir 
[\[2a.5\]]phas/_khyi gu mo zhig khyim du bzhag go/_/khyi gu mo de yang gang gi tshe/_gzhan mu stegs pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe ni rgyug ste za bar byed la gos rnams kyang 'dral bar byed do/_/de ste dge slong dag mthong na ni drung du 'jar zhing lces rkang pa la bldags te/_mjug 
[\[2a.6\]]ma dril nas g.yas phyogs su skor ba byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'jigs pa 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan 
[\[2b.2\]]pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_
[\[2b.3\]]su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag pa nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags 
[\[2b.4\]]pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon 
[\[2b.5\]]gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/
[\[2b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du/_nyan thos chen po rnams kyang nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten 
[\[2b.7\]]la lta bar byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la bltas na/_khyim bdag 'khor dang bcas pa gdul ba'i dus la bab par mthong nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/_lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]de mthar gyis bsod snyoms rgyu ba las khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang /_khyi mo des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu rings par langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song nas/_ji ltar dge slong gzhan dag gi 
[\[3a.2\]]thad du 'gro ba de bzhin du/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i thad du song nas/_ches gus par lces rkang pa la bldags te/_mjug ma dril nas lan gsum skor ba byed do/_/de yang khyim bdag des mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsams pa/_ma la 'di ltar/_khyi mo log par ltung ba'i lus can 'di yang 'di 
[\[3a.3\]]la de lta bu'i bkur sti byed par sems pa las na/_dge slong 'di ni bdag nyid chen po zhig yin gor ma chag snyam du bsams te/_ma la bdag gis kyang dge slong 'di spyan drangs la bshos gsol lo snyam du bsams nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i 
[\[3a.4\]]rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'o na 'di nyid du bshos gsol du ci gnang zhes byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim bdag de la cang mi zer bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus cang mi zer bas gnang bar rig nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[3a.5\]]shA ri'i bu'i stan bshams te 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan bshams pa la 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bde bar 'dug par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang 
[\[3a.6\]]bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci 'dod pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/_ci 'dod pa bstabs pa'i 'og tu sder ni gyu/_lhung bzed ni bkrus par rig nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 
[\[3a.7\]]mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/
[\[3b.2\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag pa dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/khyim bdag de yang bden pa mthong bar gyur nas/_sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed do/_/de'i khyim de slong ba'i skye bo rnams kyi chu dong dang 'dra bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag des 
[\[3b.3\]]kyang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dang yang du khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol bar byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang khyim bdag des khyi mo de la kha zas byin nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/khyi mo de yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas chos nyan to/_/
[\[3b.4\]]de nas khyim bdag des bsams pa bdag gis legs pa 'di lta bu rtogs pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni khyi mo 'di'i mthu las byung ba yin no/_/snyam du rig go/_/rig nas kyang de la shin tu skyong bar byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyi mo de nad kyis thebs nas/_shA ri'i bus de la smras 
[\[3b.5\]]pa/_bu 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang 'bral bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes smras nas/_
[\[3b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu song ngo /_/de song nas ring po ma lon par khyi mo de yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi'o/_/de shi 'phos te 'das nas khyim de nyid du khyim bdag de'i chung ma chen ma'i mngal du skyes so/_/de shi ba'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu slar khyim der 
[\[3b.7\]]'ongs nas/_khyim bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bsnyad de/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyi mo de gum lags so zhes byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyi mo de'i ro de phyogs dben pa zhig tu zhog shig dang /_rus pa de dag phyis de nyid la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]khyim bdag gis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bus ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_khyim bdag des khyi ro de gang du sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyogs shig tu bzhag go/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang 
[\[4a.2\]]bu byung ste/_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba sna mtho ba sna legs pa smin ma stug pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de'i btsas ston yang rgyas par byas nas/_
[\[4a.3\]]rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/_'o ma dang mar dang zho dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bu 'dug la chos nyon cig 
[\[4a.4\]]ces byas na/_de byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs nas phan tshun du g.yengs te chos nyan du mi btub bo/_/de nas phyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de shed bye bar rig nas/_khyi mo'i rus bu de de nyid kyi mdun du bzhag ste/_ci nas kyang bu mo des tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba 
[\[4a.5\]]de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas/_tshe rabs dran ma thag tu bu mo de shas cher skyo ba skyes so/_/de skyo ba skyes nas bsams pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu ni/_bdag la dka' ba byed byed pa yin pa lta zhig ste/_'di las brten nas/_bdag gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs so snyam du 
[\[4a.6\]]rig nas/_dga' ba skyes te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas bu mo des stan de kho na la 'dug 
[\[4a.7\]]bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]ba btud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[4b.2\]]spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de'i pha ma la dad pa smras nas/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos de rab tu phyung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon 
[\[4b.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong rdor mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa 
[\[4b.4\]]rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas 
[\[4b.5\]]su gyur to/_/de dgra bcom par gyur nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sngon gyi drin dran te/_yang dang yang du thad du 'gro zhing rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/_'di skad du 'phags pa shA ri'i bu las brten te bdag gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs nas/_yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par 
[\[4b.6\]]gyur pas na/_'phags pa ni bdag la dka' ba mdzad mdzad pa lags so zhes zer ro/_/de yang dang yang du zer ba dge slong mang pos thos nas thos ma thag tu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge slong ma 'dis ci las bsams te/_de yang dang yang 
[\[4b.7\]]du de skad mchi/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyed kyis khyim bdag 'di'i khyim na khyi mo zhig 'dug pa mthong ngam/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu mthong ngo /_/de kho nas bdag la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste 'das pa dang /_khyim bdag de nyid kyi khyim 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]du skyes te/_des sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran nas/_sngon gyi drin gzo ba'i phyir bdag la de skad ces zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong ma 'dis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas sngon khyir 
[\[5a.2\]]skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na de nas shi 'phos te mir skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis 
[\[5a.3\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'das pa'i las kyi shas kyang yod la da ltar byung ba'i las kyi shas kyang yod do/_/btsun pa 'das pa'i las ci bgyis lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la 
[\[5a.4\]]skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[5a.5\]]'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las phyis de la bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_gang gi tshe de chen mor gyur pa dang /_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa 
[\[5a.6\]]la dad pa rnyed nas pha ma la gsol te rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te/_de rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba/_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang /_stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur nas des bsams pa ma la bdag gis 
[\[5a.7\]]rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i sgo nas/_rnyed par bya ba rnyed pa gang yin pa des/_bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la phan gdags par bya gor ma chag snyam du bsams nas/_chos bzhin du gnyi ga'i dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byas so/_/de nas phyis de la brel ba zhig byung ste/_des 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma mang po zhig la gsol ba btab na/_de dag na re bdag cag gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste/_khyod kyi don bsgrub mi nus so zhes zer ro/_/de nas de thos pa'i mod la dge slong ma de shin tu khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa skyes te/_de khros nas 
[\[5b.2\]]dge slong ma de dag la smras pa/_nga ni khyi mo dang 'dra ba khyed dgang ba dang gso ba 'ba' zhig byed na khyed ni skad cig tsam bdag gi don byed du yang mi btub bam zhes byas so/_/de nas dge slong ma de rnams kyis bsams pa/_nyon mongs ma 'di ni dmas shing nyams par gyur te/_
[\[5b.3\]]'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal chen po rnyed na mi rung ngo snyam du bsams nas/_'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam ste de dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyis nged su yin pa dang /_khyod bdag su yin pa shes sam des smras pa/_ngas shes te khyed kyang rab tu byung ba yin la nga yang rab tu 
[\[5b.4\]]byung ba yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_che zhe'u bu cag rab tu byung bar 'dra mod kyi/_khyod ni bcing ba thams cad kyis bcings pa'i so so'i skye bo yin la nged ni bya ba byas pa yin gyis nyes pa la nyes so zhes bshags par gyis shig_/khyod 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal 
[\[5b.5\]]chen po rnyed ta re/_de skad thos pa'i mod la dge slong ma de 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/_'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/_lhag par yang chos bzhin du gnyi ga'i dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byas te tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma bdag kyang 
[\[5b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ni bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der ci nas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye ba dang /_gzugs 
[\[5b.7\]]bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/bdag khros nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la tshig rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa'i skal 
[\[6a.2\]]ba can du bdag ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma 'di nyid yin te/_des der tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyir skyes so/_/
[\[6a.3\]]des der 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[6a.4\]]'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_'di 
[\[6a.5\]]da ltar phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma 
[\[6a.6\]]byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa 'di ni 'dis 'das pa'i las yin no/_/da ltar byung ba'i las ci zhig byas zhe na/_de khyir skyes nas shA ri'i bu la sems dga' bar gyur pa des ni mi'i nang 
[\[6a.7\]]du skyes te/_'di ni da ltar byung ba'i las yin no//_//mig chung zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am/_bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs 
[\[6b.2\]]bzang zhing /_blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te de gang gi tshe/_'gro nus par gyur pa de'i tshe/_de rtser 
[\[6b.3\]]gzhug pa'i phyir phas khyi gu zhig khyim du bzhag ste khye'u la byin no/_/de nas khye'u des khyi gu de za ba bslabs so/_/de nas gang gi tshe khyi gu de cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_lam po cher song nas skye bo phal po che la yang za bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa 
[\[6b.4\]]gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang 
[\[6b.5\]]chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis 
[\[6b.6\]]nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_
[\[6b.7\]]su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes 
[\[7a.2\]]kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/
[\[7a.3\]]sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_
[\[7a.4\]]nyin mtshan dus drug tu nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la lta bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la bltas na khyim bdag 'khor dang bcas pa gdul ba'i dus la bab par mthong nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang /_chos gos bgos 
[\[7a.5\]]te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba las/_khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang /_khyi des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shugs drag pos brgyugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[7a.6\]]ri'i bu zin to/_/de'i chos gos rnams dral to/_/khyim bdag des kyang mthong nas bkag ste/_de'i rma de yang bkrus nas/_ras kyis dkris te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di nyid du bshos gsol du ci gnang zhes byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_
[\[7a.7\]]khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas/_stan bshams te 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu/_gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]ri'i bu stan bshams pa la 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bde bar 'dug par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci 'dod pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba 
[\[7b.2\]]gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci 'dod pa bstabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_de'i nyin par zan zos pa'i 'og tu khyi de la khyos ma byin te/_khyi des zos nas de'i gdong du bltas so/_/de nas khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[7b.3\]]zan zos zin te/_sder ni gyu lhung bzed ni bkrus par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin rtogs nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos ston par byed de/_
[\[7b.4\]]de thos nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas/_stan de la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[7b.5\]]rnams blangs te/_smras pa btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag las gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams bzhes par gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyim bdag gzhan dag la yang phan gdags dgos 
[\[7b.6\]]kyis thong shig ces byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/der gang gi tshe khyim bdag des bden pa rnams mthong nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe des sbyin pa dag sbyin pa dang bsod nams dag bya bar brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[7b.7\]]bu yang dus dus su spyan drangs te/_bshos gsol bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang zan zos pa'i 'og tu khyi de la khyos ma byin par byed do/_/khyi de yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_de dga' bar gyur nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pa shA ri'i bu/_khyim der 'ong ba de'i tshe/_khyi des bsu nas rkang pa la bldags te mjug ma dril nas lan gsum skor ba byed do/_/der gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus chos bshad nas phyir 'gro ba de'i tshe khyi des the gi zad tsam du bskyal nas/_lan 
[\[8a.2\]]gsum bskor ba byas te phyir ldog go/_/de nas phyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_yang khyim der zan zos te khyim bdag de la chos bshad nas phyir 'gro ba na khyi de yang phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_phyi rol gyi lam po cher song nas lces rkang pa la bldags te/_mjug ma dril nas 
[\[8a.3\]]lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyir log nas khyim du 'gro ba na/_khyi de khyi gzhan dag cig gis bcas nas bsad do/_/de nas de gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos te 'das nas khyim de nyid du khyim bdag de'i chung ma chen ma'i mngal du skyes so/_/
[\[8a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang khyi de bdag gi thad nas phyir ldog pa'i 'og tu khyi gzhan dag gis ji ltar bsad pa shes so/_/de nas des bsams pa khyi de gar skyes snyam pa dang /_khyim bdag de nyid kyi khyim du khyim bdag gi chung ma'i mngal du skyes par mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[8a.5\]]nas kyang de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir g.yog med par gcig pu khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /_khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu zla med pa dang /_g.yog med par gcig pu 'ong bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du zla ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[8a.6\]]zham ring ma mchis par gcig pu gshegs/_'phags pa'i zham ring bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes dris so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyed cag lta bu 'ba' zhig gis byin pa ma gtogs par bdag cag la gud na g.yog gi 'byung khungs ga la yod/_
[\[8a.7\]]khyim bdag gis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gi mchis brang la bu chags pa mchis kyis/_de las gal te khye'u zhig btsas par gyur na/_de bdag gis 'phags pa'i zham ring du dbul lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]pa la brtan pa yin no/_/de skad ces smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu song ngo /_/khyim bdag de'i chung ma yang zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing /_blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas mod kyi 'on kyang mig chung ngo /_/de nas de'i btsas ston 
[\[8b.2\]]rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di mig chung bas na ming mig chung zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u mig chung 'o ma dang /_zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings 
[\[8b.3\]]te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang /_spos brtag pa dang 
[\[8b.4\]]sman brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[8b.5\]]bus kyang mig chung rab tu dbyung ba'i dus la bab par mthong nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ste/_de mthar gyis bsod snyoms rgyu ba las/_khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[8b.6\]]nas stan bshams pa la 'dug go/_/'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim bdag de la smras pa/_khyim bdag khye'u 'di ni ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas khyod kyis bdag gi g.yog tu byin te/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na/_de kho na ltar dam 
[\[8b.7\]]ma bcas sam/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa de kho na ltar dam bcas lags so zhes byas nas/_khye'u de lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la phul nas smras pa/_bu khyod ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas/_'phags pa la ngas phul 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]gyis song la 'phags pa'i zham ring gyis shig_/khye'us smras pa/_de ni bdag la phan btags pa lags so zhes byas nas/_khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_gtsug lag khang du khrid nas rab 
[\[9a.2\]]tu phyung ste/_de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang dge tshul ba byed bzhin du brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser 
[\[9a.3\]]dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_sred pa'i rnyed pa dang chags 
[\[9a.4\]]pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis snum gyis skud pa na/_des tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[9a.5\]]ri'i bu'i rkang pa'i rma'i sgros mthong ngo /_/mthong nas dris pa/_mkhan po'i rma'i sgros 'di sngon ci las gyur lags/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bu rma'i sgros 'di sngon ci las gyur pa soms shig_/de nas des bdag nyid kyis sngon khyir gyur pa'i tshe zin par mthong 
[\[9a.6\]]nas des bdag gang nas shi 'phos te/_khyir skyes par gyur ces bsams na/_des khyi las shi 'phos te khyi nyid du skyes par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du des tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du bltas na des khyi las shi 'phos te/_khyi 'ba' zhig tu skyes par mthong ngo /_/des yang ma 
[\[9a.7\]]'ongs pa'i dus la bsams te/_gal te bdag la mkhan pos ma dgongs su zin na/_bdag de nas shi 'phos na/_gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam du bsams na des khyi de nyid du de'u skyes par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du des ma 'ongs pa'i dus su tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar tu bltas na des khyi 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]las shi 'phos nas khyi 'ba' zhig tu de'u skyes par mthong nas/_des bsams pa bdag 'dis log par ltung ba las rnam par grol bar byas te g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pas mkhan po ni bdag la dka' ba byed byed pa yin 
[\[9b.2\]]no snyam nas/_bsnyen bkur bya ba las gud na mkhan po'i drin bdag gis bsab pa'i thabs gzhan ci yod de bsnyen par rdzogs nas ni bdag gis bsnyen bkur rim gyis byar mi rung na/_ma la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge tshul bar 'dug la 'di la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du 
[\[9b.3\]]bsams nas/_des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mkhan po'i bsnyen bkur ba bgyid do/_/bu khyod ji ltar dga' ba bzhin gyis shig_/de nas phyis de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_mig chung khyod ci'i phyir bsnyen 
[\[9b.4\]]par rdzogs par mi byed/_des smras pa/_bdag gis mkhan po'i drin bsab dgos te/_bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge tshul bar 'dug bzhin du de'i bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod la mkhan pos lhag par drin ci zhig btags/_de nas 
[\[9b.5\]]des dge slong de dag la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad nas/_dge slong de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mig chung gis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas khyir skyes la/_gal te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma bsams 
[\[9b.6\]]su lags na/_tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyi 'ba' zhig tu de'u skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas khyi las shi 'phos te/_slar mi'i nang du phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/_'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_
[\[9b.7\]]mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mig chung ngur gyur lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mig chung 'di nyid kyis sngon las byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung 
[\[10a.2\]]gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/
[\[10a.3\]]tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[10a.4\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin 
[\[10a.5\]]pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing /_blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de 
[\[10a.6\]]gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_pha ma la gsol te rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te/_de rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba/_
[\[10a.7\]]gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur nas/_des bsams pa ma la bdag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i sgo nas/_rnyed par bya ba rnyed pa gang yin pa des/_bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la phan gdags 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]par bya gor ma chag snyam du bsams nas/_chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byas te/_de nas phyi zhig na dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig la phyi dro'i gung skyems kyi zhal ta byed pa'i res bab nas/_des dge 'dun la gung skyems brims pa'i 'og tu lus ngal te gnas khang du 
[\[10b.2\]]song nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go de nas zhal ta byed pa de'i sbyin bdag rnams la gung skyems dgos par gyur nas/_des dge slong gzhan dag la smras pa/_deng gung skyems kyi zhal ta byed pa'i res su la bab/_de dag gis smras pa/_dge slong che ge mo zhig 
[\[10b.3\]]la bab bo/_/de nas zhal ta byed pa de khros nas mig btsums te mig 'di 'dra ba de yin pa lta zhes smras so/_/de skad smras nas/_dgra bcom pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag ni khyed kyi phyir sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po rnams dga' bar 
[\[10b.4\]]byas nas/_yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed na khyed ni bdag gi dad pas byin pa la longs spyod nas/_khyi bzhin du tshang du zhugs nas nyal zhing 'dug gam zhes byas so/_/de nas dgra bcom pa des bsams pa/_nyon mongs pa 'di ni dmas shing nyams 
[\[10b.5\]]par gyur te/_'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal chen po rnyed na mi rung ngo snyam du bsams nas 'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam ste/_zhal ta byed pa de la smras pa/_btsun pa khyod kyis nga su yin pa dang /_khyod bdag su yin pa shes sam/_des smras pa/_ngas 
[\[10b.6\]]shes te/_khyod kyang rab tu byung ba yin la nga yang rab tu byung ba yin no/_/dgra bcom pas smras pa/_'u bu cag gnyis rab tu byung bar 'dra mod kyi khyod ni bcing ba thams cad kyis bcings pa'i so so'i skye bo yin la/_nga ni bcing ba thams cad las nges par grol 
[\[10b.7\]]ba'i dgra bcom pa yin na khyod kyis tshig rtsub po smras kyis nyes pa la nyes so zhes bshags par gyis shig_/khyod 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal chen po rnyed ta re/_de skad thos pa'i mod la zhal ta byed pa de 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/_'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_bzod pa gsol nas lhag par yang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byas nas/_'chi kar smon 
[\[11a.2\]]lam btab pa/_kye ma bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang /_chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang /_gang du skye ba de dang der ci nas phyug cing nor mang la longs 
[\[11a.3\]]spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/
[\[11a.4\]]de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i sdig pa'i las de'i 'bras bu bdag gis rnyed par ma gyur cig_/
[\[11a.5\]]ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_dge tshul pa mig chung 'di nyid yin te/_des der dgra bcom pa de la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyir skyes te/_
[\[11a.6\]]gal te dge slong shA ri'i bus ma bsams su zin na/_phyin cad kyang tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du khyi 'ba' zhig tu de'u skyes so/_/khros nas des dgra bcom pa de nyid kyi mig ltar bcos te/_mig btsums nas mig 'di 'dra ba de yin pa lta zhes smras pa'i las de'i rnam par 
[\[11a.7\]]smin pas ni/_da ltar mir skyes na yang mig gnyis 'di 'dra bar gyur to/_/des der smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag ci nas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[11b.2\]]du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_da ltar phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang 
[\[11b.3\]]thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//rdzogs byed ces bya ba ni/_gleng 
[\[11b.4\]]gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa 
[\[11b.5\]]las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang khyim bdag de la bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir des lha rnams la yang gsol ba btab ste/_lha gu lang dang chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs 
[\[11b.6\]]pa la sogs pa dang kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_'jig rten na 
[\[11b.7\]]yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes grag mod kyi/_de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste/_dri za'i sems kyang rjes su chags pa dang 
[\[12a.2\]]ldan pa'am khong khro ba dang ldan pa rnam pa gnyis las gang yang rung bas skyes pa'o/_/de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed la sems can chen po che bar grags pa/_srid pa tha ma pa btsal bar bya ba rnyed pa thar pa'i skal ba can du gyur pa/_tshogs bsags pa mya 
[\[12a.3\]]ngan las 'das pa la nang du bltas pa/_'khor ba las phyi rol tu bltas pa/_srid par 'gro ba'i skye gnas rnams mi 'dod pa/_lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa zhig kyang de'i chung ma'i mngal du skyes so/_/bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos 
[\[12a.4\]]lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par yang shes la ma chags par yang shes pa dang dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang bu chags pa shes pa dang /_gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang /_khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na 
[\[12a.5\]]ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/_/gal te bu mo yin na ni/_lto g.yon logs na rten cing gnas so/_/de nas gang gi tshe de la bu chags par gyur pa de'i tshe de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa/_jo bo bdag la sras chags te/_bdag gi rum g.yas 
[\[12a.6\]]logs su rten cing gnas pa las na khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis/_dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/_de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/_bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi bu 
[\[12a.7\]]rung bar gyur cig mi rung bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig_/gsos na gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig_/nor skal la spyod par shog shig_/bdag gi rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par shog shig_/bdag cag 'das te shi 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/_sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon sngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/_/des bu chags par rig nas 
[\[12b.2\]]bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/_grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang 
[\[12b.3\]]lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/_kha ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing /_do shal dang se mo dos 
[\[12b.4\]]lus rnam par bklubs te/_lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du/_lus khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang /_khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /_des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod 
[\[12b.5\]]pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa byang chub kyi 
[\[12b.6\]]yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis 
[\[12b.7\]]nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun 
[\[13a.2\]]gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_
[\[13a.3\]]su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/
[\[13a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu nyan thos kyi 
[\[13a.5\]]mig gis 'jig rten la lta bar byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la bltas na/_srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zhig gis khyim bdag de'i khyim du nying mtshams sbyor bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsams pa sems can de sus/_
[\[13a.6\]]'dul bar 'gyur/_ci sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/_'on te nyan thos kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang des bdag nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khyim der song nas/_khyim bdag de la dus dus su chos ston to/_/des khyim 
[\[13a.7\]]bdag de dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas par byas so/_/skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la yang gnas par byas so/_/sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la yang dad par btsud de/_des ring po ma lon par/_khyim de slong ba rnams kyi chu dong dang 'dra bar 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]gyur par byas so//de nas phyi zhig na/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/_pha ma de gnyis brtan par bya ba'i phyir zla med pa dang /_g.yog med par gcig pu khyim der song ba dang khyim bdag des/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa zla med pa dang /_g.yog med 
[\[13b.2\]]par gcig pu 'ong bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du zla ma mchis pa dang /_zham ring ma mchis par gcig pu gshegs/_'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes dris so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags 
[\[13b.3\]]pas smras pa/_khyed cag lta bu 'ba' zhig gis byin pa ma gtogs par bdag cag la gud na g.yog gi 'byung khungs ga la yod/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_btsun pa ma 'gags pa bdag gi mchis brang la bu chags pa mchis kyis de las/_gal te khye'u zhig 
[\[13b.4\]]btsas par gyur na/_de bdag gis 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring du dbul lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin no/_/de skad ces smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa song ngo /_/khyim bdag 
[\[13b.5\]]de'i chung ma yang zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba sna legs pa smin ma stug pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas 
[\[13b.6\]]de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_bdag gi bu nam btsa' bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam du yun ring po nas/_bdag gis smon smon pa dang yun ring po nas bdag 'dod cing /_yid smon du bgyi bgyi ba de/_
[\[13b.7\]]khye'u 'dis yongs su rdzogs par byas pas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming rdzogs byed ces gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u rdzogs byed pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]brgyad la gtad nas/_de sred med kyi bu'i lag na thogs pa'i rma bya'i mdongs dang bsrung ba'i srad bu dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skyed drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa 
[\[14a.2\]]de'i tshe/_yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge 
[\[14a.3\]]mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/_khye'u de rab tu dbyung ba'i dus la bab par mthong nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos 
[\[14a.4\]]bgos te/_lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ste/_de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba las/_khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_stan bshams pa la 'dug go/_/'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/_
[\[14a.5\]]khyim bdag de la smras pa/_khyim bdag khye'u 'di ni ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas/_khyod kyis bdag gi g.yog tu byin te/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na/_de kho na ltar dam ma bcas sam/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa de 
[\[14a.6\]]kho na ltar dam bcas lags so zhes byas nas/_khye'u de lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phul nas smras pa/_bu khyod ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas/_'phags pa la ngas phul gyis song la 'phags pa'i zham ring gyis shig_/
[\[14a.7\]]khye'us smras pa/_de ni bdag la phan gdags pa lags so zhes byas nas/_khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/_gtsug lag khang du khrid nas/_rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byas 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]nas de la lung yang phog go/_/de nas de srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas kyang khyad par cung zad kyang ma thob nas/_de phyi zhig na nad kyis thebs nas/_de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu nad kyis thebs so zhes thos nas/_thos ma thag tu de'i pha ma gnyis 
[\[14b.2\]]kyis sman pa khrid de/_yo byad thams cad khyer nas/_gtsug lag khang du song ste/_yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang sos par byed ma nus nas/_de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gnyis gtsug lag khang du 'dug na ni khyim gyi bya ba mang 
[\[14b.3\]]po dag shor bar 'gyur na ma la bu 'di khyim du khrid la de nyid du nad g.yog bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag gnyis 'di na mchis na ni khyim gyi bgyi 
[\[14b.4\]]ba mang po dag shor bar 'gyur na/_bdag cag gnyis kyis bu 'di khyim du khrid de nad g.yog bgyi bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas bsams pa/_dge slong 'dis khyim de nyid du dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[14b.5\]]byed par 'gyur la/_pha ma gnyis dang khyim mi rnams kyang bden pa rnams la 'god par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/_khyed gnyis ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas de skad thos pa'i mod la/_khyim bdag 
[\[14b.6\]]des/_dge slong de bdag gi khyim du khrid de/_sman pa'i lung bzhin du yo byad thams cad kyis nad g.yog byas so/_/dge slong des kyang khyim de nyid na 'dug bzhin du nad kyis skyo bar gyur nas/_brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[14b.7\]]spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_des dgra bcom pa thob nas pha ma gnyis dang khyim gyi mi rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des pha ma gnyis bden pa rnams la bkod nas/_bdag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas 
[\[15a.2\]]rjes su dran par byed de/_bdag gang nas 'chi 'phos gang du skyes snyam du bsams nas/_des mi las shi 'phos te/_mi nyid du skyes la thams cad du yang nad mang ba dang /_tshe thung bar gyur par mthong nas/_des bsams pa bdag so so'i skye bor gyur pas/_
[\[15a.3\]]'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur la/_da ni bdag gis bya ba byas zin pas/_bdag la sdug bsngal 'di lta bu ci dgos kyis/_ma la bdag zhi ba'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang /_char 'bab 
[\[15a.4\]]pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan te/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_pha ma gnyis kyis de khyogs ras sngon po dang /_ser po dang dmar po dang 
[\[15a.5\]]dkar po rnams kyis brgyan pa'i steng du bzhag ste khyer bar byas na/_khyogs gdeg par ma nus nas/_de dag tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i thad du song ste bsnyad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas dran par byas te/_bsams na de nyid kyis/_de lta bur 
[\[15a.6\]]'gyur ba'i smon lam btab par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag chos gos dag gyon la/_dge slong de'i mchod pa'i las byed du 'dong ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das dge 
[\[15a.7\]]slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs kyang khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi bu rab tu byung nas/_de yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'das te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang de la mchod pa dang bkur stir mdzad par bzhed do zhes thos te/_de ltar rig nas/_des kyang de'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par byas te 'khor lnga brgya dang khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der dong ngo /_/khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[15b.2\]]zas sbyin dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang gna' mis kyang thos so/_/dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang /_dge bsnyen ma legs skyes mas kyang khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi bu rab tu byung nas/_de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 
[\[15b.3\]]de'i mchod pa dang bkur sti mdzad par bzhed do zhes thos so/_/thos nas de dag kyang 'khor dang bcas par der dong ste/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/_dge slong 'di yi sku gdung gi mchod pa bdag cag bgyid kyis/_
[\[15b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das 'o brgyal mi 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /_dge bsnyen gzhan dag gis dge slong de'i khyogs khyer 
[\[15b.5\]]nas/_dur khrod du chas te/_de'i phyi bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gzhan dag dang mchod pa dang bkur sti byed pa'i dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/_de dag gis dur khrod du khyer nas/_spos kyi shing sna tshogs btser te me sbar nas/_me de 
[\[15b.6\]]'o mas bsad de rus pa de rnams bsdus nas bum pa'i nang du bcug ste sa phyogs de nyid du sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas/_mchod rten de la mchod pa chen po byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15b.7\]]kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i gtam bka' stsal nas/_gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_dge slong rdzogs byed kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la nad mang bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rdzogs byed 'di nyid kyis sngon las byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags 
[\[16a.2\]]pa rnams ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_zin pa'i phung po dang /_
[\[16a.3\]]khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[16a.4\]]dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/_rgyal po'i pho brang bde ldan na/_rgyal po bde ba'i mdun na 'don pa/_bram ze mes byin la bu gnyis yod pa las gcig gis ni rgan po dang /_nad pa dang shi ba mthong nas nags kyi nang du 
[\[16a.5\]]rten bcas te/_de der song nas byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun dran par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes te/_chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor nas sems can la phan pa mdzad de/_yang 
[\[16a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces bya bar gyur to/_/cig shos ni 'dod pa la zhugs te bag med pa dang gzhan gyi chung ma la byi byed pa dang /_srog gcod pa byed par gyur te/_de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song nas/_sems can stong phrag du ma kha 'dog par 
[\[16a.7\]]byed do/_/der gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pho brang mdzes ldan du gshegs te/_yab sras gdan 'dzom pa de'i tshe mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs te/_sems can la phan pa mdzad do/_/de nas des gcung de sdig pa'i 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]las de las bzlog nas/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par mdzad do/_/des kyang rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[16b.2\]]bcas pa la phul te yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed 
[\[16b.3\]]par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram 
[\[16b.4\]]ze'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzogs byed 'di nyid yin te/_des der sems can stong phrag du ma kha btag pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der nad mang ba dang tshe thung bar gyur to/_/des der rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 
[\[16b.5\]]gtsug lag khang byas nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar 
[\[16b.6\]]gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la 
[\[16b.7\]]longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas yongs su 
[\[17a.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa na 'khor bzhi po rnams mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam btab pa'i dbang gis gyur to/_/'dis gang du smon lam btab pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[17a.3\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla 
[\[17a.4\]]na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las phyi zhig na/_de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu gzugs 
[\[17a.5\]]bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma la gsol te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu 
[\[17a.6\]]byung nas/_brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'khor ba'i lus 'dis bya ba byas zin gyis/_ma la da ni bdag zhi ba'i dbyings su 
[\[17a.7\]]'jug par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan te/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_mkhan pos de'i pha ma la sbran te/_de'i pha 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ma gnyis dang mkhan pos sku gdung gi mchod pa chen po byas nas mkhan pos smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[17b.2\]]'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang bcom ldan 
[\[17b.3\]]'das 'khor bzhi po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i las mdzad par shog cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzogs byed 'di nyid yin te/_des dgra bcom pa de la mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab 
[\[17b.4\]]pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs 
[\[17b.5\]]mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang 'khor 
[\[17b.6\]]bzhi po rnams kyis mchod pa'i las byas so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_sgur bu gnyis zhes bya ba de la/_sgur bu dang po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag 
[\[17b.7\]]phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_
[\[18a.2\]]'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang /_lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang 
[\[18a.3\]]spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa rnams bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi 
[\[18a.4\]]zhig na khye'u de nad kyis thebs nas de'i rgyab rlung gis sgur bur byas so/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas/_de la sman pa thams cad dang yo byad thams cad bsogs te rim gro byas kyang sos par byed ma nus so/_/de nas phyi zhig 
[\[18a.5\]]na khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa khye'u 'di sman pa thams cad kyis gso ma nus kyis/_da ni yon gnas rnams la gsol ba btab na/_de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/_de dag gis bdag gi bu'i rgyab snga mkho bzhin du rangs par byed nus kyang srid do 
[\[18a.6\]]snyam du bsams nas/_des rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug spyan drangs te/_rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_khyed ni 'di ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ci 
[\[18a.7\]]yang mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi rtogs pa mi mnga' ba lags na/_bdag gi bu 'di rlung gis rgyab sgur por bgyis pa de sos par mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/de dag gis kyang de la sngags dang sman mang du byas na/_'on kyang sos par byed ma nus so/_/de nas khyim 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]bdag de'i mdza' bo bshes pa'i grogs po sangs rgyas pa'i dge bsnyen zhig yod pa des/_de la smras pa grogs po skyabs ma yin pa 'di dag la skyabs btsal te ci bya/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song dang khyod kyi legs pa thams cad mdzad par 'gyur 
[\[18b.2\]]ro/_/des smras pa de ci shes pa zhig dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_de ni thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin no/_/de nas khyim bdag des thos ma thag tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[18b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtam gyi mjug 
[\[18b.4\]]rdzogs nas/_khyim bdag de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi khyim du bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes gsol to/_
[\[18b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/_rjes su yi rang nas bcom 
[\[18b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas phyag chab kyi chu ra bkang ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[18b.7\]]'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs pa dang khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas 
[\[19a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_
[\[19a.3\]]blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba 
[\[19a.4\]]de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mthong nas kyang khye'u de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes te/_shin tu dga' ba skyes nas/_de gus par bsgrim pa'i 
[\[19a.5\]]tshul gyis khri las langs so/_/de khri las langs pa'i mod la rgyab sgur ba de snga mkho bzhin du rangs par gyur to/_/de nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[19a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mchus gtugs nas 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das ni bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa ni/_bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas 
[\[19a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol lags te/_gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig 
[\[19b.2\]]nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khyim bdag de 'khor 
[\[19b.3\]]dang bcas pa dang khye'u des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag bden pa rnams la bkod nas/_chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par 
[\[19b.4\]]bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de'i blo skyes pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi 
[\[19b.5\]]bde ba rnam pa du ma ni bsal/_bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma ni bsgrubs/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni bsal/_dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni bsgrubs kyis bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad du 
[\[19b.6\]]'gro'o snyam du bsams te pha ma la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[19b.7\]]de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na bdag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]lo/_/de nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog_/tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas/_tshig de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/_spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo 
[\[20a.2\]]brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/_lag na ni lhung bzed dang /_chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni dgongs pas gos bgos 
[\[20a.3\]]nas/_/mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams 
[\[20a.4\]]gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur la/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes 
[\[20a.5\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[20a.6\]]ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong 'dis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyab sgur bur gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[20a.7\]]la brten te/_snga mkho bzhin du rangs par gyur nas/_'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong 'dis las byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[20b.2\]]sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na 
[\[20b.3\]]sI na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu mtshe ma gnyis byung ste/_de gnyis kyi btsas 
[\[20b.4\]]ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_gang gi tshe de gnyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe de gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa 
[\[20b.5\]]rnyed nas/_de gnyis kyis pha ma la gsol te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_bsnyen par rdzogs te de gnyis la mkhan pos smras pa/_bu gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis kyis gzung 
[\[20b.6\]]ba byed de/_bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo dang kha ton byed pa'i 'khor lo 'di gnyis yin na/_khyed gnyis kyis gang bya/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_thog mar re zhig kha ton la 'bad par bgyis la slad kyis bsam gtan bgyi'o/_/mkhan pos smras pa/_khyed 
[\[20b.7\]]gnyis ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du gyis shig ces byas nas/_des re zhig kha ton slob tu bcug go/_/de gnyis kyi nang na gcig ni rgod bag can zhig go/_/gcig ni brtan po zhig ste de ni gang gi tshe kha ton byas zin nas nyal bar byed de/_de'i tshe rgod bag can cig 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]shos kyis de nyal ba'i steng du yang dang yang ljid kyis 'bebs par byed nas/_des de la btsun pa bdag la yang dang yang du gnod pa ma byed cig ces byas kyang des de'i ngag ma mnyan to/_/de nas de khros nas de nyid snad par bya ba'i phyir drung du so 
[\[21a.2\]]phag cig bsgrengs te bzhag go/_/dge slong de yang de la gtse ba'i phyir yang 'ongs te/_de'i steng du ljid kyis phab nas de'i rgyab so phag de'i steng du phab ste/_rked pa chag nas de gzhi de las sdug bsngal chen po skyes so/_/de nas nu bo des kyang de'i lus kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[21a.3\]]mthong nas/_de yang sems kyi sdug bsngal chen po skyes te/_bdag gis mi dgos pa 'di lta bu byas pa nyes so snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des sman pa dang yo byad rnams sbyar te phu bo'i nad g.yog byas nas des ring po ma thogs par de'i rgyab sos par byas so/_/de 
[\[21a.4\]]gang gi tshe sos par gyur pa de'i tshe de shas cher skyo ba skyes te/_lus rul ba snying po med pa 'di ci dgos snyam nas/_des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/nu bo des kyang des bya ba byas par rtogs 
[\[21a.5\]]nas/_de de la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas de la bkur sti dang ldan pas g.yog byas so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la yang bkur sti byas nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_
[\[21a.6\]]bdag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bkur sti byas nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang /_yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis da dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs 
[\[21a.7\]]spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa'i las de'i skal ba can du bdag ma gyur cig_/ji ste bdag la las 
[\[21b.2\]]de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur na yang bdag gi lus dang sems kyi gnod pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bsal bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung 
[\[21b.3\]]bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/_de khros nas phu bo'i rked pa bcag pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der rked pa chag par gyur to/_/des der smon lam btab ste/_ji ste bdag la las de'i 'bras bu rnam 
[\[21b.4\]]par smin par gyur na yang bdag gi lus dang sems kyi gnod pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bsal bar gyur cig ces byas pa des na da ltar ngas 'di gnod pa gnyi ga las yongs su bskyabs so/_/des der smon lam btab ste/_bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang 
[\[21b.5\]]der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par 
[\[21b.6\]]byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_'di gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la 
[\[21b.7\]]longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//sgur bu gcig ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe dge slong ma tshon mo dga' 
[\[22a.2\]]mo dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba na 'dug pa las phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa nyan thos chen mo/_gnas brtan ma gnas brtan ma rdzu 'phrul thob pa de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di nas shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du yang song /_byang gi sgra 
[\[22a.3\]]mi snyan dang nub kyi ban lang spyod dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul dang gzhan yang ljongs 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i ljongs de dang de dag tu song nas kha zas gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag khyer nas 'ongs te/_za bar 
[\[22a.4\]]byed na/_bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul zhig thob na ni bdag kyang shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du yang song /_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang nub kyi ban lang spyod dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul dang /_gzhan yang ljongs 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye 
[\[22a.5\]]bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i ljongs de dang de dag tu song la/_kha zas gtsang ma bzang po mang po blangs te bza' ba zhig na/_ma la bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul bskyed par bya'o snyam mo/_/des yang bsams pa/_bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi man ngag ston nus pa su 
[\[22a.6\]]zhig yod/_gal te bdag dge slong ma rnams kyi thad du song na ni/_'di na dge slong ma rnams phrag dog can yin pas bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam mi ston to/_/dge slong rnams kyang snyan slebs par dka' ste/_bdag cag gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams 
[\[22a.7\]]la gtam zer du yang mi btub na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi man ngag ston pa lta ci smos kyis/_ma la bdag drug sde rnams kyi thad du song na ni/_de dag bdag gi gnyen yin pas/_rtag tu bdag gi don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang phan par 'dod pa yin la/_de 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]dag gis ni bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi man ngag ston kyang nus na bdag gis ji ltar bya/_thog ma kho nar bdag gis de dag la zang zing gis gcams la phyis bdag gis 'di dag la don de'i gsol ba gdab bo snyam bsams nas/_des de dag spyan drangs te/_rang
