[\[22b.2\]]gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa dag mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag ni rdzu 'phrul bsgrub par 'tshal la/_khyed kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par 
[\[22b.3\]]spyod kyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi man ngag bstan du gsol/_khyed kyi mthus bdag gis rdzu 'phrul bskyed par 'tshal lo/_/drug sde rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshon mo dga' mo/_rig pa su la'ang sbyin mi bya/_/rig dang mnyam du 'chi bar bya/_/yang 
[\[22b.4\]]na rig pas rig pa brje/_/yang na sri zhu nor phyir sbyin/_/zhes bya ba khyod kyis ma thos sam/_de lta mod kyi 'on kyang khyod nged las rdzu 'phrul bsgrub par 'dod na/_sngar je kho bo cag zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drongs la/_re re la yang yo byad rnam pa drug drug phul 
[\[22b.5\]]cig ces byas so/_/de nas des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi man ngag ston cig dang de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/drug sde pa rnams kyis smras pa/_che zhe khyod kyis thog mar je lus zon yang bar gyis dang /_phyis goms pa'i 
[\[22b.6\]]shugs kyis rdzu 'phrul dka' ba med do/_/des smras pa/_bdag gis thabs ci zhig gis lus zon yang bar bgyi/_de dag gis smras pa/_re zhig kha zas nyung du zo shig_/de nas dang po'i nyin par ni khri'u gcig gi steng du 'dzegs la mchongs shig_/de 
[\[22b.7\]]bzhin du phyi de nyin par khri'u nyis brtsegs byos la de'i steng du 'dzegs nas de la mchongs shig_/de bzhin du nyi ma gsum nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du khri'u bdun gcig gi steng du gcig brtsegs la de'i steng du 'dzegs te de las mchongs shig_/de bzhin du khang thog nas 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]kyang mchongs shig dang de'i tshe goms pa'i shugs kyis lus zon yang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu goms pa'i shugs kyis rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu tshon mo dga' mos/_ji ltar de dag gis man ngag bstan pa de bzhin du 
[\[23a.2\]]byas nas zhag bdun pa'i nyin par des khri'u bdun brtsegs las mchongs nas rked pa chag go/_/de nas des drug sde rnams la bsnyad de/_'phags pa dag bdag 'di kho na ltar gyur gyis ma mchis na/_da bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes byas so/_/drug sde rnams kyis 
[\[23a.3\]]de la smras pa/_bdag cag gis ci shes pa'i man ngag ni khyod la bstan zin te/_thabs 'dis na khyod kyi lus zon yang bar gyur la/_phyis rdzu 'phrul yang dka' ba med do/_/de phan cad ji ltar bya ba ni khyod nyid shes par zad do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu tshon mo 
[\[23a.4\]]dga' mo khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes nas/_des gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa de dag tshar bcad de zhe gcod pa'i tshig gis dmus phyung nas gtsug lag khang nas bskrad do/_/skye bo phal po che la yang don de bsnyad nas kha byas te smod cing 'phyas so/_/de nas 
[\[23a.5\]]skabs de dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol te 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa dge slong ma tshon mo dga' mo rdzu 'phrul gyi slad du dmas shing nyams par gyur la/_des dgung zla gsum gyi bar du g.yar drangs pa dang /_lhung bzed dang chos gos mang pos 
[\[23a.6\]]kyang bgod la/_des rdzu 'phrul yang ma thob pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma tshon mo dga' mo ni drug sde rnams kyis da ltar 'ba' zhig brid par ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag nyid kyis brid de/_don de yang 
[\[23a.7\]]ma grub pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/_rgyal po de'i pho brang na khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhig gsar du byed pa der shing mkhan mang po zhig las byed de/_de dag gis sdong po yon po gang 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]yin pa de dag thig gis btab nas drang por srong bar byed pa dang /_rgyal po de'i dkor ba bud med sgur mo zhig 'dug pa des/_shing mkhan de dag gis sdong po yon po rnams thig gis btab nas drang por srong bar byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i blo skyes pa shing 
[\[23b.2\]]mkhan 'di dag ni mkhas te 'di ltar sdong po mkhrang la reg na rtsub pa dag kyang drang por srong nus na/_bdag gi rgyab 'jam zhing mnyen pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_ji ste srong mi nus snyam bsams nas/_de dag gi thad du song ste smras pa/_kye khyed rnams kyis bdag 
[\[23b.3\]]gi rgyab sgur ba bsrang bar nus sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_nged kyis nus ni nus mod kyi 'on kyang sngar ji kho bo cag la rngan pa byin te/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du g.yar drongs la gos dang rgyan mang po dag kyang byin cig dang de'i 'og tu kho bo cag gis khyod kyi rgyab drang por 
[\[23b.4\]]bsrang ngo /_/des smras pa/_khyed ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas des de dag zla ba gsum gyi bar du bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos bkur nas/_tha ma'i nyin par gos dang rgyan dag kyang byin te smras pa/_bdag gis khyed la rngan pa stsal lags 
[\[23b.5\]]kyis/_da ni khyed kyis bdag gi rgyab sgur ba drang por srong shig_/de dag gis smras pa che zhe bdag cag gis ni sdong po yon po rnams thig gis btab nas sta res bzhogs te drang por srong na/_gal te khyod kyis gnod pa de lta bu bzod nus na ni/_bdag cag gis khyod 
[\[23b.6\]]kyi rgyab thig gis btab ste sta res bzhogs la drang por bsrang ngo /_/des smras pa/_thabs des ni bdag 'chi bar 'gyur te/_bdag 'tsho ba'i skabs kyang med do/_/shing mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag gi shes pa ni de kho nar zad de/_de phan cad ji ltar 
[\[23b.7\]]bya ba ni khyod nyid shes su zad do/_/de nas de skyengs te re thag chad nas/_kha rog par 'dug ste/_su la yang cung zad kyang smra ba ma phod do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe/_rgan mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni tshon mo dga' mo 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe shing 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]mkhan du gyur pa de dag ni drug sde 'di dag nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di de dag gis brid nas don de ma grub bo/_/da ltar yang 'di de dag gis brid nas 'di rdzu 'phrul yang ma grub pa yin no//_//'char ka zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i 
[\[24a.2\]]khab na bzhugs te der gang gi tshe/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa de'i tshe des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rnam pa du ma ni bsal/_
[\[24a.3\]]bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma ni bsgrubs/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni bsal/_dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni bsgrubs na/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin ji ltar bsab par bya snyam mo/_/de nas des bsams pa sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[24a.4\]]ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'byung bar zad kyis/_ma la bdag gis kyang sems can la phan par bya gor ma chag snyam nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta yod dam snyam pa dang /_des yul kau shAM bI na gnas pa'i skye bo 
[\[24a.5\]]phal cher bdag gis gdul bar 'gyur ba mthong nas/_ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab tu gnas nas des sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/_lhung bzed thogs nas yul kau shAM bI na ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ste de mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ba las yul kau shAM bIr phyin nas/_
[\[24a.6\]]kau shAM bI na khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba na gnas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa de yang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes grags so/_/de nas kau shAM bI na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos 'phags pa piN+Do la ba ra d+hA dza ljongs rgyu zhing 
[\[24a.7\]]yul kau shAM bIr 'ongs te/_kau shAM bI na khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba na 'dug go zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang sde tshan nas sde tshan du 'dus shing tshogs te/_kau shAM bI nas byung nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza ga la ba der song ste 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]lhags nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas/_de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_kau shAM bI na 
[\[24b.2\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus pa rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni spyi bo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun 
[\[24b.3\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha 
[\[24b.4\]]cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_
[\[24b.5\]]kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do/_/de dag gis 
[\[24b.6\]]bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa las brten te bdag cag sems can 
[\[24b.7\]]dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams las bton nas/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gom pa 'dor du bcug ste/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/_rus pa'i la ni bsgral/_thog ma med pa nas goms pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag ni bor te bsal to/_/'phags pa 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]bdag cag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag cag las zhal zas dang na bza' dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams bzhes par ci gnang zhes byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas smras pa/_grogs po dag gzhan dag la yang 
[\[25a.2\]]phan gdags dgos kyis thong shig_/de nas kau shAM bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas smras pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[25a.3\]]bden pa mthong ba de dag dus dus su tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza'i thad du 'dong zhing chos nyan to/_/de nas phyi zhig na kau shAM bI na gnas pa'i tshogs nas tshogs dang 'dus pa nas 'dus pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams/_'dus shing tshogs te 'dong bar byed la/_bad sa'i rgyal po 
[\[25a.4\]]'char ka yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du dong ba dang /_bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas/_kau shAM bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams/_khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra bar 'dong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po 
[\[25a.5\]]rnams la dris pa/_yul mi 'di dag gar 'dong blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha mdun na 'don gyi bu piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis pa des khyim dang cod pan ma mchis pa'i rgyal srid bor nas rab tu byung ste/_de ljongs rgyu zhing mchis pa las kau shAM bIr mchis 
[\[25a.6\]]nas/_kau shAM bI na khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba na gnas te/_'di dag ni de la blta ba'i slad du mchis pa lags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal pos smras pa/_de ni nga'i yang yun ring po nas snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang mkhan po dang 
[\[25a.7\]]dran par bya ba yin gyis nga yang de la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro zhes byas nas/_khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ba dang /_gnas brtan des rgyal po bsu yang ma bsu langs kyang ma langs so/_/de nas mthong ma thag 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]tu rgyal po khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen pos non te/_khros nas gnas brtan la bsnyen bkur byas te song ngo /_/de nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/_khyed kyis nga'i yul na 'dug pa'i mdun na 'don gyi bu rab tu byung ba piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza 'di la ltos dang /_khos nga 
[\[25b.2\]]mthong na bsu yang ma bsu langs kyang ma langs so zhes byas so/_/de nas blon po sdang ba rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma bsu ba dang ma langs pa 'di ni des 'tsham par bgyis pa ma lags so zhes byas nas/_de dag gis rgyal po de lhag par snying na bar 
[\[25b.3\]]byas te/_gzhi des rgyal po de lhag par yang mi dga' bar gyur nas/_de khros te dpung gi tshogs de dag dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song nas phyir log ste gtsug lag khang de nyid kyi 'dab tu song nas bsams pa/_nga dge slong de la blta ba'i phyir yang song la/_gal te des nga mthong na 
[\[25b.4\]]bsu yang mi bsu ldang yang mi ldang bar gyur na ni/_de mgo bo bcad de dor ro snyam du bsams nas/_de khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra bar yang song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka bdag la blta ba'i phyir yang 'ongs so 
[\[25b.5\]]zhes thos so/_/de nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po de ci'i phyir yang bdag la ltar 'ong snyam du bsams pa dang /_des gal te dge slong 'di bdag bsu bar yang mi byed ldang bar yang mi byed par gyur na/_'di'i mgo 'ud por bcad de sa la dor ro snyam du sdang ba'i sems kyis 'ongs par des 
[\[25b.6\]]mthong ste/_des rgyal po de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas/_ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gom pa drug bor nas bsu ba dang /_bsu ba'i mod la rgyal po de'i lus las 'od 'byung ba de med par gyur te sa yang gas so/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu rgyal po de skrag nas/_
[\[25b.7\]]dge slong 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba zhig ste/_bdag 'di la sdang ba'i sems kyis song ba las 'di'i mthus bdag gi 'od med par gyur la sa yang gas par gyur to snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza ga la ba der song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]smras pa/_'phags pa bdag byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa'i nongs pa bzod par gsol/_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ngas ni bzod mod kyi rang gi sems la bzod pa gsol cig ces byas so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_btsun pa bdag rgyal srid 
[\[26a.2\]]las nyams pa 'am srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur lags grang /_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ma skrag shig ma skrag shig_/khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta mod kyi bdag gis khyod la gom pa drug bsu 
[\[26a.3\]]ba des na khyod zla ba drug gi bar du rgyal srid stor bar 'gyur te/_zla ba drug lon nas phyir yang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang bdag la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /_sems dga' bar byas ma thag pa des na khyod sa'i 'og tu nub par mi 'gyur la/_khyod kyi 
[\[26a.4\]]'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang slar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal pos gnas brtan la sems dga' ba bskyed de/_sems dga' ba bskyed pa'i mod la de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang slar byung la sa gas pa yang slar 'byor bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[26a.5\]]de gnas brtan la lhag par yang dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas gnas brtan gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gnas brtan gyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[26a.6\]]shor du song ba dang /_de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis mig blangs te song nas dpung gi tshogs kyang logs shig tu song rgyal po yang logs shig tu song ste/_de dpung gi tshogs dang bral nas 'brog 'chol te/_ba lang gi lhas zhig tu song nas de der sus kyang ngo ma shes la des kyang su 
[\[26a.7\]]yang ngo mi shes te/_de myos nas de zla ba drug gi bar du ba lang gi lhas de nyid na 'dug go/_/de nas de bu dang blon po dang zham ring 'khor rnams kyis kyang btsal ba las ma rnyed nas slar rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ong ste/_bdag cag gis ma rnyed na ji ltar bya/_gar song zhig gu snyam nas 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]kha rog ste 'khod do/_/de nas zla ba drug lon pa dang rgyal po de gzhan gyis mthong nas ngo shes te lha khyod ga las gshegs te 'dir byon ces dris so/_/rgyal po de yang sems rtas nas des ba lang rdzi de la ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bsnyad do/_/ba lang rdzis smras pa/_lha thugs 
[\[26b.2\]]rton la spro ba chen po bskyed du gsol dang /_bdag gis khyod nyid kyi pho brang du bskyal lo zhes smras nas/_ba lang rdzi des rgyal po de khrid de/_kau shAM bI logs su chas so/_/blon po rigs pa'i mun 'dzin gyi bu zhes bya bas kyang zla ba drug lon pa dang yid la dran te rgyal po de gar 
[\[26b.3\]]gshegs zhig gu bdag cag gis btsal dgos so/_/gal te bdag cag gis gson por rnyed na ni de nyid rgyal po mdzad par zad do/_/de ma yin te nongs par gyur na ni sras rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug go snyam du bsams nas/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[26b.4\]]bzhi go bskon te/_grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu tshol du dong ba las/_blon po rigs pa'i mun 'dzin gyi bus bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka thag ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ches te/_bad sa'i 
[\[26b.5\]]rgyal po 'char ka ga la ba der song nas snyun gsol te/_lha gang du gshegs zhes dris so/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad do/_/blon po rigs pa'i mun 'dzin gyi bus smras pa/_lha 'di ni 'phags pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas ji skad 
[\[26b.6\]]du lung bstan pa thams cad de kho na bzhin du gyur pa lags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de gnas brtan la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/_des bsams pa/_re zhig bdag grong khyer du 'gro ba btang la 'phags pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza de nyid la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du bsams 
[\[26b.7\]]nas/_kau shAM bIr ma song bar khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste/_de ji srid du/_bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas song nas/_bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar song nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza ga 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/gnas brtan gyis kyang de la/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la 
[\[27a.2\]]ba ra d+h+wa dza'i gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de smras pa/_'phags pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung bdun gyi bar du bdag gi der 
[\[27a.3\]]bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te rkang 
[\[27a.4\]]pa la phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza'i thad nas song ngo /_/de nas des zhag bdun gyi bar du tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza 'khor dang bcas pa bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par re re la yang ras zung re 
[\[27a.5\]]phul te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dzas kyang de dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas so/_/chos 
[\[27a.6\]]kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ji srid dgyes pa'i bar du 
[\[27a.7\]]bzhugs nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas kau shAM bI ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs pa las mthar gyis kau shAM bIr byon te/_kau shAM bI na khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_kau shAM bIr byon nas kau shAM bI na khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste 
[\[27b.2\]]phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs 
[\[27b.3\]]bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char 
[\[27b.4\]]kas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[27b.5\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par dgung zla gsum gyi bar tu bdag las na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams bzhes par ci gnang zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka la cang mi 
[\[27b.6\]]gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra bar yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum 
[\[27b.7\]]gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas song ngo /_/de yang dus dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas chos mnyan par byed do/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan nas lhag par yang tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza 'ba' zhig gi thad du bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas the tsom skyes te rgyal po 'di ci'i phyir/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza 'ba' 
[\[28a.2\]]zhig la lhag par bkur sti byed zhig gu snyam nas de dag gis gtam de rgyas par thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza'i thad du 
[\[28a.3\]]mchis nas/_gzhi des na de'i 'od ma mchis par gyur te dog sa la yang de'u nub pa las/_gang gi tshe des slar sems dga' ba bskyed pa de'i tshe 'od de yang slar byung bar gyur la/_dog sa gas pa yang slar 'byor par gyur pa la gzigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[28a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de ni da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang grong khyer 'bras 'phel zhes bya ba na rgyal po lhun po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_
[\[28a.5\]]rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/de nas rgyal po de'i 
[\[28a.6\]]mdun na 'don des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis re zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas 
[\[28a.7\]]ston rgyas par byas te/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]sbra dang cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang 
[\[28b.2\]]ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/phyi zhig na des bdag gi pha chos dang /_chos ma yin pas rgyal srid 
[\[28b.3\]]'dzin pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bsams pa pha shi ba'i 'og tu bdag gi cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid 'dzin pa'i bar du gyur gyis/_bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la nags 'dab tu gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas pha ma la gsol te nags 'dab tu gnas bcas so/_/
[\[28b.4\]]de der song nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de rgyal po'i pho brang 'bras 'phel du phyin nas/_de'i phas bu de'i phyir bdag gi skyed mos tshal du yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phub nas yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/_de la dus 
[\[28b.5\]]dus su skye bo phal po che 'dong zhing chos nyan par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po lhun pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ba dang /_rgyal pos skye bo phal po che mdun na 'don gyi skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[28b.6\]]kyang skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gar 'dong zhes dris so/_/blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha mdun na 'don gyi bu de rab tu byung ste de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar yang gyur te 'di dag ni de la blta ba'i slad du mchi ba lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_de ni nga yi 
[\[28b.7\]]yang snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang /_mkhan po dang dran par bya ba yin gyis nga yang de blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas/_rgyal po de drang srong ga la ba der song ba dang /_drang srong des de mthong nas bsu yang ma bsu langs kyang ma langs so/_/de nas de mthong 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]ma thag tu rgyal po de khro ba chen pos non nas/_'di nga yi yul na 'dug pa'i mdun na 'don gyi bu yin la/_nga 'ongs na bsu yang ma bsu langs kyang ma langs kyis 'di'i mgo bo bcad de bor ro snyam du bsams pa dang /_rgyal po de'i lus las 'od 'byung ba de 
[\[29a.2\]]des sems bskyed ma thag tu 'od med par gyur to/_/sa yang gas te der nub tu byed pa dang de mthong ma thag tu rgyal po de 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/_drang srong de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig yin no snyam nas dga' ba chen po skyes so/_/de nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 
[\[29a.3\]]'tshal nas bzod pa gsol to/_/de nas drang srong gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ngas ni bzod mod kyi 'on kyang rang gi sems la bzod pa gsol cig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal po skrag nas drang srong de la smras pa/_drang srong bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am srog gi 
[\[29a.4\]]bar chad du mi 'gyur lags grang /_drang srong gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ma skrag shig_/khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta mod kyi khyod kyis bdag la sems sdang bar byas pa des na khyod kyi 'od de med par gyur 
[\[29a.5\]]la sa yang gas par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis slar bdag la dga' ba'i sems bskyed na ni/_khyod kyi 'od de slar snga mkho bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po des drang srong de la sems dga' ba skyes nas/_de'i 'od de snga mkho bzhin du byung 
[\[29a.6\]]bar gyur la/_sa yang slar 'byor bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni piN+Do la ba ra d+h+wa dza 'di nyid yin no/_/rgyal po lhun por gyur pa de ni bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis de la sems sdang 
[\[29a.7\]]bar byas pas de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor med par gyur la sa yang gas par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe phyir sems dga' ba bskyed pa de'i tshe ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor de yang byung la/_sa gas pa yang phyir 'byor bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'dis de la sems sdang bar byas pas 'di'i 'od 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]kyang med par gyur la sa yang gas so/_/gang gi tshe 'dis de la sems dga' ba bskyed pa de'i tshe ni 'di'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang byung bar gyur la sa gas pa yang 'byor bar gyur to//_//rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA 
[\[29b.2\]]rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram 
[\[29b.3\]]shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po de'i btsun mo la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas 
[\[29b.4\]]nas/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/kA shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo yang yin la gzugs kyang mdzes pas na/_bu mo 'di'i ming kA shi mdzes ldan ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo kA shi mdzes 
[\[29b.5\]]ldan ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang /_zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi 
[\[29b.6\]]pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur te/_sgyu rtsal shes par gyur pa de'i tshe/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma gnyis la gsol te/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bkur sti byas so/_/de gang gi tshe chen mor 
[\[29b.7\]]gyur pa de'i tshe/_kA shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/_'jig rten na bu mo de dang 'dra ba gzhan med do zhes kun tu grags pas rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug 'dod chags kyi mdas phog 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]nas/_de dag thams cad kyis kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/_de dag re re nas bu mo de nga la byin cig ces spring ngo /_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin sems khongs su chud cing 'dug ste/_gal te bu mo 'di gcig la byin 
[\[30a.2\]]na ni/_gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur na su la byin par bya snyam bsams nas gang la yang sbyin mi 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug gis bsams pa/_des bdag cag la dad pas bu mo byin par mi 'gyur gyis der song la mthus dbrog 
[\[30a.3\]]go snyam du bsams te/_thams cad kyis nyi ma gcig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas grong khyer bA rA Na sIr dong ste/_kho ra khor yug nas bskor to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bdag nyid pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par rig nas khang 
[\[30a.4\]{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du song ste/_lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas/_da bdag gis ji ltar bya snyam ste sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas kA shi mdzes ldan mas rgyal po khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du song nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[30a.5\]]kyang pha la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab ci'i slad du khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du gshegs nas/_phyag la rkom tshugs bcas te sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo khyod nyid kyi phyir ro/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab bdag byad bzhin ngan lags 
[\[30a.6\]]sam ci na bdag gi slad du yab sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo khyod yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang ldan pas/_de'i phyir nga sems khongs su chud cing 'dug ste/_khyod nyid kyi phyir nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug 'khrugs nas dpung gi tshogs 
[\[30a.7\]]yan lag bzhi go bskon te lhags nas ba ra NA sIr bskor te 'khod do/_/kA shi mdzes ldan mas smras pa/_yab bu mo dag la rang nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam pa ma mchis lags sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo 'dam pa yod do/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab bdag 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo khyod nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la nga bzlugs kyi bar du sdod cig ces byas nas/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis nyi 'og gi rgyal po de dag thams cad la bzlugs te/_kA shi mdzes ldan ma ni rang 
[\[30b.2\]]nyid khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis gal te khyed 'dod na 'dam du gzhug go/_/de nas der so so nas bsams pa de ni nga lta bu btang ste/_gzhan 'dam par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa/_des ma nongs kyis 'dam du stsol cig_/de nas pho nya de phyir song nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin 
[\[30b.3\]]la bsnyad de/_de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/rgyal po drug po de dag gis kyang gcig la gcig bzlugs nas/_yid ches pa'i mna' mtho bcad de mjal dum byas nas sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu khang pa brtsegs pa tshar du sbrengs 
[\[30b.4\]]te rang rang gi g.yog 'khor dang rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa'i seng ge'i khri dag la 'dug cing 'khod do/_/kA shi mdzes ldan ma yang bzhon pa bzang po la zhon te/_bu mo dag gis g.yog byas nas chas gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs te/_bA rA Na sI nas byung nas de 
[\[30b.5\]]dag thams cad kyi dbus nas thal te/_drang srong smra ba logs su kha bltas nas bcom ldan 'das logs su me tog gi chun po bor te smras pa/_bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la skyabs su mchi'o zhes byas nas/_shing rta de drang srong smra ba logs su kha bsgyur to/_/de 
[\[30b.6\]]nas rgyal po de dag dang skye bo phal po che de dag ya mtshan du gyur te/_'di 'di ltar byad gzugs mdzes la 'dod pa rnams la yang mi lta ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag de nyid kyi phyi gzhin du 'brang ste re zhig 'dong la 'di ci byed pa blta'o zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas kA shi mdzes 
[\[30b.7\]]ldan ma drang srong smra ba ga la ba der song ste/_de ci srid du bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas song nas/_bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]phyag 'tshal te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen 
[\[31a.2\]]par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'gugs pa btang ste de la gtad do/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs 
[\[31a.3\]]kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_
[\[31a.4\]]gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags 
[\[31a.5\]]pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/skye bo phal po che de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[31a.6\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan nas rang rang gi yul du dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong 
[\[31a.7\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das kA shi mdzes ldan mas las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang byad gzugs dpe ma mchis par gyur la 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]des bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi 
[\[31b.2\]]dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[31b.3\]]zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che 
[\[31b.4\]]ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de 
[\[31b.5\]]zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag 
[\[31b.6\]]par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma la gsol te/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas/_sangs rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa 
[\[31b.7\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul te/_dge slong rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas pha ma gnyis la gsol te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to/_/de nas des bsams pa/_thos par bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis byas zin gyis/_ma la da ni bdag gis bsam gtan la 'bad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_yid la byed pa'i lung mnos te srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar 
[\[32a.2\]]brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pas byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed nas/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams 
[\[32a.3\]]dag byas pa dang rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der ci nas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye ba dang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang byad gzugs dpe med par gyur cig_/
[\[32a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te 
[\[32a.5\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ma gang yin pa de ni kA shi mdzes ldan ma 'di nyid yin te/_des der sbyin pa dag byin zhing 
[\[32a.6\]]bsod nams dag byas pa dang tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye ba dang /_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang byad gzugs 
[\[32a.7\]]dpe med par gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes 
[\[32b.2\]]pa dang byad gzugs dpe med par gyur te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga 
[\[32b.3\]]nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/des der byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der byad gzugs dpe med par gyur to//_//
[\[32b.4\]]las brgya tham pa/_bam po gsum pa/_bde byed ma zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed la/_bA rA Na sI na ni rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed pa las de gnyis phan tshun 
[\[32b.5\]]mi 'thun par gyur te/_dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te ko sa la'i yul du song nas chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du phru ma btab ste 'khod do/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang 
[\[32b.6\]]rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_bdag dang g.yul 'gyed du 'ongs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas kA shi'i rgyal po dang g.yul 'gyed du song ste/_des kyang chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du 
[\[32b.7\]]phru ma btab ste 'khod do/_/de nas de gnyis de na 'khod pas phan tshun du skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/de gnyis ka yang mthu che zhing tshugs par dka' ba yin te/_de gnyis gcig gis gcig mi thub cing 'dug go/_/de nas phyi zhig na de kho na 'khod bzhin du rgyal po gsal 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]rgyal gyi bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig kyang btsas nas/_der de gnyis so so'i pho brang 'khor du dga' ba'i rol mo brdungs so/_/de 
[\[33a.2\]]nas de gnyis kyis phan tshun du thos nas 'dir dga' ba'i rol mo brdungs pa de ci zhig ces dris nas blon po rnams kyis bsnyad de/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ni bu mo btsas/_lha'i ni sras po bltam mo zhes byas so/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po rnams kyis kyang bsnyad de/_
[\[33a.3\]]lha'i ni sras mo bltam/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi ni bu pho btsas so zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de gnyis dga' bar gyur te/_bdag cag gnyis phan tshun dgrar mi byed par gnyen byed pa'i thabs rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rgyal 
[\[33a.4\]]po gsal rgyal la pho nya btang ste/_khyod kyi bu mo btsas pa de bdag gi bu 'di'i chung mar byin cig ces spring ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa thabs 'dis ni bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des kyang de la pho nya btang ste ji ltar 
[\[33a.5\]]dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas/_de gnyis gcig la gcig bzod pa gsol te mdza' bo byas nas gcig gis kyang bu mo la gos dang rgyan mang po bskur ro/_/gcig gis kyang khye'u la gos dang rgyan mang po bskur te/_de gnyis phan tshun gnyen du byas nas mgul nas 'jus te 
[\[33a.6\]]yul de nas dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa bu mo 'di btsas pas nga rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang bde bar gyur to snyam nas/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_ming bde byed ma zhes btags so/_/de nas bu mo bde byed ma 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang 
[\[33a.7\]]zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/_des skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas/_sbyin pa dag 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]byin te bsod nams dag byas so/_/dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro zhing chos nyan to/_/de nas phyi zhig na des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs nas/_rdzu 'phrul chen mo mthu chen mo rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[33b.2\]]la bsam gtan par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na des pha ma gnyis kyi mdun du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan te smras pa/_yab yum bdag gis ni chos 'di lta bu thob pas na 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa'i rngo mi thogs kyis/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 
[\[33b.3\]]'byung ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod btsas ma thag tu bdag cag gis khyim thab la byin zin gyis bdag cag gis gnang bar byar mi rung ngo /_/de lta mod kyi bdag cag gis de la bzlugs te/_de dang bdag cag ci nas phyis 'khon 
[\[33b.4\]]du mi 'gyur bar byas la/_bag ma len pa 'ongs nas khyod nyid kyis khyim thab la gsol ba thob la rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/_bu mo bde byed ma ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod de bzlog par mi 
[\[33b.5\]]nus kyi ma thogs par bag ma long shig ces spring ngo /_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang pho nya btang ste/_tshes grangs 'di la 'ong gis bag ma btang ba'i sta gon gyis shig ces spring ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos ma thag tu bag ma btang ba'i sta gon byas so/_/
[\[33b.6\]]rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang bu 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas btang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de bkur sti chen pos mnyan du yod par g.yar drangs so/_/g.yar drangs nas rang gi pho brang du stegs bu byas te/_rgyan gyis brgyan nas 
[\[33b.7\]]der skye bo phal cher 'dus so/_/bu mo de yang rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs nas stegs bu brgyan pa de'i steng du drangs te bzhag go/_/khye'u de yang stegs bu brgyan pa de'i steng du btang ste bu mo bde byed ma drang bar byas pa las/_de'i steng gi bar snang la 'phags te 'bar ba dang /_lam 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to/_/de nas khye'u de dang skye bo de dag gis mthong ma thag tu bde byed ma la dga' ba chen po skyes so/_/de nas khye'u des bsams pa/_gal te 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob pa 
[\[34a.2\]]yin na/_'di bdag dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa yongs su spyod par ga la 'gyur snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_bzang mo mar spyon dang khyod nyid ci dgar 'dam du gzhug go/_/bde byed mas smras pa/_jo bo bdag ni 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa'i rngo mi thogs kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34a.3\]]kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzod cig_/khye'us smras pa/_gnang ngo /_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bu mo bde byed ma babs te/_des skye bo'i tshogs de dag la chos bstan nas pha ma gnyis la gsol te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/_de bcom ldan 
[\[34a.4\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i 
[\[34a.5\]]dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la gtad do/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung 
[\[34a.6\]]yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag 
[\[34a.7\]]mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang sa so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/bde byed ma de ltar rab tu byung nas rgyal po'i bu des bsams pa/_bud med kyis kyang 'di lta bu'i 
[\[34b.2\]]chos rtogs par 'gyur na/_ma la bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gor ma chag snyam du bsams nas des kyang pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[34b.3\]]cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa/_bu mo bde byed ma dang rgyal po'i bu des las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_'di gnyis 
[\[34b.4\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi 
[\[34b.5\]]dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[34b.6\]]rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na/_khyim bdag phyug cing 
[\[34b.7\]]nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_de gnyis 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]gcig la gcig smras pa/_bzang mo bdag cag gnyis la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu ci bdog pa 'di dag rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gnyis gson gyi bar du ji 'di dag 'jig rten pha rol tu bskya'o zhes zer 
[\[35a.2\]]nas/_de bza' bran gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul te yo byad thams cad sbyar nas dge slong rnams 
[\[35a.3\]]la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyi blo skyes pa/_bdag cag gnyis khyim na gnas pa btang la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes zer nas khyim gyi 'khor btang ste/_sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod 
[\[35a.4\]]nams dag byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas de gnyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob pas/_de gnyis kyis 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma bdag cag 
[\[35a.5\]]gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis ci nas gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing 
[\[35a.6\]]nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gnyis kyis 
[\[35a.7\]]mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bza' bran du gyur 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni bde byed ma 'di nyid dang rgyal po'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_de gnyis kyis der sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing 
[\[35b.2\]]nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur 
[\[35b.3\]]nas/_'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs 
[\[35b.4\]]te/_de'i tshe lha'i bu nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos mdzes par byas pa/_lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang 'od shin tu che ba dang ldan pa/_'od 'phags pa des lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang 
[\[35b.5\]]ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_nam sros pa dang mnyan du yod pa'i nang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang ku mu da dang 
[\[35b.6\]]pad ma dkar po rnams dang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams 
[\[35b.7\]]dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas lha'i bu des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur len pa la gnas pa de dag gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 
[\[36a.2\]]tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag gis bsams pa/_ci mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs sam snyam nas/_bcom 
[\[36a.3\]]ldan 'das la don de zhus pa/_btsun pa ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdang sum mi 
[\[36a.4\]]mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/_lha'i bu nor bu'i 'od lha'i gzhal med khang 'od shin tu che ba dang ldan pa/_'od 'phags pa de mdang sum nga la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 
[\[36a.5\]]'ongs nas/_de 'ongs pa la ngas chos bstan te/_des nga las chos thos nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/btsun pa lha'i bu des las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas lhar skyes te/_
[\[36a.6\]]nor bu rin po che'i gnas su grub par gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nor bu'i 'od 'di nyid kyis sngon las byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag las 
[\[36a.7\]]byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur la/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das 
[\[36b.2\]]pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[36b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na/_khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[36b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dbu skra dang sen mo blangs nas/_dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dang rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/_des gtsug lag khang der yo byad thams cad phul lo/_/mchod rten de'i char khab la yang nor bu rin po che btags te/_
[\[36b.5\]]de'i mthus mchod rten dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang de mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar gyur to/_/de nas des gtsug lag khang de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul lo/_/dge slong rnams la yang yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen 
[\[36b.6\]]bkur byas so/_/tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang bsrungs nas/_lha'i nang du skyes so/_/der skyes nas de'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang grub par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag gang gis yang dag 
[\[36b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la mchod rten dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas nor bu rin po che btags pa de ni/_lha'i bu'i nor bu'i 'od 'di yin te/_des der rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i mchod rten dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul ba dang mchod rten de la nor bu rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lha'i nang du skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang 
[\[37a.2\]]shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so//_//sna ma'i me tog ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_khyim bdag phyug 
[\[37a.3\]]cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_
[\[37a.4\]]khyim bdag de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_lha gu lang dang /_chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dang 
[\[37a.5\]]lhan cig skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/_'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes grags mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin [(]ta [,]te [)]/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus 
[\[37a.6\]]bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/_re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs te/_de ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las/_bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa 
[\[37a.7\]]dang ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste/_dri za'i sems kyang rjes su chags pa dang ldan pa'am/_khong khro ba dang ldan pa rnam pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba skyes pa'o/_/de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed la/_sems can chen 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]po che bar grags pa/_srid pa tha ma btsal bar bya ba rnyed pa thar pa'i skal ba can du gyur pa/_tshogs bsags pa mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du bltas pa/_'khor ba las phyi rol tu bltas pa srid par 'gro ba'i skye gnas rnams mi 'dod pa lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa zhig kyang 
[\[37b.2\]]de'i chung ma'i mngal du skyes so/_/bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par yang shes la ma chags par yang shes pa dang /_dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /_bu chags 
[\[37b.3\]]pa shes pa dang gang las chags pa shes pa dang khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/_/gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su rten cing gnas so/_/de nas gang gi tshe de la bu chags par 'gyur ba 
[\[37b.4\]]de'i tshe/_de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa/_jo bo bdag la sras chags te bdag gi rum g.yas logs su rten cing gnas pa las khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/_de yang dga' ches te/_ro stod ni bteg lag pa 
[\[37b.5\]]g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/_bdag gis yun ring po nas/_smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi bu rung bar gyur cig mi rung bar ma gyur cig bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig_/gsos na gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig_/nor skal la 
[\[37b.6\]]spyod par shog cig_/bdag gi rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par shog cig_/bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/_sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di 
[\[37b.7\]]song shig ces yon sngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/_/des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/_grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]dang ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/_kha ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang 
[\[38a.2\]]bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing /_do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te/_lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang khri'u'i steng nas/_khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /_des yid du mi 
[\[38a.3\]]'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ston pa rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa 'gro ba lngar 
[\[38a.4\]]'gro ba las rnam par grol ba skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa yang dag pa'i seng 
[\[38a.5\]]ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni 
[\[38a.6\]]phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar 
[\[38a.7\]]bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur 
[\[38b.2\]]yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos 
[\[38b.3\]]chen po rnams kyang nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la lta bar byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la bltas na/_srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zhig gis khyim 
[\[38b.4\]]bdag de'i chung ma chen ma'i ltor nying mtshams sbyar bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsams pa/_sems can de sus 'dul bar 'gyur/_ci sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ram 'on te nyan thos kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang /_de bdag nyid kyis 
[\[38b.5\]]'dul bar 'gyur bar mthong la/_de yang sngan cad khyim de'i bsen yin te/_des khyim bdag de brtan por bya ba'i phyir zla med pa dang g.yog med par gcig pu khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa zla med pa dang g.yog med par 
[\[38b.6\]]gcig pu 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'phags pa khyod zla ma mchis pa dang /_zhabs 'bring ma mchis par gcig pu gshegs na 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes dris so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa khyed cag lta bu 'ba' 
[\[38b.7\]]zhig las rnyed pa ma gtogs par bdag cag gis gud na/_g.yog ga la rnyed de khyed las rnyed pa 'ba' zhig bdag cag gi g.yog byed par zad do/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi mchis brang la bu chags pa mchis kyis/_de las gal te khye'u zhig 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]btsas par gyur na/_de bdag gis 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring du dbul lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/_khong dge ba dag ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin no zhes de skad smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa song ngo /_/khyim bdag de'i chung 
[\[39a.2\]]ma yang zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i lus thams cad nas sna ma'i me tog gi dri'i ngad ldang ste/_des khyim de thams cad sna ma'i me tog gi dris 'gengs par byed do/_/khye'u de ma'i mngal du zhugs pa dang 
[\[39a.3\]]btsas pa'i tshe yang khyim de kun du sna ma'i me tog gi char 'bab bo/_/de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa dang btsas pa'i tshe khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char 'bab pas na/_
[\[39a.4\]]de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming sna ma'i me tog ces gdags so/_/de nas khye'u sna ma'i me tog 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod 
[\[39a.5\]]dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba gsal ba 
[\[39a.6\]]dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/_khye'u de rab tu dbyung ba'i dus la bab par mthong nas/_khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste/_khyim bdag la smras pa/_khyim bdag khye'u 'di ni ma btsas 
[\[39a.7\]]pa'i snga rol nas/_khyod kyis bdag gi g.yog tu byin te/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na/_de kho na ltar dam ma bcas sam/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa de kho na ltar dam bcas lags so zhes smras nas/_khye'u de lag pa gnyis kyis 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bzung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phul nas smras pa/_bu khyod ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas/_'phags pa ma 'gags pa la ngas phul gyis song la/_'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring gyis shig_/khye'us smras pa/_de ni bdag la phan gdags pa lags so zhes byas nas/_khye'u 
[\[39b.2\]]de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i phyi bzhin du chas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang /_khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/_stan las langs te 
[\[39b.3\]]song ngo /_/de nas khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas gtsug lag khang du khrid nas rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[39b.4\]]byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa 
[\[39b.5\]]dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de yang rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che la/_
[\[39b.6\]]bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du thob pa yin no/_/de snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba la myur te/_khab lan re 'dzugs pa'i yun tsam la/_ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang gzhan dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig 
[\[39b.7\]]na/_tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog gis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rnam pa du ma ni bsal/_bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma ni bsgrubs/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni bsal/_dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]bsgrubs na/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin ji ltar bsab par bya snyam mo/_/de nas des bsams pa/_sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'byung bar zad kyis/_ma la bdag gis 
[\[40a.2\]]kyang sems can la phan par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas des bdag gis gdul bar 'gyur ba 'ga' lta yod dam snyam du bsams pa dang /_des thog ma kho nar pha ma gnyis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bsams pa thabs ci zhig gis de gnyis 'dul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /_des 
[\[40a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul bar rig nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rang gi khyim du pha ma gnyis kyi mdun logs nas sa brtol te byung nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug ste/_'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang /_char 'bebs pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul 
[\[40a.4\]]rnams bstan nas babs te/_stan bshams pa la 'dug go/_/de 'dug nas pha ma gnyis la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun 
[\[40a.5\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas te/_bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sna ma'i 
[\[40a.6\]]me tog gis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la/_btsas ma thag tu yang lus thams cad nas sna ma'i me tog gi ngad ldang zhing mngal du zhugs pa 
[\[40a.7\]]dang btsas pa'i tshe yang khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char bab la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]du bgyis pa lags/_pha ma gnyis kyis kyang las ci bgyis na/_des de kho na la brten nas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis smon lam 
[\[40b.2\]]gang du btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/_
[\[40b.3\]]bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi 
[\[40b.4\]]bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las/_chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_des zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing 
[\[40b.5\]]blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de cher skyes pa dang /_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_des pha ma la gsol te/_rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te/_rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa 
[\[40b.6\]]dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur nas des pha ma gnyis dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bkod de/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas so/_/sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la yang btsud do/_/phyi zhig na des bsams pa/_bdag gis 
[\[40b.7\]]thos pa'i sgo nas bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis byas zin gyis/_ma la da ni bdag gis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_pha ma gnyis dang bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag la bskul te/_dge 'dun la 'bras chan dang thug pa btung ba dang skyo ma rnams 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]dang gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams phul lo/_/khab kyang phul lo/_/de bzhin du dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rnams la yang til mar gyis byug pa dang spos kyis byug pa dang /_mar me'i phreng ba dang sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba dang gdugs 
[\[41a.2\]]kyang phul sna ma'i me tog gi sil mas kyang gtor nas/_smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig_/bdag 
[\[41a.3\]]gi lus thams cad nas kyang sna ma'i me tog gi dri'i ngad ldang bar shog cig_/mngal du zhugs pa dang btsas pa'i tshe yang bdag gi khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char 'bab par shog cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i 
[\[41a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/shes rab kyang rno bar gyur 
[\[41a.5\]]cig_/bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang thob ste/_snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba la myur bar gyur cig_/khab lan re 'dzugs pa'i yun tsam la yang /_ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang /_gzhan dag la 
[\[41a.6\]]snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de mthong nas dris pa/_bu khyod kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/_des de gnyis la bdag gis smon lam 'di ltar btab po zhes thams cad bsnyad do/_/pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyod kho na 
[\[41a.7\]]bdag cag gnyis kyi bur gyur cig_/bdag cag gnyis kyang khyod kyi pha mar gyur cig_/khyod kho na la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sna ma'i me tog 'di nyid yin te/_de der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_chos bzhin du zhal ta byas te/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la bkur sti byas nas/_smon lam btab pa'i las 
[\[41b.2\]]de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la btsas ma thag tu yang de'i lus thams cad nas/_sna ma'i me tog gi dri'i ngad ldang bar gyur pa dang /_mngal du 
[\[41b.3\]]zhugs pa dang /_btsas pa'i tshe yang de'i khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char phab ste/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa rnyed par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes 
[\[41b.4\]]par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas la shes rab rno bar gyur te/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug 
[\[41b.5\]]pa rnams thob nas/_snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba la myur bar gyur te/_khab lan re 'dzugs pa'i yun tsam la yang ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang /_gzhan dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed do/_/de'i tshe pha mar gyur pa de gnyis ni/_pha ma 'di gnyis yin te/_de 
[\[41b.6\]]gnyis kyis der smon lam btab ste/_khyod kho na la brten nas/_bdag cag gnyis kyis shAkya'i rgyal po mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/ces byas pas da ltar 'di kho na la brten te/_'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes 
[\[41b.7\]]par ma byas so//_//nga la byin zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/_mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las/_der bcom 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ldan 'das la/_khyim bdag cig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i la du 'grangs tshad cig phul ba dang /_de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'greng ste/_bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag des ro brgya dang ldan pa'i 
[\[42a.2\]]la du 'grangs tshad cig phul ba bram ze'i khye'u des mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de/_la du de la chags pa skyes nas/_de bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas smras pa/_kye gau ta ma/_la du 'o ni nga la byin cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[42a.3\]]kyis/_bram ze'i khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/_khye'u gal te khyod kyis 'di skad du/_la du 'di bdag la mi dgos so zhes byas na ni de'i 'og tu ngas sbyin no/_/de nas des kye gau ta ma la du 'di bdag la mi dgos sa zhes smras so/_/de skad ces smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bram 
[\[42a.4\]]ze'i khye'u de la la du de byin no/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa/_des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni bsod snyoms gzhan bzhes mi srid de/_de ni gnas med cing skabs ma yin no snyam du rig nas bram 
[\[42a.5\]]ze'i khye'u de gud du bkar te/_bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u la du 'o ni bcom ldan 'das la phyir phul cig dang /_bdag gis khyod la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya sbyin no/_/bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod ci ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas 
[\[42a.6\]]bram ze'i khye'u des la du de bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de bzhes nas gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis kyang bram ze'i khye'u de khyim du khrid de/_zan byin nas kAr+ShA pa Na lnga brgya 
[\[42a.7\]]byin te btang ngo /_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa kye ma bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bcom ldan 'das las la du blangs pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ma stsal la/_gang gi tshe des kye gau ta ma la du 'di bdag la mi dgos so zhes smras pa de'i 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la la du stsal pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze'i khye'u des ni tshe rabs stong phrag du mar blang ba'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig kun du bsten cing bsgoms te/_mang du byas nas 'di rtag tu gzhan 'ba' 
[\[42b.2\]]zhig la re bar gyur pas na/_ngas 'di da ltar la dus brid nas blang ba'i 'du shes las bzlog ste/_'di nyid 'di'i rab tu 'byung ba dang /_phung po yongs su spong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u 'di'i phung po gang du yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags/_dge slong 
[\[42b.3\]]dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i gsung rab la 'dis mir skye ba thob nas/_rgyu 'di kho nas rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad
