[\[42b.4\]]spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_'dus mo zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul tak+Sha shI la na/_rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can zhes bya ba 
[\[42b.5\]]rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras 
[\[42b.6\]]sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/de nas de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de'i yid la 
[\[42b.7\]]gzhung smra ba rnams dang lhan cig tu rtsod kyang ci ma rung snyam du yid la 'dod pa/_de lta bu zhig skyes so/_/de nas rgyal pos de thos ma thag tu ltas mkhan rnams la bstan te/_ltas mkhan rnams na re lha 'di ni lto na mchis pa'i sems can de'i mthu lags te/_des ni bstan 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]bcos thams cad rtogs par 'gyur la gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur te/_de'i slad du 'di'i yid la 'dod pa/_de lta bu skyes pa lags so zhes zer ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te/_btsun mo'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa 
[\[43a.2\]]de ma bsal na/_de cir 'gyur ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_sras de yan lag ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_bdag gi bu yin la yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas btsun mo yol ba'i nang du bzhag ste/_
[\[43a.3\]]gzhung smra ba thams cad bsags nas gzu bo rnams kyang bskos te/_gzhung gis rtsod du bcug go/_/de nas des gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad nas/_de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing 
[\[43a.4\]]blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_bu mo 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_bu mo 'di'i mas 'dus pa'i nang du gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pas na bu mo 'di'i ming 'dus mo zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/
[\[43a.5\]]de nas bu mo 'dus mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de sred med kyi bu'i lag na thogs pa'i rma bya'i mdongs dang bsrung ba'i srad bu dang /_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_
[\[43a.6\]]mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/_de rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du yol ba'i nang du bzhag nas yi ge bslabs so/_/de yi ge byang nas des yol ba'i nang 
[\[43a.7\]]'ba' zhig tu bstan bcos thams cad bslabs nas yul tak+Sha shI la der gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal pos bu mo de la dris pa/_khyod ngas su la sbyin par bya/_bu mos smras pa/_sus gzhung brtsad pas bdag thub par nus pa de la stsal bar gsol/_
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]de nas rgyal pos de thos nas 'dis 'di lta bu'i tshig smras pa las na/_bu mo 'di ni ngas gzhung smra ba gang gis 'di thub pa de 'ba' zhig la sbyin par bya'i byad gzugs bzang ba la yang mi sbyin/_rigs mtho ba la yang mi sbyin/_dbang phyug dang ldan pa la yang mi sbyin no zhes zer 
[\[43b.2\]]ro/_/de nas de'i sgra de kun tu grags nas/_de thos ma thag tu phyogs kun nas gzhung smra ba rnams lhags pa las bu mo des thams cad tshar bcad do/_/de nas de'i tshe lho phyogs na gzhung smra ba ri'u zhes bya ba bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa gtsug lag che ba/_
[\[43b.3\]]gtsug lag la 'byam pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_kha dog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des yul tak+Sha shI la'i rgyal po pad ma'i snying po'i sras mos gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad la de'i yab kyis kyang de lta bur dam bcas so 
[\[43b.4\]]zhes thos so/_/de thos ma thag tu de ya mtshan du gyur te/_bdag der song la de ci shes pa blta'o snyam mo/_/de nas de 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_nags khrod kyi grong dang /_yul po che rnams su rgyu zhing gzhung smra ba rnams 
[\[43b.5\]]kyang tshar gcod par byed pa las mthar gyis yul tak+Sha shI lar phyin nas des rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyi thad du song nas smras pa/_bdag gis thos na lha'i sras mos gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad ces gda' na/_bdag gis kyang mkhan po las bstan bcos 
[\[43b.6\]]bslabs pa dag mchis pas bdag kyang de dang bka' mchid bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/_rgyal po des gzhung smra ba'i 'khor bsags te so so'i gzhung btsugs nas bu mo de yol ba'i nang du bzhag ste/_bu 
[\[43b.7\]]mo des gzhung smra ba'i ri'u zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la/_mdzes pa kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong nas de mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags kyi mdas phog ste/_des bsams pa/_bdag gis khyim thab 'di 'dra ba ga las kyang mi rnyed kyis 'di kho na bdag gi khyim 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]thab tu bya dgos kyi gzhan ni mi 'dod do snyam du bsams nas/_des ci nas gzhung smra ba des bdag thub par 'gyur ba de ltar byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_bdag gis dam bcas pa la gzhung smra ba gang gis 'di thub par 'gyur ba de la bdag gis 'di 
[\[44a.2\]]sbyin par bya'i/_bdag gis 'di byad gzugs bzang ba la yang mi sbyin/_rigs mtho ba la yang mi sbyin dbang phyug dang ldan pa la yang mi sbyin no zhes dam bcas pa las/_'dis 'di thub par gyur la 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes te/_bdag gis 'di las 
[\[44a.3\]]lhag pa gud nas gzhung smra ba ches khyad par du 'phags pa mi rnyed kyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di kho na la sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_khyim pa rnams kyi khyim pa'i chos gang yin pa de bzhin du byas te/_bu mo de de la byin nas dbang phyug chen por yang bskos so/_/de yang de dang lhan cig 
[\[44a.4\]]tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_bu mo de la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed 
[\[44a.5\]]de/_khye'u 'di rus kA t+yA ya na yin la 'dus mo'i bu yin pas na 'dus pa'i kA t+yA ya na zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u 'dus pa'i kA t+yA ya na 'o ma dang /_zho dang mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag 
[\[44a.6\]]par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig 
[\[44a.7\]]byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/des lo bcu drug lon nas bstan bcos thams cad rtogs te/_gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad nas de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/_'dzam bu'i gling na bdag dang mnyam pa yang med na lhag pa lta ci smos snyam du rlom 
[\[44b.2\]]pa des skye bo phal po che la khyad du gsod par byed do/_/de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de la smras pa/_khye'u khyod bdag dang mnyam pa su yang med na/_lhag pa lta ci smos snyam du rlom pa 'dis rgyags par ma byed cig_/khye'u yul dbus na shAkya'i bu zhig skyes pa de bram ze ltas mkhan 
[\[44b.3\]]bye brag phyed pa rnams kyis lung bstan te gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos tshon can bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/_'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[44b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra cher grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa las de skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos tshon can bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[44b.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la ni/_khyod kyi gzugs dang shes rab kyis kyang brgya'i char yang mi phod stong gi char yang mi phod/_'bum gyi char yang mi phod/_khrag khrig gi char yang mi phod de/_grangs su bgrang du yang med do zhes byas so/_/de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas zhes bya 
[\[44b.6\]]ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas te lta 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas des pha ma la gsol te/_yab yum bdag yul dbus su mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/
[\[44b.7\]]de nas pha ma gnyis kyi bsams pa/_'di ni bdag cag gis bzlog par mi nus so snyam du rig nas smras pa/_sdod cig dang bdag cag gnyis kyis khyim gyi 'khor btang nas de'i 'og tu lhan cig tu 'dong la bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]zhes de skad smras nas/_de gnyis kyis khyim gyi 'khor btang ste sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas yul dbus su dong ste/_de dag mthar gyis dong dong ba las rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ba dang /_khye'u de dang de'i 
[\[45a.2\]]pha ma gnyis kyis thag ring po zhig nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_
[\[45a.3\]]mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_bla gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis/_dang po 
[\[45a.4\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong 
[\[45a.5\]]ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i 
[\[45a.6\]]chos bstan te/_de rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 
[\[45a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de gnyis la lung yang phog ste/_de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad 
[\[45b.2\]]pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil 
[\[45b.3\]]bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su 
[\[45b.4\]]gyur to/_/de nas 'dus mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la gtad nas/_de yang des rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas 
[\[45b.5\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa 'dus pa'i kA t+yA ya nas las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug 
[\[45b.6\]]la mdzes pa dang bstan bcos thams cad rtogs te gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa 
[\[45b.7\]]nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa dang /_de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te/_'di nyid la brten nas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'di rnams kyis gang du smon lam btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das 
[\[46a.2\]]pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[46a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na bram ze zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la 
[\[46a.4\]]mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_'o ma dang zho dang /_mar dang zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de cher skyes nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas 
[\[46a.5\]]pha ma gnyis la gsol te/_yab yum bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la smras pa/_bu khyod bdag cag gnyis kyi bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong la phongs pa dang 'thun par byed pa 
[\[46a.6\]]yin pas na bdag cag gnyis kyis gnang bar byar mi rung ngo zhes byas so/_/'on kyang de pha ma gnyis kyis thabs sna tshogs kyis bzlog ma nus nas de pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te/_
[\[46a.7\]]des sde snod gsum bslabs nas/_rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur te/_gos dang zas dang /_mal cha dang stan dang /_nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed do/_/de nas des pha ma gnyis dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bkod de/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas/_de gnyis sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la btsud do/_/de nas phyi zhig na des bsams pa bdag gis thos pa'i sgo nas bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis byas zin gyis ma la da ni bdag gis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta chos bzhin du bya'o 
[\[46b.2\]]snyam nas des pha ma gnyis dang sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po gzhan dag la bskul nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol te/_dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byas nas/_smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[46b.3\]]'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig ces byas so/_/de gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po des ni lo bcu drug lon pa na/_bstan bcos thams cad 
[\[46b.4\]]rtogs nas gzhung smra ba thams cad kyang tshar bcad do/_/de bzhin du de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad do/_/de nas des smras pa/_ji ltar na bdag gi mkhan pos lo bcu drug lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad rtogs nas gzhung 
[\[46b.5\]]smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang /_de bzhin du de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te/_de gnyis kyis kyang gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang lo bcu drug kho na lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par gyur cig_/gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar 
[\[46b.6\]]gcod par gyur cig_/de bzhin du bdag gi pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/
[\[46b.7\]]mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas de smon lam 'debs shing 'dug pa pha ma gnyis kyis mthong nas de gnyis kyis de la dris pa/_bu 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]khyod kyis smon lam ci zhig btab de nas des pha ma gnyis la bdag gis smon lam 'di ltar btab po zhes rgyas par bsnyad do/_/pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_de'i tshe bdag cag gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur cig_/khyod kyang bdag cag gnyis kyi bur gyur 
[\[47a.2\]]cig_/khyod kho na la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur 
[\[47a.3\]]cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong du gyur pa/_gang yin pa de ni 'dus pa'i kA t+yA ya na 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i pha mar gyur pa gnyis ni pha ma 'di gnyis kho 
[\[47a.4\]]na yin no/_/des der sbyin pa dag byin cing bsod nams dag byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_bstan 
[\[47a.5\]]bcos thams cad kyang rtogs la/_gzhung smra ba thams cad kyang tshar bcad de/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par 
[\[47a.6\]]byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/pha ma de gnyis kyis der smon lam btab ste/_bdag cag gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur cig_/khyod 
[\[47a.7\]]las brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa des ni da ltar yang 'di gnyis gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te/_'di nyid las brten nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//tshem bu mkhan zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las phyi zhig na 
[\[47b.2\]]de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas te/_khye'u de yang 'phye bo 'gro mi nus pa zhig tu gyur te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di 'phye bo yin pas na khye'u 'di'i ming 'phye bor 
[\[47b.3\]]gdags so/_/de nas khye'u 'phye bo 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe phas bsams pa/_bdag gis khye'u 'di ci nas 'dug bzhin du las byed cing bzo des 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ba'i bzo ji lta bu zhig bslab 
[\[47b.4\]]par bya snyam mo/_/de nas des bsams pa ma la bdag gi 'di tshem bu mkhan gyi las bslabs pa dang des 'di'i 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_des khye'u de tshem bu mkhan gyi las slob tu bcug go/_/de nas de yang de la slob dpon gyi mchog tu gyur to/_/de nas dus 
[\[47b.5\]]ston zhig byed pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis chung ma'i phyir gzhan gyi khyim nas gos dang rgyan g.yar por blangs nas/_khyer te 'ongs te chung ma des kyang bgos nas dus ston la chas te song ngo /_/de nas de bag med pas de'i zhu gcig gis dral to/_/de nas de khyim thab kyis 'jigs 
[\[47b.6\]]nas su la yang ma bstan te dus ston las phyir log nas khyim bdag de grong gzhan zhig tu song ngo /_/de song nas bud med des tshem bu mkhan de bdag gis khyim du blangs te/_sus kyang mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir sgo bcad nas zhu de drub tu bcug pa dang /_tshem bu mkhan gyi khyim du blangs 
[\[47b.7\]]pa'i rjes la khyim thab rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas sgo rdung zhing 'bod do/_/de nas de'i chung mas skad las ngo shes nas tshem bu mkhan rang gi khyim du bzhag pa dang /_zhu dral ba'i phyir shas cher 'jigs pa skyes nas de 'jigs shing skrag pas/_tshem bu mkhan de khong du chud par byas te 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]gzeb kyi nang du [(]gcug [,]bcug [)]nas gzeb rgyas btab ste bzhag go/_/de nas sgo phye ste khyim thab nang du 'ongs nas kha gsag byas te ci rigs par bsnyen bkur byas nas de dang lhan cig tu nyal lo/_/de gnyis nyal ba dang rkun po dag cig gis khyim phug nas nang du 'ongs te thog ma kho 
[\[48a.2\]]nar gzeb de las zin nas/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te gzeb 'di 'di ltar rgyas legs par btab la lci ba las na nor bu rin po che chen po yod gor ma chag go/_/'dis ni bdag cag mi rabs bdun gyi bar du yang chog par 'gyur te/_'di kho nas bdag cag chog gis bdag cag la 
[\[48a.3\]]rdzas gzhan mi dgos so snyam du bsams nas/_de dag gis gzeb de gcig pu khyer te phyir phyung nas nags 'dab tu khyer ro/_/de dag 'dong ba na zla ba yang shar la mi des kyang de'i nang na 'dug bzhin du gcin shor nas gcin de gzeb las thar te phyi rol du zags so/_/de nas rkun po 
[\[48a.4\]]de dag 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar zla ba shar ba na/_'di'i nang nas chu 'bab pa las na/_'di'i nang du ni nor bu chu shel bcug yang dag snyam ste/_lhag par yang snying dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag gis sha thang ste gzeb de khyer nas nags 'dab tu lhags so/_/de nas mi 
[\[48a.5\]]rgod kyi sde dpon dang mi rgod gzhan dag gis dris pa/_khyod kyis gzeb 'di'i nang du ci zhig khyer te 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_sde dpon deng du ni bdag cag gis thams cad kyi dbul ba'i rgyun bcad kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_deng bdag cag gis rin po ches gang ba'i 
[\[48a.6\]]gzeb rnyed do zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de dag kyang snying dga' bar gyur te smras pa/_gzeb phye zhig dang 'dir rin po che ji lta bu dag bcug pa blta'o zhes byas so/_/de nas de dag gis gzeb de bkrol nas kha phye ste bltas na gzeb de'i nang du 'phye bo zhig bcug cing 'dug pa 
[\[48a.7\]]mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu der song song ba dang gzeb de khyer khyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni 'phye bo 'dis bdag cag mtshan thog thag nyon mongs so snyam nas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/der ma dong ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni mi rgod der song song ba de dag la gad mo chen pos btab nas smras 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa/_legs par nyon mongs so/_/shin tu nyon mongs so zhes byas so/_/de nas bud med de sad de langs nas khang pa de'i nang du song ba dang /_khyim phug ste gzeb rkus pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang snying dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khang pa phug nas gzeb kyang stor/_/
[\[48b.2\]]bdag ni phyed dga' phyed mi dga'/_/nags 'dab song ba'i rkun po rnams/_/de ni dgod cing ngu bar 'gyur/_/zhes byas so/_/de nas der gzeb de khyer te 'ongs pa gang yin pa de dag khros te smras pa/_'di ltar 'phye bo 'dis bdag cag mi dga' bar byas mod kyi/_'on kyang 
[\[48b.3\]]bdag cag gi gnod sbyin mchod dgos kyis bdag cag gis 'di kho nas gnod sbyin la mchod pa bya'o zhes smras nas/_de dag gis gnod sbyin de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/_bdug pa dang me tog dang mchod pa'i cho ga dang bum pa gang ba rnams bzhag nas 
[\[48b.4\]]ral gri rnon po thogs te/_mi de gnod sbyin gyi mdun du bzhag nas mchod sbyin byas so/_/de nas mi des kyang ji ltar bdag nyid gnod sbyin de'i mchod par dbul bar chad pa khong du chud nas/_shin tu skrag ste/_bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig la 
[\[48b.5\]]da bdag skyabs su 'gro bar bya/_su zhig bdag la srog phangs pa sbyin par 'gyur snyam du bsams nas/_des bcom ldan 'das la sems kyis gsol ba btab pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di lta ste 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba ci yang mi 
[\[48b.6\]]gzigs pa dang mi mkhyen pa dang thugs su ma chud pa mi mnga' na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das/_bdag ni dkos thag cing nyam nga la phongs par gyur pa lags kyis bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_srog phangs pa stsal du gsol zhes byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[48b.7\]]'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag par seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid 
[\[49a.2\]]kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam thag par gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du 
[\[49a.3\]]gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor 
[\[49a.4\]]bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la 
[\[49a.5\]]ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas 
[\[49a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs na/_'phye bo de dang mi rgod lnga brgya po de rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud nas/_lha'i sku gzugs de nyid las lha'i cha lugs su bzhugs so/_/de nas mi rgod lnga brgya 'di snyam du sems te/_lhas bdag cag la rang gi sku bstan 
[\[49a.7\]]to snyam ste/_spu zing zhes byas nas/_thal mo sbyar te 'khod nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bka' ci stsal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga la mis mchod mi dgos kyis mi'i mchod pa 'di thong shig_/gal te khyed chos 'dod na ni mchod pa gsol ba 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]thong la 'khod cig dang chos bstan par bya'o/_/de nas de ltar 'tshal lo zhes byas nas mi rgod de dag gis mchod pa btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phye bo de dang mi rgod de dag gi bsam 
[\[49b.2\]]pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 
[\[49b.3\]]byas so/_/'phye bo des kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i cha lugs mi snang bar mdzad nas rang bzhin gyi skur bzhugs so/_/de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas lhag par yang dga' 
[\[49b.4\]]ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung 
[\[49b.5\]]ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgod rnams la dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha 
[\[49b.6\]]spu ni bregs nas/_zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur nas lag na lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_/de ni mgo bregs lus la 
[\[49b.7\]]snam sbyar gyon/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/_/mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la lung phog ste/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]mngon sum du byas te/_de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs 
[\[50a.2\]]bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas 'phye bos bsams pa/_gal 
[\[50a.3\]]te bdag kyang lus 'di 'dra bar ma gyur na ni bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad par bya ba zhig na snyam mo/_/de nas de skad ces brjod ma thag tu de'i lus de 
[\[50a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs shing rangs par gyur nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i 
[\[50a.5\]]chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas 
[\[50a.6\]]lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa 'phye bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'phye bor gyur lags/_
[\[50a.7\]]las ci zhig bgyis na/_des bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]dag 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags te dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul 
[\[50b.2\]]bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI 'di nyid na khyim bdag spun gnyis shig gnas pa las gcig gis ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las chos thos 
[\[50b.3\]]te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas/_des kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i las rnams spangs te/_gcig tu nges par kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las rnams la gnas so/_/nu bo cig shos ni zhing las byed de des bsams pa bdag ni grang ba na yang grang bas nyen tsha ba 
[\[50b.4\]]na yang tsha bas nyen la/_'di ni khyim na 'dug cing bde ba nyams su myong bar byed do snyam nas/_de khros te phyir mi 'ong ba de la tshig rtsub po smras pa/_bdag ni grang ba na yang grang bas nyen tsha ba na yang tsha bas nyen te las thams cad byed la khyod ni 'phye bo bzhin du khyim na then zhing 'dug ste ci 
[\[50b.5\]]yang byed pa mi 'dod dam zhes byas so/_/de nas phyir mi 'ong bas bsams pa/_nu bo 'dis bdag la tshig rtsub po smras kyis gtan du phung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir 'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam nas des de'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul bstan te smras pa/_khyod kyis nga la tshig rtsub po smras 
[\[50b.6\]]kyis nyes pa la nyes so zhes bshags par gyis shig_/'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal chen po rnyed ta re/_de nas de thos ma thag tu nu bo de 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/_des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod par gsol te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag khyim na 
[\[50b.7\]]gnas pa btang ste/_song la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/phyir mi 'ong bas smras pa/_khyim gyi 'khor thong la bdag cag gnyis ka rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_de ltar bgyi'o/_/de nas des khyim gyi 'khor 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]btang nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la gnyi ga rab tu byung ste/_phyir mi 'ong bas ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/cig shos kyis ni rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[51a.2\]]spyad de 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis 'di ltar sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i skal ba can du bdag ma gyur cig_/brgyal las de'i 'bras bu bdag la smin par gyur na yang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu ma legs pa med par gyur te 
[\[51a.3\]]legs pa 'byung bar gyur cig_/'di ltar bdag rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan ci yang ma thob kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes 
[\[51a.4\]]par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[51a.5\]]'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'phye bo 'di nyid yin te/_des der phu bo la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las des ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'phye bor gyur to/_/de 'gyod par gyur te rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi kar 
[\[51a.6\]]smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i skal ba can du bdag ma gyur cig_/brgya la las de'i rnam par smin pa bdag la smin par gyur na yang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi ma legs pa med par 
[\[51a.7\]]gyur te/_legs pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas pa des ni da ltar rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu lus kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/des der smon lam btab ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pas ni/_dge slong dag 
[\[51b.2\]]nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa 
[\[51b.3\]]nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa kye ma mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di dag 'phye bo 'di dang mjal nas rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[51b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'das pa'i dus na yang mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di dag 'phye bo 'di nyid dang phrad nas rab tu byung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na mi rgod lnga brgya 
[\[51b.5\]]tsam nags khrod cig na rten cing gnas te/_de dag gis ri khrod kyi grong zhig bcom ste/_nor zas mang po de nas blangs so/_/mi 'di yang nags khrod de nyid na rten cing 'dug pa las mi rgod de dag der dong bas gnod sbyin la mi mchod pa'i phyir bzung ste/_de dag nags khrod der dong 
[\[51b.6\]]nas gnod sbyin de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas byugs te/_bum pa gang ba dang mi de bzhag nas ral gri rnon po thogs te/_gnod sbyin gyi mdun du 'dug nas mchod sbyin byas so/_/mi des kyang bdag 'di rnams kyis bsad de gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa byed par sems sam snyam 
[\[51b.7\]]nas de shin tu 'jigs shing skrag par gyur to/_/'jigs shing skrag nas bsams pa/_bdag su zhig la skyabs su 'gro bar bya/_bdag la su zhig srog phangs pa sbyin par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe ri khrod de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na dka' thub kyi gnas shig gi nang na 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]drang srong zhig gnas so/_/de'i tshe mi des drang srong de yid la dran nas des dad pa'i sems kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni mi gzigs pa dang /_mi mkhyen pa dang /_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang mi mnga' na kye ma bdag la srog phangs pa stsal du gsol/_dka' 
[\[52a.2\]]ba sku nyams su bzhes par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas drang srong de la dga' ba'i lha zhig gis mi de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas drang srong de la sbran to/_/de nas drang srong gis thos ma thag tu rang gi dka' thub kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/_mi rgod de dag gi mdun du 'ongs 
[\[52a.3\]]nas mi rgod de dag gis drang srong de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag mchog tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas drang srong bka' ci stsal zhes byas so/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_mi 'di thong la nga'i mdun du 'khod cig dang khyod la chos bshad do/_/de nas drang srong gis 
[\[52a.4\]]bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_mi rgod de dag gis mi de btang ste/_drang srong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/_/de nas drang srong des de dag la chos de lta bu bstan te des na mi de dang mi rgod lnga brgya drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung 
[\[52a.5\]]nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe mi gang yin pa de ni 'phye bo 'di nyid yin no/_/mi rgod lnga brgyar gyur 
[\[52a.6\]]pa gang yin pa de dag ni mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de'i tshe 'di rnams kyis mi de las brten nas rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/da ltar yang 'phye bo 'di nyid la brten nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[52a.7\]]mngon sum du byas so/_/las brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po rdzogs so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po lnga pa/_sdom ni/_shing rta bzhi dang sgam po dang /_/sa 'tsho skra ldan pad ma'i mdog_/shan pa gser mdog ba 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]lang rdzi/_/mdza' sde 'jigs med dbyig mtsho dang /_/dbyig dga' dang ni dom gnyis dang /_/sgur chung dang ni tha ma srin/_/shing rta bzhi zhes bya ba la/_/shing rta dang po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bram ze zhig mchod sbyin byed par 'dod de shing rta la zhon nas 
[\[52b.2\]]mnyan du yod par song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /_de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te song ngo /_/de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[52b.3\]]'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba 
[\[52b.4\]]gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams pa dang /_kyi hud zer 
[\[52b.5\]]ba dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 
[\[52b.6\]]'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad 
[\[52b.7\]]de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[53a.2\]]ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral ba rnams dang /_dga' ldan pa rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams 
[\[53a.3\]]dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che ba rnams dang /_mi gdung 
[\[53a.4\]]ba rnams dang /_gya nom snang ba rnams dang /_shin tu mthong ba rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba 
[\[53a.5\]]brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 
[\[53a.6\]]'gyur zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 
[\[53a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[53b.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 
[\[53b.3\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[53b.4\]]'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyis/_/
[\[53b.5\]]nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum 
[\[53b.6\]]mi ston/_/brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/
[\[53b.7\]]mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa/_/khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/_/mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/_/'bras bu 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[54a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba 
[\[54a.3\]]byas te song ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bram ze 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing /_'khor bar 
[\[54a.4\]]gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des slob dpon med pa dang man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas skor 
[\[54a.5\]]byed ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni de yin no//_//shing rta gnyis pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig gis mchod sbyin byas nas shing rta la zhon te 'khor gyi tshogs kyis g.yog byas nas mnyan du yod pa'i nang du 
[\[54a.6\]]chas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad nas/_mnyan du yod pa nas slar gshegs pa dang de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bltas so/_/de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[54a.7\]]gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_sa thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma 
[\[54b.2\]]ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par 
[\[54b.3\]]rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[54b.4\]]kye ma ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems 
[\[54b.5\]]can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral 
[\[54b.6\]]rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams 
[\[54b.7\]]dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che ba rnams dang /_mi gdung ba rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i 
[\[55a.2\]]khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi 
[\[55a.3\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su 
[\[55a.4\]]mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur 
[\[55a.5\]]ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi 
[\[55a.6\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med 
[\[55a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing 
[\[55b.2\]]rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa 
[\[55b.3\]]som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa 
[\[55b.4\]]ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa/_/khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/_/mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/_/'bras bu cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[55b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/_btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin 
[\[55b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba skyes nas bltas pa mthong ngam btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bram ze 'di ni dge ba'i 
[\[55b.7\]]rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing /_'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste/_rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la des slob dpon 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]med pa dang man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni de yin no//_//shing rta gsum pa ni/_
[\[56a.2\]]gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/bram ze zhig kyang shing rta la zhon te yul rgyu zhing chas pa las/_bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/_bkra 
[\[56a.3\]]mi shis so snyam ste phan tshun du bros so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de dang de kho na na bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi char du yang de'i mdun na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur nas des bsams pa dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni rdzu 
[\[56a.4\]]'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam nas/_de bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes so/_/de dga' ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog spar gang gtor to/_/de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 
[\[56a.5\]]'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_
[\[56a.6\]]bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol ba dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar 
[\[56a.7\]]gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag 
[\[56b.2\]]cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal 
[\[56b.3\]]ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_
[\[56b.4\]]dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_
[\[56b.5\]]dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi 
[\[56b.6\]]lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang 
[\[56b.7\]]chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs 
[\[57a.2\]]su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/_zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[57a.3\]]mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi 
[\[57a.4\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na 
[\[57a.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[57a.6\]]ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol 
[\[57a.7\]]pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang 
[\[57b.2\]]gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen mnyan par 'tshal/_/'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa/_/khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/_/mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/_/'bras bu cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/_/btsun pa de bzhin 
[\[57b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/_btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni 
[\[57b.4\]]de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog gis gtor ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/
[\[57b.5\]]kun dga' bo bram ze 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar gyur nas/_srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 
[\[57b.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur la des slob dpon med pa dang man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te rang sangs rgyas me tog bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni 
[\[57b.7\]]de yin no//_//shing rta bzhi pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so/_/bram ze zhig kyang shing rta la zhon te lam du snol mar 'gro ba las/_bram ze des bcom ldan 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]'das mthong nas shing rta las babs te bcom ldan 'das la shing rta bstabs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de nyid la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_shing rta'i steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze de rgyu de las dga' ba chen po skyes so/_/dga' ba 
[\[58a.2\]]chen po skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar 
[\[58a.3\]]po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/_sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_
[\[58a.4\]]rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol ba dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal 
[\[58a.5\]]ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di 
[\[58a.6\]]nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma 
[\[58a.7\]]skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 
[\[58b.2\]]'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas 
[\[58b.3\]]rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug 
[\[58b.4\]]bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par 
[\[58b.5\]]gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor 
[\[58b.6\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal 
[\[58b.7\]]bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[59a.2\]]lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[59a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[59a.4\]]thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral 
[\[59a.5\]]zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa 
[\[59a.6\]]som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa 
[\[59a.7\]]ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa/_/khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can/_/mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi/_/'bras bu cir 'gyur lung bstan gsol/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na/_btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs 
[\[59b.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la shing rta bstabs pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bram ze 'di ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[59b.3\]]bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des slob dpon med pa dang man ngag med par byang 
[\[59b.4\]]chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas shing rta sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni 'di yin no//_//sgam po zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod 
[\[59b.5\]]pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe sems can zhig sems can dmyal bar skyes te lus che zhing dmus long du 'dug la de'i lus ril gyis rmas zhu lub tu yog ste/_de'i spyi bo man chad rkang mthil yan chad srin zhugs pas de nad ma bzod nas phan tshun rgyug par byed la/_de gal te thang la 'gro na ni/_
[\[59b.6\]]de la de nyid nas seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gzig dang /_dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/_/de ste chu la 'bog na ni de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[59b.7\]]de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/_/de ste steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro na ni de la de nyid nas/_bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/_/de ste nags stug po'i nang du 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]'gro na ni de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la der ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo/_/de ste rtsig pa'i gseb bam ri'i 
[\[60a.2\]]sul lam bya skyibs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na yang de la de nyid nas las las skyes pa'i mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te/_de dag gis de'i 
[\[60a.3\]]lus thams cad bcad cing gtub par byed de/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/_nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing ngu'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye 
[\[60a.4\]]shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa 
[\[60a.5\]]brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan 
[\[60a.6\]]dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni 
[\[60a.7\]]ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig 
[\[60b.2\]]rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur [(]ying [,]yang [)]srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs 
[\[60b.3\]]nas/_mnyan du yod pa'i skye bo phal po che 'dul ba'i dus la bab nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ci tshar gcad pas 'dul bar 'gyur ram 'on te bstod pas 'dul bar 'gyur ram/_'on te skyo ba bskyed pas 'dul bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas/_skyo ba bskyed pas 
[\[60b.4\]]'dul bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas/_de dag skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de rdzu 'phrul gyis bkug ste/_chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du bzhag na/_der yang de nad mi bzod nas phan tshun rgyug par byed la der yang de gal te thang 
[\[60b.5\]]la 'gro na ni de la de nyid nas seng ge dang stag dang /_gzig dang dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/_/de ste chur 'bog na ni de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyi mche ba can dag 
[\[60b.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/_/de ste steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro na ni de la de nyid nas bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o/_/
[\[60b.7\]]de ste nags stug po'i nang du 'gro na ni de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la de nyid du ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo/_/de ste rtsig pa'i gseb 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bam ri'i sul lam bya skyibs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na yang de la de nyid nas las las skyes pa'i mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te/_de 
[\[61a.2\]]dag gis de'i lus thams cad bcad cing gtub par byed de/_rgyu des na sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing ngu'o/_/de nas de'i ku co'i sgras mnyan du yod pa thams cad gang bar gyur to/_/
[\[61a.3\]]mnyan du yod pa'i skye bo phal po ches 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra de lta bu thos so/_/thos nas kyang sems can stong phrag du ma mnyan du yod pa nas byung ste/_sgra grag pa'i logs su chu klung khang ldan ga la ba der dong nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis/_thag ring po zhig nas sems can de 
[\[61a.4\]]de lta bu'i gnod pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag gis bsams pa/_sems can 'di lta bu gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba nyams su myong ba 'di su zhig snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes la 'tsho ba 
[\[61a.5\]]rnams ni chos nyid kyis dus dus su/_gtsug lag khang dang /_dur khrod dang /_ri dang chu klung dag tu rgyu zhing gshegs te don 'di'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das chu klung du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[61a.6\]]dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ni chu klung du rgyu zhing gshegs kyis su de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de dag chos gos dag chos shig ces bsgo shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal te bsgo nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs 
[\[61a.7\]]kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas chu klung khang ldan ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs kyis thag ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag na re dge sbyong gau ta ma ltad mo la dga' 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]ba med do zhes grag na de yang ltad mo'i dbang du gyur te 'ongs so zhes zer ro/_/dad pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag na re bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di las brten te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos cig lung ston par bzhed gor ma chag ces zer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[61b.2\]]gdan bshams te smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs 
[\[61b.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_ma la bdag sems can 'di ci nas sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing bdag dang gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ci nas sems can des 
[\[61b.4\]]sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing /_bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod sgam po yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag sgam 
[\[61b.5\]]po lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod sgam po yin nam/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag sgam po lags so/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu myong ba yod dam/_bcom ldan 'das myong ba mchis lags so/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 
[\[61b.6\]]nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu mi sdug pa yin nam/_bde bar gshegs pa mi sdug pa lags so/_/khyod kyi mi dge ba'i [(]bshegs [,]bshes [)]gnyen su yin/_des gsol pa/_rang gi sems lags so/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di lta bu'i 
[\[61b.7\]]sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba 'di su zhig snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan slebs par dka' ste/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du zhu ma nus nas de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/_btsun 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]pa kun dga' bo 'di lta bu'i sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing /_bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba 'di su zhig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[62a.2\]]rnams ni snyan slebs par dka' zhing gzi byin bzod par dka' bas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du zhu mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bdag gis kyang snyan slebs par dka' mod kyi/_'on kyang khyed 
[\[62a.3\]]la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhu bar bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di lta bu'i sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs 
[\[62a.4\]]dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bka' mchid gsol pa 'di su zhig lags/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sems can 'di ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te/_'dis sdig pa'i las mang du 
[\[62a.5\]]byas so/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[62a.6\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer can/_zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe dgra bcom pa zhig dgra bcom pa lnga 
[\[62a.7\]]brgya dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu phyin nas/_de dag rgyal po de'i skyed mos tshal du song ste/_rgan rims bzhin du shing drung re rer rtswa bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]'jug pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid na rgyal po sgam po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_rgyal po de nang par sngar langs nas bud med kyi 'khor gyis zhabs 'bring byas te skyed mos tshal der song ngo /_/de der song nas phyogs gcig tu 
[\[62b.2\]]'dug pa dang /_bud med de dag me tog dang 'bras bu la sred pas phan tshun du 'khyam zhing dong ba las bud med de dag gis dge slong lnga brgya po de dag shing drung dag na klu'i rgyal po ltar lus bskyil te gnyid log pa bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas
