[\[83a.1\]]pa rnams/_dus dus su me tog gang rgyas par de dag longs spyad pa'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi nang du song nas rol mo byed de/_rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_
[\[83a.2\]]pad ma dkar po rnams rgyas par gyur nas/_de dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/_me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams kyis phreng ba dang /_thod dang /_rna rgyan dang /_chun po 
[\[83a.3\]]rnams rgyan du thogs shing ud pa la chang pa re re thogs nas/_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_pheg rdob cing mnyan du yod pa nas byung ste/_skyed mos tshal gyi nang du chas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol 
[\[83a.4\]]te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /_mdza' sde bo de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi 
[\[83a.5\]]dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[83a.6\]]kyang de dag bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor nas/_
[\[83a.7\]]sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong ngo /_/de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod 
[\[83b.2\]]chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_
[\[83b.3\]]tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di 
[\[83b.4\]]snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang 
[\[83b.5\]]shi 'phos par ma gyur la/_gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems 
[\[83b.6\]]can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa 
[\[83b.7\]]rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]dang tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung 
[\[84a.2\]]rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 
[\[84a.3\]]'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/
[\[84a.4\]]sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par 
[\[84a.5\]]bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar 
[\[84a.6\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur 
[\[84a.7\]]ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i 
[\[84b.2\]]gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom 
[\[84b.3\]]ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang 
[\[84b.4\]]bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge 
[\[84b.5\]]sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi 
[\[84b.6\]]ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[84b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis mdza' sde bo 'di dag gis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo mdza' sde bo 'di dag dge 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar gyur nas/_srid 
[\[85a.2\]]pa tha ma dang /_gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob nas/_rab tu byung ste slob dpon med pa dang /_lung med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/_thams 
[\[85a.3\]]cad kyang rang sangs rgyas smon pa med pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur te/_'di ni de dag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci mdzad na/_las de'i 
[\[85a.4\]]rnam par smin pas mdza' sde bo lnga brgyas ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis 'di ltar bkur sti bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis las 
[\[85a.5\]]de lta bu byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge 
[\[85a.6\]]ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras 
[\[85a.7\]]bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis la bab pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_rgyal 
[\[85b.2\]]po'i pho brang mar me ldan zhes bya bar byon to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan na rgyal po mar me zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang 
[\[85b.3\]]ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_nad dang /_mu ge med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa 
[\[85b.4\]]med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/de nas rgyal po mar mes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad grong khyer gyi nang du zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs nas/_rgyal po mar me'i 'dab 
[\[85b.5\]]na rgyal po nor can gyi bu zhes bya ba 'dug pa de la des pho nya btang ste/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad grong khyer gyi nang du zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs te/_de la mchod pa bya dgos kyis shog cig ces spring ngo /_/de'i tshe 
[\[85b.6\]]rgyal po nor can gyi bus kyang lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mchod sbyin byas nas/_mchod sbyin gyi mjug tu 'di lta ste/_gser gyi 'khar ba dang /_gser gyi ril ba dang /_gser gyi gzhong pa dang /_rin po che sna bzhis spras pa'i mal khri dang /_kAr+Sha pa Na lnga 
[\[85b.7\]]brgya dang /_bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa ste rab tu sbyin pa chen po lnga dngar to/_/de'i tshe ljongs gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig gnas pa de gnyis kyis mkhan po las rig byed 'don pa bslabs te/_chos lugs kyi mkhan po la yang mkhan 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]po'i yon dbul ba dang /_slob dpon la yang slob dpon gyi yon dbul dgos par shes nas sems shing 'dug go/_/de nas de gnyis kyis rgyal po nor can gyi bus mchod sbyin gyi mjug tu rab tu sbyin pa chen po lnga bshams te/_bram ze gang kha ton rdzogs 
[\[86a.2\]]par lobs pa de dbang ngo zhes zer ba thos nas de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_blang bar bya ba de len du der 'dong na bdag cag gnyis kyi nang na mang du thos pa'i rab dang kha ton lobs pa'i rab gang yin pa nges par bya'o snyam nas/_rgyal po nor can gyi bu'i grong khyer chen po ga la 
[\[86a.3\]]ba der chas so/_/rgyal po de yang lhas sbran te/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po dang blo gros zhes bya ba gnyis 'dir 'ong gis/_de gnyis kyi nang na blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba de la rab tu sbyin pa chen po 'di dag phul cig dang /_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis lo 
[\[86a.4\]]bcu gnyis kyi bar du mchod sbyin byas pa de'i 'bras bu bas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po de la rab tu sbyin pa chen po byin pa de'i 'bras bu ches che'o zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po des bsams pa/_de gnyis kyi phyir lhas kyang sbran pa las na de gnyis ni bdag nyid che ba 
[\[86a.5\]]yin gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po des thag ring po zhig nas bram ze'i khye'u byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa de gnyis 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/de gnyis kyang mchod sbyin byed pa'i gnas der 'ongs nas bram ze'i gral du skabs bye ba'i sar stan la 'dug go/_/de 
[\[86a.6\]]nas rgyal po nor can gyi bus de gnyis mthong nas bsams pa/_bdag la lhas sbran pa'i blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba de ni 'di yin gor ma chag snyam nas/_rgyal po de gral dpon gyi mdun du song ste/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po la dris pa/_khyod blo 
[\[86a.7\]]gros bzang po yin nam des smras pa nga yin no/_/de nas rgyal po nor can gyi bus bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po gral dpon du bzhag ste zan byin nas/_rab tu sbyin par bya ba chen po rnam pa lnga po de dag byin pa las/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos rab tu sbyin 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa chen pos gser gyi 'khar ba dang ril ba la sogs pa bzhi ni blangs rab tu sbyin pa'i nang nas bu mo gcig pu ni ma blangs te/_bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo des bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa mthong nas/_
[\[86b.2\]]chags shing snying du sdug par gyur te/_khye'u blo gros bzang po de la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u bdag bzhes shig_/des smras pa/_bdag gis blang du mi rung ngo /_/de nas bu mo de rgyal pos kyang rab tu sbyin pa'i bsam pas yongs su btang ste/_phyir ma khyer la bram 
[\[86b.3\]]ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos kyang ma blangs nas/_rgyal po mar me'i grong khyer mar me ldan du song ngo /_/de der song nas rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te/_me tog phreng ba rgyud pa la byin nas/_rgyan 'di rin che ba yin gyis nga la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i mchod 
[\[86b.4\]]par ud pa la sngon po byin cig ces byas so/_/de nas des de'i lung bzhin du gser gyi rgyan de byin te lha'i rim gro byed par gyur to/_/bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po de yang rab tu sbyin pa chen po bzhi po de dag khyer te mkhan po'i thad du song ngo /_/song nas kyang rab tu 
[\[86b.5\]]sbyin pa chen po rnam pa bzhi po de dag mkhan po la phul lo/_/mkhan pos kyang de rnams kyi nang nas rnam pa gsum ni blangs kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya ni blo gros bzang po de nyid la byin no/_/blo gros bzang pos kyang de kho na'i nub mo rmi lam rnam pa bcu rmis te/_rgya mtsho chen po btung ngo 
[\[86b.6\]]snyam pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro'o snyam pa dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba mthu che ba 'di gnyis lag pas reg cing gzung bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_rgyal po rnams shing khyer du gzhug go snyam pa dang /_drang srong rnams dang /_glang po che dkar po rnams dang /_ngang pa rnams 
[\[86b.7\]]dang /_seng ge rnams dang /_brag chen po la bzhon par bya'o snyam ste/_des rmi lam de rnams rmis nas sad do/_/sad nas des bsams pa/_bdag gi rmi lam 'di rnams lung ston nus pa su yod snyam mo/_/de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ldan pa zhig gnas so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po the tshom gcad pa'i phyir/_drang srong de'i thad du song nas blo gros bzang pos drang srong de la kun du dga' ba'i gtam byas nas rmi lam de rnams bsnyad de/_khyod kyis rmi lam rnam pa bcu 
[\[87a.2\]]po 'di rnams kyi don nges par gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas drang srong des smras pa/_bdag gis rmi lam 'di rnams lung ston mi nus kyis rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan du song shig dang /_de na rgyal po mar mes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 
[\[87a.3\]]zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir/_grong khyer gyi nang du spyan drangs te/_des rmi lam 'di rnams lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po nor can gyi bu des rgyal po mar mes spring ba bzhin du mnyan te/_blon po brgyad khris zhabs 'bring byas nas rgyal po'i 
[\[87a.4\]]pho brang mar me ldan du phyin to/_/rgyal po mar mes kyang zhag bdun lon nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir/_grong khyer gyi nang du spyan drang bar bya'o snyam ste/_yul dang grong khyer thams cad nas me tog thams cad bsdus 
[\[87a.5\]]so/_/der gang gi nyin par rgyal po mar mes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir/_grong khyer gyi nang du spyan 'dren pa de'i nyin par blo gros bzang po yang der 'ongs nas/_der rgyal po des me tog thams cad bsdus par gyur to/_/
[\[87a.6\]]bu mo lha'i rim gro byed pa de yang me tog phreng ba rgyud pa'i thad du song nas lha'i mchod pa bya dgos kyis bdag la ud pa la sngon po byin cig ces byas so/_/me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa/_deng rgyal pos sangs rgyas spyan drang ba'i phyir me tog thams cad bsdus so/_/
[\[87a.7\]]des smras pa/_me tog gi rdzing der song la yang ltos shig dang gal te bdag gi bsod nams kyis ud pa la sngon po ma btogs pa rnyed kyang srid do/_/de nas me tog gi rdzing der blo gros bzang po'i bsod nams kyi mthus ud pa la sngon po bdun byung ngo /_/
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]de nas me tog gi phreng ba rgyud pa de song nas des mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bu mo des me tog phreng ba rgyud pa la smras pa/_ud pa la 'di rnams thogs shig_/me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa/_bla nas bdag la gyod rmas su 'ong gis bdag gis btog tu mi rung ngo /_/
[\[87b.2\]]de nas des smras pa/_khyod kyis sngar me tog thams cad btogs te/_rgyal po la ma phul lam/_me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa phul lo/_/de nas bu mo des smras pa/_'di dag ni bdag gi bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyis/_'di rnams thogs la 
[\[87b.3\]]bdag la byin cig_/me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa/_bla nas ma tshor bar 'di dag ji ltar khyer bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthu las byung ba yin gyis thogs shig dang /_bdag gis chu'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste nang du bskur bar 
[\[87b.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas me tog phreng ba rgyud pas de skad ces thos nas/_de dag btogs te bu mo de la byin no/_/des kyang blangs nas chu'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/_bum pa de chus bkang nas grong khyer gyi nang du chas so/_/blo gros bzang po yang grong khyer gyi 
[\[87b.5\]]nang der phyin nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mi byar ga la rung snyam ste/_des me tog phreng ba rgyud pa'i khyim rnams bskor te/_me tog go cog btsal na me tog gcig kyang ma rnyed do/_/de nas grong khyer gyi nub 
[\[87b.6\]]sgo nas byung ste/_kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar bskor te/_me tog rnams btsal kyang me tog gcig kyang ma rnyed do/_/de nas 'khor 'khor te skyed mos tshal der phyin nas/_bu mo de yang skyed mos tshal de nas byung ste/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang 
[\[87b.7\]]po dang thad kar phrad do/_/de nas blo gros bzang po'i bsod nams kyi mthus me tog ud pa la de dag chu'i bum pa de'i nang nas gyen du 'thon to/_/de nas blo gros bzang pos me tog de dag mthong nas/_bu mo de la smras pa/_nga las rin kAr ShA pa Na 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]lnga brgya long la ud pa la 'o ni rnams nga la byin cig_/bu mo des smras pa/_de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag bzhes su ma gnang na/_da ud pa la rnams bzhed dam/_bdag mi dbul lo zhes de skad smras nas/_yang bram ze'i khye'u blo gros 
[\[88a.2\]]bzang po la smras pa/_'di rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi/_blo gros bzang pos smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu bu mo des smras pa/_bdag la kAr ShA pa Na cang mi 'tshal gyis gal te khyod la ud pa la 'di dag phul 
[\[88a.3\]]ba'i 'bras bus/_tshe rabs thams cad du bdag khyod kyi btsun mor 'gyur bar bzhed de/_gal te sbyin pa 'di sbyin pa na tshe rabs thams cad du khyod bdag gi chung mar gyur cig ces de skad du smon lam 'debs na ni/_bdag gis ye dbul bar 'tshal lo/_/
[\[88a.4\]]blo gros bzang pos smras pa/_nga ni sbyin pa la dga' ba yin te/_bdag gi chung ma dang bu yang yongs su gtong la/_bdag gi sha yang yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/bu mo des smras pa/_ji smon lam de ltar thob la slad kyis su ci 'dod pa 
[\[88a.5\]]de la bdag stsol cig_/de skad ces smras nas/_bu mo des blo gros bzang po la ud pa la lnga byin no/_/gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis khyer nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod kyis gang du smon pa yi/_/'dren pa sangs rgyas brnyes pa der/_
[\[88a.6\]]rtag tu 'thun par chos spyod pa'i/_/khyod kyi btsun mor bdag gyur cig_/de nas rgyal po des grong khyer de dag thams cad rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas nas/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rta babs rnams ni 
[\[88a.7\]]btsugs/_dar gyi lda ldi rnams ni bres/_spos chab dang /_phye ma rnams kyis ni gtor to/_/grong khyer gyi sgo nas gtsug lag khang gi bar du yang rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams med par byas nas/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rta babs ni btsugs/_dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/_spos chab dang /_phye mas ni gtor to/_/rgyal po de nyid kyis kyang gdugs rtsibs brgya pa thogs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad bsu'o/_/de bzhin du blon po rnams kyis kyang bsu'o/_/de 
[\[88b.2\]]bzhin du rgyal po nor can gyi bu blon po dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang bsu'o/_/de nas rgyal pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs su gsol zhes gsol ba btab nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[88b.3\]]'das de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/_grong khyer logs su chas te gshegs so/_/rgyal po mar me yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya pa thogs so/_/de bzhin du blon po rnams dang /_rgyal po 
[\[88b.4\]]nor can gyi bu blon po dang bcas pa rnams kyang gdugs thogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas re re nas da bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs thogs so/_/snyam du sems par 'gyur ba de lta bur rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas 
[\[88b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i mdzes pa dang ldan pas grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du mdzad de/_sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag nas/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag pa de kho na'i mod la 
[\[88b.6\]]sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg par gyur to/_/chos nyid kyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang gi tshe ched du mdzad de/_sgo'i them pa la zhabs 
[\[88b.7\]]'jog pa na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te/_smyon pa rnams kyis ni rang bzhin gyis sems thob par 'gyur ro/_/long ba rnams ni mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'on pa rnams ni rna bas thos par 'gyur ro/_/lkugs 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]pa rnams ni smra nus par 'gyur ro/_/'phye bo rnams ni 'gro nus par 'gyur ro/_/bud med bu 'byung du mi btub pa rnams ni bde bar btsas par 'gyur ro/_/shing mig gi gdos dang rkang sgril dang /_an pan btags pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[89a.2\]]ni bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/chung ngu nas 'khon byung ba rnams ni de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems thob par 'gyur ro/_/be'u rnams ni be'u gdang bcad de ma'i thad du 'dong bar byed do/_/glang po che rnams kyang skad 'byin to/_/rta rnams kyang skad 
[\[89a.3\]]'byin to_/khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/_/ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u rnams kyang skad snyan pa 'byin to/_/rol mo'i cha byad rnams kyang ma brdungs par sgra snyan pa 'byin to/_/rgyan snod du bcug 
[\[89a.4\]]pa rnams kyang sgra snyan pa 'byin to/_/sa phyogs mtho ba rnams ni dma' bar 'gyur/_dma' ba rnams ni mtho bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyang bar snang las lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_
[\[89a.5\]]pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do/_/a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i phye ma rnams dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba rnams kyang 'thor bar byed do/_/shar phyogs dma' na nub 
[\[89a.6\]]phyogs mtho/_nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/_lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/_byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/_dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/_mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan de na srog chags 
[\[89a.7\]]'bum phrag du ma me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos rnams kyis bkur sti byed do/_/blo gros bzang po dang /_blo gros dang /_bu mo de yang pad ma khyer te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ga la ba der dong ba las/_de dag skye bo phal po che 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]mchod pa byed pas gtams nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ma chud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_skye bo phal po che 'di rnams pas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po bsod nams ches 'phel bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas rdzi char drag po chen po zhig 
[\[89b.2\]]sprul to/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis go skabs phye nas/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos skabs thod de bcom ldan 'das la blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas ud pa la lnga po de dag bcom ldan 
[\[89b.3\]]'das la gtor to/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis/_de dag shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag tu bla rer chags shing 'dug la/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro gzhes na ni sdod par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas 
[\[89b.4\]]bu mo des de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas dga' ba skyes te/_ud pa la gnyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas de gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan gyi gong du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyis bla rer chags shing 'dug par byin gyis brlabs so/_/sa phyogs de dag 
[\[89b.5\]]kyang rdzi char drag po chen pos 'dam rdzab tu gyur nas/_de'i 'og tu sa phyogs 'dam rdzab can der bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa na/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos sa phyogs 'dam rdzab can der bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skra bting nas tshigs su bcad 
[\[89b.6\]]de smras pa/_blo ldan sad mdzad gal te bdag_/byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya na/_/skye rga med mdzad zhabs gnyis kyis/_/myur du bdag skra brdzi bar gsol/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i 
[\[89b.7\]]skra'i steng du zhabs gnyis bzhag go/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dug pa de khros nas/_kye ltos dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'dis/_bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i skra phyugs la bya ba bzhin du brdzis sa zhes zer ro/_/
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]de nas de'i 'og tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan te/_khyod ni sa 'dir 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/ston pa mnga' bdag 'jig rten gsum las rnam grol ba/_/shAkya'i sras po shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/_/
[\[90a.2\]]'jig rten gsum gyi snying po 'gro ba'i sgron du 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan ma thag pa de'i mod kho na la nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so/_/de nas de'i skra byi nas skra sar 
[\[90a.3\]]khyad par du 'phags pa byung ngo /_/de nas de nam mkha' la 'dug pa skye bo phal po ches mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smon lam btab pa/_gang gi tshe 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag cag 'di'i nyan thos su gyur cig ces byas so/_/bu mo des kyang smon lam btab ste/_
[\[90a.4\]]khyod kyis gang du smon pa yi/_/'dren pa sangs rgyas brnyes pa der/_/rtag tu 'thun par chos spyod pa'i/_/khyod kyi btsun mor bdag gyur cig/_/gang tshe khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren 'gyur/_/de yi dus bab khyod kyi ni/_/nyan thos mar yang bdag gyur cig_/
[\[90a.5\]]mkha' gnas bram ze'i khye'u mthong nas/_/brgya phrag dang ni stong phrag rnams/_/thams cad ma 'ongs dus dag tu/_/nyan thos nyid du smon par byed/_/gang tshe khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren 'gyur/_/de yi dus bab khyod kyi ni/_/nyan thos bdag cag 'gyur bar shog_/
[\[90a.6\]]ces byas so/_/de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po mar mes de'i skra blangs nas rgyal po nor can gyi bus smras pa/_skra 'di dag bdag la byin cig_/de nas rgyal po mar mes skra de dag de la byin nas 
[\[90a.7\]]des blangs te/_bgrangs na skra nyag ma brgyad khri byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha bdag cag la skra nyag ma re re stsal bar gsol/_'on kyang bdag cag gis de rnams mchod rten du bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas rgyal po des blon po de dag la skra nyag ma re re byin nas blon po 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]de dag rang rang gi yul du song ste mchod rten brtsigs so/_/gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po mar me dang rgyal po nor can gyi bu dang grong khyer gyi mi dang yul gyi mi du mas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi yon tan la bltas te yo 
[\[90b.2\]]byad thams cad bstabs so/_/de nas blo gros bzang pos bram ze'i khye'u blo gros la smras pa/_nga ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan na khyod kyis gang du sems bskyed/_des smras pa/_bdag ni ma rung ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos smras pa/_khyod kyis ci zhig byas na/_ma 
[\[90b.3\]]rung bar 'gyur/_des smras pa/_gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zhabs kyis khyod kyi skra brdzis pa de'i tshe/_bdag khros te smras pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis/_bram ze'i skra phyugs la bya ba bzhin du rkang pas 
[\[90b.4\]]brdzis so zhes byas so/_/de nas blo gros bzang pos de la smras pa/_tshur shog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/_/de nas blo gros bzang po dang blo gros gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste/_blo gros bzang 
[\[90b.5\]]po ni rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te chos bzhin du 'khor bsdus so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/bram ze'i khye'u blo gros ni shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas sems can dmyal bar skyes so/_/dge slong 
[\[90b.6\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang por gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_ngas der sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la ud pa la sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_'khor ba na bde ba chen 
[\[90b.7\]]po myong bar gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des na nga'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam du gyur la da lta'i bar du yang las de'i rnam par smin pas mdza' sde bo lnga brgya po rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa yin no//_//
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]las brgya tham pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_'jigs med ces bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs pa las/_ri khrod cig tu byon nas de der gshegs pa na/_shing gi grib ma la skad cig mnyel bso nas chas te 
[\[91a.2\]]gshegs so/_/lam de yang seng ge'i 'jigs pa chen po dang ldan pa zhig ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lam kha gnyis su gyes pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/_/btsun pa shul 'di ni kha gnyis su gyes te/_de la shul gcig ni 
[\[91a.3\]]drang la 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags/_shul gcig ni 'khyog la 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags na/_btsun pa shul gang du gshegs par mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[91a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa de na ni/_'jigs pa'am skrag pa'am bag tsha ba ci yang med kyis lam drang po logs su drongs shig ces bka' stsal to/_/grong mi'i byis pa gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rtse zhing 'dug ste/_de gnyis la 
[\[91a.5\]]gcig ni rnge'u chung thogs so/_/gcig ni mda' gzhu thogs so/_/de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing spa bar byas pa rgyang nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes 
[\[91a.6\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa shul 'di na seng ge'i 'jigs pa ni mchis mod kyi/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /_
[\[91a.7\]]bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsel bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u khyod gnyis kyis seng ge'i 'jigs pa byung na ji ltar bya/_der gcig gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis rol mo'i sgras skrag par bgyi'o/_/gcig 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]gis gsol pa/_bdag gis ni mda' gzhu'i sgras skrag par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_khye'u de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su chas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_'di gnyis kyis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 
[\[91b.2\]]bskyed zin to snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_khye'u khyed gnyis kyis sems dga' ba bskyed pa de tsam gyis bsel byas zin te chog gis phyir dengs shig_/de nas khye'u de gnyis phyir log nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91b.3\]]rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang 
[\[91b.4\]]'dus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so thams thams dang kyi hud zer dang a chu zer dang ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa dang pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can 
[\[91b.5\]]dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag 
[\[91b.6\]]cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/_/
[\[91b.7\]]gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par gyur to/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab 
[\[92a.2\]]bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang /_
[\[92a.3\]]tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba 
[\[92a.4\]]dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang 
[\[92a.5\]]zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom 
[\[92a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[92a.7\]]can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas 
[\[92b.2\]]pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur 
[\[92b.3\]]mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod 
[\[92b.4\]]spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji 
[\[92b.5\]]ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum 
[\[92b.6\]]mi ston/_/brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog bstan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur 
[\[92b.7\]]brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas 
[\[93a.2\]]pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo khye'u 'di gnyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa bcu gsum gyi 
[\[93a.3\]]bar du lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing /_'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des slob dpon med pa dang man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun 
[\[93a.4\]]mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/_de la gcig ni rang sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gcig ni 'jigs med ces bya bar 'gyur te de gnyis kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni 'di yin no//_//dbyig mtsho zhes bya ba 
[\[93a.5\]]ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs 
[\[93a.6\]]zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de gang gi tshe bu chags par gyur pa de'i tshe de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur la/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thams cad du 
[\[93a.7\]]gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/_me tog sna tshogs ni bkram spos chus ni chag chag btab pa'i nang na/_mal khri la 'dug ste bud med kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag des bsams pa/_ma la bdag gi chung ma 'di 'byung po 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'ga' zhig gis thebs par ma gyur grang snyam nas ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na/_ltas mkhan rnams na re 'di ni 'byung pos thebs pa ma yin gyi/_sems can lto na 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs 
[\[93b.2\]]bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas nas/_de bud med de dag gis bkru bar 'dod de rgyan bkrol na de'i rgyan gzhan byung ste/_bkrol te bor yang gzhan byung 
[\[93b.3\]]bar gyur nas mas smras pa/_rgyan 'di ni 'di yi bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyis/_ma bkrol bar rgyan dang bcas par khrus shig ces byas so/_/de nas bud med de dag gis rgyan dang bcas te bkrus nas mal khri'i steng du bzhag pa dang /_de'i mi'i mal khri mi 
[\[93b.4\]]snang bar gyur nas lha'i mal khri byung bar gyur to/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de nyid du yang de'i lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba/_me tog sna tshogs bkram pa spos chus chag chag btab pa byung bar gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 
[\[93b.5\]]nang gi mal khri'i sngas su yang lha'i mchod sdong ril gyis gser las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa byung ngo /_/mchod sdong de'i drung nas kyang gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba kha bye ba bzhi byung ste/_gal te de dag las brgya 'am stong byung du zin kyang /_
[\[93b.6\]]de dag 'grib pa'am gang bar yang mi mngon no/_/de nas pha ma gnyis kyis mthong ma thag tu shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di btsas pa na khyim 'di rin po 
[\[93b.7\]]che sna tshogs kyis mtsho bzhin du gang bar gyur pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dbyig mtsho zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u dbyig mtsho pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu dang bud med rma bya'i mdongs chang pa na thogs pa dang bsrung ba'i srad bu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de 
[\[94a.2\]]gang du 'gro ba der mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de la ras sar pa ma spyad pa tshar tshar ring ba rnams sa la bting bar byed do/_/me tog sna tshogs kyang sa la 'grems par byed do/_/de nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung 
[\[94a.3\]]ba dang /_sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang 
[\[94a.4\]]yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i phas dgun dang sos ka dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang pa rnams dang skyed mos tshal rnams byas nas de dag kyang lha rdzas su gyur te/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan ni bsgreng /_me tog sna 
[\[94a.5\]]tshogs ni bkram spos chu'i chag chag ni btab par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe 'dod pa la longs spyod par nus par gyur pa de'i tshe/_lha'i bu mo dag byung bar gyur te/_de khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du 'dug nas/_bud med 'ba' zhig dang rol mo byed de/_rtse zhing dga' la 
[\[94a.6\]]dga' mgur spyod de rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo /_/de nas de phyi zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba dang chos la mngon par dga' ba dang dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis lha dang mi'i longs spyod ni yongs 
[\[94a.7\]]su longs spyad zin gyis ma la nga ni bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste/_chu bo rnams las yang dag par brgal bar bya ba dang sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad par bya gor ma chag snyam du 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]bsams nas/_sbyin pa dag kyang byin bsod nams dag kyang byas te/_dbul po du ma phyug par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas de phyogs gang du gnas par dam bcas pa'i phyogs der lha'i mal khri 'byung bar 
[\[94b.2\]]'gyur la/_de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi ma yin pa rnams kyis ras sar pa ma spyad pa tshar tshar ring ba rnams sa la 'ding bar byed do/_/me tog sna tshogs kyang sa la 'grems par byed de/_de de lta bus ngo tsha bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[94b.3\]]stsal pa/_snying thag pa nas de la mi lta ba'i sems skyed cig dang thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas des thos ma thag tu thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems bskyed nas thams cad med par gyur to/_/de nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs 
[\[94b.4\]]pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur 
[\[94b.5\]]bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed 
[\[94b.6\]]pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dbyig mtshos las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing 
[\[94b.7\]]blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas ma gos par btsas la/_skyes ma thag tu yang lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang lha'i mal khri dang lha'i mchod sdong byung bar gyur la/_de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dang der mi ma lags pa rnams kyis ras sar pa ma spyad pa tshar tshar ring ba dag 'ding bar bgyis pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyang sa la 'grems par bgyid pa dang /_cher skyes pa na yang lha dang mi'i dpal byung bar gyur la/_'dis bcom ldan 
[\[95a.2\]]'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las 
[\[95a.3\]]gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[95a.4\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs 
[\[95a.5\]]shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de phyi zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba dang chos la mngon par dga' ba dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_des phyi zhig na rnam pa thams 
[\[95a.6\]]cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas/_gtsug lag khang de nyid du bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs nas/_de'i mtshan mo cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang zhal zas 
[\[95a.7\]]ro brgya dang ldan pa bshams te/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo bdag nyid kyis khyer nas gtsug lag khang de nyid du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_las byed pa rnams bsags nas des ring po ma thogs par mchod rten de rnam pa thams 
[\[95b.2\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_/de nas des bltas nas mchod rten de bya rnams kyis mi gtsang bar byas pa mthong nas/_des yang mchod rten de nyid dgab pa'i phyir gtsang khang phyur po lan kan dang rta babs dang skar khung khol ma can dang skar khung dra ba can dang /_char 
[\[95b.3\]]gab kyis brgyan pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams bsgreng ba zhig byas nas/_mchod rten de'i nang gi sa gzhi la yang gzhi bting ste bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog dang rol mo'i sgras bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[95b.4\]]bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du skye bar shog cig_/mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas ma gos 
[\[95b.5\]]par skye bar shog cig_/bdag skyes ma thag tu lha'i mal khri dang lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang lha'i mchod sdong ril gyis gser las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'byung bar shog cig_/de'i drung nas kyang gter chen po kha phye ba mchod sdong de dang 'brel pa zhig byung 
[\[95b.6\]]la/_de las gal te brgya 'am stong blangs su zin kyang de dag 'gribs pa'am gang bar yang mi mngon par shog cig_/cher skyes pa na yang lha dang mi'i dpal 'byung bar shog cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung 
[\[95b.7\]]bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dbyig mtsho 'di nyid yin te/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byas nas/_
[\[96a.2\]]dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug 
[\[96a.3\]]la mdzes pa dang /_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /_mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang /_khrag gi dri mas ma gos par gyur la/_btsas ma thag tu yang lha'i mal khri dang lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang lha'i mchod sdong byung bar gyur to/_/cher skyes pa na yang lha 
[\[96a.4\]]dang mi'i dpal byung bar gyur te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas 
[\[96a.5\]]la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//dbyig dga' zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das yul kA shi'i phyogs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las ba rA Na sIr byon te/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na 
[\[96a.6\]]drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na dge slong lnga sde rnams gnas so/_/de nas dge slong lnga sde rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas 'dus te nang khrims bcas nas 'di skad du/_kye dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni g.yel ba mang du 
[\[96a.7\]]sogs pa mang du sogs shing 'tsho ba spong ba las nyams pa ste/_de ni da kha zas mang du za zhing 'bras can dang tsang phye za la zhun mar dang til mar gyis lus rnams skud par byed cing chu dron pos lus 'khru bar byed de/_de 'u bu cag gi thad du 'ong gis/_kye gau ta ma stan dag yod kyis 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]gal te 'dod pa lta na 'dug cig ces de skad tsam dag smra bar bya'i gus par smra bar mi bya'o/_/phyag mi bya'o/_/ldang bar mi bya'o/_/langs te stan bstab par mi bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga sde rnams dang ji tsam du nye bar byon pa/_de tsam du 
[\[96b.2\]]dge slong lnga sde rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas zhe sa mi bya ba'i thugs ma thub ste/_kha cig ni stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan shom mo/_/kha cig ni zhabs bsil ba'i chu dang zhabs rten phyogs gcig tu 'jog par byed 
[\[96b.3\]]do/_/kha cig ni langs nas chos gos rnams 'dzin par byed de/_'di skad du kye gau ta ma tshur spyon/_kye gau ta ma khyod gshegs pa legs so/_/kye gau ta ma khyod gdan bshams pa la bzhugs zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma 
[\[96b.4\]]mi blun po 'di rnams ni rang gi nang khrims las nyams so snyam du dgongs nas gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/_/de tsam na dge slong lnga sde rnams bcom ldan 'das la ming gi tshig dang rus kyi tshig dang tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'ba' zhig rjod par byed do/_/de 
[\[96b.5\]]nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshig dang rus kyi tshig dang tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'ba' zhig ma brjod cig_/khyed yun ring po nas gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang sdug bsngal bar 
[\[96b.6\]]gyur ta re/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_ming gi tshig dang rus kyi tshig dang tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'ba' zhig rjod par byed na/_de ni yun ring por de la gnod pa dang mi phan pa 
[\[96b.7\]]dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gau ta ma khyod kyi spyod lam dang spyod pa dang dka' ba spyod pa snga ma des mi'i chos las lhag pa/_mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i khyad par ye shes sam gzigs pa'am bde bar reg pa la gnas pa yang 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]rung ste ci yang ma thob na/_da khyed g.yel ba mang du sogs pa mang du sogs shing 'tsho ba spong ba las nyams pa dang /_da khyod kha zas mang du za zhing 'bras can dang tsang phye za la zhun mar dang til mar gyis lus rnams skud par byed cing chu dron pos lus 'khru 
[\[97a.2\]]bar byed pas lta ga la thob/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sngon dang da ltar gyi bzhin mdog 'gyur ba dang dbang po rnams mi 'dra bar gyur pa mthong ngam/_de dag gis gsol pa/_
[\[97a.3\]]kye gau ta ma mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mtha' 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung bas bsten par mi bya bsnyen par mi bya yongs su bsten par mi bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na 'dod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i bsod nyams la sten pa/_ngan pa 
[\[97a.4\]]grong mi'i chos phal pa so so'i skye bo'i chos gang yin pa dang /_bdag nyid nyon mongs pa la sten pa/_sdug bsngal ba 'phags pa'i chos ma yin pa gnod pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa ste/_mtha' 'di gnyis la mi bsten par mngon par shes par 'gyur ba dang mngon par byang chub par 
[\[97a.5\]]'gyur ba dang mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i mig skyed pa dang ye shes skyed pa dang nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i dbu ma'i lam yod de/_dbu ma'i lam gang zhe na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag dang 
[\[97a.6\]]yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams brda sprad pa 'dis brda sprod par spyod par gyur te/_snga dro bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga sde 
[\[97a.7\]]gnyis la gdams ngag ston na dge slong gsum grong du bsod snyoms la 'gro ste/_gsum gyis khyer te 'ongs pa gang yin pa des drug car 'tsho bar byed do/_/phyi dro bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga sde gsum la gdams ngag ston na dge slong gnyis grong du bsod snyoms la 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]'gro ste/_gnyis kyis khyer te 'ongs pa gang yin pa des lnga sde rnams 'tsho bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ni snga nas kyang bshos dus su gsol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams 
[\[97b.2\]]la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung 
[\[97b.3\]]ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug 
[\[97b.4\]]bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ni/_mngon par shes pas yongs su shes par bya ba yin no snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 
[\[97b.5\]]'phags pa'i bden pa de ni mngon par shes pas spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ni mngon 
[\[97b.6\]]par shes pas mngon sum du bya ba yin no/_/snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ni mngon par 
[\[97b.7\]]shes pas bsgom par bya ba yin no snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ni mngon par shes pas yongs su shes so snyam du mig skyes so/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de ni mngon par shes pas spangs so snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa 
[\[98a.2\]]dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ni mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong 
[\[98a.3\]]dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las/_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ni mngon par shes pas bsgoms so snyam du mig skyes so/_/ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes so/_/dge slong dag 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[98a.4\]]bzhi la/_de ltar nga'i rabs gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i mig ma skyes/_ye shes ma skyes/_rig pa ma skyes/_blo ma skyes kyi bar du/_dge slong dag nga lha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas 
[\[98a.5\]]pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu 'di las grol ba dang nges par byung ba dang /_mi ldan pa dang rnam par grol ba dang phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis shas cher gnas par yang ma gyur la/_dge slong dag bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[98a.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam du yang ngas ma rtogs so/_/dge slong dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la de ltar nga'i rabs gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i mig skyes/_ye shes dang rig pa dang blo skyes nas/_gdod dge slong dag nga lha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang 
[\[98a.7\]]bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu 'di las grol ba dang nges par byung ba dang mi ldan pa dang rnam par grol ba dang phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis shas cher gnas par yang gyur la/_
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]dge slong dag bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam du yang ngas rtogs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas der 
[\[98b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_kun shes sam/_bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so/_/kun 'tshal lags 
[\[98b.3\]]so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya chos kun shes par gyur pas na/_de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya'i ming kun shes kauN+Di n+ya zhes bya bar gyur to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sa la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams sgra rjod cing skad 'byin par byed de/_grogs po dag 
[\[98b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ba rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos dang 'thun pa/_rabs gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor 
[\[98b.5\]]lo 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am lha'am bdud dam tshangs pa'am gzhan gang su yang rung bas/_chos dang ldan par ma bskor ba de bskor gyis lha'i gnas rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro zhes zer to/_/
[\[98b.6\]]sa la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi sgra thos nas/_bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral ba rnams dang dga' ldan pa rnams dang 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang sgra 
[\[98b.7\]]rjod cing skad 'byin par byed de/_skad cig de dang thang cig de dang yud tsam de dang skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du sgra grag go/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyang sgra rjod cing skad 'byin par byed de/_grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ba rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos dang 'thun pa/_rabs gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'jig rten du dge sbyong 
[\[99a.2\]]ngam bram ze'am lha'am bdud dam tshangs pa'am gzhan su yang rung bas chos dang ldan par ma bskor ba de bskor gyis/_lha'i gnas rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro zhes zer to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ba 
[\[99a.3\]]rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su chos dang 'thun pa/_rabs gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na/_de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas der yang lan gnyis su bcom ldan 'das 
[\[99a.4\]]kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yin te/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/
[\[99a.5\]]sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang na ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang gang 'dod pa btsal te mi rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal ba 
[\[99a.6\]]dang mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag dang yang dag 
[\[99a.7\]]pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang brgyad pa ste yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang srid par skye bar byed pa dang dga' ba dang 'dod chags 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]spel mar 'byung ba dang de dang der mngon par dga' ba'i sred pa ste/_'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/de spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag dang yang dag 
[\[99b.2\]]pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang brgyad pa ste yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang srid par skye bar byed pa dang dga' ba dang 'dod chags 
[\[99b.3\]]spel mar 'byung ba dang de dang der mngon par dga' ba'i sred pa gang yin pa de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang bor ba dang bsal ba dang zad pa dang bral ba dang 'gog pa dang nye bar zhi ba dang nub pa ste/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/de mngon sum du 
[\[99b.4\]]bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang brgyad pa ste yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[99b.5\]]sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol 
[\[99b.6\]]ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang brgyad pa ste yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te de yang bsgom par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ni/_len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong lnga sde gzhan rnams ni chos rnams 
[\[99b.7\]]la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa gcig byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das dang gnyis so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde gzhan rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no/_/dge 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]slong dag gal te gzugs bdag yin du zin na gzugs gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bar mi rigs la/_gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i dbang yang yod par 'gyur bar rigs na/_
[\[100a.2\]]dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir/_gzugs gnod pa dang gzugs sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur la/_gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i dbang yang med do/_/dge slong dag tshor ba dang 'du 
[\[100a.3\]]shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te rnam par shes pa bdag yin du zin na/_rnam par shes pa gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bar mi rigs la/_rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur 
[\[100a.4\]]gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i dbang yang yod par 'gyur bar rigs na/_dge slong dag gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir/_rnam par shes pa gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur la/_rnam par shes pa la bdag gi 
[\[100a.5\]]gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i dbang yang med do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems gzugs rtag pa yin nam 'on te mi rtag pa yin/_btsun pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam 'on te 
[\[100a.6\]]sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/ci mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la/_thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos rnams 'di ni bdag gi'o/_/'di ni bdag go/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag go snyam du 
[\[100a.7\]]bdag tu 'dzin par byed dam/_btsun pa 'dzin par mi bgyid lags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rtag pa yin nam 'on te mi rtag pa yin/_btsun pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/mi rtag pa gang yin 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam 'on te sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/ci mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos rnams 'di ni bdag gi'o/_/'di 
[\[100b.2\]]ni bdag go/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag go snyam du bdag tu 'dzin par byed dam/_btsun pa 'dzin par mi bgyid lags so/_/dge slong dag de bas na gzugs ci yang rung ste/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang nang gi'am phyi rol gyi'am rags pa'am cha phra ba 
[\[100b.3\]]'am ngan pa'am bzang po'am thag ring ba'am nye ba de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no snyam du de de ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag tshor ba ci 
[\[100b.4\]]yang rung ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ci yang rung ste/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang nang gi'am phyi rol gyi'am rags pa'am cha phra ba'am ngan pa'am bzang po'am thag ring ba'am nye ba de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/_/
[\[100b.5\]]'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no snyam du de de ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag de bas na thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyis ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag bdag kyang ma yin/_bdag 
[\[100b.6\]]gi yang ma yin par yang dag par mthong ngo /_/des de ltar yang dag par mthong bas na 'jig rten ci yang mi len to/_/mi len pas na yongs su yi 'chad pa med do/_/yongs su yi 'chad pa med pas na bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyad pa spyad zin to/_/bya ba byas so/_/
[\[100b.7\]]srid pa 'di las gzhan med do snyam du rang nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga sde po gzhan rnams kyang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa lnga byung ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]'das dang drug go/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams kyi skal shas stsal nas/_
[\[101a.2\]]g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas dge slong lnga sde po 'di rnams la bdag gi srog dang bsdos te/_
[\[101a.3\]]chu'i rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral nas/_rin thang che ba'i rin po che rnams kyi skal shas ji ltar byin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ba rA Na sI'i grong khyer na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /_
[\[101a.4\]]bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa 
[\[101a.5\]]sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na ded dpon dbyig ces bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_
[\[101a.6\]]thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba/_gser gyi kha dog 
[\[101a.7\]]can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba sna mtho ba sna legs pa smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di dbyig gi bu yin gyis khye'u 'di'i ming dbyig 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]dga' zhes gdags so zer ro/_/de nas khye'u dbyig dga' 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang /_
[\[101b.2\]]lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs 
[\[101b.3\]]pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/khye'u de yang byams pa'i rang bzhin can snying rje dang ldan pa sems can la byams pa sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig ste/_des pha ma la gsol nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang spyod pa 
[\[101b.4\]]pa dang kun tu rgyu dang dman pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams la/_sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag bya ba la zhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na ded dpon dbyig dga'i pha nad kyis thebs nas/_de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim 
[\[101b.5\]]gro byas kyang sos par ma nus te shi nas/_de ras sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams kyis brgyan pa'i khyogs la khyer te/_rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas yun mi ring ba zhig tu mdun byas pa las mdun bor te 'dug go/_/de nas de'i bu dbyig dga' de 
[\[101b.6\]]rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi ded dpon chen por dbang bskur te de'i nor gyis tshong pa mang po nyo tshong byed do/_/de yang pha shi nas sbyin pa rgya chen po byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na des bsams pa/_nor 'di ni bdag gi phas bsags pa yin te/_bdag gis 'di las sbyin pa 
[\[101b.7\]]dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas na 'di'i phyir bdag la gzhan dag 'phya bar 'gyur te/_'di ni gzhan gyis bsags pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/_'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod ces zer bar 'ong gis ma la bdag nyid kyis nor bsgrubs te/_
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]rang gi zho shas bsgrubs nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag bya gor ma chag snyam nas des dril bsgrags te/_su ded dpon dbyig dga' dang lhan cig tu sho gam med pa dang /_la gcan gyi btsas med pa dang gru btsas med pa dang bsel rngan med 
[\[102a.2\]]par rgya mtsho chen por 'gro 'dod pa de dag zong sta gon gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu tshong pa lnga brgya 'dus nas de dag gis rnga mo dang ba lang dang bong bu dag gis zong bskyas te/_grong dang grong rdal dang grong khyer dang nags khrod kyi grong dang yul po che rnams 
[\[102a.3\]]su rgyus nas rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin te/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas gru'i gla byas nas zho shas 'tsho ba rnam pa lnga ste/_'tsho ba sbyor ba dang nan thur byed pa dang zhal ta byed pa dang 'phyag pa dang drod pa rnams kyang khrid do/_/de la 'tsho ba sbyor ba gang zhe na/_de'i nang du zas 
[\[102a.4\]]dang skom sbyor ba gang yin pa'o/_/nan tur byed pa gang zhe na/_de'i nang du rtsod pa byung ngo cog zhi bar byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/zhal ta byed pa gang zhe na/_de'i nang du nor rdzas kyi zhal ta byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/'phyag pa gang zhe na/_de'i nang du chu 'phyag pa gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[102a.5\]]drod pa gang zhe na/_de'i nang du rgyu skar rnams la lta ba gang yin pa'o/_/de nas tshong pa de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po mthong nas 'jigs te gru'i nang du 'jug mi 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas ded dpon gyis drod pa la smras pa/_kye mi khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa ji lta ba 
[\[102a.6\]]bzhin du sgrogs shig_/de nas drod pas bsgrags te/_kye 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i tshong pa dag nyon cig_/rgya mtsho chen po 'di'i nang na nor bu rin po che rin thang che ba 'di lta ste/_nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang dung dang nor rdo dang byi ru dang dngul dang gser dang rdo'i snying po dang spug dang /_
[\[102a.7\]]pad ma rA ga dang /_dung g.yas su 'khyil ba de lta bu dag yod na/_khyed kyi nang nas su rin po che de lta bu dag gis bdag nyid dang pha ma dang bu dang chung ma dang bran pho dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang mdza' bo dang blon po dang nye du dang rgan rabs rnams yang dag pa'i 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_dus dus su dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyi ma la yang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba'i yon dbul bar 'dod pa de ni rgya mtsho 
[\[102b.2\]]chen po'i nang du 'gro bar gyis shig ces byas pa dang 'jig rten pa dag ni 'byor pa 'dod pa ste/_skye bo phal po che gru'i nang du zhugs nas gru des mi theg par gyur te/_ded dpon des bsams pa da ni phyir phyung shig ces kyang ji skad bya snyam nas des drod pa la smras pa/_kye mi khyod 
[\[102b.3\]]kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgrogs shig_/de nas drod pas bsgrags te/_kye 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i tshong pa dag nyon cig_/rgya mtsho chen po 'di'i nang na shin tu 'jigs pa chen po 'di lta bu dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_nya'i 'jigs pa dang /_nya mid 
[\[102b.4\]]kyi 'jigs pa dang /_nya mid mid kyi 'jigs pa dang /_rlabs kyi 'jigs pa dang /_klong gi 'jigs pa dang /_chu srin kum b+hi ra'i 'jigs pa dang /_chu srin shi shu mA ra'i 'jigs pa dang /_chu'i nang gi ri rnams la thug pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_rlung nag po'i 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[102b.5\]]der chom rkun gos sngon po dang /_nag po gyon la nor phrog cing 'ong ste/_de dag gis khyed gtan du srog dang bral bar byed pa dag kyang yod na/_khyed kyi nang na su bdag nyid phangs pa dang /_pha ma gnyis dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_
[\[102b.6\]]zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_rgan rabs rnams 'dor phod pa de ni/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gro bar gyis shig_/ces byas pa dang dpa' bo ni nyung sdar ma ni mang ste/_skye bo phal po che phyir 'thon nas gru des theg par gyur to/_/de nas drod pas 
[\[102b.7\]]lan gsum gyi bar du sgra bsgrags te/_de'i 'og tu nyag thag gcig bkrol lo/_/de nas nyag thag gnyis dang gsum yang bkrol lo/_/de nas gru de drod pa chen pos ni bsdams rlung mthu chen pos ni khyer nas sprin chen po bzhin du chas te/_rlung drang por 'gro bas rin po che'i gling du 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]phyin par byas so/_/de nas drod pas sgra bsgrags pa/_kye 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i tshong pa rnams rin po che'i gling 'di na mching bu nor bu rin po che 'dra ba dag yod de/_de dag khyed kyis brtag cing brtag cing blang bar gyis shig_/khyed 'dzam bu'i gling du son 
[\[103a.2\]]pa'i 'og tu 'gyod par gyur ta re/_rin po che'i gling 'di nyid na srin mo khrung khrung gzhon nu ma zhes bya ba dag kyang gnas te/_thabs ji lta bus kyang skyes pa brid nas 'di nyid du ma rungs par byed cing sdug bsngal bar byed do/_/rin po che'i gling 'di nyid na myos par byed pa'i shing tog 
[\[103a.3\]]dag yod de/_de dag sus zos pa de zhag bdun gyi bar du brgyal te 'dug par 'gyur gyis de dag khyed ma za zhig_/rin po che'i gling 'di nyid na mi ma yin pa dag kyang gnas te/_de dag ni gzhan zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dug par ni bzod kyi/_zhag bdun las 'das nas don gang 
[\[103a.4\]]bsgrubs pa de dag ma zin par rlung gang gis gru khyer bar byed pa de lta bu'i rlung gtong bar byed do zhes bsgo nas/_de thos pas tshong pa rnams kyis bsgrims te bag yod par 'dug nas/_de dag gis rin po che rnams brtag cing brtag cing gru de bkang ste/_dper na/_til dang /_'bras 
[\[103a.5\]]dang /_ba da ra'i 'bras bu dang rgya sran gyis gang ba bzhin du byas te/_de dag rlung drang pos 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par byas so/_/des thabs de lta bur rgya mtsho'i gru'i don lan drug gi bar du bsgrubs te/_ba rA Na sIr 'ongs nas sbyin pa dag sbyin pa dang bsod nams dag byed pa la 
[\[103a.6\]]zhugs so/_/de'i tshe de ma yin pa'i grong khyer lnga na ded dpon lnga gnas te/_de dag ni song ste bor yang gru rnams ma rungs par gyur nas de dag gis bsams pa/_sems can bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa gcig gi mthus sems can mang po bde bar 'gyur la/_ded 
[\[103a.7\]]dpon chen po dbyig dga' de ni/_bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa yin te/_des rgya mtsho'i gru'i don lan drug gi bar du bsgrubs kyis/_gal te bdag cag gis de spro ba bskyed par nus na ni/_de'i mthus bdag cag gis nor bsgrub par nus par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_
[\[103b\]]
