[\[103b.1\]]lhan cig tu 'dus nas bA rA Na sIr song ste ded dpon dbyig dga'i thad du song nas smras pa/_ded dpon bdag cag song ste bor yang nor gyi gru rnams ma rungs par gyur te/_khyod ni bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa lags kyis/_bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad 
[\[103b.2\]]du/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du bzhud dang khyod kyi mthus bdag cag gis nor bsgrub nus par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_kye rgya mtsho chen po'i chos kyis ni/_gru bdun pa ma rungs par 'gyur te/_sngan chad gang gis kyang rgya mtsho'i gru'i don lan bdun grub pa su yang med do/_/
[\[103b.3\]]'on kyang khyed kyis bsams pa yongs su bskang bar bya ste/_khyed kho na la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_lan bdun du rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro bar bya'o zhes smras nas/_ded dpon chen po dbyig dgas ded dpon lnga po de dag khrid de rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song ba las de rin po che'i 
[\[103b.4\]]gling du phyin nas rin po che bsdus te yang 'dzam bu'i gling logs su gru btang ngo /_/de nas ded dpon chen po dbyig dga' rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na 'dug bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na 'khod pa rnams nye zho med pa dang bde blag tu pha rol tu 
[\[103b.5\]]son par 'gyur du mngon pa med kyis/_ma la bdag gis rin po che rin thang chen po rnams kyis sgye'u bkang ste/_rked pa la bcing bar bya'o snyam nas/_des rin po che rin thang chen po rnams kyis sgye'u bkang ste/_rked pa la bcings nas tshong pa de dag la smras pa/_kye gal te 
[\[103b.6\]]brgya la gru ma rungs par gyur na/_khyed nga'i lus la 'jus shig_/de nas phyi zhig na chu'i nang na 'dug pa'i ris de dag gi gru bshig nas/_ded dpon lnga po de dag ded dpon dbyig dga'i lus la 'jus so/_/de nas ded dpon dbyig dgas bsams pa/_bdag gson por 
[\[103b.7\]]'dug bzhin du ni 'di rnams rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral bar mi nus la/_rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig gnas pa mi srid cing skabs med de/_de ni gnas ma yin pas na/_bdag shi ba dang /_rgya mtsho chen po las myur du rgal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_ded dpon 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]rnams la smras pa/_kye khyed rnams brtan zhing spro ba cher skyed cig dang /_ngas khyed ci nas kyang nye zho med par bde blag tu rgya mtsho chen po las brgal bar bya'o/_/brgal zin nas kyang nga'i lus ma dor bar ngas rin po che rin thang chen po rnams kyis 
[\[104a.2\]]sgye'u bkang ste/_rked pa la bcings pa de khyed kyis bgo bsha' gyis la khyer cig dang /_des khyed kyi gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi bdun rgyud 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na 
[\[104a.3\]]bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med pa dang ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur 
[\[104a.4\]]ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas/_mtshon rnon po blangs te mgul pa bcad do/_/rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan 
[\[104a.5\]]cig gnas mi srid cing skabs med de/_'di ni gnas ma yin pas na/_de klu gtsang sbra la dga' ba rnams kyis 'gram du phul nas thang la bor ro/_/de nas de dag gis de'i ro las rin po che de dag bkrol te bgo bsha' byas nas/_de'i rus bu la mchod pa byas te dong ngo /_/
[\[104a.6\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe ded dpon dbyig dga' zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe ded dpon lnga por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga sde po 'di rnams yin te/_de'i tshe na yang 'di 
[\[104a.7\]]rnams ngas rang gi srog dang bsdos te/_chu'i rgya mtsho las bsgral nas/_rin po che rin thang chen po dag gi skal shas byin te/_nye zho med cing bde ba'i gnas su bkod la/_da ltar yang ngas 'di rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/_dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]yan lag rin po che'i skal shas byin nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /_bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po dgu pa/_dom gnyis zhes bya ba de la dom dang po ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na 
[\[104b.2\]]bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das yul ga yAr gshegs pa na/_cham pas btab nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis lcags mda' zhes bya ba'i sman mar phan zhes gsol nas/_de nyid kyis sman mar bskol te/_bcom ldan 'das la sman mar gsol to/_/de nas de las 
[\[104b.3\]]lhag par gyur nas 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa chab mar gyi lhag ma bdag gis su la stsal bar 'tshal/_de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed dge 'dun la brims la su 'dod pa la byin cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[104b.4\]]stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_'tsho byed kyis mar gyi lhag ma de dge 'dun la brims nas/_der dge slong rnams kyis gcig gis kyang ma blangs te/_lhas byin gyis mthong nas smras pa 'tsho byed de ci/_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[104b.5\]]lcags mda' zhes bya ba'i sman mar gsol ba de'i lhag ma 'di/_dge slong rnams la brims na sus kyang ma blangs so/_/lhas byin gyis smras pa/_ngas blang gis dge sbyong gau ta mas ji tsam 'thungs pa de tsam byin cig_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_lhas byin bcom ldan 
[\[104b.6\]]'das ni sku yang che la nyam stobs kyang che'o/_/khyod kyis ni de snyed 'ju bar mi nus so/_/des smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta mas zhu na ngas ci'i phyir mi zhu zhes smras nas/_lhas byin gyis 'tsho byed kyi tshig de ma mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam gsol ba de tsam 
[\[104b.7\]]zhig des kyang 'thungs so/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi de nyin 'bras thug sla ba'i cho ga mdzad de bshos gsol to/_/de nas lhas byin gyis 'bras thug sla ba'i cho ga mdzad de/_bshos gsol to zhes thos nas 'tsho byed la smras pa/_'tsho byed bdag gis kyang 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'bras thug sla ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i bzhin mdog bltas nas smras pa/_lhas byin khyod kyis mar nyid kyang ma zhu na 'bras thug sla ba'i cho ga ji ltar bya/_des smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta mas zhu na ngas ci'i phyir mi zhu zhes de skad 
[\[105a.2\]]smras te/_des kyang 'bras thug sla ba'i cho ga byas nas/_des 'thungs ma thag tu lto nad kyis btab ste/_de nad mi bzod nas sa la 'gre ldog par byed do/_/'jig rten na ni mdza' bo dang dgra bo dang bar ma yod de/_kha cig ni dong nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sbran pa/_
[\[105a.3\]]btsun pa kun dga' bo lhas byin ni lto nad kyis shi la thug go zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de thos nas spun la gdung bas mi dga' bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas gsol pa/_btsun pa lhas byin ni lto nad kyis gum la thug na/_bcom 
[\[105a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i skyabs mdzad par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsan ma thag tu snying rje chen pos zin nas/_lhas byin ga la ba der gshegs te/_byon nas lhas byin gyi mgo bo la phyag bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/_lhas byin bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang 
[\[105a.5\]]gis gshed ma'i mi khyod dang /_sgra gcan zin thal mo sbyor ba gnyis la nga'i sems snyoms na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des khyod nad med par gyur cig_/de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la lhas byin bde bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras 
[\[105a.6\]]pa/_lhas byin bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dka' ba mdzad pa dang srog phangs pa sbyin pa yin no/_/des smras pa de la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod de/_gal te 'dis sman dpyad ma bslabs su zin na/_'di ji ltar tshogs 'di snyed 'chos nus zhes de skad ces smras nas/_de bcom ldan 
[\[105a.7\]]'das dgrongs pa'i thabs 'ba' zhig shom mo/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshor nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin gyi skyabs mdzad na/_kho ni bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa 'ba' zhig gi slad du 'bad cing /_dgrongs pa 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]'ba' zhig gi thabs shom pa la gzigs/_btsun pa lhas byin ni byas pa mi shes pa dang byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa chud gzon pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis ji ltar byas pa mi 
[\[105b.2\]]shes pa dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa chud gzon par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/_mi dbul po zhig gnas pa de rtswa dang shing dag 'tshong zhing 'tsho bar byed pa las/_de phyi zhig na de ri la shing brngar song ba dang /_
[\[105b.3\]]de ri la song ba'i bar du kha ba bab nas/_de lhags pas nyen cing yul ngan gyis sbrebs pas brag phug chen po zhig gi nang du song ba dang /_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dom du skyes par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung bar 'gyur du zin kyang 
[\[105b.4\]]sems kyis log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_de yang bdag nyid che ba byams pa'i rang bzhin can snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can la mnyes gshin pa mi 'tshe ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa zhig go/_/de su la yang 'tshe bar mi 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus 'tsho bar byed de/_des 
[\[105b.5\]]phug der rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bsags nas lhags pas nyen pa'i tshe/_de'i nang du zhugs te gnas pa de mi phug tu song ba des mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/_bdag ni 'di'i lag tu shi zin to/_/bdag ni 'di'i lag nas 'bros mi nus so snyam mo/_/de nas de 
[\[105b.6\]]byang chub sems dpas mthong nas/_mi 'di ni lhags pas kyang nyen la skrag cing yang 'dug go snyam du rig nas/_des de la snying brtse ba'i phyir mi skad du smras te/_grogs po ma 'jigs shig_/khyod nga la 'jigs mi dgos so zhes smras nas/_byang chub sems dpas mi de rang gi 
[\[105b.7\]]lus kyis bskyabs te/_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag bstabs so/_/de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du mi de de bzhin du rang gi lus kyis bskyabs te/_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag gis yongs su bskyangs nas/_zhag bdun lon te yul ngan med par gyur pa'i 'og tu/_byang chub sems 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]dpas bsgo ba/_kye mi khyod khyim du song la nga la dgra mang du yod pas sha'i phyir bsad du 'ong gis nga 'di na 'dug ces su la yang ma zer cig ces byas nas/_byang chub sems dpas mi de phyir btang ngo /_/de nas mi de shing khur khyer te ri khrod kyi grong logs su chas 
[\[106a.2\]]so/_/ri khrod kyi grong de nas kyang rngon pa gnyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du 'gro bar chas nas/_de gnyis kyis shing khur khyer te 'ong ba'i mi de mthong nas/_de gnyis kyis bsam pa mi 'di ri khrod 'di nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu phyir 'ongs nas/_'di zhag bdun gyi bar du gang na ci za 
[\[106a.3\]]za zhig gu snyam nas de gnyis kyis mi de la dris so/_/des kyang de gnyis la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de gnyis kyis mi de la smras pa/_kye mi khyod tshur la shog la dom ga la 'dug pa bdag cag gnyis la ston cig dang bdag cag gnyis kyis 
[\[106a.4\]]dom de bsad la khyod la yang dom sha'i skal shas sbyin no/_/de nas mi des bsams pa ma la dom des zhag bdun gyi bar du bdag yongs su bskyangs mod kyi/_des nga la ci byar yang med la bdag gi khyim na yang bza' ba med kyis/_bdag gis bstan pa dang /_des bdag gi 
[\[106a.5\]]khyim mi rnams kyis zhag mang du bzar yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des mi de gnyis la smras pa/_kye mi khyed gnyis la ngas dom ga la 'dug pa de bstan to zhes byas nas/_de phug na 'dug pa kho na rngon pa de gnyis la bstan nas/_de gnyis kyis dom de dug mdas bsnun te/_
[\[106a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'chi ka'i na tshas thebs nas/_de shi la thug pa na tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_ri sul stug por gnas pa na/_/bdag gis su yi ci zhig phrogs/_/rtswa dang rtsa ba 'bras bu za/_/su la'ang 'tshe bar mi byed na/_/'chi ba'i dus la bab zin gyis/_/da ni 
[\[106a.7\]]bdag gis ci byar med/_/lus can rnams kyi skyid sdug ni/_/las rnams la ni brten par bya/_/de nas de mi de gnyis kyis bsad nas pags pa bshus te/_sha de dag cha gsum du bgos nas mi de la smras pa/_kye mi khyod rang gi skal ba khyer cig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu mi des 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]lag pa gnyis brkyang ste blang zhes byas pa dang /_de'i lag pa gnyis sa la lhung ngo /_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu rngon pa de gnyis kyis mi de la smras pa/_kye de ci des smras pa/_'dis nga zhag bdun gyi bar du rlung dang yul ngan byung ba'i tshe rang gi lus kyis bskyabs te/_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag gis 
[\[106b.2\]]yongs su bskyangs pa las de la bdag gis byas pa mi gzo ba byas pa des na bdag la 'bras bu 'di 'ongs so zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rngon pa de gnyis mi dga' ba chen po skyes te/_de gnyis mi dga' bar gyur nas bsams pa/_'di ni sems can ngan ngon ma yin te/_
[\[106b.3\]]bdag cag gnyis kyis de lta bu'i sha byams pas yongs su bsgos pa dag bza' bar mi nus te/_'di dag ni mchod pa'i 'os yin no snyam mo/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten du sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan te/_de gnyis kyis sha de dag khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/gtsug lag 
[\[106b.4\]]khang du song nas kyang dge 'dun la phul lo/_/de nas sha de dag dgra bcom pa zhig gis mthong nas des bsams pa/_sha 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yongs su bsgos pa yin no snyam nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[106b.5\]]dag sha 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yongs su bsgos pa yin te/_mchod pa'i 'os yin gyis 'di dag la bdag cag gis mchod par bya'o zhes byas nas/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skal ba chen po 'di/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[106b.6\]]gnya' shing 'dzin/_/snying rje che dang ldan pa ste/_/'jig rten gsum na mchod gnas yin/_/de skad ces smras nas/_dgra bcom pa de dang /_dge slong de rnams dang rngon pa'i mi de gnyis kyis sha de dag bsregs nas/_sku gdung gi mchod rten byas te mchod pa chen po byas nas 
[\[106b.7\]]dong ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dom du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe mir gyur pa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te/_'di ni de'i tshe yang byas pa mi shes pa dang byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa chud 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]gzon par gyur to//_//dom gcig ni/_gleng gzhi de nyid dang 'dra ba las/_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa/_btsun pa lhas byin ni byas pa mi shes pa dang byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa chud gzon pa lags so/_/
[\[107a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ji ltar byas pa mi shes pa dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa chud gzon par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_ri khrod kyi grong zhig 
[\[107a.3\]]na mi dbul po zhig gnas pa de/_rtswa dang shing dag 'tshong zhing 'tsho bar byed pa las/_de phyi zhig na nags kyi nang du shing brngar song ba dang seng ges gtses nas/_de 'jigs shing skrag ste shing la 'dzegs pa dang /_dom zhig kyang seng ge des 'jigs nas sngar shing de la 
[\[107a.4\]]'dzegs te 'dug go/_/de nas mi des de mthong nas 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/_bdag ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa las thar kyang 'dis bdag sdug bsngal bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dom de yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_byang chub sems 
[\[107a.5\]]dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung du zin kyang sems kyis log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpas de mthong nas mi 'di ni 'jigs shing skrag par gyur to snyam du rig nas de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir mi skad du smras te bsgo ba/_grogs po ma 'jigs shig_/
[\[107a.6\]]khyod nga la 'jigs mi dgos so zhes smras nas/_byang chub sems dpas lag pa brkyang ste mi de yang drangs nas rang gi lus kyis bskyabs te bzhag nas/_byang chub sems dpa' des de la smras pa/_khyod shes par gyis shig_/seng ge 'di ni bdag cag la gsod pa dang 
[\[107a.7\]]rgol ba dang dgra yin gyis/_khyod kyis kyang nga nyal ba'i tshe srungs shig_/ngas kyang khyod nyal ba'i tshe bsrung bar bya'o/_/de ltar bdag cag gnyis gcig gis gcig srungs dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi des kyang de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/_
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]mi de byang chub sems dpa'i pang du sngas bcas te nyal lo/_/de nas de nyal ba na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ges byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_mi rnams ni byas pa mi gzo ba yin gyis mi 'o ni 'or cig dang /_ngas 'o ni zos nas 'gro'o/_/nga song nas khyod kyang 
[\[107b.2\]]gar dga' bar 'gror yod do/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag ni skyabs su 'ongs pa gtong mi phod de/_bdag ni rang gi srog 'dor nus kyi skyabs su 'ongs pa ni 'dor mi nus so/_/de nas de'i skabs su mi de sad nas/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_
[\[107b.3\]]kye mi khyod nyal ba na ngas bsrungs kyis khyod kyis kyang nga nyal ba na srungs shig ces byas nas/_byang chub sems dpas mi de'i pang du sngas bcas te nyal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyal ba na/_mi de la seng ges smras pa/_kye mi khyod kyis dom 'o ni 'or cig dang ngas 'o 
[\[107b.4\]]ni zos nas 'gro'o/_/nga song nas khyod kyang gar dga' bar 'gror yod do/_/de ltar ma byas na nga song ba'i 'og tu 'o nis khyod gsod par 'ong ngo /_/de nas mi des bsams pa seng ge 'di zer ba ni bden no snyam nas/_'jig rten pha rol btang ba/_snying la snying rje med pa 
[\[107b.5\]]des/_dom de shing de las phul nas de shing de las lhung bzhin du tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kyi hud 'jig rten 'di dag na/_/chos min 'dis ni shin tu 'jigs/_/sdig to'i mi rnams nang dag na/_/bsen la gnod pa byed pa'ang yod/_/de nas de lhung ma thag tu 
[\[107b.6\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ges bsad de/_des de zos nas phyogs de nas song ngo /_/de nas mi des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_'gyod pa chen po skyes te bdag ci dang ci byed byed bdag nyal ba'i tshe des legs par rim gro byas te/_srog bskyabs na bdag gis de la chu gang bor 
[\[107b.7\]]gyis med do zhes zer te/_smyo bla zhing phan tshun 'khyams te/_kyi hud 'jig rten 'di dag na/_/chos min 'dis ni shin tu 'jigs/_/sdig to'i mi rnams nang dag na/_/bsen la gnod pa byed pa'ang yod/_/ces zer ro/_/de nas mi de'i phu nu rnams kyis sman pa la 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]bstan te/_'di ji ltar gyur ces byas nas/_sman pa na re 'di ni 'byung pos sems 'khrugs par byas pa ma yin te/_'di ni bdag gis gso mi nus so zhes zer ro/_/de nas ri khrod kyi grong de dang /_thag mi ring ba dben sa zhig na drang srong mngon par 
[\[108a.2\]]shes pa dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/_mi de'i phu nu bo rnams kyis drang srong de'i thad du khrid de/_bstan nas 'di ci zhig gi mthus smyos par gyur ces byas pa dang /_drang srong des de'i phu nu bo rnams la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad de/_chu gang bor ba 
[\[108a.3\]]des na 'di smyos par gyur to zhes byas nas/_drang srong des ci nas mi des sems kyi rang bzhin tha mal par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mi de la bstan te/_de'i tshe drang srong des mi de la smras pa/_kye mi khyod kyis chu gang bor te/_sems can de lta bu la de lta bus byas 
[\[108a.4\]]pa ni ma legs pa byas so zhes smras nas/_drang srong des mi de la rgya gang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'dug pa dang ni nyal ba dang /_/'greng ba dang ni 'gro yang rung /_/gnas skabs gang du bab pa na/_/bsen 'khus bde ba thob mi 'gyur/_/de ni rbab tu lhung bzhin du/_/
[\[108a.5\]]snying rje ba yi tshig smras pa/_/des na blo ngan khyod bsregs te/_/khan da ba yi tshal bzhin 'bar/_/bde min sdug bsngal reg pa yi/_/rab 'jigs las ni byas pas na/_/de phyir 'jig rten pha rol tu/_/na tsha khyod kyis myong bar 'gyur/_/khyod ni ngu 'bod rab 'jigs 
[\[108a.6\]]par/_/kyi hud zer zhing cho nges 'debs/_/de tshe sdug bsngal chen po ni/_/ngan pa thams cad myong bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i las ni mi bzad pa/_/khyod la de yis ci zhig byas/_/sdig to'i mi rnams nang dag na/_/bsen la gnod pa byed pa'ang yod/_/chos dang 
[\[108a.7\]]mi 'thun 'jigs pa yi/_/sdig la khyod kyis sems gnas te/_/khyod kyis sdig pa ci byas pa/_/dom dang seng ge dran par gyis/_/blo ngan khyod ni bsen rnams la/_/ji ltar bya ba mi shes te/_/gsod pa gsod dang phrad par 'gyur/_/'khon pa 'khon dang phrad par 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]'gyur/_/'jigs chen seng ge phrad pa na/_/ring du khyod kyi rim gro byas/_/khyod ni rbab tu lhung las bsrungs/_/de ni khyod kyis yod ma bsrungs/_/bsen 'khu 'ching ba'i mchog yin zhes/_/chos smra rnams ni de skad ston/_/blo rul khyod ni shi ba na/_/dmyal ba 
[\[108b.2\]]rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyi sdom ni/_kyi 'dug de bde khyod sdig chos blo 'jigs bsen/_de nas mi des drang srong gi rgya gang des thos nas skyo ba skyes te/_de drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[108b.3\]]de'i tshe dom du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe mir gyur pa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di byas pa mi shes pa dang byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa chud gzon par 'gyur ro//_//sgur chung 
[\[108b.4\]]zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze dbul po 'tsho ba phongs pa slongs mo'i zas kyis 'tsho ba zhig gnas pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de ma'i ltor zhugs phyin cad bram ze de lhag par yang slongs mo 
[\[108b.5\]]yang cher yang mi rnyed par gyur to/_/de nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u mdog ngan pa dang byad ngan po rid cing sbeg la sgur ba zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston ci 'byor tsam zhig byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di chung 
[\[108b.6\]]la sgur bas na de'i phyir 'di'i ming sgur chung zhes gdags so zer ro/_/de nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de nas phyi zhig na sems can de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas ma'i nu zho skams so/_/de nas de'i mas de ba dang ma 
[\[108b.7\]]he'i 'o mas gsos pa dang de yang legs par mi 'byor to/_/srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can bar ma dor 'chi ba ni gnas med cing skabs med de/_de'i ba dang ma he'i 'o ma res 'ga' ni 'byor res 'ga' ni mi 'byor nas de ngan ngon zhig gsos te/_cher skyes pa dang phas de la smras pa/_
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]bu bdag cag ni slongs mos 'tsho ba kho nar zad de/_zhing rmo ba yang med tshong bya ba yang med kyis slongs mo la song la slongs mo'i zas kyis 'tsho bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byas nas khye'u de slongs mo la zhugs nas/_des 
[\[109a.2\]]yun ring du bskor kyang srog gzungs cung zad tsam las mi rnyed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de dge slong zhig gi thad du song nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing 
[\[109a.3\]]dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/dge slong gis smras pa/_khyod kyi pha ma gson nam des smras pa gson no/_/dge slong gis smras pa/_khyod kyis pha ma la bzlugs sam btsun pa ma 
[\[109a.4\]]bzlugs so/_/dge slong gis smras pa/_bu sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byin pa mi mdzad kyis/_song la pha ma gnyis la bzlugs la phyir shog cig dang de'i 'og tu khyod kyi sla bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas khye'u sgur chung 
[\[109a.5\]]gis/_dge slong de'i tshig mnyan nas pha ma'i thad du song ste smras pa/_yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas pha ma gnyis kyis bsams pa/_da lta 'di yang mchog tu sdug bsngal la/_bdag cag gnyis kyang 
[\[109a.6\]]sdug bsngal te/_'di tsam zhig kyang bde bar gyur na legs kyis rab tu byung yang sla'am/_'on kyang tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la yang bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa/_bu gnang gis gal te khyod kyis khyad par 'ga' zhig thob par gyur na nged gnyis la yang ston cig_/de nas 
[\[109a.7\]]bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byas te/_khye'u sgur chung pha mas gnang nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis tshal du song ste/_dge slong de'i thad du phyin nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis pha ma gnyis la bzlugs nas bdag pha ma gnyis kyis gnang lags na/_btsun pa bdag legs par 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod par 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa yin te/_
[\[109b.2\]]dge slong des de rab tu phyung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/de nas des zhag gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du kha zas kyis bshugs nas smras pa/_bu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mi sos kyis khyod kyis phas phog pa'i yul rang gi spyod yul bsod snyoms la song shig ces 
[\[109b.3\]]bsgo'o/_/de nas des mkhan po'i tshig mnyan te res 'ga' ni bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/_/res 'ga' ni dge 'dun gyi gral du zan za bar byed de/_gal te dge 'dun gyi gral du zan za na ni de la 'drim pa'i tshe/_de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas zas gang 'drim 
[\[109b.4\]]pa de de'i thad du phyin pa dang zas dang skom zad par 'gyur ro/_/yang na de dag la glo bur gyi rkyen 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de dag phyir 'ongs na yang de las thal nas 'og ma la byin te 'drim par byed pas/_de de na 'dug kyang kha cig ni 'thob kha cig ni mi 'thob bo/_/
[\[109b.5\]]de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshor nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong 'og na 'dug pa'i nan tan du bya ba'i chos bca' bar byas te/_'og na 'dug pa'i dge slong gis ji srid du gong na 'dug pas ma blangs 
[\[109b.6\]]kyi bar du bza' ba dang bca' ba blang bar mi bya'o/_/yang na thabs ci zhig ltar thal te blangs par gyur na yang des ma thob kyi bar du bsgrub pa mi gtong bar bya'o/_/de ste sbyin du gzhug ma nus na bdag gi zas las de la phyed sbyin par bya'o/_/phyed ni bdag gis bza' bar bya ste/_de 
[\[109b.7\]]ltar byin na ni legs ma byin na nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro na ni des bsod snyoms bka' 'khor du rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas nas des de'i nyin 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]par bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang po rnyed do/_/de bzhin du zhag gnyis dang zhag gsum gyi bar du yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas na yang /_de'i nyin par bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang po rnyed nas/_de'i lus mthu dang ldan pa dang 
[\[110a.2\]]las su rung ba dang spong nus par gyur te/_des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar 
[\[110a.3\]]mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bu bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_
[\[110a.4\]]chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/des dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang de'i sngon gyi las mngon du smin nas/_de'i nyin par dge slong gzhan zhig 
[\[110a.5\]]gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas so/_/de nas de phyags ma thogs te song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar bya'o snyam pa dang /_des dge slong gzhan zhig gis phyag dar byas par mthong nas de'i blo skyes pa/_gal te na deng bdag 
[\[110a.6\]]smyung bar 'ong srid do snyam nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/de der song ba las ci yang ma rnyed de/_de de'i nyin par smyung bar 'dug go/_/de nas phyi de nyin par yang dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom 
[\[110a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung phyags ma thogs te song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar bya'o snyam pa dang /_dge slong gzhan zhig gis phyag dar byas par des mthong nas/_de'i blo skyes pa bdag deng du 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]lan gnyis smyung bar 'ong srid do snyam nas rang gi gnas khang du song ngo /_/de nas de de na 'dug pa las khyim bdag cig gis bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs so zhes thos nas/_de'i blo skyes pa bdag da yang bsod snyoms 
[\[110b.2\]]la 'gro ci dgos kyis khyim gang du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol ba de kho nar song la zan bza'o snyam nas gnas khang du zhugs te skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan lhur byed cing 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag de la don ched chen po zhig byung 
[\[110b.3\]]nas des snga rab tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la bskul nas/_des bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ni khyim de'i mi rnams la chos kyi gtam mdzad nas gtsug lag khang 
[\[110b.4\]]du chas te gshegs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis dro la bab par shes nas langs te chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te song ba las/_bcom ldan 'das ni lam logs shig nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/_/de ni lam logs shig nas 
[\[110b.5\]]khyim bdag gi khyim der song ngo /_/de nas de der song nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol te gshegs par shes so/_/de nas de de'i nyin bar du lan gnyis su smyung bar gyur to/_/de'i phyi de nyin par yang dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom 
[\[110b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung phyags ma thogs te song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag dar bya'o snyam pa dang /_des dge slong gzhan zhig gis phyags par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems 
[\[110b.7\]]te/_bdag deng du lan gsum smyung bar 'ong srid do snyam nas gnas khang du song ngo /_/de der song nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung lan gnyis smyung bar gyur to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang des de'i don du sbyin bdag cig la bskul nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]sgur chung gi thad du song ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung khyod deng khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi khyim du song la zan zo shig ces byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyid ni chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la 
[\[111a.2\]]song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung yang thag gi zad tsam gyi bar du sdod sdod nas snga dro chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song na/_de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas khyim bdag de la don ched chen po zhig byung nas des brjed de khyim mi su la yang ma byas 
[\[111a.3\]]par grong gzhan zhig tu song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis der song yang ma rnyed nas de'i nyin bar du lan gsum smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de'i nyin bar du tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung lan gsum du smyung bar gyur to zhes thos nas des bsams 
[\[111a.4\]]pa/_bdag nyid kyis bsod snyoms blangs la 'di la bstabs par bya'o snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung khyod snying ma chung shig dang /_bdag gis sang khyod la kha zas 
[\[111a.5\]]bstabs so zhes smras nas/_de gnas khang du song ngo /_/de nas de phyi de nyin par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te mnyan du yod par song nas/_des bsod snyoms lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni bdag nyid kyis zos so/_/gcig ni de'i don du khyer nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[111a.6\]]du chas te song ba las de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas lam du las las skyes pa'i khyi dag byung ste/_de dag gis kha zas de phrogs nas zos so/_/de nas des bsams pa da bdag phyir mnyan du yod par song na ni dro yol bar 'gyur ro snyam ste gtsug lag khang du song nas/_
[\[111a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung de'i nyin bar du lan bzhi smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung lan bzhi smyung bar gyur to zhes thos nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis sang nang par de la kha zas bstabs par bya'o snyam nas gnas khang du song ngo /_/
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]de nas de phyi de nyin par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te/_mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song nas des bsod snyoms lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni bdag nyid kyis zos so/_/gcig ni de'i don du khyer nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas te song ba las/_de'i 
[\[111b.2\]]sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas lam du las las skyes pa'i bya rog dag byung nas/_de dag gis kha zas de phrogs nas zos so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus bsams pa/_da bdag mnyan du yod par song na ni dro yol bar 'gyur ro snyam ste gtsug lag khang du 
[\[111b.3\]]song nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung de'i nyin bar du lan lnga smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung lan lnga smyung bar gyur to zhes thos nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis sang nang par de la kha zas bstabs par bya'o snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[111b.4\]]sgur chung gi thad du song ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung khyod snying ma chung cig dang bdag gis sang nang par khyod la kha zas bstabs so zhes smras nas de gnas khang du song ngo /_/de nas de phyi de nyin par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te mnyan du yod par song nas des bsod snyoms 
[\[111b.5\]]lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni bdag nyid kyis zos so/_/gcig ni de'i don du khyer nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du chas te song ba las/_de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas de 'gro ba na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kha zas de mi snang bar byas so/_/de nas des bsams pa 
[\[111b.6\]]da bdag phyir mnyan du yod par song na ni dro yol bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung de'i nyin par du lan drug smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_bdag gis sang nang par de la kha zas bstabs par bya'o 
[\[111b.7\]]snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi thad du song ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung khyod snying ma chung shig dang bdag gis sang khyod la kha zas bstabs so zhes smras nas de gnas khang du song ngo /_/de nas de'i phyi de nyin par lhung bzed gnyis thogs te mnyan du yod par song 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]nas/_des bsod snyoms lhung bzed do bslangs te gcig ni bdag nyid kyis zos so/_/gcig ni khyer te tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi gnas khang du song ba las/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gnas khang gi sgo yang med skar 
[\[112a.2\]]khung yang med par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul gyis sgo sprul te nang du song nas de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung longs la kha gdong khrus shig_/des smras pa bdag gis kha gdong bkrus zin no/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[112a.3\]]ri'i bus lhung bzed dang chu tshags phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gi lag tu chu btang ste/_de'i mdun du lhung bzed kyi zhabs rten bzhag nas lhung bzed blang zhes byas pa dang /_lhung bzed de thur du gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng du song nas/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[112a.4\]]pa shA ri'i bus lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste lhung bzed de phyung nas lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag ste/_lag pa g.yas pas legs par byin gyis brlabs nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung da zo shig_/de nas des lhung bzed de'i nang nas kham gcig blangs te 
[\[112a.5\]]bza' zhes byas na/_de'i kham gcig po de yang mi snang bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du kham blangs so cog mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bdag nyid kyi lag pa g.yas pas kham gcig blangs te khar gzhug ces byas na/_de'i kha med par byil por 
[\[112a.6\]]gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ci yod pa byas kyang de'i kha gdod ma nus te/_de'i skabs su dro yol bar gyur to/_/dro yol ba'i 'og tu ni de'i kha dod par gyur te/_snga mkho bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dris pa tshe dang 
[\[112a.7\]]ldan pa sgur chung khyod la nang na ci mi bzod par gnod/_des smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag skom gyis gdungs kyis chu byin cig dang btung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lhung bzed chus bkang ste byin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis blangs te khar 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]gtugs nas btung zhes byas nas/_de'i las las skyes pa'i mi dag byung nas lhung bzed de'i nang du thal ba blugs so/_/de nas des mthong nas bdag gis myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags te/_de dag ni gdon mi za bar 'ong ba dang rkyen grub 
[\[112b.2\]]pa dang ldan pa dang tshogs bsags pa yin pas las de dag ni gzhan dag gi phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin cing myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas thal skyo de nyid 'thungs te/_gzhi de nyid kyis 'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu 
[\[112b.3\]]ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te/_sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog gis mchod pa byas so/_/de nas dge slong 
[\[112b.4\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sgur chung gis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas ltogs te shin tu phongs nas dgung bdun gyi bar du smyung bar gyur la thal skyo 'tshal nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[112b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis 
[\[112b.6\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa 
[\[112b.7\]]rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs 
[\[113a.2\]]nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar 
[\[113a.3\]]dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings so/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman 
[\[113a.4\]]brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag de ni sbyin pa la dga' ba 
[\[113a.5\]]zhig ste/_khyim de na dge sbyong dang bram ze dang spyod pa pa dang kun du rgyu dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de shi nas de shi ba'i 'og tu yang bud med de khyim thab la gdung bas snga ma'i 
[\[113a.6\]]lugs bzhin du sbyin pa byed pa'i rgyun ma bcad do/_/de nas bu des smras pa/_yum khyim 'di ma gzhig cig_/khyim 'di ji ltar bdag gi phas btsugs pa bzhin du bdag gis gzugs mi nus so zhes byas te de ltar de lan mang du bkag kyang ma phan to/_/de nas khye'us 
[\[113a.7\]]bsams pa/_'di ni bdag gis ji ltar byas kyang mi phan gyis bdag gis 'di gsad do snyam nas/_de nas ma de khang phugs su bcug ste sgo bcad nas zan dang skom bcad do/_/de nas des smras pa/_bu bdag thong shig dang phyin cad su la yang sbyin par mi byed la 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]phyin cad khyim 'dir yang mi 'dug go/_/khye'us smras pa/_bdag gis khyod gson bzhin du gtong mi nus so zhes smras nas/_des ma de khang phugs de nyid du zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad de bsrungs so/_/de nas de'i khyim mis nye du gzhan dag la bsnyad nas 
[\[113b.2\]]nye du rnams lhags te de btang ngo /_/de khang phugs de nas srog rgyu tsam ste byung nas des bu la chu bslangs na khye'u des de la thal skyo byin te/_thabs 'dis na 'di 'chi bar 'gyur grang snyam mo/_/de nas de lus nyam chung bas thal skyo de 'thungs pa dang gzhi de nyid kyis shi'o/_/
[\[113b.3\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sgur chung 'di nyid yin te/_des ma ltogs su bor nas thal skyos bsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_lo stong phrag du ma'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so/_/de de nas thar 
[\[113b.4\]]nas kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der ltogs nas thal skyo 'thungs te shi'o/_/da lta srid pa tha ma dang lus tha ma dang gnas tha mar gyur te/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bar du yang ltogs nas thal skyo 'thungs te de kho na'i rkyen gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/'di nyid 
[\[113b.5\]]kyis las gzhan yang byas pa yod de/_las de'i rnam par smin pas ltogs nas sdug bsngal chen po rnyed de/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs 
[\[113b.6\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las 
[\[113b.7\]]phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu gnyis mtshe mar byung ste/_de gnyis kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas gang gi tshe de 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]gnyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas de gnyis kyi pha ma la gsol te/_rab tu byung nas de gnyis kyis sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar 
[\[114a.2\]]gyur te/_de gnyis gang dang gang du gnas pa de dang der lhan cig na gnas so/_/de gnyis las gcig ni gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang ldan par gyur te/_des bsams pa ma la bdag ni tshegs chung ngus yo byad thams cad 
[\[114a.3\]]'byor la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams ni yo byad med pas phongs kyis/_bdag gis chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta bya gor ma chag snyam nas chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhugs te/_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang 
[\[114a.4\]]sman zong rnams dang yo byad thams cad sbyor bar byed do/_/de nas de'i phu nu zla bo des bsams pa/_bdag gi phu nu 'di ni bdag gi grogs yin te 'di ni bdag dang dge ba'i phyogs kyis 'brel pa yin na/_'di ni dge 'dun gyi zhal ta'i las byed 'dod pas 'di ni bdag gi 
[\[114a.5\]]dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad byed do snyam nas de la smras pa/_phu nu khyod dge ba'i phyogs spangs te/_dge 'dun gyi zhal ta'i las 'dod par ma byed cig_/de nas des phu nu zla bo de la smras pa/_bdag ni tshegs chung ngus yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan la tshangs pa mtshungs 
[\[114a.6\]]par spyod pa rnams ni yo byad med pas phongs nas/_ngas 'di dag gi don bya bar ci ste mi 'dod ces zer nas de des lan du ma bkag kyang ma phan nas/_de'i blo skyes pa 'di ni ji srid du 'dug pa'i bar du bdag gis mi zlogs kyis/_ma la bdag gis thabs dang sbyar la 
[\[114a.7\]]yul gzhan du khrid de dgag par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_phu nu zla bo des thabs dang sbyar te yul gzhan du khrid nas de nyid na 'khod do/_/de nas de de na 'dug pas dge slong rnams kyi rnyed pa'i bar chad du gyur to/_/des kyang de na 'dug bzhin du dge slong rnams ji 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ltar yo byad kyis phongs par gyur pa thos nas thos ma thag tu phu nu zla bo la bzlugs te bdag der song la dge slong rnams yo byad kyis mi phongs par bya'o zhes byas so/_/de nas de'i phu nu zla bos smras pa/_phu nu dge slong de dag ni rtag par [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bzhin du gzhan 'ba' zhig la 
[\[114b.2\]]re zhing 'khod na khyod dge ba'i phyogs spangs te/_yang der 'gro'am phu nu zla bos smras pa/_khyod kyis ngag rtsub po smras kyis nyes pa la nyes so zhes bshags par gyis shig_/las 'di'i 'bras bu mi sdug pa rnyed par gyur ta re zhes byas nas de yang 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/_
[\[114b.3\]]des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa de ltar bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la tshig rtsub po yang smras/_rnyed pa'i bar chad kyang byas pa'i las de'i 'bras bu bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig_/'di ltar bdag gis yang 
[\[114b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan ci yang ma thob kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par 
[\[114b.5\]]gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[114b.6\]]sgur chung 'di nyid yin te/_des der tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la tshig rtsub po smras pa dang rnyed pa'i bar chad byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes so/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang las de kho na'i rnam par smin pas gang dang 
[\[114b.7\]]gang du skyes pa de dang der ltogs te shi'o/_/da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bar du yang las de kho na'i rnam par smin pas ltogs te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/des der smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig//de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[115a.2\]]byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des ni/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la 
[\[115a.3\]]nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//srin zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na phyi sa'i 'dam zhig tu srin mgo bo dge slong gi 
[\[115a.4\]]mgo bo 'dra ba zhig byung ste/_de'i lus thams cad srin bu khab kyi rtse mo 'dra ba sha stag gis gang ste/_de la ba'i spu bzhin du de'i lus las srin bu de dag byung ngo /_/de dag de la za bas na tsha mi bzod nas phyi sa'i 'dam de'i nang na phan tshun rgyug la mi bzod par bkres te 
[\[115a.5\]]phyi sa za'o/_/de na tsha mi bzod de phan tshun 'khor bas phyi sa'i 'dam de'i nang thams cad dkrugs slongs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[115a.6\]]gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[115a.7\]]'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par 
[\[115b.2\]]bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[115b.3\]]ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/
[\[115b.4\]]rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_srin lung bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/_de la brten nas bdag gis 
[\[115b.5\]]gdul bya phal po che drang dgos so snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che de dag drang ba'i phyir ci nas phyi sa'i 'dam de'i dri mnam bas mnyan du yod pa thams cad gang bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas der skye bo phal po che sngon gyi dge 
[\[115b.6\]]ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te dri mnam pa 'di dag gang nas byung snyam nas skye bo stong phrag du ma ltad mo lta 'dod par gyur te/_dri mnam pa'i phyogs su phyi sa'i 'dam ga la ba der dong ba dang skye bo phal po de dag gis phyi sa'i 'dam de na srin de 'dra ba phan tshun 'khor 
[\[115b.7\]]zhing 'dug pa de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas de dag gis bsams pa/_sems can 'di lta bu sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba myong ba ci yin zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bdag gi gdul bya mnyan du yod pa na ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad da 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]ltar tshogs so snyam du dgongs nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_mnyan du yod par gshegs nas phyi sa'i 'dam de ga la ba der byon pa dang /_skye bo phal 
[\[116a.2\]]po che de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gang ma dad pa de dag na re/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ltad mo 'dod pa dang bral lo zhes grag na de yang ltad mo la gnan par gyur te 'dir 'ongs so zhes zer to/_/gang dad pa 
[\[116a.3\]]dang ldan pa dag na re bcom ldan 'das ni srin 'di las brten te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' zhig lung ston par bzhed pa'i phyir 'dir gshegs gor ma chag snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[116a.4\]]ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag ci nas srin 'dis sngon gyi tshe rabs 
[\[116a.5\]]dran par 'gyur la mi'i skad du smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ci nas srin des sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur la mi skad du smra zhing bcom ldan 
[\[116a.6\]]'das dang gtam zer shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis srin de la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod sde snod gsum pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag sde snod gsum pa lags 
[\[116a.7\]]so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod sde snod gsum pa yin nam/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag sde snod gsum pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_bcom ldan 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]'das lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa myong ba mchis lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mi sdug pa myong ba mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/_gsol 
[\[116b.2\]]pa/_bdag gi sems lags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/_sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi skad du yang smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer yang shes pa de su zhig gu snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[116b.3\]]ldan 'das rnams ni snyan slebs par dka' ste/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i thugs ma thub nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i thad du song ste dris pa/_btsun pa sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi skad du smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang 
[\[116b.4\]]gtam zer shes pa de su zhig lags/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig_/de dag gis smras pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan slebs par dka' ste/_bdag cag gis zhu ba'i thugs mi thub bo/_/tshe dang 
[\[116b.5\]]ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bdag gis kyang snyan slebs par dka' mod kyi/_'on kyang khyed la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhu bar bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[116b.6\]]la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi skad du yang smra zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bka' mchid gsol 'tshal ba dang 'di lta bu'i gnod pa'i sdug bsngal dag kyang myong 
[\[116b.7\]]zhing mchis pa 'di su zhig lags/_de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sems can 'di ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te/_'di sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]dus na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang 
[\[117a.2\]]mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mchog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchog gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs 
[\[117a.3\]]nas des bsams pa bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchog gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam du bsams nas khyim gyi 'khor btang ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchog gi bstan pa 
[\[117a.4\]]la rab tu byung ngo /_/de der rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa chos smra ba/_zas dang skom dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur nas des bsams pa/_ma la bdag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i sgo 
[\[117a.5\]]nas rnyed par bya ba rnyed pa des bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la phan gdags gor ma chag snyam nas/_sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po rnams la bskul te/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa la zhugs so/_/de'i tshe nog ri zhes bya ba'i 
[\[117a.6\]]steng du slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge 'dun bdun khri bdun stong dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar 'dod de/_de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag gis zhal ta byed pa bskos te gdod dbyar gnas par dam bca'o snyam ste/_bdag cag dge 'dun gyi bsnyen bkur byed nus pa su 
[\[117a.7\]]yod snyam nas/_de dag gis bsams pa/_sde snod gsum pa 'di ni kun la grags pa bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_zas dang skom dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed pa yin gyis/_bdag cag gis 'di spro ba bskyed la 'di kho nas bdag cag 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]gi zhal ta byas te dbyar gnas par dam bca'o snyam nas de'i thad du song ste smras pa/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong bdun khri bdun stong nog ri'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar 'dod la/_khyod kyis ni chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byed nus na khyod spro bar 
[\[117b.2\]]gyis shig dang /_khyod la brten te bdag cag dbyar gnas par dam bca'o/_/sde snod gsum pas smras pa/_khyed thugs ma bser cig dang bdag gis khyed kyi yo byad thams cad sbyar ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong de dag ri de'i steng du song nas sde snod gsum pa de 
[\[117b.3\]]kho na la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/de nas sde snod gsum pas bsams pa/_bdag gis dge slong 'di snyed la thugs ma bser cig ces byas nas gyin da 'dug pas mi nus kyi bdag song la sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po rnams la bskul te/_dge 'dun gyi 
[\[117b.4\]]yo byad thams cad sbyar ro snyam du bsams nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas spyod yul gyi grong du chas so/_/de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gru'i don grub ste lhags nas ri de dang thag mi ring ba zhig tu rdzas phog ste 
[\[117b.5\]]gnas bcas nas tshong pa rnams kyis ri de'i steng na dge slong phal po che 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag la mchog tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dge slong zhal ta byed pa de yang de dag gi thad du song ste/_de de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa gar 
[\[117b.6\]]gshegs sde snod gsum pas smras pa/_ri 'di'i steng na dge slong bdun khri bdun stong 'khod pa rnams bdag la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas pas na/_de dag gi phyir sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po rnams la bskul du 'gro'o/_/tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/_btsun 
[\[117b.7\]]pa thugs ma bser bar ci yang bgyi mi 'tshal gyis bdag cag gis de dag gi yo byad thams cad sbyor bar 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/_de dag gis de la gser dngul mang du phul nas smras pa/_btsun pa khyod kyis deng slan cad dge slong de dag la yo byad thams cad sbyor 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]la/_gal te gser dngul 'di dag gis 'tshal na ni legs/_gal te ma 'tshal na ni yang gser dngul gzhan yang ji tsam 'tshal ba de tsam bdag cag dbul lo/_/dbyar gnas pa lags pa'i mjug tu yang na bza' dag dbul bar 'tshal 
[\[118a.2\]]lo zhes byas so/_/des zhal ta byed pa des de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas nas/_gser dngul rnams khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/_des gser dngul rnams bltas pa dang chags pa skyes nas des gser dngul rnams bskungs te/_dge slong rnams la ni zas 
[\[118a.3\]]dang skom ngan pa stobs par byed do/_/de nas phyis dge slong de dag gis zhal ta byed pa de la bshad de/_btsun pa bdag cag zas dang skom ngan pa 'di lta bus 'tsho mi nus so/_/des smras pa/_bdag gi mthu ni de kho nar zad de/_de las mi nus kyis gal te khyed des 
[\[118a.4\]]'tsho mi nus na khyed bdag cag gis sbyin bdag dag la bskul la 'tsho bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong de dag gis tshong pa de dag la khyed kyis dge slong bdun khri bdun stong gi zas dang skom sbyar bar nus sam zhes smras pa dang /_tshong pa 
[\[118a.5\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_btsun pa dag bdag cag gis 'phags pa zhal ta bgyid pa la gser dngul mang po phul te/_gal te 'di tsam gyis 'tshal na yang legs/_gal te ma 'tshal na yang gser dngul gzhan dbul bar 'tshal lo zhes bgyis nas/_ci'i slad du 
[\[118a.6\]]des khyed la zas dang skom ngan pa gsol ces byas nas/_tshong pa de dag sde snod gsum pa'i thad du dong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gis gal te gser dngul 'di rnams kyis 'tshal na ni legs/_gal te ma 'tshal na yang gser dngul gzhan dbul lo zhes ma 
[\[118a.7\]]bgyis sam/_de ci'i slad du khyod kyis dge slong rnams la zas dang skom ngan pa gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu zhal ta byed pa de skyengs nas khros te phyin cad dge slong de dag gi zhal ta byed du ma btub bo/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]btsun pa bdag cag khyod la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas na ci'i phyir khyod cang mi byed par 'dug_/phyin cad dge slong rnams kyi yo byad sbyar bar ma dad dam zhes byas pa dang de khros nas smras pa/_khyed kyis nga kho na'i dad pas byin pa longs spyod la nga nyid dma' 
[\[118b.2\]]'bebs par byed pas ni khyed phyi sa'i 'dam du bying ste bshang gci za bar gyur kyang sla'o zhes byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/_nyon mongs pa 'di dmas shing nyams par gyur te/_'di ltar slob pa dang mi slob pa bdun khri bdun stong la tshig rtsub 
[\[118b.3\]]pos smras kyis med na da yang de bas ches dmas shing nyams par 'gyur na ma legs kyis da ni bdag cag gis 'di la ci yang smra bar mi bya'o snyam nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas phyi zhig sde snod gsum pa de 'gyod pa skyes te des dge slong de dag la bzod pa 
[\[118b.4\]]gsol nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis ni bzod na khyod kyi las rnams kyis mi bzod par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchog gi bstan pa la rab tu byung 
[\[118b.5\]]ba'i sde snod gsum par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni srin 'di nyid yin te/_des de ltar slob pa dang mi slob pa bdun khri bdun stong la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa des ni 'di dud 'gror skyes te/_dge slong dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[118b.6\]]rgyas thams cad mchog gi ring phan cad da ltar nga'i ring tshun cad kyi bar du 'di dud 'gro las shi 'phos shing dud 'gro 'ba' zhig tu skyes te/_thams cad du yang 'dis lus 'di lta bu thob par gyur la thams cad du yang phyi sa'i 'dam du bying nas bshang gci za bar gyur to/_/
[\[118b.7\]]dge slong dag gis zhus pa/_btsun pa sems can 'di sdug bsngal 'di las nam thar par 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de rnams kyi 'og tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]sangs rgyas snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di dud 'gro las thar te mi lus thob nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas mtshams med pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro/_/de de nas shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas 
[\[119a.2\]]sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_des sems can dmyal ba de dag tu lo 'bum phrag du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/des de'i las mi bzad pa zad nas yang mi lus thob par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang 
[\[119a.3\]]mdzad ces bya ba zhig 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur la de kun la grags shing bsod nams chen po dang ldan te/_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad 
[\[119a.4\]]gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par 'gyur la de der lung 'bogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur te/_des der skye bo mang po la phan btags nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_der 'di yi sdug 
[\[119a.5\]]bsngal gyi mtha' zad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag skyo ba chen po skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas skye bo mang po de dag gis stan de la 
[\[119a.6\]]'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig 
[\[119a.7\]]gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang 
[\[119b.2\]]kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol chos la 'bab dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod nas/_bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/las 
[\[119b.3\]]brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po bcu pa/_sdom ni/_ka tsang ka la kai ne ya/_bag ma gtong gnyis gcod pa gnyis/_/za ba dga' byed snag bu dang /_/bur 'du shes 
[\[119b.4\]]dang zhing pa dang /_/shi dang ko ka li ka dang /_/thang bcad tha ma kham zhes bya/_/ka tsang ka la zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das yul o ta la na o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung 
[\[119b.5\]]bzed bsnams nas yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de'i tshe bud med cig bum pa khyer te chu chur song ba las bud med des thag ring po zhig nas/_bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_dad pa skye bar 'gyur ba dbang po zhi ba thugs zhi ba/_thugs 
[\[119b.6\]]mchog tu zhi ba dang ldan pa gser gyi mchod sdong bzhin du dpal dang gzi byin 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la bu'i 'du shes skyes nas des bum pa de phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste/_lag pa gnyis brkyang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[119b.7\]]song ste smras pa bu dang phrad do/_/bu dang phrad do zhes zer zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'khyud par 'dod pa las dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas bkag go/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bud med 'di 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]ma dgag cig_/gal te bud med 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mgul nas 'khyud du ma bcug na/_kha nas khrag dron mo skyugs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de thos nas ma bkag par bzhag go/_/de nas des bcom ldan 
[\[120a.2\]]'das kyi mgul nas 'khyud nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas bud med des stan de kho na la 'dug 
[\[120a.3\]]bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[120a.4\]]logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[120a.5\]]spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la gtad nas/_des de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra 
[\[120a.6\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_des dgra bcom ma khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas 
[\[120a.7\]]sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]nas de bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu lung bstan te/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma ka tsang ka la 'di yin no zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[120b.2\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa gzigs lags sam bud med stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das mthong na sus kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong ba na 'di ltar ma brgyugs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ka tsang ka la 'di ni nga'i 
[\[120b.3\]]'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar mar gyur pas na/_'di ni sngon gyi bag chags kyi gzhi yod pa'i phyir nga mthong na rgyug go/_/dge slong dag gis gsol pa/_btsun pa gal te 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar yum du gyur pa lags 
[\[120b.4\]]na/_ci'i slad du da ltar gyi yum du ma gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis na 'di nga'i da ltar gyi mar ma gyur te/_lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos smon lam btab ste/_kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur 
[\[120b.5\]]cig ces byas pa de dang /_nga yang 'dis yid byung bar byas nas ngas kyang smon lam btab ste/_phyin cad 'di bdag gi mar ma gyur cig ces byas pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_'dis ci ltar bcom ldan 'das thugs byung bar bgyis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[120b.6\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nges par 'byung ba la dga' ba dang sbyin pa la dga' ba yin na/_'dis thams cad du nga'i nges par 'byung ba dang sbyin pa'i bar chad byas te gzhi des na 'dis nga yid byung bar byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[120b.7\]]zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong ma ka tsang ka las/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/_dbul mor gyur la rgas nas gdod rab tu byung lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nges par 'byung ba 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]la dga' ba dang sbyin pa la dga' ba yin na/_'dis nga'i tshe rabs bgrangs par nges par 'byung ba dang sbyin pa'i bar chad byas pas na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar dbul mor gyur la rgas nas gdod rab tu byung ngo /_/btsun pa dge slong ma ka 
[\[121a.2\]]tsang ka las/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis la bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yang rab 
[\[121a.3\]]tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 
[\[121a.4\]]na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs 
[\[121a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas/_gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan mo de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/_des der 'dis tshe 
[\[121a.6\]]gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[121a.7\]]rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi mkhan mo ji ltar mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog des mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams 
[\[121b.2\]]kyi mchog tu bstan par shog cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ka tsang ka la 'di nyid yin te/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[121b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_
[\[121b.4\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi mkhan mo ji ltar mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog des mdo rnam par 'byed pa 
[\[121b.5\]]rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par shog cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te 
[\[121b.6\]]mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas ngas 'di mdo rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu yang bstan to//_//kai ne ya zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das yul 
[\[121b.7\]]a du ma na 'byung po'i khyim zhes bya ba'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/_yul a du ma'i grong du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/a du ma'i grong du bsod snyoms mdzad nas/_bshos 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]gsol te/_zas phyis len pa spangs nas 'byung po'i khyim gyi gnas kyi phyi rol du zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir 'byung po'i khyim gyi gnas kyi nang du gshegs so/_/de'i tshe yul a du mar 'brug sgra yang byung thog kyang bab ste/_glang 
[\[122a.2\]]bzhi dang khyim bdag zhing pa spun gnyis bsad nas/_der skye bo phal po ches sgra bo che dang ca co chen po'i skad phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus su nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'byung po'i khyim gyi gnas nas byung ste/_'byung po'i khyim gyi gnas 
[\[122a.3\]]kyi grib ma'i thang gi 'chag sa na 'chag cing bzhugs so/_/de nas der mi zhig kyang skye bo phal po che de dag gi nang nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i slad 
[\[122a.4\]]bzhin du 'brang zhing 'chag go/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la bka' stsal pa/_kwa'i mi 'di a du ma'i grong khyer du skye bo phal po che'i sgra bo che dang ca co chen po'i skad grags pa de ci zhig_/mi des gsol pa/_btsun pa da gdod a du ma'i grong du 'brug sgra yang 
[\[122a.5\]]byung thog kyang bab ste/_glang bzhi dang khyim bdag zhing pa spun gnyis bkum nas der skye bo phal po ches sgra bo che dang ca co chen po'i skad phyung na/_ci bcom ldan 'das kyis 'brug sgra dang thog bab pa'i sgra ma gsan tam/_bka' stsal pa/_ngas ma thos so/_/gsol pa/_ci 
[\[122a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gzims gzims sam/_bka' stsal pa/_nga cang ma nyal lo/_/gsol pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das 'du shes dang ldan bzhin la ma gzims bzhin du 'brug sgra dang thog bab pa'i sgra ma gsan tam/_bka' stsal pa/_'du shes dang ldan bzhin la ma nyal 
[\[122a.7\]]bzhin du ngas 'brug sgra dang thog bab pa'i sgra ma thos so/_/de nas mi des 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma 'di ltar 'du shes dang yang ldan pa zhig la gzims kyang ma gzims par 'brug sgra dang thog bab pa'i sgra yang ma gsan pa las na/_bcom ldan 'das gnas pa'i bsam 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]gtan de de tsam du zhi ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam nas mi de dga' bar gyur te/_dga' bar gyur pa'i yon yang phul lo/_/de'i tshe yul a du ma'i nags khrod cig na drang srong kai ne ya zhes bya ba 'khor lnga brgya yod pa mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/_/de 
[\[122b.2\]]dang thag mi ring ba gud kyi nags khrod cig na ni de nyid kyi sring mo'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba 'khor lnga brgya yod pa zhig gnas so/_/drang srong de gnyi ga yang mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na gnas te/_de gnyis der dus dus su 'gro zhing nyin par gnas par byed do/_/sangs 
[\[122b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_
[\[122b.4\]]skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag par seng ge'i sgra chen po 
[\[122b.5\]]sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam 
[\[122b.6\]]nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags 
[\[122b.7\]]pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/
[\[123a.2\]]gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ngas rgyal po chen po bzhi la gang du chos bshad na/_der drang srong ka ne ya dang ri bo yang zhar la bdag gis thul bar 'gyur zhig gu/_ma la bdag gis mtsho dal 
[\[123a.3\]]gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du rgyal po chen po bzhi la chos bshad dang /_der drang srong ka ne ya dang /_ri bo yang tshegs chung ngus zhar la bdag gis thul bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/_kye ma rgyal po chen po bzhis bdag gi 
[\[123a.4\]]sems shes te/_bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag la mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rtogs na legs so snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa khong du chud nas g.yog rnams btang ste/_
[\[123a.5\]]khyed deng la mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du song ste gdan dag shoms shig_/sa gzhi yang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cig_/spos chu'i chag chag kyang thob cig_/drang srong kai ne ya dang ri bo la yang mi'am mi ma yin pa'am srin po la la dag gnod pa byed na mi rung gis 
[\[123a.6\]]bsrung bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byas te/_mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du song nas gdan yang bshams/_sa gzhi yang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te spos chu'i chag chag btab bo/_/de nas 
[\[123a.7\]]drang srong ka ne yas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du gdan bshams nas/_sa gzhi yang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te spos chu'i chag chag btab pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang drang srong kai ne yas khyed ci shom zhing 'dug ces dris 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bzhi la bcom ldan 'das chos ston par bzhed de de'i phyir gdan shom mo/_/drang srong ka ne yas smras pa/_ci ngas de dag la chos bshad dam rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de dag la 
[\[123b.2\]]chos ston par mdzad kyi khyod ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_'o na khyed nga'i phyi bzhin du ci'i phyir 'brang /_de dag gis smras pa/_de dag gi phyi bzhin du g.yog 'khor mang po 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis khyod la gnod pa byed du dogs pa'i phyir bdag cag khyod la srung bar byed 
[\[123b.3\]]do/_/drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/_ci khyed nga 'ba' zhig la srung bar byed dam/_'on te dge sbyong gau ta ma la yang srung bar byed/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag ni dge sbyong gau ta ma la srung bar mi byed de/_de nyid lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[123b.4\]]la srung bar mdzad do/_/de nas kai ne yas bsams pa/_'di ltar lha rnams kyang de la mchod pa'i phyir las bya ba la brtson par byed pa las na/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig go snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul a du ma nas mi snang bar gyur te/_
[\[123b.5\]]mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dri za stong phrag du mas g.yog byas pa/_lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas bcom 
[\[123b.6\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor nas shar phyogs logs su brten te/_bcom ldan 'das la mdun 
[\[123b.7\]]gyis phyogs shing nub phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po grul bum stong phrag du mas g.yog byas pa rin po ches thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la rin po ches gtor te/_bcom ldan 
[\[124a\]]
