[\[124a.1\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs logs su brten te/_bcom ldan 'das la mdun gyis phyogs shing byang phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang klu stong phrag du mas g.yog byas pa mu tig 
[\[124a.2\]]gis thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs logs su brten te/_bcom ldan 'das la mdun gyis phyogs shing shar phyogs 
[\[124a.3\]]su kha bltas te 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin stong phrag du mas g.yog byas pa gser dngul gyis thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la gser dngul gyis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[124a.4\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/_bcom ldan 'das la mdun gyis phyogs shing lho phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug go/_/de dag gi nang na gnyis ni yul mtha' 'khob pa yin la/_gnyis ni yul dbus pa yin no/_/de nas bcom 
[\[124a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te bdag gis yul dbus kyi skad kyis chos bshad na ni/_gnyis kyis ni brda phrad la gnyis kyis phrad par mi 'gyur/_de ste yul mtha' 'khob kyi skad kyis chos bshad na yang gnyis kyis ni brda phrad la gnyis kyis ni brda phrad par 
[\[124a.6\]]mi 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di dag la so sor chos bshad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus dang bral ba dang tshor ba bsil bar gyur pa dang 'du shes 
[\[124a.7\]]'gags pa dang 'du byed nye bar zhi ba dang rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i lha stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di la khyod kyis mthong ba la ni mthong ba tsam gyi blo dang ldan par gyis shig_/thos pa la ni thos pa tsam gyi blo dang 
[\[124b.2\]]ldan par gyis shig_/bye brag phyed pa la ni bye brag phyed pa tsam gyi blo dang ldan par gyis shig_/rnam par shes pa la ni rnam par shes pa tsam gyi blo dang ldan par gyis shig dang 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_
[\[124b.3\]]rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i lha stong phrag du mas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/_e ne me ne/_dab phu/_da dab 
[\[124b.4\]]phu/_zhes bya ba 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i lha stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas der 
[\[124b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_ma shA tu shA/_sang shwa mA/_sarba da tra bi ra trI/_zhes bya ba 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang de dang skal 
[\[124b.6\]]ba mnyam pa'i lha stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis chos mthong chos rnyed chos rtogs chos kyi gting slebs som nyi las rgal the tsom las brgal te/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan 
[\[124b.7\]]gyis bkri ba med la/_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]cag ni zhugs pa lags so/_/zhugs pa lags so/_/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi gzung bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la grogs po dag khyed zer ba ni 
[\[125a.2\]]legs pa yin no/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo /_/de 
[\[125a.3\]]rnams dong ba'i 'og tu dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas gtso bor smos par gyur la gnyis ni yul dbus par gyur/_gnyis ni yul mtha' 'khob par gyur te/_
[\[125a.4\]]'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa 
[\[125a.5\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe ri rab kyi bang rim la klu'i rgyal po 
[\[125a.6\]]dbugs dang dbugs chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang gnas la/_bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding sgra snyan dang sgra chung zhes bya ba gnyis kyang de na gnas pa las/_klu de gnyis nam mkha' lding de gnyis kyis 'jigs nas thur du gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng du song ste gnas so/_/
[\[125a.7\]]de nas phyi zhig na klu'i rgyal po dbugs dang dbugs chen spun gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur te/_de gnyis kyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/der gang gi tshe de gnyis kyis skyabs su 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe/_klu'i rgyal po de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gis mi tshugs par gyur nas de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung ste bag yangs su 'khod do/_/de nas nam mkha' lding sgra snyan dang sgra chung gnyis kyis klu'i rgyal po 
[\[125b.2\]]de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung nas bag yangs su 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang brtul te shugs kyis bcum pa las de gnyis la gnod pa byed ma nus te/_ri rab la bab pa bzhin du rdugs nas/_de gnyis kyis de gnyis la dris pa/_sngon khyed gnyis 
[\[125b.3\]]nged gnyis kyis 'jigs nas thur du gser gyi sa gzhi la song ste gnas na/_da ci'i phyir khyed gnyis bag yangs su 'khod la nged gnyis kyis khyed gnyis la gnod pa byed kyang mi nus par gyur/_klu gnyis kyis smras pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[125b.4\]]srung las/_bdag cag gnyis kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas na/_de'i phyir da ni bdag cag gnyis la khyed gnyis kyis mi tshugs par gyur to/_/nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig_/de nas klu 
[\[125b.5\]]gnyis kyis de gnyis la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgyas par bshad do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de gnyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la shas cher dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas de gnyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[125b.6\]]gi thad du song ste/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas de rnams 'thun par gyur te lhan cig 'grogs shing 'khod nas/_de rnams kyis tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar 
[\[125b.7\]]bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag cag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der gtso bor smos par gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 
[\[126a.2\]]klu'i rgyal po dbugs dang dbugs chen zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po yul dbus par gyur pa 'di gnyis kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po sgra snyan dang sgra chung zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de 
[\[126a.3\]]gnyis ni/_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba yul mtha' 'khob par gyur pa 'di gnyis kho na yin no/_/de rnams kyis der tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[126a.4\]]bdag cag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der gtso bor smos par gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par 
[\[126a.5\]]ma gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang na gtso bor smos par gyur te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_
[\[126a.6\]]thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so/_/der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la chos bstan te de dag gi las kyi rnam pa yang lung bstan pa de'i tshe/_drang srong kai ne ya yang thag mi ring ba 
[\[126a.7\]]zhig na 'dug ste des kyang thams cad thos te/_thos ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na drang srong kai ne yas bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mod la phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/des bden pa 
[\[126b.2\]]mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu deng gi gdugs la/_
[\[126b.3\]]phyogs 'di nyid du bzhugs te dus ma lags par gsol du rung ba'i gung skyems bdag gis sbyar ba gsol du ci gnang zhes byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong kai ne ya la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas drang srong kai ne yas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi 
[\[126b.4\]]gsung bas gnang bar rig nas btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad sbyar te/_ku shu dang chu shing gi 'bras bu dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang a shwad tha'i 'bras bu dang u dum bA ra'i 'bras bu dang pa ru sha ka'i 'bras bu dang 'bra go dang rgun 'brum rnams kyi khu ba'i btung ba khyer nas/_
[\[126b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa dang legs par brjod pa dang bsngags pa dang snyan par brjod pa lags kyis thugs 
[\[126b.6\]]brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i phyir drang srong kai ne ya'i btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po rnams bzhes so/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[126b.7\]]dge slong dag btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po 'di dag las ras kyis btsags kyang rung ma btsags kyang rung dang ba yang rung dang ba ma yin pa yang rung rnyog pa yang rung rnyog pa ma yin pa yang rung mdog bzang ba yang rung mdog mi bzang ba yang rung ba rnams ni/_dge slong 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]dang dge slong ma dang dge tshul pha dang dge tshul ma rnams la dus su btung bar ngas gnang gi dus ma yin par mi gnang ngo /_/dge slong dag btung ba'i rnam grangs brgyad po 'di dag nyid las ras kyis btsags pa dang dang ba dang mdangs bzang ba dang rnyog 
[\[127a.2\]]pa ma yin pa dang snyigs ma med pa rnams ni dus ma yin par btung bar bya ba yin no/_/de nas drang srong ka ne yas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 
[\[127a.3\]]thabs cig tu bdag gi der bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong kai ne ya la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas drang srong kai ne yas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[127a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'o na bdag cag mchis pa'i gnas nags khrod 'di nyid du do nub bzhugs par gsol/_de nas drang srong khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das mtsho dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur 
[\[127a.5\]]te drang srong kai ne ya 'dug pa'i gnas nas thag mi ring ba'i nags khrod de nyid du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas drang srong kai ne ya nam ma langs par langs nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te/_'phags pa dag longs/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 
[\[127a.6\]]longs/_shing dag gshogs/_me dag bus/_'bras chan tshos/_skyu rum sgrol/_khur ba dag gyis/_bkad sa'i zhal ta gyis zhes zer ro/_/de'i nub mo drang srong ri bo yang drang srong kai ne ya 'dug pa'i gnas na 'dug par gyur te/_drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne 
[\[127a.7\]]ya nam ma langs par langs nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te 'phags pa dag longs/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag longs/_shing dag gshogs/_me dag bus/_'bras chan tshos/_skyu rum dag sgrol/_khur ba dag gyis/_bkad sa'i zhal ta gyis zhes zer ba thos so/_/
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_ci drang srong 'di bag ma gtong ngam bag ma len tam 'on te 'dis yul 'khor gyi mi'am lag bzo'am pha tshan nam 'khor ram rgyal po spyan 'dren nam snyam nas drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne ya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[127b.2\]]ci drang srong khyod bag ma gtong ngam bag ma len tam/_'on te khyod yul 'khor gyi mi'am lag bzo'am pha tshan nam 'khor ram rgyal po bshos la spyan 'dren nam/_drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/_bdag ni bag ma gtong ba'am bag ma len pa yang mi byed la/_yul 
[\[127b.3\]]'khor gyi mi'am lag bzo'am pha tshan nam 'khor ram rgyal po yang spyan mi 'dren gyi/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang bshos la spyan 'dren no/_/de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas spu thams 
[\[127b.4\]]cad zing zhes byed de dga' ba skyes so/_/de nas drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne ya la smras pa/_drang srong sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig_/drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/_drang srong gangs ri'i 'dab na chu klung gang gA'i 'gram na drang srong ser skya 'dug pa'i gnas nas 
[\[127b.5\]]thag mi ring ba zhig na/_shAkya rnams kyi nang du bu zhig skyes pa yod do/_/de bram ze mtshan mkhan bye brag phyed pa rnams kyis lung bstan te gal te khyim gyi nang na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/de ste skra dang kha spu dag bregs nas chos gos tshon can 
[\[127b.6\]]dag bgos te/_yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa las/_de skra dang kha spu bregs nas chos gos tshon can dag bgos te/_
[\[127b.7\]]yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_drang srong sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de yin no/_/drang srong dge 'dun zhes bya ba su zhig_/drang srong rgyal rigs 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]mkhas pa dag kyang yod bram ze mkhas pa dang khyim bdag mkhas pa dang dge slong mkhas pa dag kyang yod de/_de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de'i rjes su rab tu byung ba de dag ni drang 
[\[128a.2\]]srong dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag bdag gis sang bshos la spyan 'dren no/_/de nas drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne ya la smras pa/_drang srong bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang na bzhugs/_drang srong ka ne yas 
[\[128a.3\]]smras pa/_drang srong yul a du ma 'di nyid na nags khrod 'di kho na na bzhugs kyis/_gal te blta bar 'dod pa lta na/_bram ze nags khrod nyams dga' ba/_/ga la 'dug pa der song dang /_/dri za'i rgyal po 'dra ba yi/_/'dren pa sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/de 
[\[128a.4\]]nas drang srong ri bos drang srong kai ne ya'i tshig mnyan te nags khrod de ga la 'dug pa der song nas/_drang srong ri bos thag ring po zhig nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing sba bar byas pa me lus kyi dbyibs su 
[\[128a.5\]]'dug pa lta bu me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu 
[\[128a.6\]]dga' ba skyes te dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[128a.7\]]ltar mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na drang srong ri bos stan de kho na la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas stan las 
[\[128b.2\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos 
[\[128b.3\]]po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong khyod kyis 'khor rnams la bzlugs sam/_drang srong ri bos gsol ba/_btsun pa ma bzlugs lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[128b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong 'o na 'khor rnams la je zlugs shig dang /_'khor la bzlugs pa ni 'di lta ste/_khyed lta bu grags pa dang ldan pa kun gyis shes pa bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa dag la legs pa kho na yin no/_/de nas drang srong ri bo bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[128b.5\]]rnams ga la 'khod pa der song ste phyin nas/_bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'dod na khyed ji ltar byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag ci 'tshal ba de dag 
[\[128b.6\]]thams cad kyang mkhan po las brten par bas kyis gal te mkhan po dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du rab tu 'byung ba lta na/_bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/drang srong ri bos smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag da de'i dus la bab par shes na 
[\[128b.7\]]de ltar gyis shig_/de nas drang srong ri bo g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis 'khor rnams la bzlugs lags 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]na/_btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[129a.2\]]kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba bka' stsal te dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas/_tshig de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/_spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya 
[\[129a.3\]]lon pa lta bur gyur/_lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_/de dag mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/_mod la dbang po rab 
[\[129a.4\]]tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas drang srong kai ne yas de'i nub mo nyid du bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sta gon byas nas/_nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams nas phyag chab kyi chu ra bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs 
[\[129a.5\]]tshod la bab ste/_bshos gsol lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 
[\[129a.6\]]'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_drang srong kai ne ya'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas drang srong kai ne yas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams rang gi lag nas bza' ba 
[\[129a.7\]]dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/de nas drang srong kai ne yas drang srong ri bo g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang rab tu byung ste gral de nyid na 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang drang srong ri bo la smras pa/_drang srong khyod rab tu byung ngam/_
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]drang srong ri bos smras pa/_grogs po bdag rab tu byung ngo /_/drang srong kai ne yas smras pa legs so/_/shin tu legs so/_/bdag kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol zin nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes smras nas/_drang srong kai ne yas sangs 
[\[129b.2\]]rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/_gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas bla gos 
[\[129b.3\]]phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 
[\[129b.4\]]'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong khyod kyis 'khor rnams la bzlugs sam/_drang srong kai ne yas gsol pa/_btsun pa ma bzlugs lags so/_/
[\[129b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong 'o na 'khor rnams la je zlugs shig dang /_'khor la bzlugs pa ni 'di lta ste/_khyod lta bu grags pa dang ldan pa kun gyis shes pa bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa dag la legs pa kho na yin no/_/de nas drang srong kai ne ya bram ze'i 
[\[129b.6\]]khye'u rnams ga la 'khod pa der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'dod na khyed ji ltar byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag ci 'tshal ba de dag 
[\[129b.7\]]thams cad kyang mkhan po las brten par bas kyis gal te mkhan po dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du rab tu 'byung ba lta na/_bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/drang srong kai ne yas smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag da de'i dus la bab par 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]shes na de ltar gyis shig_/de nas drang srong kai ne ya g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis 
[\[130a.2\]]'khor rnams la bzlugs lags na/_btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[130a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba bka' stsal te dge slong dag tshur shog_/tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas/_tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/_spyod lam ni bsnyen par 
[\[130a.4\]]rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur gyur/_lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_/de dag mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/_/
[\[130a.5\]]mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ri bo dang kai ne ya la gdams ngag byin nas/_de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong lhag ma 
[\[130a.6\]]de dag las kyang dge slong lnga brgya ni tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na chen po la gtad do/_/nyis brgya lnga bcu ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la gtad do/_/nyis brgya lnga bcu ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu la gtad de/_khyed kyis 'di rnams la gdams ngag ston cig_/'di rnams 
[\[130a.7\]]la yid la byed pa'i lung yang phog shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu dang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na chen po rnams kyis dge slong de dag khrid de chu 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]klung gser ldan gyi 'gram du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/de rnams kyis dbyar gnas par dam bcas nas de dag la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/_der tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[130b.2\]]pa maud gal gyi bus ni nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos rnams ni chos nyid kyis dus 
[\[130b.3\]]gnyis su phal po che 'du bar 'gyur te/_dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas pa'i dus la bab pa dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nya la 'du bar 'gyur te/_dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe ni/_dge slong dag gis yid la byed pa'i lung mnos nas/_ri'i 
[\[130b.4\]]sul dang ri'i phug dang sog ma'i phug dang thang dang dur khrod dang nags khrod kyi gnas de dag tu dbyar gnas par dam 'cha' bar byed do/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nya la ni de nas dong ste/_rtogs pa ni rjod par byed la ma rtogs pa ni gong du 'dri bar byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[130b.5\]]dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyi 'khor lnga brgya dang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na chen po'i 'khor lnga brgya po de dag dbyar gnas par byas te/_dbyar gnas zin nas dbyar zla gsum 'das pa'i 'og tu chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas/_chos gos gyon te lhung bzed 
[\[130b.6\]]thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rtogs pa ni rjod par byed ma rtogs pa yan cad ni zhu bar byed 
[\[130b.7\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gong ma'i yid la byed pa'i lung phog nas/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na chen pos ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sde tshan dang ldan 
[\[131a.2\]]pa gnyis par gyur pas ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te 'das pa'i dus na yang dge slong ka pi nas dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la ji 
[\[131a.3\]]ltar bkod pa dang /_maud gal gyi bus gzugs med pa'i khams su ji ltar bkod pa dang /_shA ri'i bus gzugs kyi khams su ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri zhig la drang srong g.yog 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang ldan pa gnyis brten 
[\[131a.4\]]cing 'dug ste/_ri ngos gcig na ni drang srong g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa gcig 'dug go/_/pha rol gyi ngos na ni drang srong g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa gcig 'dug go/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis las drang srong gcig shi nas/_bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis de'i rus bu 
[\[131a.5\]]la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas drang srong cig shos kyi thad du dong ngo /_/drang srong des kyang de dag 'khor du byas nas drang srong des bsams pa/_ma la bdag kyang shi na ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di rnams mgon med par 'gyur gyis/_bdag gson pa'i tshe na 'di rnams bskyang bar bya dgos 
[\[131a.6\]]so snyam nas drang srong de la slob ma'i mchog gsum yod pa de las gcig la ni drang srong des bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gtad do/_/gnyis la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/_/'di skad ces kyang bsgo ste/_bdag gson pa'i tshe yang rung shi ba'i 'og tu yang rung ste khyed 
[\[131a.7\]]kyis 'di rnams slobs shig_/yid la byed pa la yang yang dag par bzung bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de dag gi nang nas gcig gis ni bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par bkod do/_/gcig gis ni gzugs med nga 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]pa'i khams su bkod do/_/gcig gis ni gzugs kyi khams su bkod do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe gang gis bram ze'i khye'u de dag bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de ni bram ze ka pi na 'di nyid yin no/_/gang gis de dag 
[\[131b.2\]]gzugs med pa'i khams su bkod pa de ni maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe gang gis de dag gzugs kyi khams su bkod pa de ni shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang de rnams las 'di dag nyid las gcig gis ni bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes 
[\[131b.3\]]pa lnga la bkod do/_/gcig gis ni gzugs med pa'i khams su bkod do/_/gcig gis ni gzugs kyi khams su bkod do/_/da ltar yang 'di rnams las gcig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do/_/gcig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod do/_/
[\[131b.4\]]gcig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod do/_/gzhan yang dge slong dag bram ze ka pi na'i slob ma gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po rnon po yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu'i slob ma gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po 'bring ngo /_/shA ri'i bu'i slob ma gang yin pa de dag ni 
[\[131b.5\]]dbang po rtul po yin te/_dge slong dag gal te shA ri'i bu'i slob ma gang yin pa de dag bram ze ka pi na la gtad du zin na/_dro bar gyur pa yang de dag gis bskyed mi nus na/_gong ma'i khyad par rtogs pa lta ga la 'gyur/_de nas dge slong de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[131b.6\]]ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa drang srong ka ne ya dang ri bo g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab 
[\[131b.7\]]tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur 
[\[132a.2\]]ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs pa gnyis shig 'khod pa las/_phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[132a.3\]]rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_de gnyis kyis khyim gyi 'khor btang ste gnyi ga rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas de gnyis kyis sde snod gsum bslabs te/_de gnyi ga rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur te/_de gnyi ga gos dang zas dang mal 
[\[132a.4\]]cha dang stan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to/_/de gnyi gas kyang slob ma lnga brgya lnga brgya bsdus nas gnyi ga yang 'khor gyi slob dpon du gyur to/_/der de gnyis kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[132a.5\]]'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gnyis kyis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom 
[\[132a.6\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas de gnyis la slob ma rnams kyis dris pa/_khyed gnyis kyis smon lam ci lta bu zhig btab ces byas nas/_de gnyis kyis de dag la rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis kyang khyed 
[\[132a.7\]]gnyis las brten te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 'khor gyi slob dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni/_kai ne ya dang ri bo 'di gnyis kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe slob mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong stong po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de dag gis der smon lam btab ste yang dag 
[\[132b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[132b.3\]]cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur 
[\[132b.4\]]nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//_las brgya tham pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_bag ma 
[\[132b.5\]]gtong ba zhes bya ba gnyis la/_bag ma gtong ba dang po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs pa gnyis shig 'dug go/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis gcig la gcig smras te/_grogs po bdag 
[\[132b.6\]]cag gnyis kyis ci nas mdza' ba las cung zad kyang 'bye bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag cig shos kyis smras pa/_'o na bdag cag gnyis kyis ji ltar bya/_khyim bdag gcig gis smras pa gnyen du bya'o/_/khyim bdag gcig gis smras pa/_khyod la bu khye'u'am 
[\[132b.7\]]bu mo lta yod dam/_khyim bdag gcig gis smras pa med do/_/khyim bdag gcig gis smras pa/_'o na bdag la yang bu khye'u yang med bu mo yang med la/_khyod la yang bu khye'u yang med bu mo yang med na bdag cag gnyis kyis gnyen du ji ltar bya/_khyim bdag gcig 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gis smras pa/_gnyen bya ba la rnam pa 'di gnyis yin te/_skyes zin pa'i gnyen dang da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen no/_/bdag cag gnyis la bu khye'u yang med bu mo yang med mod kyi/_da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen byar rung ste gal te bdag gi bu khye'u btsas la 
[\[133a.2\]]khyod kyi bu mo btsas na ni de bdag gi bu la byin cig_/de ste khyod kyi bu khye'u btsas la bdag gi bu mo btsas na ni bdag gis de khyod kyi bu la sbyin par bya'o zhes byas nas de gnyis kyis da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen byas te song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na gcig gi chung ma la bu chags par 
[\[133a.3\]]gyur nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed 
[\[133a.4\]]bsrings so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag cig shos kyang chung ma dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas 
[\[133a.5\]]nas rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa dang des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang blangs so/_/de nas phyi 
[\[133a.6\]]zhig na des pha ma gnyis la smras pa/_yab yum bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod pa'i rngo mi thogs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod ma skyes pa'i snga rol nas bdag cag gnyis 
[\[133a.7\]]kyis khyim thab la byin zin gyis bdag cag gnyis kyis gnang bar byar mi rung ngo zhes byas pa dang /_bu mo des pha ma gnyis la yang dang yang du dus kyis gsol nas/_de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bsams pa/_ma la bu mo 'di nyid kyis bdag cag gi tshig ma mnyan te rab tu 'byung srid kyis 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]bdag cag gis gyos sgyug la sbran to snyam nas/_de gnyis kyis de'i pha ma gnyis la smras pa/_bu mo 'di ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod de bdag cag gnyis kyis ma mthong bar rab tu 'byung srid kyi/_ma thogs pa kho nar bag ma long la khyed cag gi khyim du khrid cig ces byas so/_/
[\[133b.2\]]de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag des bu chas su bcug ste/_khye'u de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas 'byor pa chen po dang ldan pas gyos po'i khyim du btang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des kyang khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi khyim pa'i chos bzhin du byas nas bu mo khyim thab la 
[\[133b.3\]]btang ngo /_/de nas bag ma blangs zin pa'i 'og tu bu mo de bros te/_dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du song nas rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs so/_/mkhan mos kyang de la lung phog nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom 
[\[133b.4\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs te/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/khye'u des kyang chung ma bros pa thos nas thos ma thag tu g.yog 'khor mang po dag dang chas te/_tshol zhing dge slong 
[\[133b.5\]]ma'i gtsug lag khang du song ba las khye'u des bdag gi chung ma skra bregs te chos gos tshon can bgos te/_skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan byed pa mthong ste/_mthong ma thag tu de'i thad du song nas des lag pa nas bzung bar byas pa dang de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas 
[\[133b.6\]]'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas/_de mthong ma thag tu khye'u de dang skye bo mang po de dag shas cher dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_skal ba chen mo mar spyon mar spyon/_bdag 
[\[133b.7\]]cag nyes par spyad pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas de sa la babs nas khye'u des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas yo byad thams cad kyang bstabs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/_/des kyang de rnams kyi bsam pa dang 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas khye'u de dang skye bo mang po de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[134a.2\]]'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_bden pa mthong nas khye'u des bsams pa/_bud med kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur gyis bdag gis kyang khyim na gnas pa btang la bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung 
[\[134a.3\]]nas/_chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad par bya'o snyam nas pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[134a.4\]]spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs te/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong ma 
[\[134a.5\]]'dis las gang dag bgyis na/_bag mar mchis pa'i 'og tu nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis la dge slong 'dis kyang 'di kho na la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[134a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[134a.7\]]sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag cig gi bu mo 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]thabs snga ma kho na ltar rab tu byung nas de'i khyim thab kyis kyang de kho na las brten te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_dge slong ma des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad de 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag 
[\[134b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la thabs 'di 
[\[134b.3\]]kho na bzhin du bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas de sngon gyi khyim thab kyis mthong nas dris pa bzang mo khyod kyis smon lam ji lta bu zhig btab/_de nas des de la thams 
[\[134b.4\]]cad rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas dge slong des kyang smon lam btab ste/_bzang mo ji ltar khyod las brten nas bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed pa de bzhin du de kho na'i tshe yang nga nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu gyur te khyod kho na las brten nas 
[\[134b.5\]]bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/_de'i 
[\[134b.6\]]tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma 'di nyid yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_'di ltar bdag bag mar song ba'i 'og tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs 
[\[134b.7\]]par spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la bdag da lta bzhin du bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur 
[\[135a.2\]]nas/_da ltar 'di bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de'i tshe khyim thab tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/_des der smon 
[\[135a.3\]]lam btab ste/_de'i tshe nga nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu gyur nas khyod kho na las brten te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[135a.4\]]mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_da ltar 'dis 'di kho na la brten nas nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//bag ma gtong ba 
[\[135a.5\]]phyi ma ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i gtso bo gnyis yod pa la gcig gi ming ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin ces bya/_gcig gi ming ni byin pa zhes bya'o/_/de gnyis mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs par gyur te/_de gnyis 
[\[135a.6\]]kyis thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de gnyis chung ma dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis lhan cig tu tshogs te smras pa/_grogs po bdag cag gnyis kyis ci nas mdza' ba 'di las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du cung zad kyang 'bye bar mi bya'o 
[\[135a.7\]]zhes smras so/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis smras pa/_'o na bdag cag gnyis kyis ji ltar bya/_byin pas smras pa/_gnyen du bya'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis smras pa/_khyod la bu khye'u'am bu mo lta yod dam/_byin pas smras pa med do/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyis smras pa/_'o na 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bdag la bu khye'u yang med bu mo yang med la/_khyod la yang bu khye'u yang med bu mo yang med na bdag cag gnyis gnyen du ji ltar bya/_byin pas smras pa gnyen du bya ba la rnam pa gnyis yod de/_skyes zin pa'i gnyen dang da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen no/_/bdag cag gnyis la bu khye'u 
[\[135b.2\]]yang med bu mo yang med mod kyi da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen byar rung ste/_gal te bdag gi bu khye'u btsas la/_khyod kyi bu mo btsas na ni de bdag gi bu la byin cig_/de ste khyod kyi bu khye'u btsas la bdag gi bu mo btsas na ni bdag gis de khyod kyi bu la sbyin par bya'o zhes byas so/_/de nas 
[\[135b.3\]]de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de gnyis song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi chung ma la bu chags par gyur nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i ming sa ga zhes btags so/_/'dod pa rnams ni tsha chu dang 'dra ste ji tsam du bsten pa de tsam du phyir zhing skye 
[\[135b.4\]]bar 'gyur te/_snga phyir de'i bu bdun byung nas de rnams kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas te rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas bskyed bsrings so/_/de nas phyi zhig na byin pa'i chung ma la yang bu chags par gyur nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la 
[\[135b.5\]]mdzes pa zhig btsas na/_bu mo de rang bzhin gyis ngu bar gyur nas pha ma gnyis kyis de thabs cis kyang dgag par ma nus so/_/de nas phyi zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI khyim der song nas khyim bdag de la chos bshad pa dang bu mo de yang chos thos nas kha rog ste 'dug go/_/de 
[\[135b.6\]]nas gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs khyim bdag de la chos bshad nas phyir song ba de'i tshe yang bu mo de ngu ba la zhugs pa dang /_khyim bdag des 'phrigs te bsams pa/_bu mo 'di ni chos nyan pa 'dod pa zhig yin gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas de'i btsas ston byas nas bu 
[\[135b.7\]]mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de bu mo 'di chos 'dod la byin pa'i bu mo yin pas na/_bu mo 'di'i ming chos byin ma zhes bya bar gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo chos byin ma 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma gnyis la gsol te/_dus dus su dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma rnams bshos gsol nas de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan par byed do/_/de nas 
[\[136a.2\]]des chos thos nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas/_de khyim na gnas bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs so/_/des bden pa mthong nas pha ma gnyis la smras pa/_yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan 
[\[136a.3\]]pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod ma skyes pa'i snga rol nas/_bdag cag gnyis kyis khyim thab la byin zin gyis bdag cag gnyis kyis gnang bar byar mi rung ngo /_/bu mo des smras pa/_bdag ni 'dod pa rnams 
[\[136a.4\]]don du gnyer ba ma lags na/_bdag la khyim thab ci 'tshal/_pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis kyis khyod la gnang bar byar mi rung gis 'on kyang khyod nyid las brten te/_bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang 
[\[136a.5\]]bar bya'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin la yang bzlugs la khyod bdag nyid kyis khyim thab la gsol te rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig ces byas nas/_khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma 
[\[136a.6\]]bzang po mang po bshams te nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te 
[\[136a.7\]]gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_khyim bdag byin pa'i bkad sa ga la ba der 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa 
[\[136b.2\]]bstabs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas des bu mo chos byin ma rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa las bzlog ma nus nas khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin la sbran te 
[\[136b.3\]]khyod nyid 'dir shog la zlog shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa lhags nas khyim bdag byin pa'i khyim phyi bskor te 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag byin pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa chos kyi 
[\[136b.4\]]gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 
[\[136b.5\]]yang dong ngo /_/bu mo chos byin ma yang de dag dang thabs cig tu song ngo /_/khye'u sa ga dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bu mo chos byin ma khyim de nas byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khye'u sa gas bu mo chos byin ma bzung zhes byas na/_de steng gi nam 
[\[136b.6\]]mkha' la 'phags nas 'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan te/_de mthong nas khye'u sa gas bsams pa/_'dis chos 'di lta bu thob pa las na 'di bdag dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa rnams longs spyod par ga la 'gyur snyam mo/_/
[\[136b.7\]]so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par 'gyur te/_de mthong ma thag tu rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_skal ba chen mo mar spyon mar spyon/_bdag cag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas de nam mkha' las 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]babs nas/_khye'u sa gas kyang rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas smras pa/_bdag gis khyod de bzhin du gnang ngo /_/yo byad thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya ste khyod la ci dgos pa de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyin no zhes byas nas/_chos mnyan 
[\[137a.2\]]pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas chos byin mas de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas song ngo /_/de nas dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du song ste/_rab 
[\[137a.3\]]tu byung nas dge slong ma rnams kyis de la dge tshul ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang phog_/chos drug gi bslab pa'i sdom pa yang phog nas de gang gi tshe lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug la bslabs nas bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de'i tshe/_dge slong ma rnams kyis de la tshangs par 
[\[137a.4\]]spyod pa'i gnas kyi sdom pa phog ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid do/_/de yang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa yul na bzang ba byad gzugs dpe med pa zhig ste/_btsas ma thag tu skye bo 
[\[137a.5\]]mang pos bslangs na yang khyim bdag byin pas sngon gzhan la byin zin pa'i phyir su la yang ma byin no/_/de gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba de'i tshe gzhan dag gi sems skyes pa/_'di khyim na gnas pa'i tshe ni bdag cag gis ma thob na da ni 'di rab tu byung zin gyis/_bdag cag gis ci 
[\[137a.6\]]dga' mgur byar yod do snyam nas bskor bar chad de/_thabs ji ltar byas na 'di bdag cag gis dbrog nus par gyur snyam pa dang /_kha cig song ste dge slong ma rnams la sbran nas dge slong ma rnams kyis bsams pa/_da ni 'di bdag cag gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid de 
[\[137a.7\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par byed kyang mi nus la/_dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang 'dir bzhag par mi nus so snyam ste pha'i khyim du khrid nas der bzhag go_/de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis de'i gtam rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/_btsun pa bdag cag gis dge slong 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]ma chos byin ma ji ltar bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na dge slong ma chos byin ma phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang gis/_phyin cad gzhan zhig phyi rol du 'byung ba la/_'di kho na dang 'dra ba'i nyes dmigs 'byung bar 
[\[137b.2\]]'gyur na/_de yang phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/_de thos ma thag tu dge slong ma rnams kyis de phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_gzhung las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/de nas phrin gyis bzlugs 
[\[137b.3\]]pa'i dge slong ma chos byin ma'i thad du song nas bsgo ba/_chos byin ma khyod bsnyen par rdzogs zin gyis bag yod par nan tan gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu chos byin mas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de 
[\[137b.4\]]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[137b.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[137b.6\]]zhus pa/_btsun pa chos byin mas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung 
[\[137b.7\]]nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis nas 'di kho na las brten te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang bar mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[138a.2\]]pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las phyi zhig na de'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing 
[\[138a.3\]]blta na sdug la mdzes pa yul na bzang ba byad gzugs dpe med pa zhig btsas nas/_de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma la gsol te/_rab tu byung nas de bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[138a.4\]]par bya ba'i phyir phyi rol du byung ba las nyes dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ste/_gang gi tshe phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe phrin gyis bzlugs pa'i dge slong ma de'i thad du song nas bsgo ba ming 
[\[138a.5\]]'di zhes bya ba khyod bsnyen par rdzogs zin gyis bag yod par nan tan gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de'i tshe des nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas 'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa 
[\[138a.6\]]dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nas/_mkhan mos de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas te/_sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog 
[\[138a.7\]]gis bkur sti byas te/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag gi slob ma las brten nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[138b.2\]]rgyas 'od srung gis phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ba de bzhin du/_bdag kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog des phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnang nas/_de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[138b.3\]]sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma chos byin ma 'di nyid yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[138b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom 
[\[138b.5\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag gi slob ma las brten nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ba de bzhin du shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog des kyang /_bdag las brten te phrin gyis bsnyen 
[\[138b.6\]]par rdzogs par gnang bar gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par 
[\[138b.7\]]ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas 'di nyid las brten te/_ngas dge slong ma rnams la phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ba yin no/_/de nas yang dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa dge slong ma chos byin ma 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas ji ltar bsrungs pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te 'das pa'i 
[\[139a.2\]]dus na yang 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas ji ltar bsrungs pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag 
[\[139a.3\]]cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs pa las de phyi zhig na/_de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_rigs dang 
[\[139a.4\]]'thun par ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che 
[\[139a.5\]]brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i 
[\[139a.6\]]pha mas thabs zlar bab pa las de'i chung ma blangs nas de yang de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/_khye'u de bu mo de la shas cher chags nas de med kyi bar du 'dug mi 'dod de/_des zong bzhag pa dang tshong khang bor nas de 'ba' zhig dang lhan cig 'dug go/_/de 
[\[139a.7\]]nas khyim bdag des bsams pa/_'di 'di la chags na nor zas thams cad zad par 'ong gis 'di ro 'di dang dbral dgos so snyam nas smras pa/_bu cig ro 'di ci dgos gal te khyod 'di bzhin du 'dug ste las mi byed na rgas pa'i tshe phongs par 'gyur gyis/_bu ji srid kyi bar du 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]khyod kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams la mthu yod kyi bar du nor bsgrub par gyis shig_/phyis chung ma dang sdug par gyur ta re zhes smras nas/_khyim bdag des le'u glon pa'i zong sta gon byas nas khye'u de yul gzhan du btang ngo /_/khye'u des kyang rnga mo dang bong bu la sogs pa la zong bkal 
[\[139b.2\]]nas grong dang grong khyer dang nags khrod kyi grong dang yul chen po rnams bgrod de rgyangs chad pa zhig tu phyin nas de chung ma'i phyir rtsa sngon po brngas pa skams pa bzhin du 'dug ste des bsams pa/_bdag de dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba'i thabs ji yod snyam ste de'i thabs sems 
[\[139b.3\]]shing 'dug go/_/de nas de'i tshe ri khrod kyi grong de na shing mkhan bzo thabs mkhan shing gi bzo thabs kyi nam mkha' lding nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed shes pa zhig 'dug go/_/de nas khye'u des kyang thos nas thos ma thag tu bsams pa/_der 'gro ba'i thabs bdag gis rnyed 
[\[139b.4\]]do snyam ste bzo thabs mkhan gyi thad du song nas smras pa/_kye mi khyod kyis bzo thabs kyi nam mkha' lding 'di bdag la byin cig dang bdag gis khyod la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya sbyin no zhes byas pa dang /_de na re bdag gis khyod la gtan sbyin du ni mi rung gis nyi ma re re bdag gi thad 
[\[139b.5\]]nas long la don gnyer du song nas phyir khyer te 'ongs nas bdag la phul cig ces zer ro/_/de nas khye'us smras pa/_khyod ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas mi des nam mkha' lding de bcos te 'gro ba dang phyir ldog pa yang bslabs nas byin no/_/de nas de 
[\[139b.6\]]de la zhon nas rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma dang lhan cig tu dga' ba nyams su myong nas phyir yang ri khrod kyi grong de nyid du 'gro'o/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma de la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon te bu btsas la thug pa dang bzo thabs kyi slob dpon de don zhig la yul 
[\[139b.7\]]gzhan du song nas phyin cad khye'u de rang gi khyim du 'gro mi nus par gyur to/_/bu mo de yang gyos sgyug gnyis kyis smras te nyes dmigs 'di lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar byas zhes byas pa dang de na re jo bo nyid kyis byas so zhes zer ro/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_nga'i bu song nas lo du ma lon na 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]des 'di ji ltar byas/_de nas bu mo des de gnyis la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad pa dang de gnyis na re khyod ji skad zer ba de lta ni ma yin no/_/de nas 'khang bzhin du nyes pa byas so snyam ste khyim nas bskrad do/_/de nas de bA rA Na sI nas byung ste pha'i khyim logs 
[\[140a.2\]]su chas te de song song ba las ri khrod kyi grong zhig tu phyin nas/_de der song ste lam po cher bzhag pa dang /_de'i nub mo bu byung nas de na tsha mi bzod de myos shing 'dug pa las thag nye ba zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas te/_de'i khyim na khyi'i ming 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig yod 
[\[140a.3\]]de/_khyi de lam po cher song nas khye'u de mthong ste des bud med de myos shing 'dug pa'i bar du khye'u de sos bzung nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang /_khyim bdag des kyang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa de mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bsams pa/_bu ma rungs 
[\[140a.4\]]pa bas ni gzhan gyi bu yang bur byar rung la/_bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas na khye'u 'di kho na blangs te/_gsos dang 'di bdag gi bur 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo shes par gyis shig_/bu ma rungs pa bas ni gzhan gyi bu yang 
[\[140a.5\]]bur byar rung la/_bdag cag gnyis la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas khye'u 'di bdag cag gis gsos dang 'di bdag cag gi bur 'gyur gyis khyod ni pang du zhugs shig_/ngas ni btsas ston bya'o zhes byas nas bud med de'i pang du zhugs te 'dug go/_/khyim bdag des ni rnga 
[\[140a.6\]]brdungs nas khye'u de'i btsas ston byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas bud med snga ma de gang gi tshe na tsha zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe langs te/_bu blang zhes byas na bu mi snang nas des nang par skye bo mang po nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams la khyed kyis byis pa lta ci mthong zhes dris pa dang /_der 
[\[140a.7\]]sus mthong ba de dag gis de la smras pa/_khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi khyi 'byung po zhes bya ba des khye'u zhig khyer te khyim der song ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas bud med des bud med gzhan zhig la brtsad de khyim der btang nas khyod song la khye'u de shi'am ma shi ltos shig ces byas 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]so/_/de nas bud med de der song ste bltas nas/_khye'u khyim bdag des blangs te bur byas pa mthong nas bud med de phyir log ste bsnyad do/_/de nas mas bsams pa khye'u de dang bdag cag gnyis ka sdug par 'gyur na mi rung gis re zhig khye'u de 'di nyid na 'dug kyang rung ngo 
[\[140b.2\]]snyam du bsams nas/_song ba dang de 'gron po dag cig dang phrad nas de 'gron po rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa las 'gron po de dag mi rgod kyis bcom nas bud med de mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis rang gi khyim du khrid de chung mar bya bar byas nas/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo de dang lhan cig tu nyal 
[\[140b.3\]]bar byas pa las/_bud med des bsams pa/_ji ltar byas na 'dis bdag gi lag nas gzung bar mi nus pa'i thabs shig bdag gis bya'o snyam nas/_skra ni bshig gos sngon po ni bgos kha dang so ni rgya skyegs kyis bskus ral gri ni thogs nas khang phugs su zhugs 
[\[140b.4\]]te 'dug pa dang mi de yang khang phugs der song ste/_bud med de dang lhan cig tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_bud med des ral gri thogs bzhin du de'i steng du brgyugs nas khyod da gar yang thar du ma re zhig ces byas pa dang mi de 'jigs shing skrag nas rkang 
[\[140b.5\]]pa la phyag 'tshal te/_bzang mo bdag la srog gi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bud med de na re/_khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ba'i thabs gcig cig yod de/_gal te khyod kyis deng phyin cad nga la 'dod pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par mi byed 
[\[140b.6\]]la nga su la yang bsgrags par mi byed na/_khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis smras pa/_khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas yid ches pa'i mnas bsgags te bud med de khyim de nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas mi rgod kyi sde 
[\[140b.7\]]dpon gyis bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di nam du gso zhing 'dug bdag gis 'di thabs kyis btsong bar bya'o snyam nas/_de des smad 'tshong ma zhig la btsongs pa dang smad 'tshong mas de la bsgo ba bzang mo deng phyin cad 'dir 'dug la smad 'tshong ma gyis shig ces byas 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]so/_/de nas bud med de na re bdag la smad 'tshong ma ci dgos bdag ni skyes pa gzhan la reg mi phod do/_/smad 'tshong mas smras pa/_bdag gis de'i phyir nor yongs su btang ste khyod nyos pa yin no/_/de ma yin na khyod nga la ci dgos/_de nas bud 
[\[141a.2\]]med des bsams pa/_'dir yang thabs de nyid bya dgos so snyam nas de kho na bzhin du srin mo'i cha lugs su zhugs nas smad 'tshong ma'i thog tu brgyugs te nags khung gi srin mo ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyi khyim du zhugs na/_khyod da dung gson zhing 'dug 
[\[141a.3\]]gam zhes byas pa dang /_bud med de 'jigs shing skrag nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bdag la srog gi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas bud med de na re khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ba'i thabs gcig cig yod de/_gal te khyod kyis nga 'di nyid na 'dug 
[\[141a.4\]]na las 'di lta bu byed du ma bcug la nga su la yang bsgrags par mi byed na khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/smad 'tshong mas smras pa/_khyod ci ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas yid ches pa'i mnas bsgags te btang ngo /_/de nas smad 'tshong ma 
[\[141a.5\]]che ge mo'i khyim na nags khung gi srin mo gnas so zhes kun du gtam grags te/_des 'jigs nas phyin cad su yang khyim der mi 'gro'o/_/de nas smad 'tshong mas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di khyim nas bskrad pa'i thabs lta ci yod snyam mo/_/de nas de'i bu de yang cher 
[\[141a.6\]]skyes nas/_de'i ming yang khyim bdag des 'byung po zhes btags te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa 
[\[141a.7\]]dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]gsos pa'i pha de shi nas/_khye'u des bsams pa da ni pha shi bas na khyim 'di'i 'tsho tshis bdag gis bya dgos so snyam nas zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ba las de mthar gyis gang na de'i ma de 'dug pa'i gnas der phyin nas/_de grong khyer der song ba las smad 
[\[141b.2\]]'tshong ma de'i khyim dang thag nye ba zhig tu zong bzhag pa'i sar zong rnams bzhag nas 'dug go/_/bud med de yang gar song bar tshong pa rnams la 'dri bar byed de khyed kyis gnas ga ge mo zhig na tshong dpon che ge mo zhig 'dug pa'i bu shes sam zhes dri bar byed do/_/de nas de dag na re 
[\[141b.3\]]ded dpon 'byung po zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i pha ni shi'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de nyid kyi g.yog 'khor rnams la dris na/_de dag na re ded dpon 'byung po zhes bya ba de ni 'di yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas bud med des smras pa/_ci'i phyir phas 'di'i ming 'byung po 
[\[141b.4\]]zhes btags/_byis pa rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag de la khyi 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des 'di lam po che nas khyer te 'ongs nas de la byin pas na 'di'i ming yang 'byung po zhes btags so/_/de nas bud med des bsams pa/_bdag gi bu ni 'di kho na 
[\[141b.5\]]yin no snyam ste/_de khye'u de'i thad du song nas khye'u de la gtam de dag thams cad bsnyad de/_de lta bas na bu khyod ni nga'i bu yin no nga ni khyod kyi ma yin no zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u des ma de smad 'tshong ma las nor gyis blus nas bdag gi khyim du khrid de khyim du bzhag go/_/
[\[141b.6\]]khye'u de'i pha yang rgya mtsho'i gru'i don grub nas rang gi khyim du 'ongs te pha ma gnyis kyi mgul nas 'jus nas rdzas rnams nang du bzhag pa'i 'og tu/_rang gi gnas su song na chung ma de mi snang nas des pha ma gnyis la dris so bu mo de'i pha'i ming ni rlangs pa zhes bya ste des de'i ming 
[\[141b.7\]]las chung ma smos te/_yab yum rlangs pa'i bu mo de mi gda' na gar mchis zhes byas pa dang /_de gnyis na re bu mo des ni khyod la chu gang ma byas te des nyes pa byas pas nged kyis khyim nas bskrad de btang ngo zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'us smras pa/_de'i lto na bu 'dug pa de ni 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]bdag gi bu kho na lags na khyod kyis de bskrad pa nongs so zhes byas nas de de dang bral bas smyos te/_rlangs pa'i bu mo gar song zhig gu zhes bla zhing song ste su la yang 'dri zhing khyed kyis rlangs pa'i bu mo lta mthong ngam zhes zer nas/_de pha ma gnyis kyis 
[\[142a.2\]]thabs ci ltar byas kyang zhi bar byed ma nus te/_de sgren mor byung nas bla zhing gang na de'i chung ma dang bu de 'dug pa'i gnas der phyin to/_/de nas de sgren mor byung la bla zhing phan tshun 'khyam pa las khye'u de'i khyim gyi sgor phyin te/_khye'us mthong nas ma la bsnyad pa/_yum mi 
[\[142a.3\]]zhig smyos te rlangs pa'i bu mo gar song zhes bla zhing 'khyam mo zhes byas nas/_de thos ma thag tu bud med de dogs pa skyes te ma la de nyid jo bo ma yin nam snyam nas/_bdag nyid de'i thad du song ba dang mthong ma thag tu des mi de ngo shes nas des de rang gi khyim du khrid de smras 
[\[142a.4\]]pa/_jo bo bdag ni rlangs pa'i bu mo de lags so zhes byas nas/_de thos ma thag tu mi des dran pa rnyed do/_/de nas bud med des mi de la smras pa/_jo bo bdag ni khyod kyi btsun mo lags/_'di ni khyod kyi sras lags kyis tshur spyon/_bdag cag gi khyim du bzhud do zhes 
[\[142a.5\]]byas nas/_bud med des mi de khrus byed du bcug nas kha spu dag bcos te/_gos bskon nas mthar gyis rang gi khyim du dong ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bud med du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos byin ma 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di skye bo mang pos bstod 
[\[142a.6\]]nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs la/_da ltar yang 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_gcod pa rnam pa gnyis la/_gcod pa dang 
[\[142a.7\]]po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu ni lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de phyir 'ongs 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang /_gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/_/phyir 'ongs nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la 
[\[142b.2\]]sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i 
[\[142b.3\]]sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/_de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la/_skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa 
[\[142b.4\]]nas mi snang bar gyur te/_de rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'greng ba dang /_de na rgya mtsho chen po la byings rim pa gsum yod de/_chu'i byings dang po la ni dpag tshad nyi khri brgyad stong yod de/_de'i nang na ni chu srin nya zhes bya ba rnams gnas te/_de dag gi lus la ni dpag tshad bdun 
[\[142b.5\]]brgya yod de/_gang gi tshe de dag bkres pa na de dag chu'i byings dang po nas gyen du 'thon cing kha gdangs te 'khod nas/_de'i nang na de dag pas ches chung ba'i srog chags gang yin pa de dag chu dang bcas par de rnams kyi kha'i nang du 'bab bo/_/de nas gang gi tshe de rnams kyi lto gang 
[\[142b.6\]]bar gyur pa de'i tshe chu de dag sos btsags nas phyir pho'o/_/lto na srog chags 'khod pa de dag gis ni zas kyi bya ba byed do/_/chu'i byings gnyis pa la ni dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong yod de/_de'i nang na ni chu srin nya mid ces bya ba rnams gnas te/_de dag gi lus la ni dpag tshad 
[\[142b.7\]]stong bzhi brgya yod de/_de rnams gang gi tshe bkres pa na de dag chu'i byings dang po dang gnyis pa'i nang nas gyen du 'thon te zas kyi bya ba byed do/_/chu'i byings gsum pa la ni dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong yod do/_/de'i nang na ni chu srin nya mid mid ces bya ba rnams gnas te/_de dag gi lus 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]la ni dpag tshad nyis stong chig brgya yod de/_gang gi tshe de rnams bkres pa na chu'i byings dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i bar nas 'thon te kha zas kyi bya ba byed do/_/de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen por chu srin nya mid ces bya ba zhig skyes nas/_de bas ches chung ba'i 
[\[143a.2\]]chu srin gzhan rnams de'i drung du lhags te/_de'i lus las dum bu dum bu rgyang grags gcig tsam dang /_rgyang grags gnyis tsam dang /_rgyang grags gsum tsam dang /_dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar du bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed do/_/rgyu des na des sdug 
[\[143a.3\]]bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas skyabs 'dod pa'i phyir thang la byung ste/_de thang la byung ba dang de'i las las skyes pa'i gnod sbyin lnga brgya byung nas/_de dag gis zhag lnga brgya'i 
[\[143a.4\]]bar du sta re lnga brgyas rtsib ma zhe gcig gcod par byed do/_/de nas gang gi tshe de dag gis thabs de lta bus de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcad pa dang /_de na tsha mi bzod pas skad po che phyung ste/_phyir yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gres nas/_'gres pa'i khrag gis rgya mtsho 
[\[143a.5\]]chen po 'khrugs shing 'dres la khrag gi mtsho bzhin du snang ngo /_/de de'i nang du song nas yang srog chags de dag gis bza' bar byed de/_de thang la byung yang rung chu'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/_sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[143a.6\]]chen pos sems can 'di las ci zhig byas na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong zhig gu snyam ste/_sems pa la zhugs nas de rab kyi mtha' las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi bar du snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i tshe rabs kyi mtha' ma rtogs 
[\[143a.7\]]te/_dud 'gro'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/_dud 'gro 'ba' zhig tu skyes shing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnams rnyed pa tsam zhig shes par zad nas/_des bsams pa bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par 'di'i las bdag la lung ston par nus pa gzhan su zhig yod de/_de ni 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]ye shes gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dang ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin no snyam nas/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de 
[\[143b.2\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus bsams pa/_'di ni bdag gis skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs 
[\[143b.3\]]gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar 
[\[143b.4\]]bgyid/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/_slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la 
[\[143b.5\]]rjod par bgyid lags so/_/slar mchis nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros 
[\[143b.6\]]sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/_rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob 
[\[143b.7\]]par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bdag dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis pa las/_btsun pa bdag de na mchis pa na sems can lus dpag tshad nyis stong chig brgya mchis pa de lta bu zhig mthong ste/_de bas 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]ches chung ba'i chu srin gzhan rnams de'i drung du lhags nas/_de'i lus dum bu rgyang grags gcig tsam dang rgyang grags gnyis tsam dang rgyang grags gsum tsam dang dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar du bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid de/_rgyu des na des sdug 
[\[144a.2\]]bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur lags so/_/de na tshas nyam thag nas skyabs 'tshal ba'i slad du thang la byung ste/_de thang la byung ba dang de'i las las skyes pa'i gnod sbyin lnga brgya byung nas/_de dag gis zhag lnga brgya'i
