[\[144a.3\]]bar du sta re lnga brgyas rtsib ma zhe gcig gcod par bgyid do/_/de nas gang gi tshe de dag gis thabs de lta bus de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcad pa dang de na tsha mi bzod pas skad po che phyung ste phyir yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gres nas/_de 'gres pa'i khrag gis rgya mtsho 
[\[144a.4\]]chen po 'khrugs shing 'dres la khrag gi mtsho bzhin du gda'o/_/de de'i nang du mchis nas yang srog chags de dag gis za bar bgyid de/_de skam la mchis kyang rung chab kyi nang na mchis kyang rung ste/_sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong lags na btsun pa sems can des 
[\[144a.5\]]las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro'i nang du skyes la/_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu sems can de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin 
[\[144a.6\]]te/_des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis yang dag par 
[\[144a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_des de nyid las chos thos te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de'i chung ma ni gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig ste/_khyim thab kyis de la smras pa/_bzang mo bdag gis ni 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das las tshangs par spyod pa'i gzhi lnga mnos zin gyis gal te khyod 'di nyid na 'dug na yang /_ngas khyod la zas dang gos sbyin par bya'o/_/'on te skyes pa gzhan 'dod na yang bdag gis khyod de la sbyin par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_jo bo bdag la skyes pa 
[\[144b.2\]]gzhan cang mi 'tshal gyis/_bdag ni jo bo nyid kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes byas so/_/bud med de ni byad gzugs bzang ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos yid smon du bya ba zhig ste/_gnas de nyid na sna la gtogs pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/_ma la bdag bud 
[\[144b.3\]]med de dang phrad par bya ba'i thabs lta ji yod snyam nas/_phyi zhig na des gser dngul mang po khyer te dbang po dag dang chas te dge bsnyen de'i thad du song nas smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo rgyal po'i sku don zhig la ga zhig tu 'gro dgos te rdzas 'di dag bdag gis der bskur 
[\[144b.4\]]mi nus kyi/_bdag de nas phyir ma log gi bar du re zhig khyod la gdams so zhes byas so/_/khyim bdag de ni rang bzhin gyis drang po zhig ste/_des rdzas de dag dbang po'i mdun du blangs so/_/de nas sna la gtogs pa des de'i lag tu rdzas de dag gtad de/_rang gi khyim 
[\[144b.5\]]du song nas thang cig tsam lon pa dang dge bsnyen de'i thad du song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag ngas khyod la rdzas gtams pa de dag phyir byin cig ces byas pa dang /_dge bsnyen des de'i rdzas dpang po med bzhin du phyir byin no/_/de nas des rdzas de dag rang gi khyim du bzhag nas 
[\[144b.6\]]phyir yang dbang po rnams khrid de dge bsnyen de'i thad du song nas smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bos rgyal po'i dkor khyod la gtams pa de dag phyir byin cig ces byas pa dang des smras pa/_de ni bdag gis khyod la phyir byin zin no/_/sna la gtogs pa des smras pa/_ngas khyod las 
[\[144b.7\]]cung zad kyang blangs pa med do zhes byas nas/_sna la gtogs pa des dpang po de rnams la smras pa/_khyed dge bsnyen 'di'i byed stangs la ltos shig_/bdag gis dpang po rnams kyi mdun du 'di la rdzas gtad nas 'dis bdag gcig pu'i lag tu ga la byin zhes smras nas/_
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]des de rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid de shags kyis pham par byas nas rang gi khyim du khrid de 'breng rlon gyis gzhus nas dam rab tu byas nas de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcom nas de de kho na'i rkyen gyis shi'o/_/de nas sna la gtogs pa des mi de bu yang med pas khyim rdzas 
[\[145a.2\]]thams cad kyang bsdus/_chung ma de yang rang gi khyim du khrid nas smras pa/_bzang mo khyod kyi phyir bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas pa yin gyis/_da ni khyim 'dir da ni khyod kyi khyim thab yin no/_/khyod ni nga'i chung ma yin no zhes byas so/_/de nas dge bsnyen gyi chung 
[\[145a.3\]]mas smras pa/_bdag gis 'di'i rus bu'i mchod pa yang ma bgyis par khyod dang lhan cig tu ji ltar 'du bar bgyis/_re zhig bdag gis sngar 'di'i rus bu la mchod pa bgyis la de'i 'og tu gdod jo bo ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas/_de thos ma thag tu 
[\[145a.4\]]sna la gtogs pa des dge bsnyen de'i rus bu dur khrod du khyer te/_rus bu bsregs nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bud med des me 'bar ba de'i nang du mchongs nas de yang de nyid du shi'o/_/de nas sna la gtogs pa de rgyu des sems khongs su chud de bdag gis bya ba ma yin 
[\[145a.5\]]pa 'di lta bu ci dang ci bya bya/_bdag bud med dang phrad pa la yang ma phan la 'di la yang bdag gis mi rigs pa 'di lta bu byas kyis med do snyam mo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe sna la gtogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chu srin de nyid yin te/_des dge bsnyen de 
[\[145a.6\]]'breng rlon gyis gzhus te rtsib ma rnams bcom nas/_de yang de'i rkyen gyis shi bar gyur pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sna la gtogs pa de sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skyes te/_de der lo mang po lo stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas shi 'phos 
[\[145a.7\]]te dus las 'das nas dud 'gro'i nang du skyes te/_dud 'gro'i nang nas shi 'phos shing dud 'gro'i nang 'ba' zhig tu skyes nas sdug bsngal de lta bu sha stag rnyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sems can de 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]sdug bsngal de las nam thar bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[145b.2\]]'gyur te/_de'i ring la sems can 'di'i las de zad de/_mir skyes nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te der 'di'i sdug bsngal mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo 
[\[145b.3\]]mang po de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i 
[\[145b.4\]]bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[145b.5\]]'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya 
[\[145b.6\]]byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas 
[\[145b.7\]]phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol chos la 'bab dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do//_//gcod pa phyi ma ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu ni lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/_yi 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]dgas kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/_phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de 
[\[146a.2\]]dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/_/phyir 'ongs nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi 
[\[146a.3\]]tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/_de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la/_skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad 
[\[146a.4\]]par thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_de rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'greng ba dang des der [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lus che la ro smad ni tha mal par 'dug_/rked pa yan 
[\[146a.5\]]chad ni lus gnyis su 'dug ste/_de yang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar te/_phan tshun du rgyu ba de la de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng ge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa de'i drung du lhags nas/_de'i sha rnams bcad cing 
[\[146a.6\]]bcad cing za bar byed pa dang /_las las skyes pa'i mi dag kyang lhags nas ral gri rnon po dag gis ro stod gcod par byed de/_de'i ro stod gcig bcad na cig shos 'byung bar 'gyur la cig shos bcad na yang gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag 
[\[146a.7\]]pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong la skad po che 'thon cing /_phan tshun du 'bros te las las skyes pa'i mi de dag kyang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba zhig mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/_sems can 'dis las ci 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]zhig byas na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong zhig gu snyam nas/_des bltas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste/_dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas/_des dge slong dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos 
[\[146b.2\]]dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dgun gnas bcas pa rnams la phul/_dgun gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams la phul/_gnyi ga las bcad de kha cig ni bdag nyid kyis spyad/_kha cig ni gzhan dag la phul ba mthong 
[\[146b.3\]]ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/_'di'i las ni bdag gis kyang yang dag par mngon sum du mthong mod kyi 'on kyang skye bo phal po che skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du 
[\[146b.4\]]yod par song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bsams pa 'di ni 
[\[146b.5\]]bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[146b.6\]]maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_lha'i 
[\[146b.7\]]nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/_slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid pa lags so/_/slar mchis nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang 
[\[147a.2\]]ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/_rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du 
[\[147a.3\]]rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lus che ba la ro smad ni tha mal par mchis rked pa yan chad ni lus gnyis su mchis te/_de yang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du 'bar te/_phan tshun du rgyu la de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng ge dang stag dang 
[\[147a.4\]]gzig dang dred la sogs pa de'i drung du lhags nas de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid pa dang las las skyes pa'i mi dag kyang lhags nas/_ral gri rnon po dag gis ro stod gcod par bgyid de/_de'i ro stod gcig bcad na cig shos 'byung bar 'gyur la/_
[\[147a.5\]]cig shos bcad na yang gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong la skad po che 'thon cing phan tshun 'bros te/_las las skyes pa'i mi de dag kyang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba zhig 
[\[147a.6\]]mthong lags na/_btsun pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]des las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu sems can de ni sdig pa byed byed pa 
[\[147a.7\]]yin te/_des sdig pa mang du byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i bstan pa la sems can 'di rab tu byung nas zhal ta byed par gyur te/_des der dge slong dbyar gnas 
[\[147b.2\]]bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dgun gnas pa rnams la phul/_dgun gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams la phul gnyi ga las bcad de kha cig ni bdag nyid kyis spyad/_kha cig ni gzhan dag la phul 
[\[147b.3\]]lo/_/maud gal gyi bu ji snyam du sems de'i tshe zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'di kho na yin te/_des der dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dgun gnas bcas pa rnams la phul/_dgun gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang 
[\[147b.4\]]rnyed pa rnams bcad de dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams la phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni rked pa yan chad lus gnyis su 'dug par gyur te/_las las skyes pa'i mi rnams de'i drung du lhags nas/_de dag gis ral gri rnon pos de'i ro stod gcod par byed de/_de'i 
[\[147b.5\]]ro stod gcig bcad na cig shos 'byung bar 'gyur la/_cig shos bcad na yang gcig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des gnyi ga las bcad de kha cig ni bdag nyid kyis spyad/_kha cig ni gzhan dag la phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng ge dang 
[\[147b.6\]]stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa byung nas/_de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sems can de sdug bsngal de las nam thar bar 'gyur 
[\[147b.7\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i ring la sems can de'i 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]las zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur la/_de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/_der de'i sdug bsngal mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo de dag skyo ba 
[\[148a.2\]]chen po skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag yid skyo bar gyur pa thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas 'khor de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten 
[\[148a.3\]]gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 
[\[148a.4\]]byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha 
[\[148a.5\]]cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol 
[\[148a.6\]]chos la 'bab dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do//_//za ba zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu ni lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal ba rnams su rgyu bar byed/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/_dud 'gro'i 
[\[148a.7\]]nang du rgyu bar byed/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/_phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/_/phyir 'ongs nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams 
[\[148b.2\]]kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/_de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan 
[\[148b.3\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas/_mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_ri byin t+ya'i nags khung du phyin pa dang /_des der [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar la de gal te thang la 'gro na ni de'i las 
[\[148b.4\]]las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng ge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed de/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong la phan tshun du 
[\[148b.5\]]rgyug pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sems pa la zhugs te/_sems can 'dis las ci zhig byas na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas/_des bltas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi 
[\[148b.6\]]gsung rab la rab tu byung ste/_dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas des dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byed pa na/_dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor la ci dga' mgur spyad la gzhan dag la yang byin pa mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[148b.7\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa 'di'i las ni bdag gis kyang yang dag par mngon sum du mthong mod kyi/_'on kyang skye bo phal po che skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam mo/_/ri byin t+ya'i nags khung nas mi snang bar gyur te/_
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]mnyan du yod par song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[149a.2\]]nas kyang des bsams pa/_'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[149a.3\]]tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid lha'i 
[\[149a.4\]]nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/_slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/_/slar mchis nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba 
[\[149a.5\]]dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 
[\[149a.6\]]'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la/_de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_
[\[149a.7\]]ri byin t+ya'i nags khung du mchis pa las/_btsun pa bdag gis der [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lus che la 'bar zhing kun du 'bar te/_kun du rab tu 'bar la me lce gcig tu 'bar zhing tshig pa dang de thang la mchis na/_de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi seng ge dang stag dang gzig 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]dang dred la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gal te chab kyi nang du mchis na ni lcags kyi mche ba can gyi chu srin rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_gal te de nam mkha' la mchis na ni lcags kyi mchu can gyi bya rog rnams dang /_chun lag rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te de dag gis 
[\[149b.2\]]de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid de/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas phan tshun rgyug pa zhig mthong lags na/_btsun pa sems can des las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par 
[\[149b.3\]]smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu sems can de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la 
[\[149b.4\]]skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 
[\[149b.5\]]zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la sems dad de rab tu byung nas/_dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur te des der sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po mang po dag la bskul nas dge 'dun dang mchod rten gyi phyir bslangs te/_des dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor 
[\[149b.6\]]dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor ma thub nas thams cad ci dga' mgur spyad la gzhan dag la yang byin te/_des der dge 'dun las bcad nas bdag nyid kyis kyang ci dga' mgur spyad la gzhan dag la yang byin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[149b.7\]]kyi nang du skyes nas/_der nam mkha' la gnas pa dang chu la gnas pa dang thang la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyis bza' bar gyur to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur pa thugs su chud 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na der kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du 
[\[150a.2\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig 
[\[150a.3\]]gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang kha cig gis ni 
[\[150a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol chos la 'bab dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do//_//dga' byed ces bya 
[\[150a.5\]]ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed ni lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/_phyir 'ongs 
[\[150a.6\]]nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/_/phyir 'ongs nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug 
[\[150a.7\]]bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/_de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 
[\[150b.2\]]'gram du phyin pa dang /_des der [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sgren mor 'dug la rang gi skras yog pa sdong po me reg ma 'dra la dmus long du 'dug pa de'i kha sna nas srin bu mang po byung ba dang des dpag tshad du mar dri mnam pas gang bar byed de/_phan tshun rgyug la de gang dang gang du 'gro ba 
[\[150b.3\]]de dang der khyi sngo bkra can dag gis gtses nas rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/_skad po che 'thon pa phan tshun rgyug pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa/_sems can 
[\[150b.4\]]'dis las ci zhig byas zhig gu snyam ste/_des bltas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_dge slong ma 'thab krol can kha tshas ngan pa zhig tu gyur nas/_des der dge slong ma mang mo zhig la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab 
[\[150b.5\]]ste/_de dag gi rnyed pa'i bar chad byas pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa 'di'i las kyi 'bras bu ni bdag gis kyang mngon sum du mthong mod kyi 'on kyang skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas/_de rgya mtsho'i 
[\[150b.6\]]'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[150b.7\]]kyang des bsams pa 'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis rtag tu dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar 
[\[151a.2\]]bgyid mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/_slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/_/slar mchis nas 
[\[151a.3\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_
[\[151a.4\]]lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/_rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa 
[\[151a.5\]]bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis na/_btsun pa bdag gis der [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sgren mor mchis la rang gi skras yog pa sdong po me reg ma 'dra la dmus long du mchis pa de'i kha sna nas srin 
[\[151a.6\]]bu mang po byung ba dang des dpag tshad du mar dri mnam pas gang bar bgyid de phan tshun rgyug la de gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der khyi sngo bkra dag gis gtses nas/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste skad po che 
[\[151a.7\]]'thon la phan tshun rgyug pa zhig mthong lags na/_btsun pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo des las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' byed [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]yin te des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/_/dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[151b.2\]]pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che 
[\[151b.3\]]ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu 
[\[151b.4\]]lon pa dang /_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_
[\[151b.5\]]des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_des pha ma la gsol te/_rab tu byung nas des sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba/_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos 
[\[151b.6\]]dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur nas/_des sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po rnams la bskul te/_gtsug lag khang mchod rten dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed du bcug nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la phul te/_dge slong 
[\[151b.7\]]ma rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las/_de byad gzugs dang lang tsho dang cho rigs kyi rgyags pas dregs nas tshul khrims srung ma nus te/_des dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dkor ci dga' mgur spyad nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshor te/_de dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang nas bskrad nas de khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes te/_khro ba'i dbang du gyur nas slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma mang mo zhig la tshig 
[\[152a.2\]]rtsub cing brlang ba'i zug rngu dag gis spyos te/_khyim khyim du yang 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa dang sdig pa'i chos can yin no zhes de dag gi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod la/_de dag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yod pa'i bar chad kyang byas sdang mig gis kyang bltas 
[\[152a.3\]]so/_/dga' byed de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de yin te/_des der slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i bar chad byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes so/_/
[\[152a.4\]]des dge slong ma de rnams la tshig rtsub cing brlang ba'i zug rngus spyos pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni kha sna nas srin bu mang po byung bar gyur to/_/des khyim khyim du de dag gi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni dpag tshad du mar dri mnam 
[\[152a.5\]]pas gang bar gyur to/_/des dge slong ma rnams la sdang mig gis bltas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni dmus long du gyur to/_/des dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor ci dga' mgur spyad pa'i las 
[\[152a.6\]]de'i rnam par smin pas ni khyi sngo bkra dag gis bza' bar gyur te des ni las de lta bu byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na der kha 
[\[152a.7\]]cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/
[\[152b.2\]]kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med 
[\[152b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol chos la 'bab dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_snag bu zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[152b.4\]]gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu ni lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar byed dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/_phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal 
[\[152b.5\]]ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/_/phyir 'ongs nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang 
[\[152b.6\]]dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod 
[\[152b.7\]]par byed de/_de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]pa dang des der sha'i snag bu 'dra ba la gtsang khang phyur po tsam zhig 'dug ste/_de sa la 'dug na ni de la thog thag nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can sha stag za zhing 'dug la srog chags de dag za ches pas de gal te nam mkha' la 'phags na yang de'i lus 
[\[153a.2\]]thams cad mer 'bar te/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/_sems can 'dis las ci zhig byas na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 
[\[153a.3\]]sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar gyur zhig gu snyam ste/_des bltas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur te/_des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs 
[\[153a.4\]]bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig pus spyad pa dang /_kha cig ni nye du rnams la yang byin/_kha cig ni khros nas mes bsregs pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa des na sdug bsngal de lta bu dag rnyed par gyur par mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[153a.5\]]chen pos bsams pa 'di'i las ni bdag gis kyang yang dag par mngon sum du mthong mod kyi 'on kyang skye bo phal po che skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang de'i tshe 
[\[153a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/_'di ni bdag gis skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba 
[\[153a.7\]]der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/_slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la 
[\[153b.2\]]sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/_/slar mchis nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba 
[\[153b.3\]]las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 
[\[153b.4\]]'gyur la/_de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis na/_btsun pa bdag gis der sems can sha'i snag bu 
[\[153b.5\]]'dra ba la gtsang khang phyur po tsam zhig mchis te de sa la mchis na ni/_de la thog thag nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can sha stag 'tshal zhing mchis la/_srog chags de dag 'tshal ches pas de gal te nam mkha' la 'phags na yang /_de'i lus thams cad 
[\[153b.6\]]zhugs su 'bar te/_rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags na/_btsun pa sems can des las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/_
[\[153b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu sems can de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sems can de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]rab tu byung ste dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas/_des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig pus spyad la/_kha cig ni bsags te bzhag pa las de phyi zhig 
[\[154a.2\]]na nad kyis thebs nas des nor de dag nye du rnams la sbyin par byas pa dang /_de dge slong dag gis mthong nas bkag pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te 'di dag gis bkag pa lta na/_bdag gis ci nas de dag la yang mi phan la bdag la yang mi phan par bya'o snyam 
[\[154a.3\]]mo/_/de nas de khros pas nor de dag thams cad mes bsregs so/_/de'i 'og tu de de nas shi 'phos te shi nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes te/_des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig pus 
[\[154a.4\]]spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_lus sha'i snag bu 'dra la gtsang khang phyur po tsam du gyur nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can dag gis bza' bar gyur to/_/des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 
[\[154a.5\]]dkor mes bsregs pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gal te steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags na yang lus mer 'bar bar 'gyur te/_sems can des las de lta bu byas pas na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams su myong ngo /_/de nas de thos ma thag 
[\[154a.6\]]tu skye bo phal po che de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur pa thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te des na der kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 
[\[154a.7\]]'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba la snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni 
[\[154b.2\]]brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag 
[\[154b.3\]]gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol chos la 'bab dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do//_//bur 'du shes zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa zhig 
[\[154b.4\]]'dug pa las/_de don zhig la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang bram ze des bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bram ze de bcom ldan 'das la bu'i 'du shes skyes te/_de bu'i 'du shes kyis 
[\[154b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'jus so/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'jus pa mthong nas bkag go/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[154b.6\]]slong dag bram ze 'di ni bu la byams pa'i phyir/_nga'i mgul nas 'jus pa yin gyis ma dgag shig_/gal te bram ze 'di nga'i mgul nas 'jur ma bcug na kha nas khrag dron po byung ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'khyud 
[\[154b.7\]]zin nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin dang shes pa thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[155a.2\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs 
[\[155a.3\]]par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis/_dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas/_tshig de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon 
[\[155a.4\]]la tsam du gyur/_spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/_lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_/de ni skra bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/_/
[\[155a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/_/mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas/_des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de 
[\[155a.6\]]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang 
[\[155a.7\]]so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]la gsol pa/_btsun pa gzigs lags/_mi stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das mthong yang sus kyang bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das la bu dang phrad do zhes mchi zhing brgyugs te mgul nas 'ju ba ma bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[155b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze 'di ni nga 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar phar gyur pas na/_sngon gyi bag chags de kho nas 'di nga la bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis bu dang phrad do zhes zer zhing nga'i mgul nas 'jus pa yin no/_/dge slong dag gis gsol pa/_
[\[155b.3\]]btsun pa gal te bram ze 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar yab tu gyur pa lags na/_ci'i slad du da ltar yang yab tu ma gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa la sred pa 
[\[155b.4\]]dang nges par 'byung ba la sred pa yin na/_tshe rabs thams cad du 'dis nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byas nas der ngas smon lam btab pa/_phyin cad 'di nga'i phar ma gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_gzhan yang zas gtsang gis kyang kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yab tu gyur 
[\[155b.5\]]cig ces smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag gis gsol pa/_btsun pa zas gtsang gis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/_yang 
[\[155b.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de tshong dpon zhig gis bshos gsol nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar 
[\[155b.7\]]shog cig_/skyes bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang bdag gi bur gyur nas bdag gis de kho na mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces/_des der smon lam btab bo zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]btsun pa bram ze 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas dbul por yang gyur la rgas nas gdong rab tu byung lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa la sred pa dang nges 
[\[156a.2\]]par 'byung ba la sred pa yin na/_'dis dus thams cad du nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad dang rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byas te/_'dis dus thams cad du nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad dang rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di dbul por gyur la rgas 
[\[156a.3\]]nas gdod rab tu byung ngo /_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/_bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[156a.4\]]sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[156a.5\]]'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom 
[\[156a.6\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs 
[\[156a.7\]]par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa 
[\[156b.2\]]mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//zhing pa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi 
[\[156b.3\]]mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze dbul po zhing las kyis 'tsho ba zhig gnas te/_bram ze de'i zhing rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug la/_bram ze de yang sgrub phod pa zhig ste de nang par sngar thong gshol thogs nas 
[\[156b.4\]]zhing gi steng du song ngo /_/de'i chung ma bram ze mo de yang bram ze de'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams khyer te/_zhing gi steng du song nas de gnyi ga zan zos te bram ze mo ni khyim du song ngo /_/bram ze de ni zhing de nyid na zhing las byed cing 'dug pa las/_de phyem red khyim du 'gro ba 
[\[156b.5\]]na bram ze dang bram ze mo de gnyis kyis/_bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams mnyan du yod pa nas yang dang yang du phyi nang du gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de gnyis bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams la shin tu dga' ba skyes te/_de gnyis 
[\[156b.6\]]dga' bar gyur nas phan tshun gcig la gcig smras pa bdag cag gnyis da ltar sdug bsngal bar gyur pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni sngon bsod nams ma byas pa'i phyir te/_gal te da ltar yang bdag cag gnyis kyis dge ba'i las ci yang ma byas na ni/_bdag cag gnyis 
[\[156b.7\]]'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang /_dbul po 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas bram zes smras pa/_bzang mo bdag cag gnyis nor gang gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed par 'gyur ba'i nor de lta bu bdag cag gnyis la ci yang yod dam/_chung mas smras pa/_
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]jo bo de skad ma gsung shig dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni rkang gnyis kyi nang na bsod nams kyi zhing yin te/_'di la ni bkur sti chung ngu byas pa tsam gyis kyang 'bras bu shin tu che bar 'gyur gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di la bdag cag gnyis kyis bshos dbul 
[\[157a.2\]]bar bya'o/_/'di la phul na bdag cag gnyis dbul ba'i rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/bram zes smras pa khyod ci dga' ba bzhin du byas/_song la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag bshams te/_nang par phyir byung nas gang gi tshe dge sbyong gau ta ma 
[\[157a.3\]]mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs pa de'i tshe/_bdag cag gnyis kyis zhing gi steng na 'dug bzhin du bshos dbul lo/_/bram ze mos smras pa/_jo bo ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas/_bram ze mo de rang gi khyim du song ste bza' ba dang 
[\[157a.4\]]bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po bshams te/_nang par sngar langs nas zhing gi steng du song ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kha bltas nas/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa la sdod cing 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i 
[\[157a.5\]]lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub 
[\[157a.6\]]kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin 
[\[157a.7\]]dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol/_
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor 
[\[157b.2\]]bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis 
[\[157b.3\]]brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[157b.4\]]dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bram ze de dang bram ze'i chung ma gnyis gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam dgongs nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod pa logs su chas te 
[\[157b.5\]]gshegs pa dang /_bram ze dang bram ze mo de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[157b.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das zhing 'di nyid du bdag cag gnyis kyis phul ba'i bshos zhal cig gsol du ci gnang zhes byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bza' bran gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das 
[\[157b.7\]]cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te/_bram ze de dang bram ze mo de gnyis kyis 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam 
[\[158a.2\]]grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/_gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis kyi rkyen du 'tsham pa'i chos bstan 
[\[158a.3\]]nas gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas ring po ma lon par bram ze de dang bram ze mo de gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis kyi dbul ba'i rgyun chad par gyur cig_/bdag cag gnyis kyi zhing 'di las nas kyi 
[\[158a.4\]]myu gu skyes pa thams cad kyang gser gyi myu gur snang bar gyur la/_de dag kyang de kho na bzhin du gyur cig_/gzhan du ma gyur cig ces byas nas/_bram ze dang bram ze mo de gnyis kyis/_de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la zhing de las skyes pa'i nas kyi myu gu thams cad 
[\[158a.5\]]gser du mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bram ze mo des smras pa/_jo bo bdag cag gnyis kyi smon lam ni grub na/_rgyal po la ma gsol bar bdag cag gnyis kyis longs spyad par mi nus so zhes byas so/_/de nas bram ze des de thos ma thag tu rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[158a.6\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha bdag cag gi nas zhing las gser gyi myu gu skyes kyis lhas sku skal bzhes pa'i rigs so zhes byas nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_ma la bram ze 'di ma smyos sam snyam pa dang /_rgyal pos 
[\[158a.7\]]bltas na blo gsal zhing dbang po zhi bar 'dug par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yang bsams pa/_ma la de ltar gyur kyang srid dam snyam nas des rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rnams btang ste/_de dag der dong na gser gyi myu gu ma mthong nas/_de dag phyir log ste rgyal 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]po la gsol pa/_lha bram ze de ni sems la dbang ma mchis te de na gser gyi myu gu ga la mchis zhes byas so/_/de nas bram ze des yang lan cig song nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol pa/_lha bdag gis ni gser gyi myu gu de dag nges par mthong gis lha'i 
[\[158b.2\]]sku skal bzhes par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_yang na ni bram ze 'di sngon bsod nams byas pa zhig yin no/_/yang na ni 'dis da ltar zhing bzang po zhig la sa bon btab bo snyam nas/_rgyal po de nyid bram ze de'i zhing gi steng du song nas 
[\[158b.3\]]des kyang de na yod pa'i gser gyi myu gu ma mthong nas/_de nas bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze gal te khyod kyis gser gyi myu gu rnams mthong na/_khyod kyis ji tsam yongs su btang ba nga la byin cig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze des zhing thog gi 
[\[158b.4\]]skal ba bcad de 'di ni lha'i bgyi'o/_/'di ni bdag gi bgyi'o zhes byas pa dang de skad brjod pa'i mod la rgyal po des kyang gser gyi myu gu mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu rgyal po de ya mtshan du gyur te/_de ya mtshan du gyur nas bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyis 
[\[158b.5\]]las ci zhig byas na des khyod kyi dpal 'di lta bu thob par gyur/_bram zes gsol pa/_lha bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma la bshos gsol to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyis ni zhing bzang po la sa bon btab kyis song la 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med par 
[\[158b.6\]]spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces smras nas rgyal po song ngo /_/de nas bram ze des bsams pa/_bdag gis dpal 'di lta bu thob pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das las brten te thob pa yin gyis/_bdag 
[\[158b.7\]]gis de kho na'i bka' drin bsab dgos so snyam nas/_des khyim gyi 'byor pa rgya chen po bshams nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs te/_yo byad thams cad sbyar nas mjug tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]'dun bshos gsol te/_re re la ras zung re phul nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos 
[\[159a.2\]]bstan te/_des na bram ze 'khor dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas bram ze des bsams pa bdag khyim na 'dug 
[\[159a.3\]]pa btang la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad par bya'o snyam nas/_sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[159a.4\]]kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_
[\[159a.5\]]nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab 
[\[159a.6\]]kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[159a.7\]]pas zhing las skyes pa'i nas kyi myu gu rnams gser gyi myu gur mthong la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yang rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'das pa'i las kyi shas kyang yod la/_da ltar gyi las kyi shas kyang yod de/_'das pa'i las gang zhe na/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye 
[\[159b.2\]]dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig 
[\[159b.3\]]rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la bram ze 'di rab tu byung nas/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang 
[\[159b.4\]]yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i 
[\[159b.5\]]bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di kho na yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu 
[\[159b.6\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/
[\[159b.7\]]de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa 'di ni sngon gyi las yin no/_/da ltar gyi las gang zhe na/_'dis 
[\[160a.2\]]nga la zhal zas phul nas smon lam btab ste/_'phral kho nar bdag gi dbul ba'i rgyun chad par gyur cig_/bdag gi nas kyi myu gu 'di rnams kyang gser gyi myu gur snang bar gyur la de dag kyang de kho na bzhin du gyur cig_/gzhan du ma gyur cig ces byas pa 'di ni da ltar gyi 
[\[160a.3\]]las yin no//_//shi ba zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na bram ze zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig 
[\[160a.4\]]na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings 
[\[160a.5\]]so/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang oM zhes bya ba dang b+ho zhes bya ba dang gtsang sbra dang cho ga dang thal ba blang ba dang ril ba thogs pa dang nges brjod kyi rig byed dang mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang snyan tshig gi rig byed dang srid srung gi rig byed 
[\[160a.6\]]dang mchod sbyin bya ba dang mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang sbyin pa dang blang ba dang kha ton bya ba dang kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/bram ze de yang phyi zhig na sangs rgyas la dad pa 
[\[160a.7\]]dang chos dang dge 'dun la dad par gyur te/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas gshegs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze de nad kyis thebs nas/_de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gror byas kyang sos par byed ma nus nas shi'o/_/de shi 
[\[160b.2\]]'phos te dus las 'das nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes so/_/de nas bu des kyang pha'i rus bu de bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las thag mi ring ba zhig tu phyung ste/_bsregs nas de dur khrod de nyid na 'dug cing mya ngan byed la sdug bsngal zhing smre sngags 'don te brang rdung zhing 
[\[160b.3\]]pha cig pha cig ces cho nges 'debs te phan tshun 'khyam zhing 'dug go/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa na chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gi skyes snyam mo/_/de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa 
[\[160b.4\]]gsum pa'i lhar skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bkur sti byas te skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs par des mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas gzod 
[\[160b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur byed du 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa 
[\[160b.6\]]lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams 
[\[160b.7\]]kyis thu ba bkang ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i 
[\[161a.2\]]bu des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_
[\[161a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas mi snang bar gyur te/_des bltas na bu de dur khrod na 'dug cing shin tu mya ngan byed la sdug bsngal zhing smre sngags 'don te/_brang rdung zhing pha cig pha cig ces cho nge 'don te/_phan tshun du 'khyam zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bu'i thad du song ste 
[\[161a.4\]]smras pa/_bu nga ni mya ngan byar med par gyur gyis nga'i phyir ha cang mya ngan ma byed cig_/bus smras pa/_khyod su zhig_/lha'i bus smras pa/_nga ni khyod kyi pha yin no/_/bus smras pa/_khyod gang du skyes/_lha'i bus smras pa/_lha'i nang du skyes so/_/bus smras pa/_khyod kyis 
[\[161a.5\]]las ci zhig byas/_lha'i bus smras pa/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bkur sti byas te/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs so/_/bu nga'i mya ngan ma byed par khyod bdag gi mya ngan byos la/_bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song shig dang /_de 
[\[161a.6\]]las khyod kyi legs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/_lha'i bu de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du song ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u des kyang pha'i ngag mnyan nas pha'i mya ngan spangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la yang dga' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[161a.7\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[161b.2\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 
[\[161b.3\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas 
[\[161b.4\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs 
[\[161b.5\]]bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis 
[\[161b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa gzigs lags/_bram ze'i khye'u ma dad pa 'di phas dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bzhag ste/_'di rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom 
[\[161b.7\]]pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang bram ze'i khye'u 'di ma dad pa las phas ji ltar dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bzhag pa dang 'di rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur 
[\[162a.2\]]ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na bram ze zhig gnas pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas te/_gang gi tshe cher skyes 
[\[162a.3\]]pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang oM zhes bya ba dang b+ho zhes bya ba dang gtsang sbra dang cho ga dang thal ba blang ba dang ril ba thogs pa dang nges brjod kyi rig byed dang mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang snyan tshig gi rig byed dang srid srung gi rig byed dang mchod sbyin bya ba dang mchod sbyin byed 
[\[162a.4\]]du gzhug pa dang sbyin pa dang blang ba dang kha ton bya ba dang kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' 
[\[162a.5\]]bar gyur/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na de shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas lha'i nang du skyes so/_/bram ze'i khye'u de ni shin tu mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don te/_brang rdung zhing pha 
[\[162a.6\]]cig pha cig ces cho nge 'don te phan tshun 'khyam zhing 'dug go/_/de nas de'i phas de tshor nas de'i thad du song ste smras pa/_bu cig nga ni mya ngan byar med par gyur gyis mya ngan ma byed cig_/bus smras pa/_khyod su zhig_/des smras pa/_nga ni khyod kyi pha yin no/_/bus smras pa/_khyod 
[\[162a.7\]]gang du skyes/_des smras pa/_lha'i nang du skyes so/_/bus smras pa/_khyod kyis las ci zhig byas/_des smras pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byas te/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs so/_/da khyod kyis nga'i mya ngan ma byed 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]par khyod bdag gi mya ngan byos la/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyabs su song shig dang /_de las khyod kyi legs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes byas nas lha'i bu de mi snang bar gyur to/_/bram ze'i khye'u des kyang pha'i ngag mnyan te/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[162b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang bdag gis yon tan gyi tshogs ci 
[\[162b.3\]]yang ma thob kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[162b.4\]]thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u'i phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bu 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis 
[\[162b.5\]]pha las brten te dad pa rnyed nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/da ltar yang 'dis pha de nyid las brten nas dad pa rnyed de/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam 
[\[162b.6\]]po bcu bzhi pa/_ko ka li ka zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ko ka li ka sab kang ri la 'jigs byed ma'i tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na gnas te/_sab kang ri la gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de la bkur sti byas bla mar 
[\[162b.7\]]byas ri mor byas mchod par byas te/_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur nas/_des der dge slong 'ongs so cog la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ljongs 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]rgyu zhing dong ba las sab kang ri la phyin te/_'jigs byed ma'i tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na gnas so/_/de nas dge slong ko ka li kas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing song song ba las sab kang ri la phyin te/_'jigs byed ma'i tshal ri 
[\[163a.2\]]dgas kyi nags na 'dug go zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[163a.3\]]nas dge slong ko ka li kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis btsun pa khyed gnyis la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis/_khyed gnyis kyis thugs khral chung ngur bzhugs shig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[163a.4\]]sab kang ri 'di ni shin tu 'jigs pa yin te 'dir gnas mi phod kyis/_bdag cag gnyis ni dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu song ste gnas par bya'o/_/ko ka li kas smras pa/_der bzhud na yang bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis/_khyed gnyis 
[\[163a.5\]]kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_gal te khyod shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis dgon pa'i gnas ga ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes sab kang ri 'dir su la yang mi zer na ni bdag cag gnyis 'dug par bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[163a.6\]]khyod kyis 'ga' zhig la byas na ni bdag cag gnyis kyis khyod la ma sbran par gnas de nas gud du 'gro'o/_/ko ka li kas smras pa/_su la yang mi mchis gnang bar mdzod cig_/de nas de gnyis de la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/_/de gnyis kyis de la khas blangs nas dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[163a.7\]]der song ste/_'khod nas ko ka li kas de gnyis la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe sab kang ri de nyid na khyim bdag cig gnas te/_khyim bdag de dge slong ko ka li ka la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_de de la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]bkur byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_dge slong ko ka li ka de nyid las brten nas bcom ldan 
[\[163b.2\]]'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag khyim na gnas pa btang la bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo snyam ste/_tshe dang ldan pa ko ka li ka ga la ba der song nas smras pa/_
[\[163b.3\]]btsun pa ko ka li ka bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/ko ka li kas smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod 
[\[163b.4\]]pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/_des smras pa ma gnang ngo /_/ko ka li kas smras pa/_bu sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams ni/_pha ma gnyis kyis ma gnang bar rab tu 'byin par yang mi mdzad/_bsnyen par rdzogs par yang mi mdzad kyis/_song la pha 
[\[163b.5\]]ma gnyis la gsol cig dang de'i 'og tu khyod kyi sla bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'phags pa ji ltar dgyes pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/_de pha ma'i thad du song ste smras pa/_yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol 
[\[163b.6\]]pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag ni khyod shi ste 'bral bar 'gyur yang srid kyi/_khyod gson bzhin du gnang bar ni mi byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa ko ka li ka ljongs dag tu don bsgrub pa zhig byung nas/_des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[163b.7\]]ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis la gtad de/_btsun pa gnyis bdag ni ljongs dag tu bgyi ba cung zad cig la mchis/_dge slong 'di dag btsun pa gnyis kyis lung dbog pa dang yid la bgyid pa'i lung dang zhu ba'i gnas stsal du gsol zhes byas nas/_des de gnyis la 'khor 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]rnams gtad de ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de song nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis bsams pa/_dge slong 'di dag la nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi'i dge ba cung zad yod dam med cig gu snyam ste/_de gnyis kyis bltas nas yod par 
[\[164a.2\]]gyur te/_bdag cag gnyis kho na la rag las par mthong nas/_dge slong de dag la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis bskul/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis bskul nas/_de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad 
[\[164a.3\]]pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas khyim bdag gi bu des kyang pha ma la gsol te/_gtsug lag khang du song nas de dge slong de dag gi thad du song ste smras pa/_btsun pa ko ka li ka gar mchis/_
[\[164a.4\]]de dag gis smras pa/_de ci la dgos/_khye'us smras pa/_bdag de las rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/dge slong de dag gis de la smras pa/_khyod la ko ka li ka ci dgos/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu 'di gnyis ni mchog gi zung /_zung bzang po yin gyis de gnyis
