[\[164a.5\]]las rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de dga' ches nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i 
[\[164a.6\]]mdun du 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na khye'u de stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes 
[\[164a.7\]]bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/_btsun pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bu khyod 
[\[164b.2\]]la pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/_des smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni gnang lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khye'u de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[164b.3\]]cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas pha ma gnyis bden pa rnams la bkod do/_/sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la yang btsud do/_/de nas phyi zhig na lha rnams kyis sab kang ri la sgra bsgrags te/_kye khyed kyi grong 'dab na dge slong 
[\[164b.4\]]shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis 'khod bzhin du khyod bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir de gnyis kyi thad du ma dong na/_khyed kyis ci rnyed ci zhig ni legs par rnyed ces byas so/_/de nas sab kang ri la gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams kyi sgra thos nas sde tshan nas sde tshan dang /_pha tshan nas pha tshan 
[\[164b.5\]]dang /_dga' sde nas dga' sder 'dus shing tshogs te sab kang ri las byung nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ga la ba der song ste lhags nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis 
[\[164b.6\]]bsams pa/_bdag cag gnyis kyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti byung gis gcad dgos so/_/bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang ko ka li ka la dam bcas te/_gal te khyod kyis bdag cag gnyis dgon pa 'di na gnas so zhes su la yang ma bsnyad na ni bdag cag gnyis dgon pa'i gnas 'dir 
[\[164b.7\]]gnas par bya'o/_/de ste bdag cag gnyis kyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti zhig byung bar gyur na ni/_bdag cag gnyis kyis khyod la yang ma sbran par dgon pa'i gnas 'di nas 'gro'o zhes byas zin no snyam nas dgon pa'i gnas de nas dong ngo /_/ko ka li ka'i slob ma dang /_nye gnas de dag 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]gis smras pa/_bdag cag kyang slob dpon gnyis dang thabs cig tu mchi'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyed ni rgyal po'i khab tu deng shig kho bo cag gnyis ni logs shig nas 'dul bar bya ba'i don byed cing 'gro dgos la/_thams cad der dong na zas kyis kyang brel 
[\[165a.2\]]bar gyur na mi rung ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong de dag lam gud nas rgyal po'i khab tu dong ste 'khod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni lam gzhan zhig tu zhugs te de gnyis chas pa na char pa khad kyis dal nas dal nas bab bo/_/
[\[165a.3\]]ri 'gab de na ri'i phug cig yod de/_der ma he rdzi mo zhig sngar nang du song ba las de mi gnyis kyis nyal po byas nas/_de gnyis de nas phyir song ba'i 'og tu dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis der 'ongs nas phug sgo na 'khod do/_/de nas de dag dgon pa'i gnas de nas dong 
[\[165a.4\]]ba'i 'og tu/_dge slong ko ka li ka yang rang gi gtsug lag khang der 'ongs te/_de der 'ongs na slob ma dang nye gnas rnams mi snang nas des dge slong gzhan dag la dris pa/_bdag gi slob ma dang nye gnas de dag gar dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi 
[\[165a.5\]]bu gnyis dang lhan cig tu dong ngo /_/de nas de thos ma thag tu/_dge slong ko ka li ka shas cher khros te/_de gnyis kyis bdag la ma bzlugs par song ba'i steng du bdag gi 'khor rnams kyang kha drangs te song ngo zhes zer ro/_/de de na 'dug pa na khyim bdag de yang thad du 'ongs nas ko ka li kas 
[\[165a.6\]]khyim bdag de la dris pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyi bu de gar song /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_rab tu byung ngo /_/su'i thad du rab tu byung /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_shA ri'i bu'i thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de lhag par yang de gnyis la rab tu khros so/_/gzhan yang sab 
[\[165a.7\]]kang ri la gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyis snying na ba'i tshig gis zher btab ste/_btsun pa ko ka li ka dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis 'dir byon pa lta zhig na khyod kyis bdag cag la ma sbran to zhes byas so/_/de nas de yul yul por gyur nas des bsams pa/_de gnyis kyis bdag 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gi 'khor khrid de song mod kyi/_bdag gis kyang rang gi 'khor yal bar gtang du mi rung gis/_bdag song la rang gi 'khor rnams bkug ste phyir 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas/_sham thabs bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas/_dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis gar dong ba'i lam de 
[\[165b.2\]]nyid du chas nas de mthar gyis phug de kho na'i sgor phyin te/_dge slong ko ka li kas dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis phug sgo de nyid na 'khod pa mthong nas de de gnyis kyi thad du song ste/_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas de 
[\[165b.3\]]rnams kyi skad ma he rdzi mo des thos nas phug de nas phyir byung ste song ngo /_/de nas de la ko ka li ka khu phrig zos nas/_tshe dang ldan pa de yang mtshan brtags la mkhas pa zhig ste/_des bltas na ma he rdzi mo de la mi gnyis kyis nyal po byas par rig go/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu de la 'di 
[\[165b.4\]]lta bu'i sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa skyes te/_'di gnyis ni sdig pa la dga' ba sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin no zhes tshig rtsub cing brlang bas zhe bcad nas/_rgyal po'i khab tu song ste 'od ma'i tshal du zhugs nas lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste/_dge slong mthong ngo cog la yang dag pa ma 
[\[165b.5\]]yin pa'i phyar ka btang ste/_de gnyis ni sdig pa la dga' ba sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas skabs de dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ko ka li ka la bka' stsal pa/_ko ka li ka ko ka 
[\[165b.6\]]li ka khyod dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis shin tu des pa bye brag phyed pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la sems dga' bar gyis shig_/khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/_des gsol pa/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la dad cing glo ba ches 
[\[165b.7\]]kyis kyang dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni sdig pa la dga' ba sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa lags so/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ko ka li ka la bka' stsal pa/_ko ka li ka_/ko ka li ka khyod dge slong shA ri'i bu dang 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]maud gal gyi bu gnyis shin tu des pa bye brag phyed pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la sems dga' bar gyis shig_/khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/_des gsol pa/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la dad cing glo ba ches 
[\[166a.2\]]kyis kyang dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni sdig pa la dga' ba sdig pa'i dbang du gyur pa lags so/_/de nas dge slong ko ka li kas lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar ma byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas song 
[\[166a.3\]]ma thag tu dge slong ko ka li ka de'i lus thams cad 'bras yungs 'bru tsam sha stag gis gang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i 'og tu 'bras rgya sran tsam dang rgya shug gi 'bru tsam dang skyu ru ra tsam dang bil ba'i 'bras bu tsam dang ka pid ta'i 'bras bu tsam sha stag gis gang bar gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[166a.4\]]dge slong ko ka li ka'i kha nas khrag dron po skyug cing bdag ni tshig go bdag ni tshig go zhes zer te lus thams cad nas rnag khrag 'dzag cing 'bab bzhin du lus dang bral te/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba chen po pad ma ltar gas pa chen por 
[\[166a.5\]]skyes so/_/de der skyes nas cher gyur te lus dpag tshad mang po dang ldan pas khyab par 'dug go/_/de nas de'i las las skyes pa'i mi dag gis kha nas lce phyung ste/_lcags kyis gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar ba'i steng du lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing rab 
[\[166a.6\]]tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag gis brgyangs nas de'i lce de la rmon pa dor lnga brgya byung ste/_thams cad kyang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag go/_/las las skyes pa'i rmon glang de dag gi rmig pa yang spu 
[\[166a.7\]]gri'i so 'dra ste/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag ste/_de dag gis phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i phyogs de dang der kun tu gcod cing kun tu gtub la kun du dmyal bar byed do/_/de'i kho ra khor yug nas kyang lcags 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]kyi mche ba can gyi khyi dang seng ge dang stag dang gzig dang dom dang dred la sogs pa dag lhags nas/_lus las sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed do/_/steng gi nam mkha' las kyang lcags kyi mchu can gyi bya rgod dang bya rog dang chun lag rnams lhags nas sha 
[\[166b.2\]]rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed de/_gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ste skad ngan chen po 'don to/_/de nas lha kha dog 'phags pa gsum nam sros pa na/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom 
[\[166b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa lha sbyin gyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i dge slong ko ka li ka ni gum lags so/_/lha gcig 
[\[166b.4\]]gis gsol pa/_btsun pa dge slong des ni shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po pad ma ltar gas pa chen por skyes lags so/_/lha gcig gis ni de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyes bu gcig cig skyes pa na/_/
[\[166b.5\]]kha nas sta re byung bar gyur/_/nyes par smra ba'i tshig brjod pa/_/des ni bdag nyid gcod par byed/_/gang zhig dmad 'os skye bo bsngags pa dang /_/bsngags par 'os pa'i skye bo dmod byed pa/_/des ni kha nas rtsod pa de bsags te/_/rtsod pa des na bde ba myong mi 'gyur/_/'di 
[\[166b.6\]]na cho los bdag skugs pham pa'i tshe/_/rtsod pa gang yin de ni chung ba yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa la sems sdang ba yi/_/rtsod pa gang yin de ni shin tu che/_/ngag dang yid kyis sdig byas 'phags la dmad/_/des na lo grangs dung phyur phrag 'bum dang /_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[166b.7\]]sum cu rtsa lnga'i bar/_/sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/lha gsum gyis de skad ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo de 'das nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdang sum nam sros na lha kha dog 'phags pa gsum nga ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/_nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha gcig 
[\[167a.2\]]gis nga la gsol pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin gyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i dge slong ko ka li ka ni gum lags so/_/lha gcig gis gsol pa/_btsun pa dge slong des ni shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po pad ma ltar 
[\[167a.3\]]gas pa chen por skyes lags so/_/lha gcig gis ni de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyes bu gcig cig skyes pa na/_/kha nas sta re byung bar gyur/_/nyes par smra ba'i tshig brjod pa/_/des ni bdag nyid gcod par byed/_/gang zhig dmad 'os skye bo bsngags pa dang /_/
[\[167a.4\]]bsngags par 'os pa'i skye bo dmod byed pa/_/des ni kha nas rtsod pa de bsags te/_/rtsod pa des na bde ba myong mi 'gyur/_/'di na cho los bdag skugs pham pa'i tshe/_/rtsod pa gang yin de ni chung ba yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa la sems sdang ba yi/_/rtsod pa gang yin de ni 
[\[167a.5\]]shin tu che/_/ngag dang yid kyis sdig byas 'phags la dmad/_/des na lo grangs dung phyur phrag 'bum dang /_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa lnga'i bar/_/sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/zhes smras so/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang khyed kyis sems can dmyal ba 
[\[167a.6\]]chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad nyan par 'dod dam/_dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i dus ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lags so/_/bde 
[\[167a.7\]]bar gshegs pa dus ni 'di lags so zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du/_dge slong rnams kyis mnyan nas/_dge slong dag 'o na legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag dper na/_yul ko 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]sa la'i til gyi bang ba/_til khal bcu tshad nyi shu shong ba til gyis bkang ste/_byur bur sbyur ba de las mi la la zhig gis lo brgya brgya lon zhing til 'bru gcig gud du bor na/_dge slong dag yul ko sa la'i til gyi bang ba til khal bcu tshad nyi shu pa de ni/_thabs 
[\[167b.2\]]de lta bus ches myur du yongs su zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/_sems can dmyal ba chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni zad par 'gyur ro zhes nga mi zer ro/_/chu bur can nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni chu bur rdol gcig gi tshad do/_/chu bur rdol 
[\[167b.3\]]nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni so thams thams gcig gi tshad do/_/so thams thams nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni kyi hud zer gcig gi tshad do/_/kyi hud zer nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni a chu zer gcig gi tshad do/_/a chu zer nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa de ni ud pa la ltar gas pa gcig 
[\[167b.4\]]gi tshad do/_/ud pa la ltar gas pa nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni pad ma ltar gas pa gcig gi tshad do/_/pad ma ltar gas pa nyi shu'i tshad ji tsam pa ni pad ma ltar gas pa chen po gcig gi tshad yin te/_lha sbyin gyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i dge slong ko ka li kas/_dge slong shA 
[\[167b.5\]]ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis la/_sems sdang bar byas pas der skyes so/_/dge slong dag de bas na tha na sdong dum me reg ma la yang snying na ba med par bya na rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa la lta ci smos zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan 
[\[167b.6\]]yang gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod ma bzung shig_/dge slong dag gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod bzung na nyams par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag nga'am nga dang 'dra bas ni gang zag gi tshod gzung du rung ngo /_/dge slong dag de bas na/_gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod 
[\[167b.7\]]gzung bar bya na/_gang zag des ni gang zag de la rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis brtag par bya ste/_spyod pa dang spyod yul dang mdza' bo dang grogs po dang 'tsho ba dang thos pa dang lus kyi las dang ngag gi las las brtag par bya'o/_/de ltar brtags na de la snying na bar gyur pa gang yin 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]pa de phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_tha na sdong dum me reg ma la yang bdag cag gis sems sdang bar mi bya na/_rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa la lta ci smos zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de 
[\[168a.2\]]skad ces bka' stsal nas/_de'i skabs su dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gnyis kyis dge slong ko ka li ka brtag par bya'o snyam ste 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song 
[\[168a.3\]]ste de gnyis der phyin nas bltas na dge slong ko ka li ka de lta bur 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de kho na la snying brtse ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste ko ka li ka ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas ko ka li kas dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis thag ring po zhig nas mthong 
[\[168a.4\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de de gnyis la lhag par snying na bar gyur te/_bdag 'dir skyes na yang sdig pa la dga' ba sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di gnyis kyis ma btang ngo snyam mo/_/de nas de sems 'khrugs ma thag tu de'i lce la rmon pa dor stong byung ngo /_/de nas de gnyis kyis 
[\[168a.5\]]bsams pa/_kyi hud mi blun po 'di ni gsor med do snyam nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po pad ma ltar gas pa chen po nas mi snang bar gyur te 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo /_/de gnyis der phyin nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir de na de'i gnod pa ci 'dra ba 
[\[168a.6\]]de dag de kho na bzhin du bsnyad do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che rnams shas cher skyo ba skyes so/_/de nas de gnyis kyis de dag skyo bar gyur pa sems kyis rig nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na 'khor de dag las kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig 
[\[168a.7\]]gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[168b.2\]]kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor 
[\[168b.3\]]de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa gzigs lags/_dge slong ko ka li kas dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu 
[\[168b.4\]]gnyis la sems sdang bar bgyis nas/_sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 'di gnyis kho na la sems sdang bar byas pas ji ltar sems can dmyal bar gzhol 
[\[168b.5\]]bar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer 'thab med ces bya ba na/_rgyal po sde chen po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_rgyal po sde chen po de'i mdun na 'don bram ze mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[168b.6\]]pa zhig 'dug pa de yul thams cad du bkur sti bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang mchod par bya ba dang dgra bcom par bkur bar gyur te/_rnyed pa'i mchog dang grags pa'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe nags khrod zhig na drang srong g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig 
[\[168b.7\]]gnas te/_de la bram ze'i khye'u mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis shig 'khod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na drang srong des bsams pa bdag gis dka' thub kyi tshal 'di na 'dug bzhin du skye bo mang po la phan par byed mi nus 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]kyis ma la bdag gis grong 'dab tu gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam nas/_gnas de nyid nas thag mi ring ba zhig tu yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phub nas 'dug ste/_de de na bkur sti bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang mchod pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[169a.2\]]drang srong de yang rgas nas gnas de dag tu 'gro mi nus so/_/de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u de gnyis ni der 'gro zhing rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang khyim bdag rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams kyi thad 
[\[169a.3\]]du 'gro ste/_de gnyis der bkur sti bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang mchod par bya ba dang dgra bcom par bkur bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na mdun na 'don de'i sems skyes pa/_sngon bdag yul 'di thams cad du bkur sti bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang 
[\[169a.4\]]mchod pa bya ba'i gnas yin na/_da ni bdag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti gang yin pa de bram ze'i khye'u 'di gnyis la 'phos na/_da yang 'di gnyis med na ni phyir yang bdag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti snga mkho bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur gyis bdag gis 'di gnyis la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[169a.5\]]kha phyar btang ba dang /_de gnyis bsnyen bkur med par 'gyur du dogs pas gud du 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_mdun na 'don des thog thag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang ste/_'di gnyis ni 'dod pa la spyod pa yin gyi/_'di gnyis ni tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no zhes 
[\[169a.6\]]zer ro/_/de nas de gnyis kyi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa de drang srong des mthong nas mdun na 'don de bkag ste/_bram ze khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u 'di gnyis la sems sdang bar ma byed cig_/khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes byas 
[\[169a.7\]]so/_/de ltar drang srong des de yang dang yang du bkag kyang bzlog par ma nus nas des de gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong rgan por gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu 'di gnyis kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe mdun na 'don du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ko ka li ka 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di ngas bkag bzhin du 'di 
[\[169b.2\]]gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang ngas bkag bzhin du shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[169b.3\]]btsun pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas dge slong des mang po'i nang du bden pa ma lags pa dang yang dag pa ma lags pa dang gsog dang rdzun gyi tshig dang gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[169b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di gnyis kyis sngon gyi las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing 
[\[169b.5\]]bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung 
[\[169b.6\]]ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer rdul ldan zhes bya ba'i gnas gcig cig na/_dka' thub can g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa gnyis shig 'khod de/_grong khyer de na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang mchod par bya ba dang dgra bcom 
[\[169b.7\]]par bkur bar gyur te/_rnyed pa'i mchog dang grags pa'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe ri'i sul zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/_de yang bdag nyid che ba byams pa'i bdag nyid can 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can la mnyes gshin pa sems can la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/_des bsams pa/_dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du ni bdag gis sems can la phan par byed mi nus kyis/_ma la bdag grong khyer rdul ldan du rten bcas te 'dug 
[\[170a.2\]]par bya gor ma chag bdag der 'dug pa dang skye bo phal po che la phan par byed nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas dgon pa'i gnas der ji srid du dga' ba de srid du gnas nas/_g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa dang shing shun gyi gos dang 'khar ba dang ril ba dang 
[\[170a.3\]]dgang gzar dang blugs gzar rnams khyer te grong khyer rdul ldan du phyin nas/_de nags khrod cig tu gnas bcas te yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phub nas 'dug go/_/de nas grong khyer rdul ldan na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos de lus mdzes pa dang sems mdzes pa dang g.yog 
[\[170a.4\]]'khor mdzes par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skye bo phal che ba de dag drang srong de la shas cher dga' ba skyes so/_/de dag dga' ba skyes nas drang srong de la bkur sti byed bla mar byed ri mor byed mchod par byed de yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bsnyen bkur byed do/_/drang srong des kyang 
[\[170a.5\]]der 'ong ba de dag la dus dus su chos ston to/_/de dag gis kyang de las chos thos nas kha cig ni drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/kha cig ni khyim na gnas bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 
[\[170a.6\]]blangs te gnas la drang srong de'i thad du yang dus dus su blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/_de phyin cad dka' thub can de dag gi thad du ni mi 'ong ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na dka' thub can de dag gis bsams pa/_sngan cad ni grong khyer rdul ldan du gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams bdag cag la bkur sti byed 
[\[170a.7\]]bla mar byed ri mor byed mchod par byed de rnyed pa'i mchog dang grags pa'i mchog dang shin tu ldan na/_drang srong 'di 'ongs nas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti chad par gyur gyis bdag cag gis ci nas kyang drang srong 'di g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa yul 'dir mi 'dug par bya'o/_/'di 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]med na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti phyir yang snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam nas/_bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/drang srong 'di 'ongs nas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti chad par gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis grong khyer thog 
[\[170b.2\]]thag tu 'di'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang ste/_drang srong 'di ni 'dod pa spyod pa yin gyi 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ma yin gyis/_khyed 'di la bkur sti byed par ma sems shig ces byas pa dang /_de skur pa btab pas 'jigs shing skrag nas yang na ni yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[170b.3\]]yang na ni bdag cag 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di med na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti phyir yang snga mkho bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas nas de gnyis g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa grong khyer rdul ldan du dong nas lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu 'khod nas 
[\[170b.4\]]drang srong de'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka gtong bar byed de/_drang srong 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos dang ldan par 'dod pa la spyod pa yin gyi 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ma yin te/_'di ni khyed la sgyus 'drid pa yin gyis khyed 'di la ha cang bkur sti byed par ma sems shig_
[\[170b.5\]]ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag drang srong de la mi dga' bar gyur te/_'di ni 'dod pa spyod pa yin gyi 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no zhes mi dga' bar gyur nas/_de phyin cad de la bkur sti mi byed bla mar mi byed ri mor mi byed mchod par mi byed la blta ba'i 
[\[170b.6\]]phyir yang 'gro bar mi byed do/_/de nas drang srong gis bsams pa/_sngan cad ni skye bo mang po 'di dag bdag la bkur sti byed bla mar byed ri mor byed mchod par byed na/_da ni 'di dag bdag la bkur sti mi byed/_bla mar mi byed ri mor mi byed mchod par mi byed na 'di ni ci las gyur snyam pa dang /_des 
[\[170b.7\]]bltas na dka' thub can de gnyis g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas grong khyer rdul ldan thog thag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yang bsams pa grong khyer rdul ldan 'dir bdag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar kas phog pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]ni rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti'i gcugs las byung ba yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di na ci yod pa thams cad spangs te/_sngon gyi dgon pa'i gnas de nyid du gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam nas/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag khrid de/_sngon gyi dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[171a.2\]]de nyid du song ste 'dug go/_/de nas drang srong de song nas dka' thub can de dag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti snga mkho bzhin du gyur te gzhi des na de dag shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dka' thub can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de gnyis 
[\[171a.3\]]ni dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu 'di gnyis kho na yin te/_der de gnyis rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i dbang du gyur nas drang srong de la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_lo du ma lo 'bum phrag du mar sems can dmyal ba 
[\[171a.4\]]rnams su btsos so/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pas na/_da ltar srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha mar gyur te dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bar du yang dge slong ko ka li kas mang po'i nang du mi bden pa dang yang dag 
[\[171a.5\]]pa ma yin pa dang gsog dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig gis skur pa btab bo/_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa dge slong ko ka li kas las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba pad ma ltar gas pa chen por skyes la der skyes nas kyang de'i lce la rmon pa 
[\[171a.6\]]dor lnga brgya byung bar gyur lags/_de bzhin du de'i glo g.yas g.yon nas lcags kyi mche ba can gyi khyi dang seng ge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pas sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid lags/_de bzhin du steng nas kyang lcags kyi mchu can gyi bya rgod dang bya rog dang 
[\[171a.7\]]chun lag rnams kyis sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid lags/_de bzhin du glo g.yas g.yon nas lcags kyi shing shal ma li'i tshal grub par gyur la/_gal te de na tsha mi bzod de glo bsgyur na yang steng nas lcags kyi mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]mdung rtse gcig pa rnams 'bab lags/_bka' stsal pa/_des shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pa'i phyir ro//_//thang bcad ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu ni lugs kyis 
[\[171b.2\]]dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar byed/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de/_phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug 
[\[171b.3\]]bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do/_/phyir 'ongs nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi 
[\[171b.4\]]rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de/_de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par thob 
[\[171b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sems can dmyal ba'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba mnar med par phyin pa dang /_de der sems can lus che la lus kyis dpag tshad mang po khyab par 'dug la/_
[\[171b.6\]]de'i las las skyes pa'i mi rnams kyis de'i kha nas lce phyung ste/_lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba'i steng du brgyangs nas lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar ba dag gis thang 
[\[171b.7\]]bcad nas/_de'i lce de la rmon pa dor stong byung ste rmon pa de dag thams cad kyang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag la rmon glang de dag kyang las las skyes pa sha stag ste/_de rnams kyi rmig pa de dag thams cad kyang spu gri'i so 'dra la 'bar 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag ste/_de dag gis phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i phyogs de dang der kun du gcod cing kun du gtub la kun du dmyal bar byed de/_gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi 
[\[172a.2\]]bzad pa dang tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa sems can 'dis las ci byas na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu rnyed par gyur zhig gu snyam ste/_des rab kyi mtha' las byung ba'i 
[\[172a.3\]]bsam gtan gyi bar du snyoms par zhugs kyang /_sems can de'i sdug bsngal gyi mtha'i rtsad ma chod de/_sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba' zhig tu skyes pa nyi tshe zhig mthong bar zad do/_/mthong nas kyang bsams pa 'di'i las lung 
[\[172a.4\]]bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dang /_ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam nas mnar med pa nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par phyin to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang 
[\[172a.5\]]na bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems can de'i lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus ni 
[\[172a.6\]]'di yin no snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[172a.7\]]pa 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid/_lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de/_slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang gtub pa dang 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]brdeg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so/_/slar mchis nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa dang 'bar ba dang bsreg pa dang btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la 
[\[172b.2\]]gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de/_de dag gis de thos nas 
[\[172b.3\]]skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gang du khyad par thob par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bdag sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar 'tshal te/_mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar ma mchis par mchis na/_btsun pa bdag gis der sems can 
[\[172b.4\]]lus che ba lus kyis dpag tshad mang po khyab par mchis la/_de'i las las skyes pa'i mi rnams kyis/_de'i kha nas lce phyung ste lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i steng du brgyangs nas lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing 
[\[172b.5\]]rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar ba dag gis thang bcad nas/_de'i lce de la rmon pa dor stong byung ste/_rmon pa de dag thams cad kyang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag la rmon glang de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[172b.6\]]las las skyes pa sha stag ste/_de rnams kyi rmig pa de dag thams cad kyang spu gri'i so 'dra la/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag ste/_de dag gis phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i phyogs de dang der kun tu gcod cing kun du gtub 
[\[172b.7\]]la kun du dmyal bar bgyid de/_gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba zhig mthong lags na/_btsun pa sems can des las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu sems can de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te/_maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[173a.2\]]sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa ma nyams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe dge slong sde 
[\[173a.3\]]snod gsum pa rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/_chos smra ba 'khor dang ldan pa zhig rgyal po'i pho brang zhig na rten cing gnas te/_de de na bkur sti bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i gnas su gyur te/_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos 
[\[173a.4\]]dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dge slong dgra bcom pa sde snod gsum pa rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa chos smra ba zhig kyang yod de/_de yang g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing song ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin nas/_skye bo mang pos de lus 
[\[173a.5\]]mdzes pa dang sems mdzes pa dang g.yog 'khor mdzes par mthong ste/_mthong ma thag tu de la dga' bar gyur nas de yang der gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur te/_skye bo mang po de dag de 'ba' zhig la bkur sti bya bar sems kyis/_snga 
[\[173a.6\]]nas 'dug pa'i sde snod gsum pa de la ni bkur sti mi byed do/_/de nas de'i blo skyes pa gang gi tshe dge slong 'di grong 'dab 'dir ma 'ongs pa de'i tshe na bdag rnyed pa'i mchog dang grags pa'i mchog dang ldan par gyur la 'di 'ongs nas bdag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti chad par gyur te/_'di 
[\[173a.7\]]med na ni bdag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti phyir yang snga mkho bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis ci nas kyang 'di g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa grong 'dab 'dir mi 'dug par bya'o snyam nas/_sde snod gsum pa des grong khyer de thog thag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang ste/_
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]dge slong 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin gyis/_'di la khyed bkur sti byed par ma sems shig_/bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang g.yog 'khor tshul khrims 'chal pa 'di na 'dug pa ci dgos zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu 
[\[173b.2\]]skye bo mang po de dag dgra bcom pa de la mi lta bar gyur te/_phyin cad sbyin par bya ba dang bkur sti bya bar mi sems so/_/de nas dgra bcom pa des bsams pa/_skye bo mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir bdag la mi lta bar gyur snyam nas des bltas na/_sde snod gsum pas thog thag tu phyar ka btang 
[\[173b.3\]]bar gyur nas/_des bsams pa skye bo mang po 'di dag dang sde snod gsum pa'i 'di shas cher bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te grong 'dab de nas song ngo /_/de song nas sde snod gsum pa de dga' bar gyur te/_da ni bdag gi rnyed pa dang 
[\[173b.4\]]bkur sti snga mkho bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas phyi zhig na de nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas kyang sos par byed ma nus nas shi'o/_/de shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas sems can dmyal ba chen po 
[\[173b.5\]]mnar med par skyes te/_der de'i lce la rmon pa dor stong byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe sde snod gsum par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sems can 'di nyid yin te/_des der rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i dbang du gyur cing shas cher mngon par zhen nas dgra bcom 
[\[173b.6\]]pa de la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes nas/_de'i lce la rmon pa dor stong byung ste/_dge slong dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bgrod pa mi nyams pa'i ring nas da ltar nga'i ring gi bar du 
[\[173b.7\]]sems can de sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba' zhig tu skyes te/_sdug bsngal 'di lta bu sha stag rnyed par gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa sems can de sdug bsngal de las nam thar bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la sems can 'di sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos te/_mi'i 
[\[174a.2\]]lus thob nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/skur pa mang bar yang 'gyur te/_de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der skur pa dang phrad par 'gyur te/_de de kho nas skyo bar gyur nas phung po lhag ma 
[\[174a.3\]]med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_der de'i sdug bsngal mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag skyo ba chen po skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su 
[\[174a.4\]]chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na 'khor de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du 
[\[174a.5\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor 
[\[174a.6\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_/kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas 
[\[174a.7\]]kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po bco lnga pa/_
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]kham zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes pa bzhin du/_
[\[174b.2\]]sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes su zin na ni/_de lta na kham gyi tha ma dang kham gyi mjug lus pa gang yin pa de las kyang /_gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na de la ma byin nam bgo bsha' 
[\[174b.3\]]ma byas kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/_de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes pa bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sbyin 
[\[174b.4\]]pa'i 'bras bu yang mi shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi shes pas na/_de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa'am/_bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug go_/
[\[174b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bgo bsha' dag gi rnam par smin/_/ji ltar don chen 'gyur ba de/_/drang srong che rnams gsungs pa bzhin/_/sems can 
[\[174b.6\]]rnams kyis shes na ni/_/ma byin bar du mi za zhing /_/ser sna can du mi 'gyur la/_/de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems/_/nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur na/_/gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis/_/bsgribs pa kun gyis ma shes pas/_/de phyir kun du 'dzin sems kyis/_/rtag tu ma 
[\[174b.7\]]byin za bar byed/_/de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang /_/sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa gzigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i bsngags pa gsung ba lags so/_/
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang nga ji ltar sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po zla 
[\[175a.2\]]'od ces bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang 
[\[175a.3\]]ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/_bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/rgyal po de yang byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can la byams pa sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig go/_/de sbyin pa dag sbyin 
[\[175a.4\]]zhing bsod nams dag byed de/_de zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin par byed/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos sbyin par byed/_spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa rnams sbyin 
[\[175a.5\]]par byed do/_/nad pa la mkho ba'i nad brang bcas nas yo byad thams cad sbyar te/_skye bo dman pa dang bkren pa dang sdug pa dang mgon med pa rnams la rim gro byed do/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po sta gon byas nas/_nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams dang chu na gnas pa rnams dang 
[\[175a.6\]]thang la gnas pa rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na kA shi'i yul du than pa byung ste/_der ltas mkhan bram ze bye brag phyed pa rnams kyis bsgo ba/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas char ma bab pas mu ge byung ste/_skye bo mang 
[\[175a.7\]]po de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis dril bsgrags te/_khyed kyi nang na lo bcu gnyis kyi zan 'byor pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'di nyid du 'khod cig_/mi 'byor pa de dag ni yul gzhan du deng la/_nam lo legs par gyur pa de'i tshe phyir 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]shog cig_/yul ni phyis kyang yod la/_srog ni phyis med do zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag las kha cig ni yul gzhan du dong ste 'khod do/_/kha cig ni yul la chags nas de nyid na 'khod de/_de dag de na su la zan ji tsam yod pa de dag 
[\[175b.2\]]zos pa'i 'og tu bkres pas nyam thag nas rgyal po'i thad du song ste smras pa/_lha bdag cag ni bkres lags kyis bdag cag la 'tshal ma stsal du gsol/_de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po des bsams pa/_'dir skye bo phal po che la yun ring po zhig tu bgo bsha' bya dgos snyam nas 
[\[175b.3\]]smras pa/_khyed re zhig sdod cig dang ngas mngan rnams la smras te bya'o zhes byas nas/_rgyal po des mngan rnams la smras pa/_nga dang yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po 'di dag gis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du bzar yod dam/_mngan rnams kyis smras pa/_lha stsang bang rnams 
[\[175b.4\]]g.yar sngar brims te gdod gsol bar 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_mngan rnams kyis stsang bang rnams g.yar sngar brims nas/_yul na 'khod pa'i skye bo mang po rnams bgrang ba la zhugs so/_/de nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mi re re'i skal bar ci thob pa rtsis na/_thams cad 
[\[175b.5\]]kyis nyin gcig bzhin du kham re re thob par 'gyur la/_rgyal pos ni kham gnyis gnyis gsol du yod par rig nas/_de dag gis rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha dgung lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du yul na gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni gdugs gcig bzhin du kham re re 
[\[175b.6\]]'tshal du mchis so/_/lhas ni zhal kham gnyis gnyis gsol du mchis so zhes gsol to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po des yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad nyin gcig cing kham re re sbyin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/skye bo mang po de dag kyang dge ba bcu'i 
[\[175b.7\]]las kyi lam la yang dag par 'dzud do/_/de nas der su yang rung 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der skyes pas lha'i gnas rnams kun tu gang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_lha'i gnas rnams ni rgyu gnyis 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]kyis kun du gang bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba yin na/_ci da ltar 'jig rten du 'khor los sgyur ba byung ngam/_'on te de bzhin gshegs pa byung zhig gu snyam du bsams nas/_des bltas na de lta ma yin te/_yang des 
[\[176a.2\]]bsams pa 'o na su'i mthus lha'i gnas rnams kun tu gang bar gyur zhig gu snyam ste/_des bltas nas rgyal po zla 'od kyi mthus de ltar gyur par rig nas/_des bsams pa/_ci 'di brgya byin du 'gyur ba'am tshangs par 'gyur ba zhig bsgrub snyam du bsams te/_
[\[176a.3\]]des bltas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ci sems can 'di brtan po yin nam/_'on te sems can brtan po ma yin pa re zhig bdag song la 'di brtag par bya'o/_/gal te sems can brtan po 
[\[176a.4\]]yin na ni de la mchod pa bya'o/_/de ste sems can brtan po ma yin na ni de brtan por bya'o/_/snyam nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bsgyur te/_lha bdag ni bkres kyis 'tshal ma stsal du gsol ces smras so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_gal te gzhan gyi bcad de 'di la byin na ni gcig gi 
[\[176a.5\]]srog srungs la gcig gi srog ma rungs par byas par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gi zan las kham gcig ni bdag gis zos la/_kham gcig ni 'di la sbyin no snyam nas rgyal po des bram ze de la kham gcig byin te/_gcig bdag gis bza'o snyam pa dang /_bram ze des smras 
[\[176a.6\]]pa/_lha bdag ni kham gcig gis 'tsho ba'i rngo mi thogs so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po des bsams pa gal te bdag gis 'di la kham phyi ma ma byin na bram ze 'di ltogs te/_'chi yang srid la bdag kyang sems can gyi don la zhugs pa yin pas bdag gis rang gi srog 
[\[176a.7\]]bor te/_gzhan gyi srog bsrung bar nus so snyam nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med pa ston pa med pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas tshigs su bcad de 
[\[176b.2\]]smras pa/_sbyin pa rgya cher gyur pa 'di yis ni/_/srid gsum sangs rgyas rang byung gyur par shog_/brgal nas sngon gyi rgyal ba'i dbang rnams kyis/_/skye bo phal chen ma bsgral rnams kyang bsgral/_/zhes smras nas/_kham de lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i cha lugs 
[\[176b.3\]]can la byin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_byang chub sems dpas ni mchog tu dka' ba byas so snyam du bsams te/_bram ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas nas rang bzhin gyi lus su bsgyur te smras pa/_khyod 'bad pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/_des smras 
[\[176b.4\]]pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub bo/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_khyod kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams de 'dra ba las na/_khyod ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis 
[\[176b.5\]]de'i tshe bdag dran par mdzod cig ces smras nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang chen gyi char phab ste/_de'i tshe 'bru thams cad rgyal nas lo legs par gyur te kA shi'i yul snga mkho bzhin du gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po zla 'od ces bya 
[\[176b.6\]]bar gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang nga sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/_nga da ltar sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe lta ci smos te/_de bzhin 
[\[176b.7\]]gshegs pa da ltar sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i bsngags pa brjod par ci ste mi mdzad/_las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_byams pa'i stobs dang rlung nag dang /_/grog ma gnyis dang spyod 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]yul dang /_/dgon pa glang klu seng ge dang /_/dbyen dang nags khung thos pa rnams/_/byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo dbyig dga'i rtogs pa brjod pa las/_
[\[177a.2\]]gtan tshigs ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/_dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par mdzad nas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/_grub 
[\[177a.3\]]pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ji ltar 
[\[177a.4\]]bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba 
[\[177a.5\]]dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug pa dang chom rkun dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/rgyal po de 
[\[177a.6\]]yang byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje che ba/_sems can la byams pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig ste/_de sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa dang slong ba rnams tshim par byed la/_bza' ba dang 
[\[177a.7\]]bca' ba mang po bshams nas/_srog chags nam mkha' la gnas pa dang chu na gnas pa dang skam na gnas pa rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams la byams pa sgom par byed do/_/des de'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po ji snyed yod pa de 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]snyed la byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas te 'dug nas/_de'i mthus sems can de dag la su yang gnod pa cung zad kyang byed mi nus so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i btson ra nas/_gzi byin 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga bros te/_skye bo mang po'i 
[\[177b.2\]]gzi byin 'phrog par byed cing bA rA Na sIr 'ongs te der phyin nas/_yams kyi nad btang ba las de dag gis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa yan chad su'i gzi byin yang dbrog par ma nus nas/_de dag gis bsams pa/_gang gis yul 'dir bdag cag gis tha na dud 'gro'i 
[\[177b.3\]]skye gnas su gyur pa yan chad su'i gzi byin yang dbrog par ma nus pa 'di su'i mthu yin pa je dri bar bya'o snyam nas ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi rnams la dris pa/_kye gang gi yul 'dir su la yang gnod pa cung zad kyang byed mi nus pa 'di su'i mthu yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal 
[\[177b.4\]]po 'di byams pa'i bdag nyid can yin te/_des yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po ji snyed yod pa de snyed la byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas te 'dug pa de'i mthus na/_yul 'dir sus kyang gnod pa cung zad kyang byed mi nus so/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsams pa/_rgyal 
[\[177b.5\]]po de ni bsod nams can che bar grags pa/_byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje che ba/_sems can la byams pa zhig ste/_des ni bdag cag 'grangs par byed nus gor ma chag snyam nas/_bram ze'i cha lugs su bsgyur te byams pa'i stobs kyi thad du song nas smras pa/_snying rje 
[\[177b.6\]]chen po dang ldan pa/_bdag cag ni bkres kyis 'grangs par mdzod cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ngas khyed kha zas ji lta bu zhig gis 'grangs par bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_khrag 'phral du phyung bas 'grangs par mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_ma la cha lugs 'di 
[\[177b.7\]]'dra ba la kha zas de 'dra ba las na/_'di dag ni mi yin pa mi 'dra ste/_'di dag ni mi ma yin pa dag cig yin gor ma chag gis 'di dag la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du bya dgos so/_/gzhan dag gi lus la gnod pa ma byas kyi bar du ni ngas 'di rnams kyi kha zas kyi don bsgrub par mi 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]nus la/_gzhan la gnod pa ma byas kyi bar du yang khrag 'phral du phyung ba rnyed par mi nus te/_gal te 'di dag bdag gi khrag gis kha zas kyi don byed nus na ni bdag gis 'di rnams la bdag gi sha dang khrag sbyin no snyam nas/_gnod sbyin de dag la smras pa/_grogs po 
[\[178a.2\]]dag nga'i khrag gis kha zas kyi don byed nus sam/_gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rngo thogs lags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po byams pa'i stobs kyis/_gnod sbyin de dag mdun du bkad du bcug nas sman pa rnams bos te bka' stsal pa/_kwa'i nga'i lus la 
[\[178a.3\]]gtar ka lnga thob shig dang sems can 'di dag la khrag gis 'grangs par bya'o/_/sman pa rnams kyis gsol pa/_bdag cag gis lha'i sku la mtshon gyis gdab pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_'di dag ni bdag dang 'bral ba 
[\[178a.4\]]mthong mi 'dod kyis ma la bdag gis bdag gi khrag dbyung ngo snyam ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas ci la yang byang ba yin te/_des bdag nyid kyis me long blangs nas/_rang gi lus la gtar kha lnga btab ste/_gnod sbyin re re la bstabs 
[\[178a.5\]]nas ngas 'di dag 'grangs par ma gyur gyi bar du gtar ka 'di dag gcad par mi bya'o zhes dam bcas so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dis kyang mchog tu dka' 
[\[178a.6\]]ba zhig brtsams kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' ha cang yun ring du 'o brgyal na mi rung ngo snyam nas/_ma la bdag gis 'di'i lus thams cad du gzi byin bsnan par bya'o snyam ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad du lha'i gzi byin bsnan nas/_gtar 
[\[178a.7\]]ka de dag kyang che rab tu sprul to/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang gzi byin 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga po de dag dka' ba med par tshim par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/_sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 
[\[178b.2\]]'di yis ni/_/'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur par shog_/sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral gang /_/skye bo srid pa'i chu las sgrol bar shog_/ces byas so/_/de nas gnod sbyin de dag gang gi tshe 'grangs shing ngoms par gyur te/_dbang po rnams tshim par gyur pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[178b.3\]]smras pa/_snying rje chen po khyod rtsol ba 'dis ci zhig sgrub/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub bo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'o na gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_'gro ba rnams bdud rtsis tshim 
[\[178b.4\]]par mdzad pa de'i tshe/_bdag cag khyod kyi nyan thos kyi dang por gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_khyed rnams ni srog gcod pa pha rol gyi srog 'phrog pa yin na/_ji ltar ngas de 'dra ba dag nyan thos kyi dang por bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_snying rje chen po bdag cag la bka' ci stsal/_byang chub sems dpas smras 
[\[178b.5\]]pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyis shig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu gnod sbyin de rnams kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na gang gi tshe 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[178b.6\]]'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/_bdag cag 'di'i nyan thos kyi dang por gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po byams pa'i stobs su gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe gzi byin 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga po gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong 
[\[178b.7\]]lnga sde 'di dag nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di dag ngas rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//_//
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]rlung nag po zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis zong khyer te/_yul gzhan du chas nas de dag mthar gyis song song ba las nags khung chen po dgon pa zhig tu phyin to/_/nags khung 
[\[179a.2\]]de na gzi byin 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin drag po 'jigs pa/_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa zhig kyang gnas te/_des rlung nag po chen po btang nas tshong pa de dag gi steng du brgyugs te/_de nas tshong pa de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur nas/_de dag 'jigs shing skrag 
[\[179a.3\]]ste lha'o cog la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs so/_/dge bsnyen zhig kyang 'dron po de dag gi nang na 'dug ste/_des tshong pa de dag ci bya gtol med par 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/_kye skyabs ma yin pa 'di rnams la skyabs btsal te ci rung /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[179a.4\]]skyabs su deng shig dang des khyed dkos thag cing nyam nga la phongs par gyur pa las yongs su bskyab par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu tshong pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[179a.5\]]sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba ci yang mi gzigs pa dang mi mkhyen pa dang thugs su mi chud pa mi mnga' na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dkos 
[\[179a.6\]]thag cing nyam nga la phongs par gyur pa las/_yongs su bskyab pa dang srog phangs pa stsal du gsol zhes byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran 
[\[179a.7\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis/_nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[179b.2\]]spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngan song nas phyung ste/_
[\[179b.3\]]mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma 
[\[179b.4\]]bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu 
[\[179b.5\]]dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs 
[\[179b.6\]]nas/_tshong pa lnga brgya po rnams 'dul ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud nas/_phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste/_tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag nags khung dgon pa de nas brungs rdzas dang bcas te blangs nas/_mnyan du yod pa nas ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu bton te 
[\[179b.7\]]bkod do/_/de nas tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag gis mnyan du yod par phyin pa'i rtags rnams mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis skyabs mdzad do snyam nas tshong pa de dag shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_de dga' 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]bar gyur nas bsams pa/_bdag cag khyim na gnas pa btang la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad par bya'o snyam nas mnyan 
[\[180a.2\]]du yod par dong ste/_rang rang gi khyim gyi 'khor btang nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_zhabs la mchus 
[\[180a.3\]]gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag la dka' ba mdzad pa dang /_srog phangs pa stsol ba lags so zhes gsol nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag gi bsam 
[\[180a.4\]]pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[180a.5\]]'bras bu mngon du byas te de dag gis bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs 
[\[180a.6\]]par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i 
[\[180a.7\]]tshig gis rab tu byung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog go/_/de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so 
[\[180b.2\]]yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs 
[\[180b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su bskyabs te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[180b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid ngas ji ltar 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su bskyabs nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon 
[\[180b.5\]]byung ba 'das pa'i dus na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam zhig gis zong khyer te/_yul gzhan du chas nas de dag mthar gyis song song ba las nags khung chen po dgon pa zhig tu phyin to/_/nags khung de na gzi byin 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin drag po 'jigs pa gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa zhig 
[\[180b.6\]]kyang gnas te/_des rlung nag po chen po btang nas tshong pa de dag gi steng du brgyugs te/_des na tshong pa de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur nas de dag 'jigs shing skrag par gyur to/_/de'i tshe drang srong gi gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_
[\[180b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas pa des/_tshong pa lnga brgya sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag brungs rdzas dang bcas te/_nags khung dgon pa de nas blangs nas bdag nyid kyi gnas su bkod do/_/de nas tshong 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]pa rnams kyis bsams pa/_ci yang rung ste bdag cag 'tsho bar gyur pa 'di dag thams cad ni drang srong 'di'i mthu yin gyis/_bdag cag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la 'di nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste tshangs par spyod pa spyad do snyam nas/_tshong pa lnga brgya 
[\[181a.2\]]po de dag drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe tshong pa lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshong pa lnga 
[\[181a.3\]]brgya po 'di dag yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas 'di rnams 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di rnams 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang 
[\[181a.4\]]bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rnams rab tu byung ste/_rab tu byung nas kyang tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na 
[\[181a.5\]]bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[181a.6\]]cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong lnga brgya por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_
[\[181a.7\]]tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_'di dag der rab tu byung nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed 
[\[181b.2\]]par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes 
[\[181b.3\]]par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//grog ma gnyis zhes bya ba la/_grog ma dang po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_der gang gi tshe 
[\[181b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas bden pa rnams mthong ba de'i tshe/_lha brgyad khris kyang bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi 
[\[181b.5\]]bcud kyis tshim par mdzad nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin 'das pa'i dus na yang kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa lha brgyad khri po 'di dag 
[\[181b.6\]]nyid ngas ji ltar rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas nas srog phangs pa byin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na chu klung zhig gi 'gram na/_ru sbal snying rje che ba byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_sems can la byams pa zhig gnas pa de res 'ga' 
[\[181b.7\]]ni skam la rgyu/_res 'ga' ni chu'i nang du rgyu'o/_/de nas phyi zhig na chu'i nang nas byung ste/_skam la rgyu zhing song song ba las skam sa de nyid du nyal lo/_/de nas grog tshang zhig nas grog ma zhig byung ste/_ru sbal de'i thad du son pa dang /_des ru sbal skam la nyal ba de 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]mthong nas de tshang gi nang du song ste/_grog ma gzhan dag la sbran to/_/grog tshang de na yang grog ma brgyad khri gnas te/_de dag gis grog ma de las thos nas grog tshang de'i nang nas 'thon te/_ru sbal de'i lus la zhugs so/_/de nas de dag za bas sad de 
[\[182a.2\]]des bltas na lus thog thag grog mas gang bar mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung du zin kyang sems kyis log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' des bsams pa/_ngas chu'i nang du 'gro ni nus mod kyi/_sems can 
[\[182a.3\]]'di snyed kyi srog ma rung bar 'gyur la/_bdag kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa yin gyis bdag rang gi srog yongs su btang yang sla'i/_sems can 'di snyed kyi srog ma rung bar byar ni mi rung ngo snyam nas bdag nyid kyis mnags te cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_
[\[182a.4\]]de grog ma brgyad khri po de dag gis bza' ba na smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba ston pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs 
[\[182a.5\]]su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na 
[\[182a.6\]]med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig_/ji ltar ngas 'di rnams da ltar rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas nas srog phangs pa byin pa de bzhin du/_nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[182a.7\]]sangs rgyas pa na yang 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe ru sbal du gyur pa byang 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe grog ma brgyad khrir gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas 'di rnams rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas nas srog phangs pa byin no/_/da 
[\[182b.2\]]ltar yang ngas 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//_//grog ma gnyis pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_gtan 
[\[182b.3\]]tshigs rgyas par ni dbyig dga'i rtogs pa brjod pa las 'byung ba bzhin te/_gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas bden pa rnams mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_lha brgyad khris kyang bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[182b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par mdzad nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom 
[\[182b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus su yang kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa/_lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid ngas ji ltar rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas nas/_srog phangs pa byin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung 
[\[182b.6\]]ba 'das pa'i dus na/_ri khrod cig nas thag mi ring ba zhig na/_khung zhig gi nang na srog chags skyin gor snying rje che ba byams pa'i bdag nyid can sems can la byams pa zhig gnas pa de/_rtsa ba dang 'bras bus 'tsho zhing su la yang 'tshe mi 'dod pa zhig 'dug pa de phyi zhig 
[\[182b.7\]]na gzas la song song ba las/_rngon pa zhig gis mthong nas de des gson por bzung ste/_pags pa bshus nas btang ste rngon pa des pags pa de khyer te song ngo /_/de nas skyin gor de na tsha mi bzod de chu 'gram zhig tu song nas sa gzhi bsil ba'i phyogs su nyal lo/_/de nas ha 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]cang yang mi ring ba zhig na grog tshang zhig yod de/_grog tshang de na grog ma brgyad khri gnas te/_grog tshang de'i nang nas grog ma zhig byung ste/_grog ma de skyin gor de'i thad du song ste bltas na skyin gor pags pa med pa de mthong nas rang gi tshang du song ste/_grog ma 
[\[183a.2\]]gzhan dag la sbran nas/_grog ma brgyad khri po de dag tshang nas 'thon te skyin gor de'i lus la zhugs so/_/de nas de dag za bas sad de des bltas na lus thog thag grog mas gang bar mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung du zin kyang /_sems 
[\[183a.3\]]kyis log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' des bsams pa/_ngas bdag nyid thar bar ni nus mod kyi sems can 'di snyed kyi srog ma rung bar 'gyur la/_bdag kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa yin gyis bdag rang gi srog yongs su btang yang 
[\[183a.4\]]sla'i/_sems can 'di snyed kyi srog ma rung bar byar ni mi rung ngo /_/gcig tu na bdag ni gnod pa 'di kho nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur la/_bdag gi bya ba gang yin zhe na/_sems can la phan pa'i phyir lus yongs su gtong ba ste/_de ni bdag la 'di rnams kyis 
[\[183a.5\]]bskul to snyam nas/_bdag nyid kyis mnags te cang mi zer bar 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba ston pa med pa yongs su 'dren pa med par/_sems can ma rgal ba 
[\[183a.6\]]rnams sgrol ba dang ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su 
[\[183a.7\]]ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig_/ci ltar ngas 'di rnams da ltar rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]nas/_srog phangs pa byin pa de bzhin du/_nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god 
[\[183b.2\]]par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe skyin gor du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe grog ma brgyad khrir gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni lha brgyad khri 'di dag nyid yin te/_de'i 
[\[183b.3\]]tshe yang ngas 'di rnams rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas nas srog phangs pa byin no/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//_//
[\[183b.4\]]spyod yul zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos rnams ni chos nyid kyis 'du ba chen po'i dus gnyis yod de/_dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas 'cha' ba'i dus la bab pa dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]
[\[183b.5\]]nya'o/_/de la dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas 'char nye ba'i tshe ni/_dge slong rnams yid la byed pa'i khyad par dag mnos nas ri'i sul dang /_ri'i phug dang sog ma'i spyil po dang thang dang dur khrod dang nags khrod dang bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu dong ste dbyar gnas 'cha' 
[\[183b.6\]]bar byed do/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nya la ni phyir 'ongs nas rtogs zin pa ni rjod par byed/_da dung ma rtogs pa yan chad ni zhu bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong zhig ljongs su skabs dbye ba byas nas ljongs rgyu zhing song song ba las mnyan du yod par phyin nas/_des lhung bzed dang 
[\[183b.7\]]chos gos bzhag go/_/de nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/de yang gsar du 'ongs la sngan cad ma phyin te/_shes pa chung zhing spyod yul la mi mkhas pa zhig ste/_de shin tu 'phyi ba zhig na 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]mnyan du yod par song nas des bltas na/_dge slong gzhan dag lag pa gang ba dang lhung bzed bkang ste/_phyir 'ong bar mthong nas des bsams pa/_dge slong 'di dag la 'di na spyod yul gyi sa gang na yod pa dang gang du bsod snyoms skyen par rnyed par 'gyur ba 
[\[184a.2\]]de dri bar bya'o snyam nas/_nye dga' bo'i thad du dong ste dris pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bo bdag ni mnyan du yod pa'i spyod yul gyi rgyus ma 'tshal na bdag gis gang nas bsod snyoms skyen par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i spyod yul bdag la ston cig ces byas pa dang /_nye dga' bos mtho 
[\[184a.3\]]btsam par bsams te/_bram ze dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang sbyor ba mi srun cing ma dad pa zhig gi khyim bstan te/_khyim 'dir song shig dang 'di nas khyod kyi bsod snyoms 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes byas nas nye dga' bo song ngo /_/de nas dge slong de khyim de'i nang du song
