[\[184a.4\]]ba dang bram ze de yang don zhig la grong gzhan zhig tu 'gro bar chas pa las des bsams pa/_mgo reg gos tshon can gyon pa bdag gi mdun du 'ongs pa 'di ni bkra mi shis so snyam nas/_de des bzung nas khu tshur dang /_rdog pas zhen par brdegs te/_bskyur te 
[\[184a.5\]]bor nas de klad pa ni rdol/_chos gos snam sbyar ni ral/_lhung bzed ni zhom/_gseg shang ni chag ste/_khyim de'i nang nas phyir byung nas des bsams pa/_bdag zan med kyang sla'o snyam nas de smyung bar 'dug bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_
[\[184a.6\]]dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa btsun pa 'di lta bu ci khyod mi rgod kyis ma bcom mam/_des smras pa/_bdag mi rgod kyis ni ma bcom gyi nye dga' bos mtho btsams so zhes byas so/_/de nas skabs kyi gtam de dge slong rnams kyis thos te bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[184a.7\]]gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis dge slong la spyod yul ma yin pa bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te mi shes bzhin du 'gro 'dod pa zhig dge slong dag gis mthong na yang dgag par bya ste/_de ltar bkag na ni legs/_ma bkag na nyes 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bos dge slong 'di spyod yul ma lags par btang nas/_dge slong 'di yang der mchis te/_gnod pa chen po dang mjal ba la gzigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[184b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang dge slong 'di nye dga' bo 'di kho nas spyod yul ma yin pa la ji ltar btang ba dang 'di yang der song ste/_gnod pa chen po dang ji ltar phrad pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 
[\[184b.3\]]pad ma'i mtsho zhig gi nang na/_srog chags ru sbal zhig gnas la wa zhig kyang skom gyis gdungs nas chu btung ngo snyam ste pad ma'i mtsho de'i nang du zhugs pa dang /_des srog chags ru sbal de mthong nas bza' bar chas te/_sos bzung nas ru sbal des de la smras pa/_
[\[184b.4\]]grogs po bdag ma gsod cig bdag ni khyod kyi kham cig tu yang med kyis gal te khyod kyis bdag gson por btang na bdag gis khyod la kha zas mang po bstan to zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu wa des ru sbal de btang ste smras pa/_bdag gis ga las bza' ba rnyed 
[\[184b.5\]]par 'gyur ba'i phyogs de ston cig_/ru sbal gyis smras pa/_grogs po phyogs ga ge mo zhig na phug cig gi nang na skyin gor ma smad brgyad gnas kyis/_de rnams khyod kyis sod la zo shig ces byas so/_/phug de'i nang na seng ge mo zhig kyang gnas te/_de yang gsar 
[\[184b.6\]]du bu byung nas de la seng ge'i phrug gu gnyis yod de/_des de gnyis bsrung ba'i phyir phug de'i nang nas phyir 'byung du mi btub bo/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu wa de yang phug sgo logs su chas pa las/_de wa gzhan zhig gis mthong nas smras pa/_grogs po gar 'gro_/des 
[\[184b.7\]]smras pa/_phug 'di'i nang na skyin gor ma smad brgyad gnas te/_de dag bdag gis bsad la bza' bar bya'o/_/wa des smras pa/_grogs po ltos dang khyod 'dir song na sdug bsngal dang phrad ta re zhes byas pa dang /_des de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ni 'di na stobs ldan brtson 'grus ldan/_/bdag dang mtshungs pa ga la'ang yong med de/_/glang chen rgyal po rdzing la bab pa bzhin/_/de ring skyin gor smad brgyad gzhom par bya/_/zhes smras nas/_des de'i tshig ma mnyan te phug de'i nang du song ba las/_de seng ge'i 
[\[185a.2\]]phru gu gcig gis ni rna ba nas bzung /_gcig gis ni mjug ma nas bzung ste mas smras pa/_bu gnyis the rel za ba 'di ma gsad 'di bsad de ci rung zhes byas nas/_de gnyis kyis ma'i tshig ma nyan te gcig gis ni rna ba bcad gcig gis ni mjug ma bcad de bor ro/_/de 
[\[185a.3\]]nas wa cig shos kyis de phug sgo nas byung ba mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod ni 'di na stobs ldan brtson 'grus ldan/_/khyod dang mtshungs pa ga la'ang med ce na/_/dpa' bo lus mdzes ma rung gyur pa las/_/kha tsho bskyed pa de dang 'thun ma gyur/_/de nas des de la smras 
[\[185a.4\]]pa 'di ni des kyang mnyes kyis bdag gis de'i tshig mnyan te yid ches par byas pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyis nyes so zhes byas nas/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyin gor smad brgyad phug na skyes so zhes/_bdag ni ru sbal tshig la yid ches pa/_/de ni bdag 'dir blun zhing 
[\[185a.5\]]dgongs kyang chung /_/mi shes byur ngan dam pas dmad par 'os/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe srog chags ru sbal du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' bo 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe war gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang de 'dis 
[\[185a.6\]]spyod yul ma yin par btang ste/_'di yang der song ba las sdug bsngal chen po rnyed la da ltar yang des 'di spyod yul ma yin par btang ste/_dge slong 'di der song nas sdug bsngal chen po rnyed par gyur to//_//dgon pa pa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na 
[\[185a.7\]]bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la/_longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de dang lhan 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags te/_sems can de yang srid pa tha ma pa zhig yin la/_khyim de'i bsen ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa yin te/_des bltas na srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can gyis khyim der nying mtshams sbyar bar 
[\[185b.2\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas des phyi zhig na khyim bdag de brtan por bya ba'i phyir/_gcig pu zla med cing g.yog med par khyim der song ba dang /_khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod zham ring ma mchis sam ci na/_zla ma mchis pa dang 
[\[185b.3\]]zhabs 'bring ma mchis par gcig pu gshegs/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/_bdag cag gi g.yog ni khyed cag lta bu 'ba' zhig gis byin pa de dag bdag cag gi g.yog tu 'gyur bar zad pas na/_bdag cag gi g.yog ni rnyed rnyed tsam du zad do/_/
[\[185b.4\]]khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi mchis brang la bu chags pa mchis kyis de las gal te khye'u zhig btsas par gyur na/_de bdag gis 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring du dbul lo/_/ma 'gags pas smras pa/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin no 
[\[185b.5\]]zhes smras nas song ngo /_/khyim bdag gi chung ma de yang gang gi tshe bu chags par gyur nas/_gcig pu shin tu dben pa'i phyogs su song nas gnas par byed de/_phyin cad skye bo mang po'i nang du 'dug par mi dga'o/_/de nas khyim bdag gis bsams pa/_ma la bdag 
[\[185b.6\]]gi chung ma 'di 'byung po 'ga' zhig gis ma brlams grang snyam nas ltas mkhan rnams la bstan nas ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_'di 'byung pos brlams pa ni ma yin gyi 'di ni sems can lto na 'dug pa de'i mthu yin te/_sems can de ni gcig pu gar bar dga' ba zhig 
[\[185b.7\]]go zhes byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba sna mtho ba sna legs pa zhig 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas gcig pu gar bar dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dgon pa pa 
[\[186a.2\]]zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u dgon pa pa de 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas 'gro bar nus par gyur pa dang /_khye'u de rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran te/_des bltas na 'khor bar 'khor ba na bdag gis 'du 'dzi'i nyes pas 
[\[186a.3\]]sdug bsngal chen po myong bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gcig pu shin tu dben pa'i phyogs su dga' bar byed cing de 'du 'dzi'i nyes pa spang ba'i phyir gnas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de rab tu byung ba'i dus la bab par shes nas khyim bdag de la smras 
[\[186a.4\]]pa/_khyim bdag khye'u 'di ni ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas/_khyod kyis bdag la g.yog tu byin te/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na de kho na ltar dam ma bcas sam/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa de kho na ltar dam bcas lags so zhes 
[\[186a.5\]]byas nas/_khye'u de lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phul nas smras pa/_bu khyod ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring du phul gyis song la 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring gyis shig_/khye'us smras pa/_de ni bdag la phan gdags pa 
[\[186a.6\]]lags so zhes byas nas/_khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i phyi bzhin song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang /_khyim bdag de la chos bshad nas khye'u de khrid de gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/der khrid nas kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la 
[\[186a.7\]]lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye 
[\[186b.2\]]dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de dgon pa dang nags khrod dang bas mtha'i gnas mal la rten cing /_bdag su dang yang mi phrad par bya'o snyam mo/_/dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[186b.3\]]btsun pa dgon pa bas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/_'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon 
[\[186b.4\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_nongs dmigs ci zhig mthong na byis pa nas 'du 'dzi spangs te gcig pu mchis par dga' bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni rang bzhin gyis tshe 
[\[186b.5\]]rabs dran la/_'khor bar 'khor ba na 'dis 'du 'dzi'i nyes pas sdug bsngal chen po yang myong bar gyur te/_'dis sdug bsngal de rjes su dran pas na gcig pu gnas par dga' bar gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis gang du 'du 'dzi'i nyes pa bskyed lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[186b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[186b.7\]]skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ste/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa 'du 'dzi mang bar gyur nas/_'du 'dzi'i nyes pa des tshul khrims 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]'chal par gyur te/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_des dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang /_'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor ma thub nas/_ci 'dod par spyad de gzhan dag la yang byin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe zhal 
[\[187a.2\]]ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_dge slong 'di kho na yin te/_de der rab tu byung nas dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor ma thub nas/_ci 'dod par spyad de/_gzhan dag la yang byin nas/_khong dge ba rnams la ngor 
[\[187a.3\]]byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_'di tshe rabs lnga brgyar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes te sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ngo /_/des sdug bsngal de rjes su dran pas na gcig pu gnas par dga' bar gyur to/_/des der tshe gcig gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa bsrungs pa dang /_
[\[187a.4\]]dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des ni da ltar 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/des cung zad chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[187a.5\]]pas ni/_phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_glang po che zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dbyar gnas bcas 
[\[187a.6\]]te/_dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos mdzad de/_chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs nas/_mthar gyis gshegs gshegs pa las ri drung shod cig tu byon pa dang /_de'i 
[\[187a.7\]]tshe dgon pa'i glang po che zhig seng ges 'jigs nas rang gi khyu ded de/_ri de la 'dzegs nas rang gi khyu skyong zhing 'dug pa las/_glang po che'i gtso bo ri la song ba des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas gshegs pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu glang po che'i 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gtso bo de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes nas/_de ri de las babs te shing n+ya gro d+ha'i yal ga dag khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdung bar mi 'gyur 
[\[187b.2\]]bar bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du n+ya gro d+ha'i yal ga 'dzin cing phyi bzhin 'brang ngo /_/de nas grong gzhan du gshegs kyi bar du bskyal te/_phyir log nas de phyir ldog cing 'ong ba na/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ges bsad de de shi 'phos nas dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu 
[\[187b.3\]]lha'i nang du skyes te/_lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /_
[\[187b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon glang po cher gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 
[\[187b.5\]]'gro snyam mo/_/de nas sngon glang po cher gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/_lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang [(]spr-i [,]spri [)]ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/_de nyid kyi 
[\[187b.6\]]mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[187b.7\]]'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon glang po cher gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas sngon glang po cher gyur pa'i lha'i 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_
[\[188a.2\]]rus pa'i la brgal ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs 
[\[188a.3\]]rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/
[\[188a.4\]]mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang 'thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/
[\[188a.5\]]skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang ba dgar gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig 
[\[188a.6\]]rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon glang po cher gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /_zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 
[\[188a.7\]]'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed 
[\[188b.2\]]kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/_khyod kyis glang po che'i gtso bo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa lam du 'gro ba'i steng du n+ya gro d+ha'i yal ga bzung ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/dge 
[\[188b.3\]]slong dag de ni nga'i thad nas phyir log pa'i 'og tu seng ges bsad de/_de nga la sems dga' ba bskyed pas lha'i nang du skyes te lhar gyur nas nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_de la ngas chos bstan nas des bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis/_
[\[188b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa glang po che'i gtso bo des las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas glang po cher skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas lha'i nang du skyes la/_des bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis la 
[\[188b.5\]]mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'das pa'i las kyi shas kyang yod la/_da ltar byung ba'i las kyi shas kyang yod de/_'das pa'i las gang zhe na/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di 
[\[188b.6\]]nyid la/_skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[188b.7\]]ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong bslab pa la ma gus shing g.yel bar gyur te/_des der bslab pa'i gzhi che phra las 'gal ba mang du byas so/_/des bslab pa'i gzhi kha cig ni bsrungs nas 'chi 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]kar smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/
[\[189a.2\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni glang po che 'di kho na yin te/_des der bslab pa'i gzhi che phra mang du ma bsrungs pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni dud 'gro'i nang du skyes so/_/des der bslab pa'i gzhi kha cig bsrungs nas/_
[\[189a.3\]]'chi kar smon lam btab ste dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa 
[\[189a.4\]]des ni dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis da ltar nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas pa ni 'das pa'i las yin no/_/da ltar byung 
[\[189a.5\]]ba'i las gang zhe na/_de glang po cher gyur nas nga la bsnyen bkur byas te/_sems dga' bar byas pa des na lha'i nang du skyes te 'di ni da ltar byung ba'i las yin no//_//klu zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na 
[\[189a.6\]]klu'i rgyal po dbyig ces bya ba zhig gnas te/_des klu'i thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na bu khye'u zhig btsas te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_bu 'di'i ming ji skad gdags 
[\[189a.7\]]zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_bu 'di dbyig gi bu yin pas na/_'di'i ming dbyig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu dbyig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas/_de cher skyes te 'gro nus par gyur 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]to/_/klu rnams kyi chos kyis ni nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du lus la klu'i bye ma 'bab ste/_gzhi des na de dag gis sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/_bu de byis pa shed ma bye ba'i bar du ni de'i lus la klu'i 
[\[189b.2\]]bye ma de mi 'bab bo/_/gang gi tshe cher skyes shing shed bye bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni de'i lus la yang klu'i bye ma 'bab par 'gyur te/_gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong nas/_pha ma la dris pa/_yab yum bdag gis yun 
[\[189b.3\]]ji srid cig gi bar du sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur/_pha mas smras pa/_bu ji srid du skal ba mnyam pa 'di yod pa de srid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas bu des bltas na/_klu chen po gzhan dag gi lus la klu'i bye ma mi 'bab pa 
[\[189b.4\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang pha ma la dris pa/_yab yum log par ltung bar gyur pa 'dra na/_ci'i phyir klu chen po 'di dag gi lus la ni klu'i bye ma mi 'bab la/_bdag cag gi lus la ni 'bab/_pha mas de la smras pa/_klu chen po 'di dag ni che bar grags pa yin te/_che 
[\[189b.5\]]bar grags pa yin pas na de dag la ni mi 'bab bo/_/de nas des bltas na rgya mtsho chen po de'i nang na klu bdag cag pas ches ngan pa de dag gi lus la yang klu'i bye ma mi 'bab par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang pha ma la smras pa/_yab yum khyed gnyis na re klu chen po 'di dag ni 
[\[189b.6\]]che bar grags pa yin te/_che bar grags pa yin pas na 'di dag gi lus la klu'i bye ma mi 'bab bo zhe na/_'di na bdag cag pas ches ngan pa gzhan dag kyang yod na/_ci'i phyir de dag la ni klu'i bye ma mi 'bab la bdag cag la ni 'bab/_pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_de dag 
[\[189b.7\]]ni bdag cag bas ches ngan mod kyi/_'on kyang de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na/_de'i phyir de dag gi lus la klu'i bye ma mi 'bab bo/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bu de shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_smras pa yab yum de dag gi skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]pa'i gzhi rnams ga las byung /_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_yul dbus 'dir sangs rgyas byung ste/_de ni bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas/_de las de dag gi skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams byung ngo /_/klu'i bu des smras pa/_yab yum bdag mchi bar gnang bar 
[\[190a.2\]]mdzod cig dang /_gang dag gi mthus bdag gi lus la klu'i bye ma 'bab par mi 'gyur ba'i skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi de dag bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o/_/pha mas smras pa/_bu ma len cig_/lhan cig skyes pa'i bye ma'i sdug bsngal 'di ni chung gi_/skyabs su 
[\[190a.3\]]'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi de dag blangs pa las ma bsrungs na/_gzhi de las sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes nas sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal 'di ni sdug bsngal 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod stong gi char yang mi phod 'bum 
[\[190a.4\]]gyi char yang mi phod do/_/klu'i bus smras pa/_yab yum bdag gi lhan cig skyes pa'i bye ma'i sdug bsngal 'di zhi bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig gi phyir yang ci nus kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_klu'i bu des lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams 
[\[190a.5\]]kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/de nas klu'i bu des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[190a.6\]]mdzes shing yid du 'thad pa dbang po dul ba thugs zhi ba thugs dul zhing rnam par zhi ba'i mchog dang ldan pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song 
[\[190a.7\]]ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos te/_chos 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas de'i klu'i bye ma med par gyur nas/_des bsams pa bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po sel ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma thob par mdzad pa yin na bdag gis bcom 
[\[190b.2\]]ldan 'das kyi bka' drin ji ltar bsab par bya/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad na/_bdag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/_stan las langs 
[\[190b.3\]]te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun 
[\[190b.4\]]gsos dang sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu gzhan dag la yang phan gdags dgos kyis thong shig de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par dbyar 
[\[190b.5\]]bzhugs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs su rgyu zhing gshegs kyis/_su ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de chos gos dag dang 
[\[190b.6\]]chos shig ces sbron cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid dgyes pa'i bar du mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs bzhugs nas rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/de nas klu'i bu des bsams pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar 
[\[190b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyi/_bdag gis lam 'dir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab kyi bar du/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams 
[\[191a.2\]]sbyar bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu de la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas klu'i bu des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar ri_ga nas/_mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab kyi bar 
[\[191a.3\]]gyi lam thog thag tu rdo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams bsal te/_stor khung dang phyi sa'i 'dam dang phyag dar nyal nyil dang shing dang bong ba rnams med par byas nas/_sa gzhi gsing ma sngon pos khyab par byas nas/_spos chab kyis chag chag btab pa/_ngos g.yas 
[\[191a.4\]]g.yon nas me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing dag gis 'khyams 'dra bar dkrigs te/_ne tso dang ri skegs dang rma bya dang /_shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa bkod ma dang /_mtshe'u dang lteng ka dang rdzing rnams me tog dang /_pad ma dang /_ud pa la dang /_ku mu da 
[\[191a.5\]]dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gang bar 'dug la/_ngang pa dang ngur pa dang zal mo rnams skad 'byin pa dag sprul te/_lam thog thag tu bum pa gang ba dang chu shing gi sdong bu dang phreng ba'i mchog rnams ni tshar du sbrengs/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams ni bsgreng 
[\[191a.6\]]ras sna tshogs ni sbyangs rnga yab sna tshogs ni btsugs glo g.yas g.yon du ni gzims khri kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams bshams dar gyi bla re rnams ni bres/_zla ba dang zla ba tshes pa dang me long rnams kyis ni brgyan/_mgul 
[\[191a.7\]]gdub dang gdub bu rgyan can dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan phreng dang se mo do rnams kyis ni mdzes par byas/_me tog sna tshogs kyi chun po rnams kyis ni khebs par byas te sprul to/_/der mi mang po dag kyang sprul te/_la la ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]rnams la gdugs rtsibs brgya pa dag 'dzin par byed/_la la ni bla re 'dzin par byed/_la la ni rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dang /_nor bu'i yu ba can dag gis g.yob par byed/_la la ni ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar rnams 'thor bar 
[\[191b.2\]]byed do/_/klu'i bu de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_des phyogs gang dang gang du bcom ldan 'das mnyel bso ba'i phyogs de dang der gdan rnams sprul par byed do/_/sangs rgyas la 
[\[191b.3\]]sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la sbyar ba'i btung ba dang /_hwags dang /_'dam bu kha ra dang /_kha ra rnams kyis kyang tshim par byed do/_/phyogs gang dang gang du bcom ldan 'das gshegs dgongs mdzad pa'i phyogs de dang der ni rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag 
[\[191b.4\]]khang sprul par byed do/_/dge slong rnams la yang rkang pa bkru ba'i spos chu dang rkang pa bsku ba'i til mar spos can 'bul bar byed do/_/de nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas 
[\[191b.5\]]yang bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byed bla mar byed rim gro byed mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gshegs gshegs pa las rgyal po'i khab tu byon te/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par bzhugs so/_/de 
[\[191b.6\]]nas klu'i bu des yang bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'od ma'i tshal 'di nyid du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang 
[\[191b.7\]]zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ste/_klu'i bu des bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_'od ma'i tshal de nyid du zla ba gsum gyi yo byad thams cad sbyar te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong 
[\[192a.2\]]gi dge 'dun zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan rnams la yang so sor yo byad thams cad phul nas sems dad par byas te/_gral dpon gyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de'i skabs su 
[\[192a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig 
[\[192a.4\]]ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol 
[\[192a.5\]]dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang 
[\[192a.6\]]ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam 
[\[192a.7\]]snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar gyur pa'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden 
[\[192b.2\]]pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_
[\[192b.3\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams 
[\[192b.4\]]dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams 
[\[192b.5\]]kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_'dam bu'i khyim la 
[\[192b.6\]]glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum 
[\[192b.7\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung 
[\[193a.2\]]ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los 
[\[193a.3\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang 
[\[193a.4\]]chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 
[\[193a.5\]]bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de 
[\[193a.6\]]yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra 
[\[193a.7\]]thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod la skye bo phal cher nyan 
[\[193b.2\]]par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/
[\[193b.3\]]kun dga' bo khyod kyis klu'i bu 'dis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la lam dang rgyal po'i khab 'dir bkur sti 'di lta bu byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo klu'i bu 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa brgya'i 
[\[193b.4\]]bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya'i bar du lha dang mi'i nang du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste/_rab tu byung nas slob dpon med pa dang /_man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[193b.5\]]dang 'thun pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas/_rang sangs rgyas smon lam legs par btab pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'di ni de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos yin no//_//seng ge zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[193b.6\]]gleng gzhi yangs pa can na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba chung ma dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_bud med de'i lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri 'byung la/_phyi sa za ba'i sems kyang skyes nas chung 
[\[193b.7\]]mas sde dpon seng ge la bsnyad do/_/de nas sde dpon seng ges bsams pa/_ma la bdag gi chung ma 'di lus srul po 'ga' zhig gis ma brlams grang snyam ste/_des ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na ltas mkhan rnams na re/_'di lus srul pos 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]brlams pa ni ma yin gyi 'di ni sems can lto na 'dug pa de'i mthu yin te/_sems can de nam btsas pa de'i tshe 'di'i skyon de med par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_de'i bu mi sdug pa'i sna grangs 
[\[194a.2\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/_de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thog thag tu phyi sa'i dris gang bar gyur to/_/de nas bud med de dag gis spos sna tshogs kyis byugs te/_mal du bzhag kyang de'i lus las phyi sa'i dri med par ma gyur nas/_chung mas 
[\[194a.3\]]sde dpon seng ge la bu de bstan par mi 'dod pa las bud med gzhan dag gis de la bsnyad de/_jo bo khyod kyi sras ni bltam mod kyi mi sdug pa'i sna grang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa/_lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri 'byung ste/_des na khyim thog thag phyi sa'i dris gang 
[\[194a.4\]]bar gyur to zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu sde dpon seng ge shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/_des bsams pa/_'di ltar bdag gi bu btsas su zin kyang 'di kho na ltar skyon can du gyur na/_bu 'di lta bu bdag la ci dgos kyis mun sros pa'i 
[\[194a.5\]]'og tu khyim nas byung ste/_khyi rnams la sbyin no snyam mo/_/de nas de'i bar skabs su sde dpon seng ge dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas bden pa rnams mthong ste/_des bden pa rnams mthong nas/_bsams pa/_sems can 'di ni las 
[\[194a.6\]]las skyes te/_sngon mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis lus 'di lta bur skyes par gyur nas ngan ngon zhig gsos la cher skyes pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed du gzhug go/_/'on kyang tshe rabs gzhan 
[\[194a.7\]]du lus 'di lta bur skye bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus gsos nas de cher skyes pa dang /_phas de la smras pa/_bu khyod sngon gyi las mi dge ba rnams kyis lus 'di lta 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bur skyes la/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsod nams kyi zhing rkang gnyis pa yin te/_'di la ni bkur sti cung zad cig byas kyang 'bras bu che zhing phan yon che bar 'gyur gyis/_de la bkur sti byos la smon lam legs par thob shig dang /_khyod kyi las de 
[\[194b.2\]]yang bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes byas nas des kyang pha'i ngag mnyan te/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u des pha ma la gsol te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan 
[\[194b.3\]]drangs nas/_bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bshos gsol zin te/_gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 
[\[194b.4\]]kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na khye'u des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig 
[\[194b.5\]]tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas bsams pa/_gal te bdag lus 'di lta bur ma gyur na ni bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[194b.6\]]bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_chu bo rnams las rgal bar bya ba dang /_sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad par bya ba zhig na snyam du sems pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu khye'u de'i byad bzhin mi sdug 
[\[194b.7\]]pa de dang dri mi zhim pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/_de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[195a.2\]]kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom 
[\[195a.3\]]pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon 
[\[195a.4\]]par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge 
[\[195a.5\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong 'dis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas mi sdug pa'i sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan par skyes la lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri 'byung bar gyur lags/_las ci bgyis na rab tu 'byung ba'i 
[\[195a.6\]]sems bskyed ma thag tu mi sdug pa ma mchis par gyur te/_bzang por gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas 
[\[195a.7\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las 'di lta bu byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_ri khrod kyi grong zhig na bram ze gzugs bzang 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig gnas pa de/_byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs nas dge sbyong dang bram ze du ma la brnyas par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de khang thog tu song ste/_bram ze'i khye'u dag gis bskor zhing 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[195b.2\]]rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba'i bse ru lta bu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_rang sangs rgyas shig ri khrod kyi grong khyer 
[\[195b.3\]]der bsod snyoms la song nas/_des bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang po dag rnyed de/_de khyer zhing bram ze de'i khyim gyi sgo drung nas lam po che'i logs su chas pa dang /_de bram ze des mthong nas/_bram ze de'i mdun na yang gyo mo phyi sas gang ba zhig 'dug ste/_
[\[195b.4\]]des tho btsam pa'i bsam pas rang sangs rgyas de'i steng du gyo mo de rkang pas phul nas de'i gos rnams dang de'i lus dang lhung bzed rnams la gos par gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas des yar bltas pa dang bram ze de dga' ches nas bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur te/_lus kyi las 
[\[195b.5\]]kyis tho btsams so/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_nyon mongs pa 'di ni dmas shing nyams par 'gyur gyis 'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang /_char 'bab 
[\[195b.6\]]pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas na/_de shing sog les bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_skal ba chen po mar spyon/_bdag nyes par spyod 
[\[195b.7\]]pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i ra mda' mdzod ces byas so/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des kyang de la snying brtse ba'i phyir sa la babs nas/_/de bram ze des khyim gyi nang du spyan drangs nas/_gos de rnams ni phud de btang lus ni spos kyis byugs te spos chus khrus byed du bcug 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]nas chos gos gzhan dag phul te/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas kyi 
[\[196a.2\]]mchog 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa'i las 'di'i skal ba can du bdag ci nas kyang ma gyur cig_/'di la bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ni ci nas bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/
[\[196a.3\]]'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/brgya la las mi dge ba 'di gdon mi za ba kho nar 'bras bu smin par gyur na/_yang 
[\[196a.4\]]rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi mi sdug pa med par gyur te/_bzang por gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni seng ge'i bu 'di kho na yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas de la gnod pa byas 
[\[196a.5\]]pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mi sdug pa'i sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan par skyes la/_lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri 'byung bar gyur to/_/des der slar bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang 
[\[196a.6\]]dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/
[\[196a.7\]]brgya la las mi dge ba 'di gdon mi za ba kho nar 'bras bu smin par gyur na yang /_rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi mi sdug pa med par gyur te bzang por gyur cig ces byas pas ni/_dge slong dag 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang lhag par ches khyad par du 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]'phags pa mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas nas nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu yang mi sdug pa med par gyur te bzang por gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[196b.2\]]dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sde dpon seng ges las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/_mi 
[\[196b.3\]]mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dge bsnyen du gyur te/_der 'dis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab 
[\[196b.4\]]pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram 
[\[196b.5\]]ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi 
[\[196b.6\]]dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sde dpon seng ge 'di kho na yin te/_des der sbyin pa bdag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 
[\[196b.7\]]gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so//_//dge 'dun gyi dbyen zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mu ge byung nas phongs shing gnas par gyur te slong mo bas kyang kha zas mi rnyed do/_/
[\[197a.2\]]gzhan yang pha mas kyang rang gi bu smad la yang kha zas legs par sbyin pa dang legs par bya bar mi sems na slong ba rnams la lta ci smos/_de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga ni zla ba gsum gyi bar 
[\[197a.3\]]du nang du yang dag 'jog par 'dod kyis bco lnga'i gso sbyong gi dus de nyi tshe dang zhal zas skyel ba ma gtogs par dge slong su yang phrad du ma 'ong cig ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum gyi bar du nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhugs so/_/de nas dge 
[\[197a.4\]]slong rnams kyis nang khrims bcas te/_bco lnga'i gso sbyong gi dus de nyi tshe dang zhal zas skyel ba ma gtogs par dge slong su yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du ma 'gro cig ces byas so/_/de nas lha sbyin gyis bsams pa/_da ni bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan 
[\[197a.5\]]thos kyi dge 'dun 'thun pa'i dbyen bya ba dang /_'khor lo'i dbyen bya ba de'i dus la bab bo snyam nas/_dge slong rnams la smras pa/_btsun pa rnams dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos rnams la ji ltar byas pa la gzigs/_gang gi tshe dge slong rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bstang 
[\[197a.6\]]dgos par gyur pa de'i tshe/_nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas shing 'dug gis dge slong dag tshur sheg bdag gi thad du 'khod cig dang bdag gis khyed rnams yo byad thams cad kyis bstang ngo /_/de nas dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyis de'i tshig mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[197a.7\]]la mi lta ba'i sems bskyed de lha sbyin gyi thad du song nas 'khod do/_/de nas lha sbyin gyis dge slong de rnams bsdus nas smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma dgon par gnas na ni bdag cag grong 'dab tu gnas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag dgon par gnas pa la ni nyes dmigs 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]mang ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas sha za bar gnang na ni bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las sems can rnams gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma lan tshwa za na ni bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khu chu las byung 
[\[197b.2\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma 'o ma 'thung na ni bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las be'u rnams nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma chos gos dras pa gyon na ni bdag cag gis bgo bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi rnams kyi zho shas 
[\[197b.3\]]bsgrubs pa chud zos par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gang dag brtul zhugs kyi gzhi 'di lnga thob nas 'dod cing bzod la 'thad pa sems pa dang /_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad nas 'bye ba dang gzhan du 'gro ba dang /_dge sbyong gau ta ma dang 'bral bar 'dod pa de dag gis ni shing bu long shig ces 
[\[197b.4\]]smras nas/_de nas dge 'dun gyi nang du shing bu brims te/_dge slong lnga brgyas shing bu blangs nas shing bu brims pa'i 'og tu gsol ba byed pa la zhugs te/_btsun pa dge 'dun rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gau ta ma dgon par gnas na ni bdag cag grong 'dab tu gnas par 
[\[197b.5\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag dgon par gnas pa la ni nyes dmigs mang ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas sha za bar gnang na ni bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las sems can rnams gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau 
[\[197b.6\]]ta ma lan tshwa za na ni bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khu chu las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma 'o ma 'thung na ni bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las be'u rnams nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta 
[\[197b.7\]]mas chos gos dras pa gyon na ni bdag cag gis bgo bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi rnams kyi zho shas bsgrubs pa chud zos par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_des na dge 'dun rnams brtul zhugs 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]kyi gzhi 'di lnga yang dag par blangs te gnas par bgyi'o 'di ni gsol ba'o zhes smras nas/_lhas byin gyis dge slong lnga brgya khrid de khyim bya ba'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya bar song nas slob ma'i mchog ko ka li ka dang khan da drab bya dang ka ta mo ra ka dang rgyal dang rgya mtshos byin rnams g.yas 
[\[198a.2\]]gral dang g.yon gral du bzhag ste/_sde tshan gyi gung la 'dug cing ston pa'i btsun chos nyams su myong bar byed do/_/de nas de'i blo skyes pa/_da ni bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thun pa'i dbyen yang byas zin la/_'khor lo'i dbyen yang byas zin no snyam nas/_sde tshan gyi gung la 'dug 
[\[198a.3\]]cing ston pa'i btsun chos nyams su myong bar byed do/_/dge 'dun 'byed pa de'i tshe/_dge slong rnams kyi rnal 'byor yang med yid la byed pa yang med lung nod pa yang med kha ton byed pa yang med la/_mdo sde sems pa dang 'dul ba sems pa dang chos mngon pa sems pa yang mi dran te/_dge ba'i phyogs thams cad kyi 
[\[198a.4\]]bar chad du gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad mdzad na/_phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs 
[\[198a.5\]]gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi 
[\[198a.6\]]sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag 
[\[198a.7\]]gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na drang srong gi gnas shig na drang srong mngon par 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_g.yog 'khor lnga brgya yod pa zhig rten cing gnas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na lho phyogs nas bram ze g.yog 'khor lnga brgya yod pa zhig 'ongs nas drang srong de'i gnas dang nye ba zhig tu btab ste/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze dag gi gsang sngags slob par byed do/_/
[\[198b.2\]]bram ze de yang rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig ste/_snga nas 'dug pa'i drang srong gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bram ze de'i rgyus ri gnas de dag de'i thad du song ste smras pa/_mkhan po bdag cag la yang phan gdags par gsol/_bram zes smras pa/_khyed la 
[\[198b.3\]]ci zhig gis phan gdags par bya/_bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis smras pa/_kha ton bslabs pas phan gdags par gsol/_bram zes smras pa/_nga ni gzhan gyi slob ma la slob par mi byed do/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gi mkhan pos kyang gos dang zas 
[\[198b.4\]]kyis ni sdud par byed mod kyi/_kha ton bslabs pas ni mi nus kyis bdag cag gis 'di bor la bram ze 'di kho na la brten te/_kha ton bslab pa'i phyir 'du bar bya'o snyam nas/_bram ze de la smras pa/_bdag cag gi mkhan po bor te khyod kho na la bdag cag brten par bgyi'o zhes byas so/_/bram ze des 
[\[198b.5\]]smras pa/_gal te de lta na bdag gis khyed gos zas dang kha ton bslabs pas bstang bar bya'o/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis drang srong de gcig pu grogs med par bor nas bram ze de la brten to/_/des kyang de dag gos dang zas dang kha ton bslabs pas bsdus so/_/
[\[198b.6\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_der ngas drang srong de'i 'khor gyi dbyen byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas nga lo grangs mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po 
[\[198b.7\]]dang lo 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos par gyur to/_/de nas nga shi 'phos nas kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der ngas 'khor dang phye ba myong la/_da ltar gyi bar du yang las de'i rnam par smin pas lhas byin gyis nga 'khor dang phye ba yin no//_//
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]las brgya tham pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_nags khung zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe dgon pa nags khung zhig yod de/_nags khrod de na bkod ma'i chu 'khyil ba'i mtshe'u zhig kyang yod la/_mtshe'u de na drang srong lnga brgya tsam rten cing 
[\[199a.2\]]dka' thub spyod de/_de dag thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma pa 'bras bu smin pa mtshon gyis brtol la rag pa dang 'dra ba sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[199a.3\]]pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms 
[\[199a.4\]]par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni 
[\[199a.5\]]nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las 
[\[199a.6\]]lag nas drang bar bya su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[199a.7\]]ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_nags khrod der gshegs pa dang /_drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis thag ring 
[\[199b.2\]]po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gcig la gcig smras pa/_kye dge sbyong gau ta ma g.yel ba mang du len cing 'tsho ba spong ba btang ba de 'dir 'ongs kyis/_de 'ongs kyang bdag cag gis lag brdas spyil po bstan pa ma gtogs par de la smra bar 
[\[199b.3\]]mi bya kun du smra bar mi bya'o zhes smras nas/_drang srong lnga brgya po rnams kyang cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gis de dag gi thad du gshegs te/_thams cad la bka' stsal na/_de dag gis lag brdas spyil po bstan pa ma gtogs par bcom 
[\[199b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi lan ma gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyil po de'i nang du gshegs te/_rtswa stan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag drang ba'i phyir bkod ma'i chu 'khyil ba'i mtshe'u de skams par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas drang 
[\[199b.5\]]srong lnga brgya po de dag gis mtshe'u de na chu med par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag sdug bsngal chen po skyes te lha la gsol ba 'debs shing 'dug go/_/'on kyang de dag gi mtshe'u der chu ma byung ngo /_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir lhas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag la rang gi lus 
[\[199b.6\]]bstan nas smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed bdag cag bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs te ci bya/_bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su deng shig dang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus chu'i mtshe'u 'di snga mkho bzhin du 'ong ngo zhes 
[\[199b.7\]]byas so/_/de nas drang srong lnga brgya po de rnams kyis lhas bsgo ba thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'dug cing 'khod bzhin du bden pa rtogs 
[\[200a.2\]]pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag 
[\[200a.3\]]cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po rnams dge slong 
[\[200a.4\]]tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog go/_/de rnams kyis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum 
[\[200a.5\]]pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig 
[\[200a.6\]]pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de dag rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas nags khrod de nas mi snang 
[\[200a.7\]]bar gyur te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de rnams nags khrod de nyid na 'khod do zhes bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis thos so/_/thos nas kyang nags khrod der rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]lag khang zhig brtsigs te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul lo/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[200b.2\]]pas 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam 
[\[200b.3\]]gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[200b.4\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung nas/_der 'di rnams kyis 
[\[200b.5\]]tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[200b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[200b.7\]]te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rab tu byung ba'i dge slong lnga brgya po de dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de rnams kyis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa 
[\[201a.2\]]la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes 
[\[201a.3\]]par gyur nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//thos pa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs 
[\[201a.4\]]te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig 
[\[201a.5\]]tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na/_de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can/_mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba/_dpral 
[\[201a.6\]]ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas rdzing gi nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur 
[\[201a.7\]]to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid bzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i phas de'i dgun sa dang sos ka'i sa dang dbyar sa'i khyim kha gsum du 
[\[201b.2\]]brtsigs te/_skyed mos tshal yang kha gsum du bcas nas chung ma chen ma dang 'bring ma dang chun ma gsum yang blangs te/_de khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug cing bud med 'ba' zhig gi rol mos rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu myong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[201b.3\]]phyi zhig na de dpyid kyi dus su shing ljon pa mang po me tog rgyas shing /_ne tso dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang rma bya dang shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi nags khrod du g.yog 'khor dang bcas par dong nas/_pheg rdob pas rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/
[\[201b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye 
[\[201b.5\]]mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra 
[\[201b.6\]]chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis/_nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam 
[\[201b.7\]]nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[202a.2\]]rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang 
[\[202a.3\]]srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de gdul bar bya ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis skyed mos tshal de dang nye ba zhig tu skyed mos tshal gcig 
[\[202a.4\]]sprul te/_skyed mos tshal der skye bo phal po che la tshangs pa'i gsung gis chos ston par brtsams so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu des skyed mos tshal de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi gdangs grag pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang bdag gis sngan cad mir gyur pa'i skad 
[\[202a.5\]]kyi gdangs 'di lta bu ma thos so snyam ste ngo mtshar du bzung nas/_bdag der song la skad kyi gdangs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa su yin pa brtag go snyam mo/_/de nas sgra gar grag pa logs su skyed mos tshal cig shos kyi nang du song ba dang /_khyim bdag gi bu de g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas 
[\[202a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras 
[\[202a.7\]]pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mthong nas kyang khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[202b.2\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos 
[\[202b.3\]]bstan te de thos nas/_khyim bdag gi bu des stan de kho na la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu 
[\[202b.4\]]gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_
[\[202b.5\]]bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis pha ma la byas sam/_btsun pa ma bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu sangs rgyas rnams dang 
[\[202b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad kyis pha ma la gsol te phyir shog cig dang /_de'i 'og tu khyod kyi sla bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_khyim bdag gi bu de pha 
[\[202b.7\]]ma'i gan du song ste/_smras pa yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas pha ma gnyis kyis bsams pa bdag cag gis 'di bzlog mi nus so snyam nas smras pa/_bu gnang gis khyod kyis gang gi tshe cung 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]zad khyad par 'ga' zhig thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag la ltar shog cig ces byas so/_/de nas de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas khye'u de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bla gos 
[\[203a.2\]]phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag pha mas gnang ba lags na/_legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[203a.3\]]shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog 
[\[203a.4\]]go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i 
[\[203a.5\]]sems dang ldan pa tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis 
[\[203a.6\]]mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas pha ma gnyis bden pa rnams la bkod de/_sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' rnams la yang btsud nas khyim de chu dong lta bur gyur par byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[203a.7\]]ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa khyim bdag gi bu 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis nas/_'di ltar 'di nyid las brten te khyim gyi nang mi thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[203b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa 
[\[203b.3\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad 
[\[203b.4\]]mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas grong khyer gnyen ldan gyi rgyal pos de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te mchod rten de la srog shing gzugs par bsams nas der skye bo phal po che 'dus 
[\[203b.5\]]pa dang /_rgyal po des skye bo mang po de dag la bsgo ba su mchod rten 'di la nor mang du skyed par byed pa des mchod rten 'di la srog shing tshugs shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu zhig sa phyogs der phyin nas khyim bdag gi bu der rgyal po des de skad ces bsgo ba thos so/_/
[\[203b.6\]]thos nas kyang de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag gis mchod rten 'di la nor ches mang du bskyed de srog shing gzugs par bya na/_bdag la de tsam gyi 'byor pa dag ni med kyis/_ma la bdag gis nye du rnams kyi thad du song la btsal te nor bskyed par bya'o snyam nas/_khyim bdag gi bu des 
[\[203b.7\]]nye du rnams la gsol ba btab pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa brtan por byos la spro ba chen po skyed cig dang khyod kyis nor ji tsam du bskyed pa de snyed nged kyis khyod la sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de dang rgyal po des gong nas gong du bskyed de/_gser bye ba phrag drug cu'i 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]bar du bskyed do/_/de nas rgyal po de gzhi de las mi dga' bar gyur te/_bdag gis bdag la gnod pa 'di lta bu 'di ci dang ci bya snyam nas yid mi bde zhing 'dug go/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha brtan por mdzod la spro ba chen por bskyed par gsol/_
[\[204a.2\]]bdag cag gis lha la nor dbul bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/khye'u de la yang gnyen 'dun mang po rnams kyis bkag ste/_rgyal po 'di'i thugs srung dgos kyis rgyal po dang ma 'gran cig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u des btang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po de gzhi de las 
[\[204a.3\]]dga' bar gyur te/_khye'u de la longs spyod kyi tshogs chen po byin nas mchod rten de la srog shing btsugs te/_ring po ma thogs par rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_/mchod rten de la bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog rnams kyis bkur sti byas te/_mchod rten 
[\[204a.4\]]de'i dus ston gyi lugs bcas so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bsams pa/_mchod rten 'di la bdag gis gser bye ba phrag drug cu bsngos pa'i rdzas 'di dag bdag nyid kyis longs spyad mi phod kyis bdag gis mchod rten 'di nyid la thams cad dbul bar bya'o snyam nas/_khye'u de 
[\[204a.5\]]nye du dang bcas pas mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig_/ston pa 
[\[204a.6\]]'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so/_/de nas nye du mang po rnams kyis de la smras pa/_bu khyod kyis smon lam ji 
[\[204a.7\]]skad btab/_de nas khye'u des de rnams la thams cad bsnyad nas/_thos ma thag tu de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab ste/_bdag cag gis kyang khyod kho na las brten te/_ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'di nyid yin te/_des der mchod rten la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes
