[\[204b.2\]]nas/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes 
[\[204b.3\]]par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de'i tshe nye dur gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni nye du 'di dag nyid yin te/_de dag gis der smon lam btab ste/_bdag cag gis kyang 
[\[204b.4\]]khyod kho na las brten nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/ces byas pa des na dge slong dag 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so/_/las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi 
[\[204b.5\]]pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_mi sdug bde byed gdol pa dang /_/rab bzang dang ni lhar bcas glang /_/snying rje bzang po gel po dang /_/nag po mda' thogs brdzis dang wa/_/mi sdug pa zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das yul gar ga zhes bya bar ljongs rgyu 
[\[204b.6\]]zhing gshegs pa las/_shi shu ma ri'i ri la byon nas/_shi shu ma ri'i ri 'jigs byed kyi tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe shi shu ma ri'i ri la khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_
[\[204b.7\]]rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na/_de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u mi sdug pa'i sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pa zhig btsas nas/_de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis sdug bsngal chen po dang ldan par gyur te/_bdag cag gnyis kyi bu btsas nas kyang 'di kho na lta bur skyon can du gyur na/_'di 'dra ba ci dgos kyis 'di ni shi yang slas phyem red nam sros pa dang khyi rnams la 
[\[205a.2\]]sbyin no snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/_mi gsod pa ni 'jig rten na dmad pa'i steng du/_sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i las byas par 'gyur gyis de ltar mi bgyis par/_bu 'di de ltar skyon can du gyur gyis kyang 'di bdag gis dben pa'i phyogs 
[\[205a.3\]]shig tu gsos la gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_khyim nas bskrad de btang ba dang 'di 'tsho ba ngan ngon tshol bar 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/_de gnyis kyis khye'u de dben pa'i phyogs shig tu gsos so/_/de nas de cher skyes pa dang de'i ming mi sdug pa zhes btags so/_/de nas 
[\[205a.4\]]de khyim nas bskrad de btang nas/_de bkres shing skom pas lus rid par gyur nas 'khar ba dang snod thogs ta slong ba la zhugs so/_/de nas de gang gi khyim sgo'am zong bzhag pa'i sa'am tshong khang du 'ongs pa der grong mi'i byis pa rnams kyis de la khu tshur dang thal lcag dang dbyig pa 
[\[205a.5\]]dang bong ba rnams kyis brdegs te/_'dre 'ongs so zhes zer zhing skrod par byed do/_/de nas de sdug bsngal chen po skyes te/_bdag gis las mi dge ba ci zhig byas na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas bdag gis sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar gyur zhig gu/_bdag grong khyer na 
[\[205a.6\]]gnas pa btang la grong khyer nas byung ste/_skyed mos tshal de dang de dag tu song la slongs mo byas kyang der bdag gis lto gang tsam rnyed grang snyam nas grong khyer nas byung ste/_skyed mos tshal de dang de dag tu rgyu ba la zhugs nas/_der yang de la 'dre yin no snyam nas de dag gis khu 
[\[205a.7\]]tshur dang thal lcag dang dbyug pa dang bong ba rnams kyis brdegs nas skrod par byed do/_/de nas de brdegs pas 'jigs shing skrag la mis 'jigs shing skrag nas/_tshang tshing dag gi nang du zhugs te nyin mo zad par byed la/_nyi ma nub pa'i 'og tu skyed mos tshal de dang de dag 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]tu song nas de dag tu kha zas brul ba gang yin pa de dag tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed do/_/srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can bar ma dor 'chi ba ni gnas med cing skabs med do/_/des der srog zungs cung zad tsam dag rnyed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston 
[\[205b.2\]]pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[205b.3\]]la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan 
[\[205b.4\]]dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar su ni phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab 
[\[205b.5\]]su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las la gnas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 
[\[205b.6\]]gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas 
[\[205b.7\]]byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u mi sdug pa gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs te/_'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa las bzhengs nas/_de kho na gdul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid de bas kyang ches mi sdug pa zhig tu 
[\[206a.2\]]sprul te/_bza' ba dang bca' bas gyo mo bkang nas sa phyogs gang na khye'u mi sdug pa 'dug pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs so/_/de nas khye'u mi sdug pas thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bros te 'di yang 'ongs pa dang bdag la rdeg tu 
[\[206a.3\]]'ong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas de 'bros mi nus pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lta 'dod par gyur te/_'di lta bu su yin pa de re zhig blta'o snyam nas phyir log ste/_khye'u mi sdug pas sprul pa 
[\[206a.4\]]mchog tu mi sdug pa de mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de'i blo skyes pa/_'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig ces dri'o snyam nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de ga la ba der song ba dang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas khye'u mi sdug pa mthong nas/_'bros pa ltar byas pa dang khye'u mi sdug pa des smras pa/_
[\[206a.5\]]grogs po khyod kyis bdag mthong na ci phyir 'bros sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas smras pa/_grogs po bdag ni sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas lus 'di lta bur gyur te/_khyod kyis bdag la 'dre yin no snyam ste brdegs su dogs nas bdag gis khyod mthong nas 'bros so/_/
[\[206a.6\]]khye'u mi sdug pas smras pa/_grogs po bdag kyang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas 'di ltar mi sdug par gyur te/_bdag mi sdug pa'i phyir pha mas khyim nas bskrad de/_bdag slongs mo la gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der khu tshur dang thal lcag dang dbyig pa dang bong 
[\[206a.7\]]ba dag gis brdegs shing bskrad de/_bdag mis brdegs pas 'jigs shing skrag nas tshang tshing 'di'i nang du zhugs te 'dug gis khyod kyang tshur shog dang lhan cig 'grogs te rgyu bar bya'o/_/de nas sprul pa des de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/_de nyid du 'dug ste des de la 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]kha zas kyi bgo bsha' byas nas/_de zos te 'grangs shing ngoms la dbang po brtas nas sprul pa de la sems dga' bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi sdug pa'i gzugs mi snang bar mdzad de/_rang bzhin gyi sku bstan nas khye'u mi sdug pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[206b.2\]]sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma 
[\[206b.3\]]med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ji 'dra ba de lta bu ni/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du 
[\[206b.4\]]zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur te/_de ltar mthong nas lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur te/_de dga' bar gyur nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[206b.5\]]go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas khye'u mi sdug pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa 
[\[206b.6\]]mthong nas bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis lus 'di lta bur ma gyur du zin na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad par bya 
[\[206b.7\]]ba zhig snyam mo/_/de nas rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu khye'u de'i mi sdug pa med par gyur nas byad gzugs bzang por gyur te/_kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing 
[\[207a.2\]]dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson 
[\[207a.3\]]pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang 
[\[207a.4\]]ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams 
[\[207a.5\]]kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mi sdug pas las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_mi sdug 
[\[207a.6\]]pa'i sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/_'di mi sdug pa'i phyir pha ma gnyis kyis khyim nas bskrad la/_rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de'i mi sdug pa ma mchis par gyur te/_byad gzugs bzang por gyur nas 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis shing /_mi 
[\[207a.7\]]mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi sdug pa nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]te dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/_khyim bdag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad kun du 'dzin pa zhig gnas pa las phyi zhig na de khyim na 'dug pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi bzhugs pa'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig 
[\[207b.2\]]rten du 'byung ste/_rang sangs rgyas shig khyim bdag de'i khyim du bsod snyoms la 'ongs nas/_khyim bdag des de la bsod snyoms phul ba las bsod snyoms phul ba'i 'og tu 'gyod pa skyes te/_bdag gis zas 'di dge sbyong mgo reg las med pa 'di la byin pa bas ni tshal 
[\[207b.3\]]za'am las byed pa la byin dang rung ba zhig snyam ste/_de 'gyod par gyur pas kha zas de phyir phrogs nas lus dang ngag gi las tshul mi sdug pa tho btsams te khyim nas bskrad do/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa nyon mongs pa 'di ni dmas shing nyams par gyur te/_
[\[207b.4\]]gtan du dmas par gyur na mi rung gis 'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/_'bar ba dang lam mer 'dug pa dang char pa 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed 
[\[207b.5\]]de/_de shing ljon pa sog les bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_skal ba chen po dang ldan pa mar gshegs/_bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so/_/rang sangs rgyas de yang de kho na la snying brtse 
[\[207b.6\]]ba'i phyir/_sa la babs nas des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_bzod pa gsol nas/_yang bsod snyoms phul te smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yon gnas 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa'i las 'di'i skal ba can du bdag ma gyur cig_/'di ltar bdag gis 
[\[207b.7\]]phyir yang bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/gal te sdig pa'i las 'di'i 'bras bu gdon mi za bar bdag la smin par gyur na yang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi mi sdug pa med par gyur te byad gzugs bzang por gyur cig 
[\[208a.2\]]ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mi sdug pa 'di kho na yin te/_des der rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul ba'i 'og tu phyir phrogs te lus dang ngag gi las tshul mi sdug pas tho btsams nas/_khyim nas 
[\[208a.3\]]bskrad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mi sdug par gyur te khyim nas bskrad do/_/des rang sangs rgyas la phyir yang bsod snyoms phul nas smon lam btab ste/_gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs 
[\[208a.4\]]spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang 
[\[208a.5\]]du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang ches lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa nga lta bu 'dis mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu 
[\[208a.6\]]byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas/_des 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab 
[\[208a.7\]]ste/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_
[\[208b.2\]]dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[208b.3\]]thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_bde byed ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed do/_/grong khyer bA rA Na 
[\[208b.4\]]sI na ni rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de de gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur nas dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ste/_glang po che'i tshogs dang rta'i tshogs dang 
[\[208b.5\]]shing rta'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go bskon nas/_g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thog tu drangs te/_chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du phru ma btab ste 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis yul kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis 
[\[208b.6\]]dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir bdag gi thog tu drangs te/_des chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du phru ma btab ste 'dug go zhes thos nas/_thos ma thag tu des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_g.yul 'gyed 
[\[208b.7\]]pa'i phyir rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi steng du drangs te/_des kyang chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du phru ma btab ste 'dug nas/_de gnyis de na 'dug cing dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed de/_de gnyi ga yang mthu che bas gcig gis gcig mi thub ste/_de gnyis 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]der yun ring mo zhig lon no/_/de nas phyi zhig na de na de 'khod bzhin du rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi btsun mo la bu chags par gyur nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas ma 
[\[209a.2\]]thag tu pho brang 'khor der kun dga' ba'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrags so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so zhes thos nas/_thos ma thag tu dga' bar gyur te/_tshangs pas byin dang 
[\[209a.3\]]gnyen du byas pa'i thabs bdag gis rnyed do/_/bu mo de la brten te 'di dang bdag 'khon med par bya'o snyam bsams nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/_grogs po 'khon med par bya'o/_/bu mo 'di las brten te bdag cag 
[\[209a.4\]]'khon med par bya yis/_bu mo 'o ni bdag gi chung mar byin cig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis de thos ma thag tu dga' bar gyur te bsams pa/_'di dang bdag gis dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed kyis bu mo de la brten te/_'di 
[\[209a.5\]]dang 'khon med par bya'o snyam bsams nas/_des kyang de la pho nya'i lan btang ste/_khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas/_mjal dum byas te/_mgul nas 'khyud nas bu mo sbyin par byas te rang gi yul du song ngo /_/de rang gi yul du song ba dang 
[\[209a.6\]]bu mo 'di'i btsas ston byas nas/_bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dog par byed de/_bu mo 'di btsas pa na yul khams gnyis bde bar gyur pas na bu mo 'di'i ming bde byed ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo bde byed ma 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun 
[\[209a.7\]]mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings so/_/'dod pa rnams ni tshwa chu dang mtshungs te ji tsam du brten pa de tsam du rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na yang rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi btsun mo la bu chags par gyur nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]pa dang bu khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te de'i btsas ston yang rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dog par byed de/_khye'u 'di sring mo bde byed ma'i 'og tu btsas pas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming bde byed ces 
[\[209b.2\]]gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u bde byed 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas mtsho'i nang gi pad ma ltar skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gnyis gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe bu mo bde byed ma dang khye'u bde byed gnyis shin tu 
[\[209b.3\]]mdza' bar gyur te/_skad cig tsam yang gcig med par gcig 'dug mi phod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/_bu mo bu la blang ngo zhes spring ngo /_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang thos ma thag tu/_
[\[209b.4\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya'i lan btang ste/_'di la thogs pa ci yang med kyis che ge mo zhig gi nyin par shog cig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang de ltar bya'o zhes byas nas/_'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yul 
[\[209b.5\]]kA shir song nas/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis khyim pa rnams kyi khyim pa'i chos gang yin pa de bzhin du byas nas bu mo byin no/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu mo khyer te rang gi yul du chas so/_/de nas khye'u bde byed kyis pha ma la smras pa/_che zhe bde byed ma 
[\[209b.6\]]mchis par bdag mchi mi phod kyis bdag kyang 'di dang lhan cig mchi'o zhes byas nas/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu khyod ni nga'i bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs pa rgyal tshab yin te nga 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal po bya dgos so/_/de bas na khyod 
[\[209b.7\]]yul gzhan du 'gror mi rung ngo zhes byas te/_de rgyal pos lan mang du bkag kyang dgag ma nus so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis smras pa/_lha bdag gis 'di ming sring gnyis bskyang bar bgyis mchi yang mi dngo'o zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gyis de ltar bya'o zhes byas nas de btang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu mo bde byed ma dang khye'u bde byed gnyis khrid de mnyan du yod par song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas 
[\[210a.2\]]dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bslabs te/_'di lta ste glang po che zhon pa dang rta zhon pa dang mtshon cha bcang ba dang 'phong dang mdun du bsnur ba dang phyir bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las 'byung bar 
[\[210a.3\]]bya ba dang /_lcags kyu bzung ba dang /_zhags pa bzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stangs 
[\[210a.4\]]dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_sgra grag par 'phang ba dang /_gnad du 'phang ba dang /_gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang tshabs cher btang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de nan tur ma byas pas ma 
[\[210a.5\]]grangs te 'phyon ma la yang zhugs so/_/des yul der tshul ma yin pa brgya tsam byas te/_rgyal po gsal rgyal dang sring mo bde byed mas lan mang du bkag kyang dgag par ma nus nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po tshangs byin la pho nya btang ste/_khyod kyi bu 'di na 
[\[210a.6\]]'dug pas mi rigs pa brgya tsam byas te dgag kyang ma nus so zhes spring ngo /_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis thos ma thag tu bu la spring ba/_bu khyod 'o nir ma 'dug par 'dir shog cig_/nga 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi mnga' bdag bya dgos kyis/_
[\[210a.7\]]mi rigs pa ma byed par 'dir 'dug cig ces byas so/_/'on kyang de phas spring ba ltar rang gi yul du yang ma 'ongs/_bag med pa de dag kyang ma spangs nas/_de gang gi tshe dgag par ma nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bu ma yin par bsgrags so/_/rgyal po gsal 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]rgyal gyis kyang spangs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du yong du ma gnang ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na de rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro 'dod pa las chab sgo bas bkag pa dang nan gyis nang du song ste/_sring mo dang phrad par bya'o zhes zer zhing btsun mo'i sgor 'dug go/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal yang 
[\[210b.2\]]btsun mo bde byed ma dang lhan cig tu pi bang len cing 'dug go/_/de nas khye'u bde byed kyis tshor nas khye'u de'i lag tu mda' gzhu yang bcang ste/_de khros nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs pa las mda' des pi bang gi rgyud bcad de sa la ltung ngo /_/de 
[\[210b.3\]]nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de mthong ma thag tu 'jigs shing skrag ste bros nas shas cher khros te des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di gyin das bsad na ni rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang khrel bar 'ong gis/_'di bdag gis shags kyis pham par byas 
[\[210b.4\]]te gsad par bya'o snyam mo/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi lugs kyis na/_gal te don chung ngu zhig gi phyir shags 'gyed na ni dung sgril ma 'bud du 'jug go/_/de ste shags chen po zhig 'gyed na ni de'i tshe rnga bo che yang rdung la dung sgril ma yang 'bud du 'jug ste/_rgyal po 
[\[210b.5\]]gsal rgyal gyis rnam pa gnyis ka byed du bcug nas/_thos ma thag tu mnyan yod na mi'i gtso bo ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dus te/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po'i bu de shags kyis pham par byas nas/_ka ra bI ra'i me tog gi phreng bas 
[\[210b.6\]]mgul pa dkris te gshed ma la gtad nas/_gshed ma'i mi gos sngon po bgos la ral gri phyung ste rnga sgra drag por sgrogs pa dag gis khrid nas/_lam po che'i mdo rnams su bsgrags te gsod pa'i sar phyin du nye ba dang /_khye'u bde byed snying rje rje skad du bla zhing phan tshun du 
[\[210b.7\]]lta ste/_bdag phongs shing dkos thag pa dang sdug pa'i skyabs byed pa dang srog phangs pa sbyin pa su zhig yod cig gu snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_
[\[211a.2\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig 
[\[211a.3\]]rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song 
[\[211a.4\]]nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[211a.5\]]rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas 
[\[211a.6\]]par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u bde byed gdul ba'i dus la bab bo 
[\[211a.7\]]snyam du dgongs te/_sham thabs dang chos gos gsol nas lhung bzed bsnams te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs nas/_khye'u bde byed kyis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]su song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das ni dka' ba mdzad cing srog phangs pa stsol ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu ma 'jigs shig da khyod kyi srog chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[211b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gzhon nu 'di thong shig_/gshed ma rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la mgo gnyis mchis sam ci na bdag cag gis khye'u 'di gtang bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[211b.3\]]de dag la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag nga rgyal po dang ma phrad kyi bar du re zhig zung shig_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_
[\[211b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khye'u de thong shig_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa gal te rab tu 'byung ba na ni gtang bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gsad pa las bzlog ste bcom ldan 
[\[211b.5\]]'das la phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de la lung yang phog ste des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[211b.6\]]sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa rgyal po'i bu bde byed ma grangs te gsod du btang ba de bcom ldan 'das kyis thar bar mdzad de/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan la 'das pa la gzhag 
[\[211b.7\]]pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ma grangs shing g.yem par gyur nas tshangs pas byin gyis gsod du btang ba las/_ngas skyabs byas te/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la ji 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ltar bzhag pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI de nyid na mi zhig ma grangs shing g.yem ste/_gzhi de las grong khyer pa rnams 'khrugs nas skye bo mang po rnams 
[\[212a.2\]]kyis de bzung ste/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin la phul nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gsod du btang ste/_de gshed ma rnams kyis khrid nas gsad pa'i sar phyin te/_de gsad pas 'jigs skrag nas phan tshun lta zhing 'dug ste/_bdag la dka' ba byed pa dang srog phangs pa 
[\[212a.3\]]byin par byed pa su zhig yod zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i phyogs shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig yod pa de bA rA Na sIr spyod yul la song ba las mi des mthong ste/_mthong ma thag tu rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[212a.4\]]smras pa/_drang srong dag bdag la dka' ba mdzad cing srog phangs pa stsal bar gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas drang srong des gshed ma rnams la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag mi 'di ma gsad par thong shig_/gshed ma rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis 
[\[212a.5\]]mchis sam ci na/_bdag cag gis 'di btang bar bgyi/_drang srong gis smras pa/_nga rgyal po dang ma phrad kyi bar du re zhig zung shig ces byas nas/_drang srong de rgyal po tshangs pas byin ga la ba der song nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mi de ma gsad par thong shig_/rgyal po 
[\[212a.6\]]tshangs pas byin gyis smras pa/_drang srong gal te rab tu 'byung na ni btang bar bgyi'o zhes byas nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis mi de phrin gyis gsad pa las bzlog ste drang srong de la phul nas/_drang srong des dka' thub kyi gnas su khrid de rab tu byung nas lung yang phog go/_/mi des 
[\[212a.7\]]kyang dka' thub kyi gnas de nyid na 'dug bzhin du bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe mi gang yin pa de ni khye'u bde byed yin no/_/de'i 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]tshe rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang des 'di gsod du btang ba las ngas skyabs byas te/_rab tu phyung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bzhag go/_/da yang 'di rgyal po gsal 
[\[212b.2\]]rgyal gyis gsod du btang ba las ngas bskyabs te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa gzhon nu bde byed kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs 
[\[212b.3\]]spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[212b.4\]]mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig 
[\[212b.5\]]pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur te/_
[\[212b.6\]]des der chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byas nas/_byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin kyang bskyed do/_/des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i 
[\[212b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong zhal ta bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal po'i bu bde byed 'di nyid yin te/_des der chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa dang byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shing tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang 
[\[213a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa/_gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[213a.3\]]spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pas na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes 
[\[213a.4\]]par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/des der chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa des ni/_phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so/_/des byams 
[\[213a.5\]]pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa des na/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to//_//gdol pa'i khye'u zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer gyen du rgyal zhes bya ba na/_grong gi byang phyogs shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul 
[\[213a.6\]]gyen du rgyal na rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do/_/yul su bi ra zhes bya ba na ni rgyal po 'char ka zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de gnyis mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs te dus dus su pho nya dang skyes kyis 'drul lo/_/rgyal po rab snang gi yul na a mra rab tu dkon te/_su bi 
[\[213a.7\]]ra'i rgyal pos rgyal po rab snang dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/_a mra mang po skyes su bskur ro/_/de nas rgyal po rab snang gis kha cig ni btsun mo la byin no/_/kha cig ni bu rnams la byin no/_/kha cig ni blon po rnams la byin no/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis a mra 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]zos nas blo skyes pa/_bdag gi yul 'di na a mra med kyis bdag gis a mra'i sa bon 'di rnams bdag gis skyed mos tshal du rmo'o snyam du bsams nas/_des a mra'i sa bon de dag khyer te/_rang gi skyed mos tshal du rmos nas/_de dag ring po ma thogs par skyes te/_
[\[213b.2\]]cher gyur nas ring po ma thogs par tshal chen por gyur te yal ga rnams rgyas par gyur to/_/phyi zhig na de dag me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags nas/_rgyal po rab snang gis de dag gzhan dag mi za bar bya ba'i phyir/_gdol pa rnams a mra de dag gi srungs mar bskos 
[\[213b.3\]]so/_/de nas phyi zhig na gdol pa de dag nyid kyis a mra de rnams zos nas rkun po byung zhes bsgrags te/_'di 'di dag ni rkun pos zos so zhes zer to/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis 'phrigs te/_gdol pa 'di dag nyid kyis a mra 'di dag zos grang snyam du 
[\[213b.4\]]bsams nas/_des rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rnams btang ste/_gdol pa'i khyim tshol du bcug pa las/_de dag der song ba dang a mra'i rus pa de dag mthong nas/_de nas rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang la gsol to/_/de nas 
[\[213b.5\]]gtum po rab snang khros pas gdol pa 'khor dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du btsud de/_khyim gyi kho ra khor yug nas rtswa spungs te me btang nas bsregs so/_/grong de'i nang nas gdol pa'i khye'u gcig gdol pa'i las kyis ngo tsha nas lho phyogs su song ngo /_/der song nas bram 
[\[213b.6\]]ze'i cha lugs su zhugs te lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i rig pa bslabs so/_/des de bslabs nas/_phyir grong khyer gyen du rgyal du phyir 'ongs nas/_rang gi khyim du song song ba las de bltas na grong thams cad mes tshig par mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu grong 'di sus ma rung 
[\[213b.7\]]bar byas zhes dris na/_des rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis byas so zhes thos nas des smras pa/_bdag gi nye du de rnams gar song /_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang khros pas rtswa spungs pas bskor te 'khor dang bcas pa mes bsregs so zhes byas so/_/
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de sdug bsngal chen pos thebs nas des bsams pa/_skyes pa rnams kyis ni dngos su nyes par byas pas/_de dag la ni des khrims bzhin du byas na/_byis pa dang bud med rnams kyis de la nyes pa ci zhig byas na de dag kyang 
[\[214a.2\]]mes bsregs/_da ni ngas kyang dus ngan pa'i rgyal po des byas pa'i sha glan par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bdag nyid mi snang bar byas te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas/_des rgyal po la mgo lcag gis gzhus te/_dus ngan pa'i rgyal po khyod la gdol pa de dag gis nyes 
[\[214a.3\]]pa ci byas/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa/_de dag gis nga'i a mra rnams med par byas so/_/gdol pa'i khye'us smras pa/_gal te skyes pa rnams kyis nyes su zin kyang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyis nyes pa ci byas/_da ni rgyal po 'chal ba khyod 
[\[214a.4\]]bya ba ci yod pa dang don ci yod pa de byos shig_/khyod gson pa'i dus zad de zhag bdun na 'chi dgos so zhes byas nas/_gdol pa'i khye'u de nyin gcig bzhin rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ste rgyal po la rdeg cing 'di skad du/_che ge mo'i nyin par khyod med par bya'o zhes 
[\[214a.5\]]kyang zer ro/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'jigs shing skrag nas/_blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha mi bsnyengs su gsol/_bdag cag gis 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na la gsol pa gdab bo zhes smras nas/_blon po rnams tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i 
[\[214a.6\]]thad du song nas smras pa/_'phags pa rgyal po la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis gnod pa bgyid na de'i skyabs mdzad par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu 'phags pa kA t+yA ya nas/_gdol pa'i khye'u de'i rig sngags de ci nas phyin chad mi snang bar byed mi 
[\[214a.7\]]nus par byas so/_/de nas des bsams pa/_bdag gi rig sngags su zhig gis ma rung bar byas zhig gu snyam nas/_blon po de rnams la dris pa/_kye rgyal po mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa de las su zhig gis skyabs byas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]pa kA t+yA ya nas byas so/_/de nas thos ma thag tu gdol pa'i khye'u de/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na ga la ba der song nas smras pa/_btsun pa khyod kyis ci'i slad du bdag gis rig sngags rengs par mdzad/_kA t+yA ya nas smras pa/_bu 'dug shig dang khyod la rgyas par bsnyad par 
[\[214b.2\]]bya'o/_/de nas gdol pa'i khye'u des/_'phags pa kA t+yA ya na'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya nas/_de la mthar gyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na gdol pa'i khye'u des stan de kho na la 'dug bzhin du 
[\[214b.3\]]'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na ga la ba de logs su thal mo 
[\[214b.4\]]sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod 
[\[214b.5\]]pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya nas de rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom 
[\[214b.6\]]pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par 
[\[214b.7\]]shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas blon po de dag gis thos nas rgyal po 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gtum po rab snang la gsol pa/_lha khyod gang gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa de ni 'phags pa kA t+yA ya nas rab tu phyung lags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de yid dga' bar gyur nas/_kA t+yA ya na ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_'phags 
[\[215a.2\]]pa kA t+yA ya na'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa ni bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa dang /_srog phangs pa stsol ba lags kyis/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gi khyim du dgung bdun bshos gsol bar ci gnang /_kA t+yA ya nas smras pa/_
[\[215a.3\]]lha gyen du rgyal 'di nyid na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das spyan drongs shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan 
[\[215a.4\]]pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[215a.5\]]rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[215a.6\]]'phags pa kA t+yA ya na'i slad du/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag gi khyim du dgung bdun bshos gsol bar ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas cang mi gsung bas 
[\[215a.7\]]gnang bar rig nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas des pho brang gi nang du 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos gsol nas/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la/_zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge 
[\[215b.2\]]slong gzhan rnams la ni re re la ras bcos bu zung re phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas 
[\[215b.3\]]gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gdol pa'i khye'u 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom 
[\[215b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las 'di byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[215b.5\]]dus na/_'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha 
[\[215b.6\]]dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya 
[\[215b.7\]]ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po mnyan yod kyis sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu 'byor pa chen po dang ldan pas/_spos kyi shing rnams spungs nas de'i ring bsrel zhugs la bzhen to/_/de nas de'i sku gdung rnams gzhan gyis mi khyer bar bya ba'i phyir/_sku 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]gdung bzhugs pa de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na gdol pa dag cig srungs mar bskos te/_gdol pa de dag sa phyogs der nyal ba las gdol pa zhig stag gis khyer nas/_gdol pa gzhan zhig 'jigs shing skrag ste/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[216a.2\]]lo zhes brjod nas/_de sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rnams kyis skyabs byas so/_/de nas gang gi tshe der rgyal po mnyan yod kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas 
[\[216a.3\]]nas/_dus ston gyi lugs su gtod pa de'i tshe gdol pa de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag gson por gyur pa ni ci yang rung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu yin no snyam du rig nas/_des mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas te smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i 
[\[216a.4\]]rtsa ba 'dis na/_'di kho na dang 'dra ba'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[216a.5\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe gdol par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gdol pa'i khye'u 'di kho na yin te/_des mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang /_shin tu 
[\[216a.6\]]mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[216a.7\]]sum du byas so/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_dge slong 'thab krol can kha mi mkhas pa zhig tu gyur nas/_des der dge slong mang po dag la khros te/_gdol pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod nas phyi zhig na 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]de 'gyod pa skyes te/_des dge slong de dag la bzod pa gsol nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob ste 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang 
[\[216b.2\]]yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces 
[\[216b.3\]]byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gdol pa'i khye'u 'di kho na yin te/_des der dge slong mang po la gdol pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa'i 
[\[216b.4\]]las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_tshe rabs lnga brgyar gdol pa'i rigs su skyes so/_/des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang 
[\[216b.5\]]yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas 
[\[216b.6\]]pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes 
[\[216b.7\]]par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//rab bzang zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po zas gtsang gi kha lo pa rab bzang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des thabs zlar bab pa las 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang de la bu med de/_bu 'dod pa'i phyir lha gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal 
[\[217a.2\]]gyi lha dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos 'thun pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len du zin kyang bu yang 
[\[217a.3\]]ma byung bu mo yang ma byung ngo /_/der gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sku bltam pa de'i tshe/_mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/_chos gos tshon 
[\[217a.4\]]can dag bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan nas tshig de kha lo ba rab bzang gis thos 
[\[217a.5\]]nas/_thos ma thag tu de sdug bsngal chen po skyes te/_gal te bdag gi bu zhig yod na ni de gzhon nu'i kha lo par 'gyur te/_de lta na kha lo pa rabs chad par mi 'gyur zhig gu snyam du bsams nas/_lhag par yang lha so so la gsol ba 'debs pa la 
[\[217a.6\]]zhugs so/_/de'i tshe der byang chub sems dpas rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba mthong nas nags kyi nang du gnas bcas te/_de der song nas lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad de/_de der lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad nas se ri ka'i grong mi'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' 
[\[217a.7\]]stobs las 'o ma lan bcu drug tu nying gur byas pa'i 'o thug sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bzhes so/_/de nas rtswa 'tshong bkra shis ldan las rtswa bzhes so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos mngon par bstod cing byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te/_nyid kyis rtswa rnams ma 'khrugs 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]par bting nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas/_nam bla na med pa'i ye shes ma thob kyi bar du skyil mo krung mi bshig go zhes thugs dam brtan por bsams so/_/des der bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug bcom nas/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[217b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i ye shes brnyes so/_/de nas tshangs pas bskul nas bA rA Na sIr lan gsum du bzlas te/_rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin bskor te lnga sde rnams rab tu phyung ngo /_/de nas nye ba'i lnga sde rnams dang bzang sde'i pha tshan pa drug cu dang grong gi 
[\[217b.3\]]byis pa gtso bo'i mchog lnga bcu dang dga' mo dang dga' stobs spun gnyis bden pa la bkod nas/_lteng rgyas 'od srung dang chu klung 'od srung spun gnyis rab tu phyung ste ga yAr gshegs nas/_cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis btul te smyig ma'i nags khrod du gshegs nas 
[\[217b.4\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bden pa la bkod do/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs te/_'od ma'i tshal bzhes nas dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis rab tu 
[\[217b.5\]]phyung ste mnyan du yod par gshegs nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu lta bu'i mdo sdes btul te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bzhes nas ser skya'i gnas su gshegs te/_yab sras mjal nas ser skya'i gnas su rten bcas te/_gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi don 
[\[217b.6\]]mdzad cing bzhugs so/_/de nas kha lo pa rab bzang gi sems skyes pa/_bdag ni da ltar bu med de bdag shi ste dus las 'das na ni/_ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang byed par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu bskya bar bya'o snyam nas/_
[\[217b.7\]]des phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs te/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bstsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/_stan ches 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_
[\[218a.2\]]chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas kha lo pa rab bzang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi 
[\[218a.3\]]mjug rdzogs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di ni bdag gi yun ring po'i ston pa lags te/_kye ma bdag la bu zhig skyes na ni/_ji ltar bdag rgyal po zas gtsang gi kha lo pa 'tshal ba de bzhin du/_de yang gzhon 
[\[218a.4\]]nu'i kha lo par 'gyur ba zhig na/_da ni bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyung ste/_de ltar gyur gyis kyang gal te da dung yang bdag gi bu zhig byung na ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du dbul bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i yon tan gzigs 
[\[218a.5\]]nas bka' stsal pa/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin no zhes gsungs nas/_de'i khyim nas bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na kha lo pa rab bzang gi chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu btsas te 
[\[218a.6\]]khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di rab bzang gi bu yin pas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming bzang po zhes gdags so zer ro/_/de 
[\[218a.7\]]nas khye'u bzang po 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas de mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang /_khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_dgram pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_nor bu brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_spos brtag pa dang /_sman brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge 
[\[218b.2\]]mkhas pa dang /_klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang /_bya ba la gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu 'byung ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/_kha 
[\[218b.3\]]lo pa rab bzang la bka' stsal pa rab bzang khye'u 'di ni ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas khyod kyis nga la phul te/_khong dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na de kho na ltar dam ma bcas sam/_rab bzang gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de kho na ltar dam bcas 
[\[218b.4\]]lags so zhes gsol nas/_rab bzang gis khye'u de lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/_smras pa bu khyod ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas ngas bcom ldan 'das la phul gyis/_song la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring gyis shig_/khye'us 
[\[218b.5\]]smras pa/_de ni bdag la phan btags pa lags so zhes smras nas/_khye'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kha lo pa rab bzang la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs 
[\[218b.6\]]bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khrid de gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de der khrid nas/_rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas 
[\[218b.7\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po sel bar mdzad pa dang bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma sgrub par 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]mdzad pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sel bar mdzad pa dang /_dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sgrub par mdzad pa yin na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin ji ltar bsab par bya snyam ste/_des bsams pa sangs rgyas rnams 'jig 
[\[219a.2\]]rten du 'byung ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/_sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'byung bar zad kyi/_ma la bdag gis kyang sems can gyi don bya'o snyam ste bdag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lta 'ga' mchis sam zhes bsams te/_des bltas na thog ma kho nar 
[\[219a.3\]]pha ma gnyis 'dul bar 'gyur bar rig nas de gtsug lag khang nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bdag gi khyim du pha ma gnyis kyi mdun nas sa brtol te byung nas de ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_pha ma gnyis kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang 
[\[219a.4\]]lam mer 'dug pa dang char 'bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas sa la babs te/_des pha ma gnyis kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas pha ma gnyis stan de kho na 
[\[219a.5\]]la 'dug bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de gnyis kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_bu bdag cag gnyis kyang khyim na gnas pa btang la/_khyod 
[\[219a.6\]]rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/_/bzang pos smras pa/_khyed gnyis ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa bzang po de gnyis kyi khyim nas phyir song ngo /_/de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis khyim gyi 'khor btang ste/_sbyin 
[\[219a.7\]]pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bzang pos las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/_mi 
[\[219b.2\]]mnyes par ma bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_de'i pha ma gnyis kyis kyang las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di kho na las brten nas/_bcom 
[\[219b.3\]]ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/
[\[219b.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su 
[\[219b.5\]]ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad 
[\[219b.6\]]mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po mdzes pas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod 
[\[219b.7\]]rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsig par brtsams te/_des der blon po ma dad pa zhig lag dpon du bskos nas/_blon po des bu de la smras pa bu ngas ni rgyal po'i bsgrub pa dang rgyal po'i bya ba dag bya dgos te/_
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]ngas gnyi ga lag gis mi khyab pa'i steng du/_'di 'ba' zhig la 'tshal na bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang du bya ba rnams shor bar 'gyur gyis/_khyod kyis 'dir mchod rten gyi lag gi zhal ta gyis shig dang ngas rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring bya'o/_/khye'us 
[\[220a.2\]]smras pa/_yab ji ltar dgyes pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas de de na mchod rten gyi lag gi zhal ta byed cing 'dug ste/_de der las byed pa la zhugs so/_/de de na las byed pa na sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i 
[\[220a.3\]]gzhi rnams blangs so/_/des der pha ma gnyis kyang dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bkod de/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la yang bkod do/_/der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pas mchod rten de rnam pa thams cad du zin par byas nas mchod pa chen po 
[\[220a.4\]]byas te/_mchod rten gyi dus ston gyi lugs gtod pa de'i tshe/_blon po de gza' bran dang blon po'i bu des mchod rten de rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par mthong nas mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/_mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas de dag gis mchod rten de la bkur 
[\[220a.5\]]sti chen po byas te/_blon po'i bu des mchod rten gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/gzugs bzang zhing blta na 
[\[220a.6\]]sdug la mdzes par gyur cig_/ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so/_/
[\[220a.7\]]de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de mthong nas/_bu khyod kyis smon lam ji skad btab ces dris pa dang /_des de gnyis la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad nas/_de thos ma thag tu de gnyis kyis kyang smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag cag gnyis kyang gang 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/'di nyid bdag cag gi bur gyur nas 'di kho na las brten te/_bdag cag gnyis kyis ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur 
[\[220b.2\]]cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe blon po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bzang po 'di kho na yin no/_/
[\[220b.3\]]de'i tshe pha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni pha ma 'di gnyis kho na yin no/_/des mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge 
[\[220b.4\]]slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa 
[\[220b.5\]]la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/der pha ma de gnyis kyis mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs 
[\[220b.6\]]spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/_bu 'di kho na las brten te 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas pa la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/gzhan yang yang dag 
[\[220b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la yang 'di gsum char rab tu byung ste/_der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po yongs su smin par byas te des na da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po bcu dgu 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa/_lhar bcas zhes bya ba ni/_yul ser skya'i gnas na rgyal po seng ge 'gram zhes bya ba ni rgyal po byed do/_/yul lha mthong zhes bya ba na ni rgyal po legs rtogs rgyal po byed de/_de gnyis mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[221a.2\]]po seng ge 'gram yid smon byed pa/_kye ma bdag gi rgyud du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byung na ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas mthar gyis de'i bu bzhi byung ste/_zas gtsang dang bre bo zas dang bdud rtsi zas dang zas dkar rnams byung ngo /_/bu mo yang bzhi byung ste/_dag 
[\[221a.3\]]ma dang /_bre mo ma dang /_bdud rtsi ma dang /_dkar mo rnams byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po legs rtogs yid smon byed pa/_kye ma bdag seng ge 'gram dang gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas de yang btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod 
[\[221a.4\]]pa las bu btsas te de'i ming lhar bcas zhes btags so/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che zhon pa dang /_rta zhon 
[\[221a.5\]]pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phong dang mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las 'byung bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyu gzung ba dang /_zhags pa gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab 
[\[221a.6\]]pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stabs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_sgra grag par 'phang ba dang /_gnad du 'phang ba dang gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang 
[\[221a.7\]]tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur te de 'dra ba'i zla gzhan med do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po legs rtogs la bu mo gnyis byung ste/_de la gcig gi ming ni sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so/_/gcig gi ming ni sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes btags te/_
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]de gnyis bram ze mtshan mkhan bye brag phyed pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_gcig la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/cig shos la ni gzhon nu mtshan dang ldan pa btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyis thos nas 
[\[221b.2\]]de gnyis zas gtsang gi btsun mor blangs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i ris dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs te/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang sras bltam ste/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug 
[\[221b.3\]]nas de yi ge mthar phyin par gyur to/_/bstan bcos thams cad kyang des rtogs so/_/gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra thams cad la yang mthar phyin to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/_da ni gzhon nu la 'phong bslab dgos so snyam nas shAkya rnams la dris 
[\[221b.4\]]pa/_'di na 'phong gi slob dpon gyi mchog su yod su la bslabs na gzhon nu 'phong lobs par 'gyur zhes smras so/_/shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'phong gi slob dpon gzhan lta zhog ste/_rgyal po legs rtogs kyi bu lhar bcas zhes bgyi ba 'phong gi slob dpon 
[\[221b.5\]]gyi mchog cig mchis te/_de 'dra ba'i zla gzhan ma mchis so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang gis lhar bcas pho nyas bkug nas smras pa/_lhar bcas khyod kyis gzhon nu 'di la 'phong slobs shig_/lhar bcas kyis smras pa/_ji ltar lhas dgongs 
[\[221b.6\]]pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas de gzhon nu 'phong slob pa la zhugs te/_/des byang chub sems dpa' la ci bya'o cog bstan nas thams cad lobs so/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang gang la lhar bcas kyi yul ma yin pa'i thabs gzhan dag bstan to/_/de nas lhar bcas 
[\[221b.7\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa'i brtson pa dang sngon ma byung ba'i thabs rnams mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_des 'phong gi thabs de dag gi slob ma byas nas byang chub sems dpa' las bslabs so/_/des gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba mthong nas/_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]nags kyi nang du gnas bcas pa de'i tshe/_lhar bcas ni yangs pa can du song nas de na 'dug pa dang yangs pa can gyi mi rnams kyis de la gzhon nu lnga brgya gtad de/_khyod kyis gzhon nu 'di rnams gnas lnga po rnams slobs shig ces byas nas/_
[\[222a.2\]]des ring po ma thogs par gzhon nu lnga brgya po rnams la 'phong bslabs te/_de dag gnas lnga'i mthar phyin par gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di lta bu'i rgyags pa skyes te/_su yang bdag cag las gzugs dang stobs dang shes pas mtshungs pa yang med na lhag pa lta ci 
[\[222a.3\]]smos snyam mo/_/de nas de dag la lhar bcas kyis smras pa/_bu dag rgyags par ma byed cig_/khyod ni shAkya dag gi nang du gzhon nu skyes pa de'i rkang pa'i rdul dang yang mi mtshungs na/_byad gzugs sam stobs sam shes pas mnyam pa lta ci smos zhes byas so/_/de 
[\[222a.4\]]nas de thos ma thag tu gzhon nu de dag lta 'dod par gyur te/_bdag cag dong la gzhon nu de blta bar bya'o zhes zer to/_/de nas lhar bcas kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu des ni nags kyi nang du gnas bcas te/_da khyod kyis de mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas 
[\[222a.5\]]de'i bar skabs su bcom ldan 'das gdul bar bya ba'i don mdzad cing /_mthar gyis yangs pa can du gshegs so/_/de nas lhar bcas kyis de thos nas gzhon nu de dag la sbran te/_de thos ma thag tu gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag lta 'dod ches nas/_lhar bcas dang lhan cig 
[\[222a.6\]]tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas/_gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes shing yid du 'thad la dbang po zhi ba thugs zhi ba thugs mchog tu dul ba dang rnam par zhi ba dang ldan pa gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[222a.7\]]mthong nas kyang de dag gi gzugs kyi rgyags pa gang yin pa de dag med par gyur te/_de rnams kyis bsams pa/_'di bdag cag las byad gzugs kyis ni ches lhag mod kyi stobs kyis ni de lta ma yin no snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_'di rnams kyi nga rgyal bcag dgos so snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed 
[\[222b.2\]]de/_kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mda' gzhu blangs te nga la ltar 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mda' gzhu blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs so/_/
[\[222b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de dag gi nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir/_rang bzhin gyi sku mi snang bar mdzad de lha'i lus lta bur sprul nas/_gzhon nu de dag dang thag mi ring ba zhig tu lcags kyi ta la bdun dang /_'khor lo bdun dang /_rnga bo che bdun dang /_phag bdun 
[\[222b.4\]]sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de dag la bka' stsal pa/_bu dag khyed kyis mda' gzhu 'di long la 'ben 'di la mda' 'phongs shig ces gsungs nas de thos ma thag tu gzhon nu de dag gis gzhu blangs te bdung zhes byas na/_bdung yang ma nus nas bcom 
[\[222b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bde blag tu bdungs te/_mda' yang blangs nas mda' de 'ben de dag la 'phangs te/_des lcags kyi ta la bdun dang /_'khor lo bdun dang /_rnga bo che bdun dang /_phag bdun las thal nas mda' de sa'i 'og tu song ngo /_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu 
[\[222b.6\]]gzhon nu de dag gi stobs kyis rgyags par gyur pa gang yin pa de yang med par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das la yang dga' bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag yid dga' bar gyur par thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas gzhon nu 
[\[222b.7\]]lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de kho na la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsa mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu 
[\[223a.2\]]rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog go/_/de dag gis 
[\[223a.3\]]kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil 
[\[223a.4\]]du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas 
[\[223a.5\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu lnga brgya po rnams lhar bcas las brten te/_nga rgyal bcag nas g.yung drung gi 
[\[223a.6\]]mthar phyin pa dang /_grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhag pa gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'di rnams lhar bcas las brten te/_dregs pa bcom nas/_bsam gtan 
[\[223a.7\]]bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer tsam pa zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po gang chen mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_phyi zhig na de'i btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am zla ba bcu lon 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]pa dang bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di gang chen mtsho'i lha'i bu yin pas na khye'u 'di'i 
[\[223b.2\]]ming rgya mtsho'i lha zhes gdags so zhes zer to/_/de nas khye'u rgya mtsho'i lha 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[223b.3\]]rgyal po rnams kyis bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che zhon pa dang /_rta zhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phong ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las 'byung bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyu gzung ba dang /_zhags 
[\[223b.4\]]pa gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stabs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_
[\[223b.5\]]sgra grag par 'phang ba dang /_gnad du 'phang ba dang /_gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /_tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas des bltas na/_pha chos bzhin dang /_chos bzhin ma yin par rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas 
[\[223b.6\]]de'i blo skyes pa/_pha 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag gis rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bya dgos par 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la nags kyi nang du gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_yab la gsol te nags kyi nang du gnas bcas 
[\[223b.7\]]so/_/des der song nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/de rab tu byung ba dang rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya'i bu btsas nas/_de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_de dag yi ge slob tu bcug ste gnas lnga'i bar du byang bar gyur to/_/de dag blo 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]'di lta bu skyes te gzhan su yang byad gzugs dang stobs dang shes pas bdag cag dang mnyam pa yang med na lhag pa lta ci smos snyam mo/_/de nas 'phong gi slob dpon gyis de dag la smras pa/_bu dag de skad ma zer cig_/khyod ni rgyal po 'di nyid kyi bu rab 
[\[224a.2\]]nags kyi nang du gnas bcas pa de'i byad gzugs dang stobs dang shes pa'i brgya'i char yang mi phod stong gi char yang mi phod do zhes byas nas/_de thos ma thag tu gzhon nu de dag drang srong de lta 'dod par gyur te/_'phong gi slob dpon de nyid dang lhan cig tu drang srong de ga la ba der dong 
[\[224a.3\]]nas/_gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas drang srong mdzes shing yid du 'thad la dbang po zhi zhing yid zhi ba de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag gi gzugs kyi rgyags pa gang yin pa de med par gyur te/_de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag gi slob dpon gyis 
[\[224a.4\]]'di'i byad gzugs mdzes pa dang yon tan rnams bsngags pa las/_'di'i byad gzugs de kho na bzhin du gyur pa las na/_'di'i yon tan rnams kyang de kho na bzhin du yod par nges kyis/_bdag cag khyim na gnas pa btang la 'di nyid kyi thad du tshangs par spyod par spyad 
[\[224a.5\]]par bya'o snyam du bsams nas de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/_de dag der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid 
[\[224a.6\]]yin no/_/de'i tshe gzhon nu lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'di dag nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe 'phong gi slob dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni lhar bcas 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di rnams lhar bcas 'di kho na la brten te/_ngas dregs pa bcom nas bsam gtan 
[\[224a.7\]]bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do/_/da ltar yang 'di rnams lhar bcas kho na las brten te/_ngas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dag thams cad rab tu byung ste/_der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis 
[\[224b.2\]]mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe/_yang dag par 
[\[224b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni/_da ltar rab tu byung ba 'di dag nyid yin te/_de dag gis der rab tu byung nas tshe gcig gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag 
[\[224b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[224b.5\]]cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur 
[\[224b.6\]]nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//glang zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe 
[\[224b.7\]]mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas thag mi ring ba zhig na/_ba lang gi khyu dag cig 'khod de/_der glang khyu mchog gnyis 'thabs nas gcig gis gcig brdungs nas gcig gi lto dral te/_de'i rgyu ma sa la lhung nas zla de la sdang ba'i sems skyes te sa la 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sgyel to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba 
[\[225a.2\]]lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_
[\[225a.3\]]yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod
