[\[225a.4\]]pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag 
[\[225a.5\]]nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i 
[\[225a.6\]]rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/
[\[225a.7\]]gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te glang de da lta'i skabs su shi bar gyur na ni/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/_'di ngan song las dbyung ba'i dus la bab po snyam 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te glang gi drung du gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis glang de'i rgyu ma rnams phyir lto'i nang du bcug ste/_rma kha drubs nas rtswa dang chu yang byin te bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di 
[\[225b.2\]]ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas de bcom ldan 'das la sems 
[\[225b.3\]]dga' bar gyur te/_shi 'phos nas dus las 'das te mnyan du yod pa de nyid du tshong dpon zhig gi khyim du nying mtshams sbyar nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas 
[\[225b.4\]]te/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe lo bdun lon par gyur pa de'i tshe/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_des pha ma gnyis la gsol 
[\[225b.5\]]te rab tu byung nas/_des lo bdun lon pa kho na nyid na brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te des dgra bcom pa thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing /_gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag nas lo ma'i 
[\[225b.6\]]nang du me tog dang 'bras bu rnams bcug ste/_khyer te 'ong zhing dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur to/_/ya mtshan du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa dge tshul pa 'dis lo bdun lon lags 
[\[225b.7\]]na yon tan 'di lta bu rtogs pa la gzigs/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed kyis glang gi rgyu ma ngas ltor bcug nas chos tshig gsum bstan pa de mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]de nga la sems dga' bar byas nas shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas/_mnyan du yod pa 'di nyid du tshong dpon gyi khyim du skyes nas/_de nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_lo bdun lon pa kho na na nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[226a.2\]]du byas so/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa dge tshul pha 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas glang du skyes lags las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/_de nas shi 'phos nas mir skyes la 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes 
[\[226a.3\]]par ma bgyis nas skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa rnams pham par bgyis te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las de byas shing bsags te/_
[\[226a.4\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med 
[\[226a.5\]]pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ste dge slong chu'i zhal ta byed par gyur te/_de dge 'dun la ril ba spyi blugs kyis chu 'drim pa las/_dge slong dgra bcom pa 
[\[226a.6\]]gzhan zhig yengs par gyur te/_de de dang thug nas chu'i zhal ta byed pa de'i ril ba lag nas shor te chag nas/_de khros pas/_dgra bcom pa de la smras pa/_'di ni glang dir po bzhin du che zhing tshor phrig med pa zhig go zhes byas nas/_de'i tshig de dgra bcom pa des 
[\[226a.7\]]thos nas des de phyogs gcig tu khrid de smras pa/_btsun pa khyod bdag su yin pa dang nga su yin pa shes sam des smras pa/_ngas shes te/_khyod kyang rab tu byung ba yin la/_nga yang rab tu byung ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_'o bu cag rab tu byung bar 'dra mod kyi/_khyod ni bcing 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]ba thams cad kyis bcings pa'i so so'i skye bo yin la/_nga ni 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba yin na/_khyod kyis tshig rtsub po smras kyis/_nyes pa la nyes so zhes bshags par gyis shig_/khyod 'khor ba na 'khor zhing mi sdug pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnyed ta re zhes byas so/_/de nas 
[\[226b.2\]]de thos ma thag tu dge slong de 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/_des dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod pa gsol te/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i yon gnas kyi mchog la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las 'di ci nas kyang 
[\[226b.3\]]bdag la smin par ma gyur cig_/'di ltar bdag gis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag 
[\[226b.4\]]gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe chu'i zhal ta 
[\[226b.5\]]byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge tshul pa 'di nyid yin te/_des der khros nas dgra bcom pa de la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar glang du skyes so/_/des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag 
[\[226b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[226b.7\]]spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//snying rje bzang po zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi yangs pa can na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yangs pa can na sde dpon seng 
[\[227a.2\]]ge zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas ming snying rje bzang po zhes btags so/_/de nas khye'u 
[\[227a.3\]]snying rje bzang po 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta 
[\[227a.4\]]ste glang po che zhon pa dang /_rta zhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phong dang mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las 'byung bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyu gzung ba dang /_zhags pa gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang 
[\[227a.5\]]ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stabs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_sgra grag par 'phang ba dang /_gnad du 'phang ba dang /_gdon mi za bar phog 
[\[227a.6\]]par bya ba dang /_tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de ma grangs nas 'phyon ma rnams la yang zhugs so/_/phyis re zhig na de phas mdza' sde'i khrod du btang nas mdza' sde de dag dpyid kyi dus su shing grib me tog rgyas pa/_ne tso dang ri skegs 
[\[227a.7\]]dang rma bya dang khu byug dang shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i/_skyed mos tshal gyi nags khrod du smad 'tshong ma'i gtso mo khrid de song nas de dag de na 'khod pa las smad 'tshong ma'i phyir thab mo byung ste/_khye'u snying rje bzang po khros pas mdza' sde gsum bsad nas/_mdza' sde 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]rnams dong ste sde dpon seng ge la smras so/_/de nas sde dpon seng ges de thos nas bu de bu ma yin par bsgrags te khyim nas kyang bskrad do/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis de gsod du btang ste/_ka ra bI ra'i me tog gi phreng bas mgul pa dkris nas/_gshed ma la 
[\[227b.2\]]gtad de/_gshed ma'i mi gos sngon po bgos la ral gri phyung ste rnga sgra drag po sgrogs pa dag gis/_khrid nas lam po che'i mdo rnams su bsgrags te/_gsad pa'i sar phyin tu nye ba dang de srog gi phyir 'jigs shing skrag nas phan tshun du lta ste/_bdag phongs shing dkos thag pa dang 
[\[227b.3\]]sdug pa'i skyabs byed pa dang srog phangs pa sbyin pa su zhig yod zhig gu snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_
[\[227b.4\]]mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jig pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 
[\[227b.5\]]'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs 
[\[227b.6\]]shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_
[\[227b.7\]]su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu 
[\[228a.2\]]srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khye'u snying rje bzang po gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas spre'u rdzing gi 
[\[228a.3\]]'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te/_khye'u snying rje bzang po'i mdun du bzhugs so/_/de nas khye'u snying rje bzang pos thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la dka' ba mdzad cing srog 
[\[228a.4\]]phangs pa'i sbyin pa mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu khyod da ni srog chud za bar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa med kyis ma skrag shig ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi mi rnams la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin 
[\[228a.5\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khye'u 'di bsad de ci rung gis thong shig_/yangs pa can gyi mi rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa gal te rab tu byung na ni btang bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de la lung yang phog ste/_
[\[228a.6\]]des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa khye'u snying rje bzang po ma grangs pa'i slad du/_yangs pa can gyi mi rnams kyis gsod 
[\[228a.7\]]du btang ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis thar bar mdzad de/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/_grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ma grangs 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]shing g.yem par gyur nas skye bo phal po ches gsod du btang ba las/_ngas skyabs byas te/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bzhag pa nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/_yul mi kha mi mkhas shing g.yem pa zhig 
[\[228b.2\]]'dug nas/_skye bo mang po glags tshol zhing 'dug pa las/_de dag gis glags rnyed nas gzhan gyi chung ma la byi po byed pa las bzung ste/_rgyal po la phul nas rgyal pos de gsod du btang ste/_de gshed ma rnams kyis khrid de gsad pa'i sar phyin du nye ba dang /_ri khrod kyi grong de nas thag mi 
[\[228b.3\]]ring ba dka' thub kyi gnas zhig na drang srong zhig gnas te/_drang srong de spyod yul la chas nas mi de des mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_smras pa drang srong bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa dang /_srog gi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol/_de nas drang srong des rgyal po la 
[\[228b.4\]]gtod du bcug nas/_dka' thub kyi gnas su khrid de rab tu phyung nas/_der bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe mi de ni 
[\[228b.5\]]khye'u snying rje bzang po 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di skye bo phal po ches gsod du btang ba las/_ngas skyabs byas nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bzhag go/_/da ltar yang 'di ma grangs pa'i phyir yangs pa can gyi mi rnams kyis gsod du btang ba las 
[\[228b.6\]]ngas de las thar bar byas nas g.yung drung gi mthar phyin pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi 
[\[228b.7\]]kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje bzang po 'di kho na yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad 
[\[229a.2\]]nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan 
[\[229a.3\]]pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_
[\[229a.4\]]thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//gel po zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa 
[\[229a.5\]]na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gnas pa de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir lha'i gnas so cog tu gsol ba 'debs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa 
[\[229a.6\]]tsho zhing pags pa dang sha dang khrag rgyas pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de khye'u 'di tsho zhing pags pa dang sha dang khrag rgyas pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di gel po zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/
[\[229a.7\]]de nas khye'u gel po 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas 
[\[229b.2\]]las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug ste/_bram ze'i khye'u de yang mgon med zas sbyin dang 'grogs 
[\[229b.3\]]pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi'o de gnyis shi nas de don zhig la grong khyer shur pa ra kar chas te/_de mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song ba las mnyan du yod pa dang shur pa ra ka'i grong khyer gyi bar gyi ri'i sul zhig 
[\[229b.4\]]na nags khung zhig yod de/_nags khung de na drang srong zhig gnas pa ste/_bram ze'i khye'u des shes nas de de'i thad du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas drang srong des kyang de la nges par 'byung ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_
[\[229b.5\]]de thos ma thag tu de nges par 'byung ba dang 'thun pa'i sems skyes te/_de drang srong de nyid las rab tu byung nas nags khrod de na gnas kyang des khyad par ci yang ma thob bo/_/de nas phyi zhig na drang srong de shi nas gel po de yang dka' thub kyi gnas de nyid na gnas so/_/de nas gang 
[\[229b.6\]]gi tshe bcom ldan 'das shur pa ra kar gshegs pa na/_khye'u gel pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang nas gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu bsams pa/_'di ni shAkya'i rigs dka' ba mdzad pa thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa de yin te/_lam 'di nas 
[\[229b.7\]]tshur gshegs kyis/_bdag gis bsnyen bkur mi byar mi rung ngo snyam nas/_yang des bsams pa/_gal te bdag brag 'di las rkang gis babs na ni/_bcom ldan 'das thal bar 'gyur gyis/_brag ka 'di nas bdag gis mchongs pa dang bdag gis bsnyen bkur 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]byed khom mo snyam du bsams nas brag ka de nyid nas mchongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der sa gzhi stan shing bal gyi nang tshangs can 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs nas/_de lhung ma thag tu rkang pa 'greng bar gyur te/_de dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[230a.2\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir lam nas bzung ste phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas/_des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[230a.3\]]phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bram ze'i khye'u gel pos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 
[\[230a.4\]]byas te des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung 
[\[230a.5\]]ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la 
[\[230a.6\]]lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag 
[\[230a.7\]]mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gel pos bcom 
[\[230b.2\]]ldan 'das mthong nas/_brag ka nas rang gis mchongs pa dang gzhan yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[230b.3\]]bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da lta 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis ji ltar nga mthong nas brag ka nas rang gis mchongs te/_nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa de nyon cig_/dge 
[\[230b.4\]]slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_drang srong zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang lam du zhugs te/_de brag drung logs nas 'gro ba las phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/brag de'i kha na ni dka' thub can zhig 'dug pa las/_des drang srong brag drung de na 'dug pa de mthong nas/_mthong 
[\[230b.5\]]ma thag tu de la shin tu dga' ba skyes te/_des bsams pa/_bdag drang srong de la bsnyen bkur byed du 'gro'o snyam nas/_des yang bsams pa gal te bdag rkang gis babs na ni drang srong de thal du 'ong ngo snyam nas/_rang gis brag de'i kha nas mchongs pa las/_drang srong 
[\[230b.6\]]des lha la bsgo nas lag nas bzung ste sa la bzhag go/_/de nas de'i thad du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas drang srong des de la nges par 'byung ba dang 'thun pa'i gtam byas nas/_de de'i thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab 
[\[230b.7\]]tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe dka' thub can du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gel po 'di kho na yin 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis nga mthong nas brag ka nas rang gis mchongs te/_nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do da ltar yang nga mthong nas brag ka nas rang gis mchongs te/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[231a.2\]]thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la yang zhus pa/_btsun pa gel po 'dis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis 
[\[231a.3\]]la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon 
[\[231a.4\]]lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags/_bka' stsal pa dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs 
[\[231a.5\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de zhabs 'bring 'khor nyi khri dang ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las 
[\[231a.6\]]nags khrod cig tu byon te/_nags khrod de na drang srong lnga brgya 'khod de drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de dag dga' bar gyur nas yang dag 
[\[231a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa dka' thub kyi gnas su rtsa ba dang 'bras bu la spyan drangs te phul lo/_/de ltar phul nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_de dag gi bsam pa dang bag 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas drang srong lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams kyis bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas stan 
[\[231b.2\]]las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par 
[\[231b.3\]]rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag dge slong rnams la gtad nas/_dge slong rnams 
[\[231b.4\]]kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de dag la lung yang phog go/_/de dag kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/drang srong gcig gis ni der tha na dro 
[\[231b.5\]]ba tsam gyi yon tan yang cung zad kyang ma thob bo/_/de gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po de ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de nas des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi 
[\[231b.6\]]kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung 
[\[231b.7\]]bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ji ltar yang 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi mkhan po dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog gis dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces 
[\[232a.2\]]byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de ni gel po 'di kho na yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag 
[\[232a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[232a.4\]]te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des kyang bdag dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_
[\[232a.5\]]shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/_ngas 'di dad pa dang mos pa dang ldan 
[\[232a.6\]]pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu pa/_nag po zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na bram ze 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon 
[\[232a.7\]]pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas na mdog nag por 'dug go/_/de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di mdog nag pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di nag po kho nar gdags so zhes 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]zer ro/_/de nas khye'u nag po 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te de mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[232b.2\]]gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba 
[\[232b.3\]]dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de'i pha ni bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i sngags slob par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de rgas par gyur 
[\[232b.4\]]te bsams pa/_da ni bdag rgas pas phyin cad bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di rnams sngags slob mi nus kyis/_bdag gis khye'u 'di sde tshan gyi slob dpon byed du gzhug go snyam nas bu la bsgo ba/_bu nag po nga ni da rgas pas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag phyin cad sngags slob 
[\[232b.5\]]mi nus la/_khyod kyang sngags kyi mthar phyin pa yin gyis bram ze'i khye'u 'di rnams kyi sngags kyi slob dpon gyis shig_/bus smras pa/_mkhan pos ji skad bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag sngags slob pa la 
[\[232b.6\]]zhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab de nyid du bram ze gzhan zhig gis mchod sbyin byas te/_bram ze rnams la yon mang po phul lo/_/mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze kha cig na re kho bo cag yon dbang gi khyed mi dbang ngo zhes zer ro/_/grong na gnas pa rnams na re/_nged ni dag pa 
[\[232b.7\]]yin gyi khyed ni rgyal po'i zham ring ba'i g.yog byed pa yin pas na/_yon 'di rnams nged dbang gi khyed mi dbang ngo zhes zer ro/_/de nas bram ze nag pos bsams pa/_bram ze 'di rnams thab mo chen po 'byung ste/_gzhan gyis ni zhi bar byed mi nus kyis ma la nga nyid kyis bsgrim dgos 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]so snyam du bsams nas/_des bram ze de dag dgag par brtsam pa las thab mo zhi bar byed ma nus nas/_de gzhi de las shas cher skyo ba skyes te/_bdag gis 'khor rnams gtang la gcig pu nags khrod du gnas bcas te 'dug par bya'o snyam nas des 'khor de rnams 
[\[233a.2\]]bor te nags khrod cig tu song ngo /_/nags khrod de na gnod sbyin nag po zhes bya ba drag cing 'jigs la mdangs 'phrog pa zhig kyang gnas te/_des sems can stong phrag du ma gyin da la sdug bsngal skyed par byed do/_/nags khrod de na drang srong zhig kyang gnas te drang srong de la gnod 
[\[233a.3\]]sbyin de shin tu dga'o/_/de nas bram ze nag pos drang srong de thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de la dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas de nyid kyi thad du rab tu phyung ste/_des de la yid la bya ba'i lung phog nas/_des der bsams gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes 
[\[233a.4\]]pa lnga bskyed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na drang srong rgan po de shi'o/_/de shi nas drang srong nag po gnas de nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis gsol ba btab ste/_btsun pa gnod sbyin nag po 'di ni/_bdag cag la 'khon ma mchis par 
[\[233a.5\]]'khon du 'dzin pa lags/_dgra zla ma lags par dgra zla bgyid pa lags te/_sems can stong phrag du ma la gnod pa bgyid pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni klu ma rungs pa dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang btul/_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 
[\[233a.6\]]'brog gnas la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang btul lags na/_gnod sbyin nag po yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du btul na legs lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas/_
[\[233a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de rdzu 'phrul gyis bkug nas bka' stsal pa/_kye sems can rnams la gnod pa ma byed cig_/sdig pa'i las 'di thong shig ces bka' stsal to/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji ltar bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa deng slan chad bdag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la bsrung ba dang bskyab par 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[233b.2\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas de rang gi gnas su song ste 'dug go/_/de de na 'dug nas bsams pa/_drang srong nag po de dka' thub don med pa/_'dis nyon mongs pa'i steng du zhag bdun na 'chi bar mthong nas/_de de la snying brtse ba'i phyir de'i thad du 
[\[233b.3\]]song ste smras pa/_drang srong khyod kyi dka' thub drag po 'di ci dgos/_de'i steng du khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu drang srong de sdug bsngal chen po skyes nas/_de mya ngan gyi dbang gis rdzu 'phrul de las nyams te/_de gzhi de las lhag par yang mya 
[\[233b.4\]]ngan skyes nas shin tu smre sngags 'don cing 'dug go/_/de nas gnod sbyin des smras pa/_drang srong ha cang mya ngan ma byed/_ha cang mya ngan ma byed/_nyon mongs par ma byed/_smre sngags 'don par ma byed/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i lam 
[\[233b.5\]]mkhyen pa yin gyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song shig dang /_des na khyod la legs pa thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu drang srong nag pos thams cad spangs te 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya 
[\[233b.6\]]phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas drang srong nag pos thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_
[\[233b.7\]]mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ji 'dra ba de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[234a.2\]]dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs 
[\[234a.3\]]su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na des stan de kho na la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mthong ba'i mod la/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[234a.4\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 
[\[234a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de nas de bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de 
[\[234a.6\]]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so 
[\[234a.7\]]yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa drang srong 'di 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung nas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/_grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin 
[\[234b.2\]]te/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas ngas rab tu phyung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_dka' thub kyi gnas zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga 
[\[234b.3\]]dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas pa de'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u le lo can tshe thung ngu zhig yod de/_des de la lung phog kyang de le lo che ba'i phyir sgrim du mi btub bo/_/de nas phyi zhig na drang srong des bltas nas bram ze'i khye'u de zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur bar mthong 
[\[234b.4\]]la/_des ci yang ma thob par rig nas/_des de skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u le lo ma byed cig_/khyod zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u de shin tu mi dga' bar gyur te/_mi dga' bar gyur pa des na bsam gtan 
[\[234b.5\]]bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nag po 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di 'chi bas 
[\[234b.6\]]'jigs shing skrag nas/_ngas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bzhag go/_/da ltar yang 'di 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas ngas rab tu phyung ste/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[234b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur te/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des na da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//mda' thogs zhes bya ba ni/_yul ser skya'i gnas na shAkya dbyug 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]thogs zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[235a.2\]]spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di dbyug thogs kyi bu 
[\[235a.3\]]yin pas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming mda' thogs zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u mda' thogs 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas de mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i 
[\[235a.4\]]tshe/_khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che zhon pa dang /_rta zhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phang ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_
[\[235a.5\]]g.yul las 'byung bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyu gzung ba dang /_zhags pa gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang 
[\[235a.6\]]pa'i stangs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_sgra grags par 'phang ba dang /_gnad du 'phang ba dang /_gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /_tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas/_gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na yang shAkya dbyug 
[\[235a.7\]]thogs kyi chung ma la/_bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas ma thag tu/_shAkya lag na dbyug thogs kyi bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa kha dog rgyas pa/_mchog dang ldan pa zhig 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]btsas so zhes bya ba'i sgra ser skya'i gnas thams cad du grags so/_/de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_bu mo 'di btsas pa na ser skya'i gnas thams cad du gtam snyan pa grags pas na/_bu mo 'di'i ming grags 
[\[235b.2\]]'dzin mar gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo grags 'dzin ma 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas de mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor 
[\[235b.3\]]phul lo/_/de nas grags 'dzin ma'i rkyen gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' khye'u mda' thogs dang shin tu mdza' bar gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba gzigs nas nags kyi nang du gnas bcas pa de'i tshe/_khye'u mda' thogs shin tu mi 
[\[235b.4\]]dga' bar gyur te/_ci zhig mthong na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang bdag gi sring mo bor te rab tu byung zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/_gdul bar bya ba'i don mdzad cing ser skya'i gnas su gshegs te/_yab 
[\[235b.5\]]sras gdan 'dzom par mdzad pa der/_shAkya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/shAkya mda' thogs ni sngar mi dga' bar gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'gror ma btub nas de shAkya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nan 
[\[235b.6\]]gyis khrid nas/_gzhon nu mda' thogs kyis kyang shAkya rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga mnos so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de sngon mi dga' ba'i phyir blo skyes pa/_bdag gis de las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis de'i 
[\[235b.7\]]bslab pa'i gzhi lngar mtshar cig bsrung mi dgos so snyam nas/_des sngon mi dga' ba'i phyir bslab pa'i gzhi lnga nyams par byas so/_/de nas der shAkya rnams kyis tshor te bslab pa'i gzhi rnams des 'di ltar nyams par byas so snyam du rig nas/_de dag de la snying rje skyes te 'dis 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nyams par byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas phyi zhig na shAkya mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 
[\[236a.2\]]'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas shAkya rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa shAkya mda' thogs kyis ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nyams par bgyis te skyems 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te ngan song du mi mchi bar mdzad du gsol/_
[\[236a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya mang po rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar shAkya mang po rnams kyis rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[236a.4\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_de'i dbang po yongs su smin par bya dgos so snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis re zhig de la ci yang bka' ma stsal pa las/_tshe'i lhag ma zhag bdun lus 
[\[236a.5\]]par gzigs nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_shAkya mda' thogs ni de nas zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas sgra de 'bru mar btsir ba bzhin du grags ma thag tu shAkya mda' thogs kyis/_bdag zhag bdun na 
[\[236a.6\]]'chi bar lung bstan to zhes thos nas/_de bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur te/_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug cing skyes pa dang ma 'dres pa'i rol mo'i sgras rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ngas de la je nyan thos chen po 
[\[236a.7\]]dag btang la phyis nga nyid 'gro bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la bka' stsal pa/_ma 'gags pa khyod song la shAkya mda' thogs la soms shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]zhes gsol nas/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong zhig dang shAkya mda' thogs kyi khyim du song ngo /_/de nas shAkya mda' thogs kyis dge slong ma 'gags pa bdag gi khyim du 'ongs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang phu nu bo la dga' ba'i phyir de'i thad du song nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos 
[\[236b.2\]]mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas phyir song ngo /_/de nas phyis nyin zhag gnyis pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo btang ngo /_/zhag gsum pa la ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[236b.3\]]po btang ngo /_/zhag bzhi pa la ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu btang nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_de la ci nas de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan nas de 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag par gyur to/_/de nas zhag lnga pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[236b.4\]]de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_nyid mda' thogs kyi khyim du gshegs so/_/de nas shAkya mda' thogs kyis bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[236b.5\]]kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 
[\[236b.6\]]la bzhugs nas/_shAkya mda' thogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya mda' thogs la bka' stsal pa/_mda' thogs 'di ltar 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'di ni 'jigs pa 
[\[236b.7\]]rnams kyi nang na phran tshegs tsam du zad do/_/'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa 'di ni 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang na mchog yin no/_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa sems can dmyal ba de dag ji lta bu lags/_
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis khrid de/_sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad bstan nas/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa las gang gis 'dir skye bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srog gcod pa kun tu bsten cing 
[\[237a.2\]]bsgoms te/_mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'dir skyes na yang tshe thung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de la mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan nas/_de 
[\[237a.3\]]thos ma thag tu de lhag par yang 'jigs pa skyes te/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa las ma bsrungs na/_bdag sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams na_sa/_des bslab pa nyams pa de dag 
[\[237a.4\]]bshags nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na shAkya mda' thogs kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[237a.5\]]mngon sum du byas so/_/des bden pa mthong ste shi nas lhar skyes te/_de lhar skyes ma thag tu bsams pa/_bdag gang nas shi 'phos snyam pa dang des mi las shi 'phos par mthong ngo /_/gang du skyes snyam pa dang lhar skyes pa mthong ngo /_/las ci zhig byas snyam pa dang 'chi kar bslab 
[\[237a.6\]]pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs pa dang bcom ldan 'das la yang sems dga' ba skyed par mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag zhag lon nas gdod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas/_rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul 
[\[237a.7\]]pa thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/_lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i me tog rnams kyis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas des 
[\[237b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de shi ba'i tshe shAkya rnams the tshom skyes te/_shAkya 
[\[237b.3\]]mda' thogs kyis bslab pa nyams par byas te chang 'thungs na/_de'i 'gro ba ni gang yin skye gnas ni gang yin tshe phyi ma ni gang yin zhig gu ma la bdag cag gis don 'di bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar 
[\[237b.4\]]bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas shAkya mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas shAkya mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[237b.5\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa shAkya mda' thogs kyis bslab pa nyams par bgyis te skyems 'tshal na/_btsun pa de'i 'gro ba ni gang lags skye gnas ni gang lags tshe phyi ma ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag lhar skyes so/_/de dag gis 
[\[237b.6\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa shAkya mda' thogs kyis bslab pa nyams par bgyis te skyems 'tshal na/_de ji ltar lhar skyes lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shAkya mda' thogs kyis 'chi kar bslab pa nyams pa bshags te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas 
[\[237b.7\]]lhar skyes so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu shAkya rnams ya mtshan du gyur te/_de dag rnams ya mtshan du gyur nas yang smras pa/_kye ma sangs rgyas/_kye ma chos/_kye ma dge 'dun/_kye ma chos legs par gsungs pa 'di ltar ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can dag kyang ngan song 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]nas phyung ste/_mtho ris su 'gro bar byed do zhes zer nas/_lhag par yang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa shAkya mda' thogs 'chi bas 
[\[238a.2\]]'jigs shing skrag pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las skyabs mdzad de/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_ji ltar 
[\[238a.3\]]'das pa'i dus na yang 'di 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas/_zhag bdun bslab pa bsrungs te/_gzhi de las mtho ris su skyes pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[238a.4\]]sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sIr tshong pa 
[\[238a.5\]]dbul po zhig 'dug pa des/_phyi zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do/_/tshong pa de yang sbyin pa la sred pa zhig ste/_sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed 'dod nas des bsams pa/_ci bdog pa 'di tsam gyis ni bdag 
[\[238a.6\]]gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed mi nus kyis/_bdag gis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don bsgrub bo/_/gal te bdag gis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don lan cig tsam zhig bsgrub par nus na yang /_bdag gis pha ma'i bdun rgyud kyi bar du dar bar byed nus par 
[\[238a.7\]]'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_zong khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas/_des rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don bsgrubs te/_sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs so/_/de yang tshe thung ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de nyid skyo ba 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]bskyed pa'i phyir/_zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes dge slong rnams la bka' stsal te/_dge slong dag tshong pa che ge mo ni zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal nas/_sgra de 'bru mar btsir ba bzhin du kun tu grags so/_/tshong pa des kyang thos nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[238b.2\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung gis ji ltar bdag zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan pa de thos ma thag tu/_de 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/_de 'jigs shing skrag nas de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_sangs rgyas 'od srung la 
[\[238b.3\]]skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas/_de shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas lhar skyes so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe tshong par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni shAkya mda' thogs 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di 'chi bas 'jigs zhing skrag nas bslab pa'i 
[\[238b.4\]]gzhi rnams bsrungs te mtho ris su skyes so/_/da ltar yang 'di 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te gzhi de las mtho ris su 'gro ba dang thar bar 'gro ba thob par gyur to//_//brdzis pa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du 
[\[238b.5\]]yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na/_de'i chung ma la bu chags te/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang 
[\[238b.6\]]zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_khye'u de yi ge dang /_bram ze'i spyod lam 
[\[238b.7\]]dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de lo bcu drug lon pa dang bstan 
[\[239a.2\]]bcos thams cad rtogs te gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad do/_/de nas des gzhung gis rtsod pa'i dam bcas te/_nga dang mtshungs pa yang med na lhag par lta ci smos zhes zer zhing de gzhung gis rtsod pa'i rgyags pas dregs nas bram ze thams cad khyad du bsad do/_/de 
[\[239a.3\]]nas phyi zhig na bram ze de dag gis sems skyes pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni ma dul ba 'dul ba yin gyis/_khye'u 'di dge sbyong gau ta ma la bstan par bya'o/_/'on kyang des 'di rab tu phyung yang srid de/_de ltar byas na bdag cag 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_
[\[239a.4\]]khyad du bsad pa'i bram ze de dag gis/_khye'u de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyus bstan te/_khyod ni bdag cag gi bu dang 'dra na nga dang mtshungs pa yang med na/_lhag pa lta ci smos zhes shes rab kyi rgyags pas dregs shing 'dug ste ci bya/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni lus kyang 
[\[239a.5\]]mdzes la sems kyang mdzes te/_thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin pas na/_khyod ni de yi byad gzugs dang shes pa'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/_stong gi char yang mi phod/_'bum gyi char yang mi phod do zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu/_bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[239a.6\]]de bcom ldan 'das lta 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/_bram ze'i khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me 
[\[239a.7\]]lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[239b.2\]]ltar mthong nas byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa med par gyur te/_des bsams pa/_'di bdag pas ches bzang mod kyi shes rab kyis ni bdag dang mtshungs pa ma yin no/_/'on kyang re zhig 'di thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin nam ma yin pa de bgam mo snyam nas/_
[\[239b.3\]]sems kyis dri ba bsngogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 
[\[239b.4\]]sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_sems kyi dri ba bsngogs pa de lung bstan to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa yin par nges so snyam nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa 
[\[239b.5\]]gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zhag bdun gyi bar du bdag gi khyim du bshos gsol bar ci gnang /_de nas 
[\[239b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de 
[\[239b.7\]]nas des sangs rgyas la sogs pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun gyi bar du khyim du bshos gsol nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]lo/_/dge slong gzhan rnams la ni/_re re la yang ras zung re phul nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun 
[\[240a.2\]]pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bram ze'i khye'u de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de dag la 'khod bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/_
[\[240a.3\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob 
[\[240a.4\]]tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad 
[\[240a.5\]]pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bu 
[\[240a.6\]]bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis/_mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i 
[\[240a.7\]]gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_bstan bcos thams cad rtogs te/_
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad nas/_'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[240b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag 
[\[240b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de gang gi tshe sangs rgyas 
[\[240b.4\]]kyi phrin las thams cad zin nas/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das te/_rgyal po kr-i kIs de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa rin po che las brtsigs nas/_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[240b.5\]]byas te/_mchod pa chen po byas nas dus ston gyi lugs btod do/_/de nas rgyal po des dril bsgrags te/_bA rA Na sI 'di na skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed gnas pa de dag mchod rten gyi dus ston la bab pa na der dong la bkur sti gyis shig_/su der ma song ba de ci bdog pa thams cad 
[\[240b.6\]]slar bzhes so zhes bsgo'o/_/rgyal po kr-i kIs mdun na 'don ni ma dad pa zhig ste/_mdun na 'don de'i bu rgyal po'i bu dang mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs so/_/de nas bram ze mdun na 'don ma dad pa ste sdang ba'i sems kyis der ma song ste/_rgyal po kr-i kIs thos nas mdun na 'don 
[\[240b.7\]]gyis nga'i bka' bcag go snyam nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po de khros nas/_ngas de'i ci bdog pa thams cad phrogs te su mi btang ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas de'i tshig de rgyal po'i bus thos nas mdun na 'don gyi bu la sbran te/_khyod song la pha la mchod rten gyi dus ston la skyen 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]par song shig_/rgyal pos khyod ci bdog pa thams cad phrogs sa re zhes gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze mdun na 'don bu dang lhan cig tu gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/de der song nas skye bo phal po che mchod rten gyi mchod pa la 
[\[241a.2\]]brtson zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas mdun na 'don gyi bus de mthong nas mchod rten de la dad pa rnyed do/_/dad pa rnyed nas mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug 
[\[241a.3\]]cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur cig_/bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par gyur cig_/gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar chod par gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[241a.4\]]rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[241a.5\]]mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces khye'u des de skad du smon lam btab nas/_khye'u de skye bo mang pos brdzis te shi nas de mchod rten de la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas lhar skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa la ni chos nyid kyis sems 
[\[241a.6\]]rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas des mi las shi 'phos pa dang lhar skyes pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la sems dga' ba bskyed pas der skyes par mthong ngo /_/
[\[241a.7\]]de nas de mthong ma thag tu lha'i bu des sngon gyi drin yang dag par dran nas/_rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul bar thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/_lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]sogs pas byugs pa des/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[241b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor nas/_a ga ru'i phye ma dang rgya spos kyi phye ma dang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas sems dga' bar gyur te 'dug go/_/de de na 'dug pa na de'i phas 
[\[241b.3\]]bdag gi bu skye bo phal po che de dag gis ji ltar brdzis te shi ba'i gtam thos so/_/thos ma thag tu der song ste/_bu'i rus bu pang du 'khyud nas ngu zhing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don pa dang lha'i bu des mthong nas de la smras pa/_pha cig bdag ni mya ngan byar med par gyur gyis mya ngan 
[\[241b.4\]]ma byed cig sdug bsngal zhing ma 'dug cig smre sngags ma 'don cig bram zes smras pa/_khyod su zhig_/des smras pa/_bdag ni khyod kyi bu de yin no/_/des smras pa/_khyod gang du skyes/_des smras pa/_lhar skyes so/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyis las ci zhig byas/_des smras pa/_mchod 
[\[241b.5\]]rten 'di nyid la bsnyen bkur byas nas sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/khyod kyis kyang sngon gyi lta ba'i rnam pa bor la mchod rten 'di la bsnyen bkur byas te sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /_de ltar byas na khyod legs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ro zhes smras nas lha'i bu 
[\[241b.6\]]de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshig de thos nas bram ze de yang bu'i mya ngan med par gyur te/_mchod rten de la yang shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de dga' bar gyur nas mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang 
[\[241b.7\]]dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig_/bu 'di nyid las brten te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bram ze'i mdun na 'don gyi bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_bram ze 'di kho na 
[\[242a.2\]]yin te/_khye'u des mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur nas bstan bcos thams cad 
[\[242a.3\]]rtogs te/_gzhung gis rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad nas dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes 
[\[242a.4\]]par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de'i phas mchod rten de la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing 
[\[242a.5\]]nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_bu 'di kho na'i rkyen gyis 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_wa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa 
[\[242a.6\]]na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' 
[\[242a.7\]]mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na/_de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri mnam par gyur la yid la 'dod pa 'di lta bu yang byung ste/_phyi sa dang gcin bza' zhing 'thung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas des khyim thab la smras pa/_jo bo bdag gi yid la 'dod pa de lta bu byung 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag de sdug bsngal chen po skyes te/_bdag gi chung ma 'di lus srul po 'ga' zhig gis thebs par ma gyur grang snyam nas/_des mtshan mkhan rnams la bstan te/_mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod kyi chung ma 'di 
[\[242b.2\]]lus srul pos thebs pa ni ma yin gyi/_lto na 'dug pa'i sems can de'i dbang gis gyur pa yin te/_gang gi tshe de btsas pa de'i tshe ni bud med 'di'i lus la phyi sa'i dri dang yid la 'dod pa 'di 'dra ba de med par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag des chung 
[\[242b.3\]]ma'i lus spos sna tshogs kyis byugs te/_de phyi sa dang gcin za zhing 'thung du dogs nas/_bud med de'i rim gro ba dang srungs ma rnams bskos so/_/de nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u phyi sa dang gcin gyis yog pa zhig btsas nas/_de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thog thag 
[\[242b.4\]]tu phyi sa'i dris gang bar gyur to/_/de nas khye'u de bud med rnams kyis bkrus te mal du bzhag kyang /_de'i lus las phyi sa'i dri de med par ma gyur te/_mas khye'u de spos sna tshogs kyis bskus te bzhag go/_/de nas btsas ma thag tu ma'i yid la 'dod pa snga ma de med par gyur to/_/
[\[242b.5\]]de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe 'gro nus par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi phyi sa blangs nas/_kha cig ni za bar byed kha cig ni lus la skud par 
[\[242b.6\]]byed de bud med de dag gis bkag go/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_de mkhan po'i thad du btang ba las/_phyi sa'i 'dam snyag snyig ga la yod par song nas/_phyi sa za bar byed de/_de pha ma gnyis kyis tshor nas des sdug bsngal chen por gyur te/_
[\[242b.7\]]bdag cag gnyis kyi bu byung mod kyi 'on kyang skyon 'di lta bus ma rung bar gyur na/_'jig rten gyis shin tu dmad pa 'di lta bu bdag cag la ci dgos snyam du bsams nas/_de khyim nas bskrad de btang ngo /_/de nas de mi gtsang ba'i 'dam snyag snyig de dag nyid du gnas bcas te/_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]phyi sa dang gcin za zhing 'thung bar byed do/_/de nas de mi gtsang ba za ba skye bo mang pos mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag gcig la gcig smras pa/_khye'u 'di ni wa bzhin du phyi sa dang gcin za zhing 'thung ngo zhes zer nas/_de'i ming snga ma med par gyur te/_de wa bzhin du phyi sa 
[\[243a.2\]]dang gcin za zhing 'thung ba'i phyir ming wa nyid du btags so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag cag ni ba lang gi lci ba za ba'i yi dam byed par zad na/_khye'u 'di ni bdag cag pas ches dka' ba byed pa yin te/_gal te 'di bdag 
[\[243a.3\]]gi thad du rab tu byung na ni 'dir 'di la bsod nams mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_khye'u de la smras pa/_ci khye'u khyod kyis 'di yi dam du bcas pa yin nam 'on te goms pa'i tshul can du zad dam/_khye'us smras pa/_bdag ni yi dam du bcas pa ji lta bu yin pa yang mi 
[\[243a.4\]]shes te/_bdag ni phyi sa za ba la shin tu sred kyi zas skom dag la ni mi sred do/_/'od srung rdzogs byed kyis smras pa/_khye'u nga'i thad du rab tu byung la yi dam du long shig dang gzhi de las khyod kyi bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/khye'us smras pa/_khyod ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin 
[\[243a.5\]]du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_khye'u de de'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te song ngo /_/de nas des gnas khang du khrid nas skra btogs te/_phor pa dang rma bya'i mdongs kyi phyags ma byin nas/_phyi sa za ba'i yi dam byin te btang ngo /_/de nas de phyi sa'i 'dam ga la ba der song ste 'dug go/_/de'i tshe 
[\[243a.6\]]mnyan du yod pa na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lnga brgya tsam 'khod pa rnams mtshan mo gang gi tshe/_skye bo mang po nyal ba de'i tshe phyi sa'i 'dam gzhan nas gzhan dag tu dong nas/_phyi sa dang gcin za zhing 'thung bar byed do/_/khye'u des kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de rnams kyi sgra ni thos la gzugs mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[243a.7\]]de nas phyi zhig na 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis de la brtags te/_bu khyod kyis brtul zhugs yi dam du blangs pa 'dis khyad par cung zad lta thob bam/_des smras pa/_khyad par zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/_rdzogs byed kyis smras pa/_khyod kyis lha'i gzugs lta bu lta mthong ngam/_
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]lha'i sgra skad lta thos sam/_des smras pa/_bdag gis lha'i gzugs lta bu ni ma mthong gi skye bo mang po'i sgra skad dag thos na/_'on kyang mngon sum du de ma mthong ngo /_/rdzogs byed kyis smras pa/_de dag ni bdag nyid chen po brtul zhugs grub pa yin no/_/da yang yi dam bcas 
[\[243b.2\]]pa 'di nyid yi dam du bgyis te 'dug shig dang ci ste na de dag gis lus ston kyang srid do zhes byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de rnams kyis bsams pa/_ji ltar bdag cag mi dge ba'i las kyis 'dir skyes te/_sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong ba de bzhin du/_khye'u 'di 
[\[243b.3\]]yang sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong ba yin na/_ci'i phyir bdag cag gis 'di la lus bstan par cis mi bya zhes zer nas/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de rnams kyis khye'u de la lus bstan te/_de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'grogs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na 'od srung 
[\[243b.4\]]rdzogs byed kyis yang de la brtags te/_bu khyod la brtul zhugs grub pa de dag gis lus cung zad tsam bstan tam/_des smras pa lus ni bstan mod kyi mi sdug pa'i tshul du bstan to/_/'od srung rdzogs byed kyis smras pa/_da dung yi dam du bcas pa de nyid yi dam du gyis te 'dug shig 
[\[243b.5\]]dang /_rang bzhin gyis gzugs ston par 'gyur yang srid do/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'di rnams las zad de ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis 'di rnams gdul bar bya'o snyam ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yi 
[\[243b.6\]]dgas lnga brgya po rnams kyi thad du song nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang 
[\[243b.7\]]srid do zhes byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu song ngo /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de rnams kyang tshe zad nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems dga' bar gyur bzhin du shi nas lha'i yul du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]bdag gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]las shi 'phos pa dang lhar skyes pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[244a.2\]]bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu/_rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do 
[\[244a.3\]]shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sbr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu dA dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba 
[\[244a.4\]]bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan te/_de dag thams cad kyis bden pa rnams mthong ngo /_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/_
[\[244a.5\]]rang gi gnas su dong ba na de dag gis khye'u wa yid la dran nas de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag ni 'phags pa shA ri'i bu las brten te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas dang bral nas/_lhar skyes kyis bdag cag dong ste wa'i don bya'o/_/'on kyang de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas 
[\[244a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das las brten te/_sdug bsngal de las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_mnyan du yod pa'i phyogs gang na wa 'dug pa'i phyogs de'i steng gi bar snang la lha'i gzhal med khang dang bcas par 'khod de/_mnyan du yod pa thog 
[\[244a.7\]]thag snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/de nas was lha lnga brgya po de dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khyed su dag ci byed ces byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag ni sngon khyod kyi grogs po de dag yin no/_/khye'us smras pa/_sngon ni ngas khyed rnams tshul de lta ma 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]yin par mthong la/_da ni tshul de lta ma yin par mthong ngo zhes byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag ni gnas 'di nas shi 'phos te lha'i nang du skyes so/_/was smras pa/_khyed brtul zhugs yi dam du blangs pa de kho nas lha'i nang du skyes sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[244b.2\]]brtul zhugs yi dam du blangs pa des skyes pa ma yin gyi sngon ngas mi dge ba'i las kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa las/_nged kyis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu las brten nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas dang bral te lha'i skye gnas thob par gyur to/_/khyod kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs 
[\[244b.3\]]su song shig dang khyod kyang sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes byas nas lha de dag de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/'od srung rdzogs byed kyis kyang lha lnga brgya po de dag wa'i thad du song ba mthong nas gzhan dag la bsnyad de/_'di ltar 'di la lha rnams kyang lus ston par byed 
[\[244b.4\]]cing 'ong ba las na/_bdag nyid chen po 'dis ni brtul zhugs grub par gyur to zhes zer ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu sems can mang po dag gis phyi sa bza' bar yi dam blangs so/_/khye'u was ni lha rnams kyi tshig thos nas bsams pa/_bdag song la sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[244b.5\]]ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/'on kyang bdag gi lus 'di kho na ltar phyi sas yog bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba ni mi phod do snyam ste/_chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du song nas lus thams cad sas drud de khrus byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/
[\[244b.6\]]de nas khye'u was sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[244b.7\]]kyis spras pa lta bu blo gsal zhing dri ma med la/_rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis/_dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 
[\[245a\]]
