[\[245a.1\]]'dra ba de lta bu ni/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[245a.2\]]'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin dang shes pa thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas khye'u was stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/_'jig tshogs 
[\[245a.3\]]la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[245a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[245a.5\]]dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 
[\[245a.6\]]'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig 
[\[245a.7\]]pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa was las ci bgyis 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]shing bsags na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_btsas ma thag tu lus thams cad nas phyi sa'i dri 'byung ba dang phyi sa 'tshal ba dang phyi sa'i 'dam du gnas par gyur lags/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/_'dis 
[\[245b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu 
[\[245b.3\]]byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_
[\[245b.4\]]bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na/_khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi 
[\[245b.5\]]bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa las/_phyi zhig na de sangs rgyas la dga' ba dang chos la dga' ba dang dge 'dun la dga' bar gyur nas/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas des bsams pa/_bdag la 
[\[245b.6\]]bu yang med bu mo yang med pas shi ste dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag la ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang byed par gyur na/_ma la bdag gis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bkur sti bya'o snyam ste/_des rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang 
[\[245b.7\]]brtsigs nas yo byad thams cad sbyar te/_dge slong rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas der dge slong zhal ta ba la bskos so/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_zhal ta ba de ljongs su bya ba zhig yod de/_khyim bdag de la bzlugs nas song ngo /_/de der song ba'i 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]'og tu dgra bcom pa zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song song ba las gtsug lag khang der phyin te/_khyim bdag des de mdzes shing g.yog 'khor mdzes pa mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu khyim bdag de de la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_dga' bar gyur nas des bsams pa/_gal te 
[\[246a.2\]]bdag gis 'di gcig pu spyan drangs na ni gnang bar mi 'gyur na/_ma la bdag gis de kho na'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs la bshos gsol lo snyam nas de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa khyod dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par sang bdag gi 
[\[246a.3\]]khyim du bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes byas so/_/de nas dgra bcom pa des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis khas ma blangs na ni dge slong 'di rnams kyi rnyed pa'i bar chad du yang 'gyur la/_sbyin bdag 'di'i bsod nams kyi bar chad du yang 'gyur ro snyam nas des de la cang mi gsung 
[\[246a.4\]]bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des phyi de nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir/_khyim du cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang mal cha dang stan bshams te/_chu ra bcas nas dge slong rnams la spyan 'dren btang ste/_'phags pa rnams gdugs tshod dang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la bab na/_
[\[246a.5\]]'phags pa rnams kyis da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas dge slong rnams de'i khyim du lhags nas/_khyim bdag des 'dreg mkhan bkug ste/_dge slong thams cad kyi skra 'dreg tu bcug nas cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyis khrus byed du 
[\[246a.6\]]bcug ste/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas so/_/dge slong zhal ta pa de yang ljongs su don bsgrubs nas/_gtsug lag khang der phyir 'ongs so/_/de phyir 'ongs nas/_de dge slong de dag mi snang na gar dong zhes dris pa dang de 
[\[246a.7\]]dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag gis khyim du spyan drangs so/_/des smras pa/_su'i phyir spyan drangs/_de dag gis smras pa/_dge slong zhig gsar du 'ongs pa'i phyir spyan drangs so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de shas cher mi dga' bar gyur te/_de'i bya ba thams cad 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]byed pa ni nga yin na/_dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa zhig gi phyir/_des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so snyam du rig nas khros te/_khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ngo /_/de der song nas bltas na khyim bdag de rang nyid dgra bcom pa de la gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong 
[\[246b.2\]]ngo /_/de nas de lhag par phrag dog gi phyir khros so/_/der dge slong rnams bshos gsol nas/_gtsug lag khang du dong ba de'i tshe dgra bcom pa de'i thad du song nas smras pa/_btsun pa khyod kyis khyim bdag 'di ltar byed pa 'di su yin shes sam/_dgra bcom pas smras pa/_ngas 
[\[246b.3\]]shes te/_phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/_/zhal ta byed pas smras pa/_gal te de ltar na khyod kyis de las skra bregs pa nyams su blangs pa bas ni/_khyod kyi skra btogs kyang sla'o/_/khyod kyis de las khrus kyi yo byad blangs pa bas ni/_khyod phyi sa'i 'dam du bying yang sla'o/_/khyod kyis de 
[\[246b.4\]]las zas dang skom blangs pa bas ni/_khyod kyis phyi sa dang gcin zos shing 'thungs kyang sla'o zhes byas so/_/de nas dgra bcom pa des bsams pa nyon mongs pa 'di ni dmas shing nyams par gyur te/_gtan tu nyams par gyur na mi rung gis 'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam nas/_
[\[246b.5\]]de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis nga su yin pa dang khyod bdag su yin pa shes sam/_des smras pa/_bdag gis shes te khyod kyang rab tu byung ba yin nga yang rab tu byung ba yin no/_/dgra bcom pas smras pa/_'o bu cag rab tu byung bar 'dra mod kyi/_khyod ni so so'i skye bo bcing ba 
[\[246b.6\]]thams cad kyis bcings pa yin te/_nga ni dgra bcom pa bcing ba thams cad las grol ba yin no/_/khyod kyis ngag rtsub po smras kyis/_nyes pa la nyes so zhes bshags par gyis shig_/khyod 'khor ba na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal chen po rnyed ta re/_de nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong 
[\[246b.7\]]de 'gyod pa chen po skyes so/_/de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol to/_/de nas des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis dgra bcom pa de la tshig rtsub smras pa'i las 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]de bdag la 'ong bar ma gyur cig_/phyis bdag gis chos bzhin du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byas pa dang tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar 
[\[247a.2\]]gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs 
[\[247a.3\]]pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni wa 'di kho na yin te/_des der dgra bcom pa de la tshig rtsub po smras te/_khyod kyis de las 
[\[247a.4\]]skra bregs pa nyams su blangs pa bas ni/_khyod kyi skra btogs kyang sla'o zhes byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der skra btogs par gyur to/_/des der khyod kyis de la khrus kyi yo byad blangs pa bas ni khyod phyi sa'i 'dam du bying yang sla'o zhes 
[\[247a.5\]]byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyi sa'i 'dam du gnas par gyur to/_/des der dgra bcom pa de la khyod kyis de las zas dang skom blangs pa bas ni/_khyod kyis phyi sa dang gcin zos shing 'thungs kyang sla'o zhes byas pa'i las 
[\[247a.6\]]de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lus las phyi sa'i dri 'byung ba dang phyi sa za bar gyur to/_/des der chos bzhin du zhal ta byas pa dang tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing 
[\[247a.7\]]nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[247b.2\]]kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lnga brgya po de dag gis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes par gyur lags/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas lhar skyes nas/_de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes 
[\[247b.3\]]par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[247b.4\]]rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad dge bsnyen du gyur 
[\[247b.5\]]nas/_de dag gi thad du dge slong rnams 'gro zhing /_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong yang dang yang du slong nas de dag ser sna'i dbang du gyur te/_dge slong de dag la 'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bzhin du khor zug tu gzhan la re ba 
[\[247b.6\]]lhur byed cing rgyu'o zhes de lta bu'i tshig rtsub po smras so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge bsnyen lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lnga brgya po de dag kho na yin te/_de dag gis der dge slong de dag la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[247b.7\]]pas ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes so/_/de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des ni de ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/las 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_bya gnyis dang ni lus 'phags dang /_ston pa 'od srung kun dga' bo/_/'dzin byed bu dang rab bzang dang /_yon rabs dang ni rgan zhugs gnyis/_/bya gnyis 
[\[248a.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_bya dang po ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs shing chos ston pa'i skabs su ri spos kyi ngad ldang nas/_
[\[248a.3\]]rma bya blta na sdug ces bya ba zhig 'ongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi steng gi bar snang la lding ba las/_bya des bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs shing chos ston pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang sa la babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du 'dug go/_/
[\[248a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos tshig gsum bstan te/_'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes de skad 
[\[248a.5\]]ces bka' stsal nas/_bya de dga' bar gyur te yun ring du zhal du brtags nas song ba'i 'og tu de steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba las khras bsad de/_de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos te/_dus las 'das nas rgyal po'i khab de nyid du tshong dpon zhig gi 
[\[248a.6\]]khyim du nying mtshams sbyar te/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu byung nas khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes 
[\[248a.7\]]pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_dgram pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_nor bu brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_spos brtag pa dang /_sman brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]dang /_go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang /_klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang /_bya ba la gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de sangs rgyas la dga' ba dang /_chos la dga' ba 
[\[248b.2\]]dang /_dge 'dun la dga' bar gyur nas des pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas na tshod kyis lo bdun lon pa kho na na nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar 
[\[248b.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas de rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag tu song nas lo ma'i nang du me tog dang 'bras bu rnams bcug ste khyer te 'ong zhing dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[248b.4\]]'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa dge tshul ba 'di lo bdun nas rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag nyid skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bka' stsal pa/_khyed kyis che ge mo zhig gi 
[\[248b.5\]]tshe/_bya zhig nam mkha' las babs nas nga'i mdun du 'dug pa mthong ngam gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bya de nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas song ba las khras bsad de/_de nga la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos nas 
[\[248b.6\]]rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid du tshong dpon gyi rigs su skyes nas/_cher skyes pa dang nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas na tshod kyis lo bdun pa kho na na nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[248b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge tshul ba 'dis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas byar skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na de las shi 'phos nas mir skyes la/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/_bcom ldan 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_yul kA shi'i grong khyer bA rA Na sI na ni rgyal po tshangs 
[\[249a.2\]]pas byin rgyal po byed do/_/yul lus 'phags na ni lus 'phags kyi rgyal po bi de ha rgyal po byed do/_/de gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun nas skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g.yul 
[\[249a.3\]]'gyed pa'i phyir rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi thog tu drangs so/_/kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang /_bi de ha'i rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir/_bdag gi thog tu drangs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas des kyang dpung gi 
[\[249a.4\]]tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir bi de ha'i rgyal po'i thog tu drangs pa las/_de bi de ha'i rgyal pos de thub cing brdungs par byas te/_pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/_rgyal po gcig pu thar te bros nas nags khrod cig tu zhugs te/_
[\[249a.5\]]de lus ngal ba dang lus sdug bsngal ba la lus shig shig por gyur nas rta las babs te/_dgra zhu dang 'thab ber phud de sa la bting ba'i steng du 'dug go/_/sa phyogs de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na ni/_rma bya zhig rma bya mo dag gis bskor te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/_de des 
[\[249a.6\]]mthong nas de la smon par gyur te/_'di ni 'dod pa yang spyod la 'di la gnod pa byed pa yang ci yang med pas na skye gnas 'di ni bzang po zhig go snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi bzhugs pa'i tshe na/_rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ste/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[249a.7\]]zhig rgyal po de'i thad nas rgyang mi ring ba zhig na/_shing zhig gi drung na rten cing 'dug nas rang sangs rgyas des de drang ba'i phyir lud pa bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de 'jigs shing skrag ste langs nas/_'dir yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs ma 'ongs grang snyam 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]pa las/_rgyal po des shing zhig gi drung na rang sangs rgyas rten cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de la sems dga' bar gyur te/_'di de ltar mi med pa'i nags khrod du dga' ba las na 'di ni bdag nyid chen po zhig yin gor ma chag snyam mo/_/sngon gyi rgyal rigs kyi rgyal 
[\[249b.2\]]po rnams kyi lugs kyis na/_gang gi tshe g.yul 'gyed du 'gro'am [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du 'gro ba de'i tshe rta'i 'phongs la kha zas cung zad tsam btags te 'gro'o/_/rgyal po de'i rta'i 'phongs la yang kha zas cung zad tsam btags pa yod de/_des rang sangs rgyas de la bshos gsol to/_/
[\[249b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas des kyang rgyal po de steng gi nam mkha' la khyer nas 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bzhag go/_/de nas rgyal po des smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der rma byar skye bar gyur cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 
[\[249b.4\]]'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/
[\[249b.5\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya de kho na yin te/_des der rang sangs rgyas la bshos gsol nas smon lam btab pa des na/_da ltar 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so//_//bya gnyis 
[\[249b.6\]]pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe ri spos kyi ngad ldang la bya ku mu dA'i dus ston sna tshogs can zhes bya ba nad pa ring por mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis 
[\[249b.7\]]kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus 
[\[250a.2\]]gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan 
[\[250a.3\]]song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed 
[\[250a.4\]]du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan 
[\[250a.5\]]pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs 
[\[250a.6\]]pa/_bya de lung bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/_'di las brten nas gdul bar bya ba'i skye bo mang po drang dgos so snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_ri spos kyi ngad ldang gis phyogs bya de 'dug pa nas thag mi ring ba zhig tu byon te/_bcom 
[\[250a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis ci nas bya tsa sha lnga brgya lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das la skor ba byed par 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bya des bya tsa sha lnga brgya lhags te bcom ldan 'das la skor ba byed par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang /_kye ma bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]la bskor ba bya'o snyam du de'i 'dod pa skyes so/_/de nas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur bzhin du shi nas lhar skyes so/_/de lhar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas des bden pa mthong ste/_bden pa mthong nas 
[\[250b.2\]]de rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya de'i ro las brten te/_dge slong gi 'khor gyi nang du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu bya 'dis las ci zhig byas na las de'i rnam par smin pas byar skyes par gyur ces smras pa dang /_de thos ma 
[\[250b.3\]]thag tu tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems pa la zhugs te/_de rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan gyi bar du snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i rtsad ma chod de/_bya rnams las shi 'phos shing bya rnams su skyes pa 'ba' zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bla gos phrag 
[\[250b.4\]]pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bya 'di'i rtsad ma khums te/_bya rnams las shi 'phos shing bya rnams su skyes pa 'ba' 
[\[250b.5\]]zhig mthong lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni ye shes gzigs pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas pa lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bya 'dis las ci bgyis pa dang /_las gang gi rnam par smin pas bya 'ba' zhig tu 
[\[250b.6\]]skyes pa lung bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bya 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[250b.7\]]sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]rab la bya 'di rab tu byung ste/_dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas/_des sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po rnams las bza' ba dang btung ba bslangs te/_khyim pa la rten par byed nas dge slong mang pos bkag pa las de khros te smras pa/_khyed ni dud 'gro bzhin 
[\[251a.2\]]du bsam mno med pa yin te/_dge slong dag gis bya ba gang yin pa ltar byed pa ma yin no/_/zhes byas so/_/de nas phyis de 'gyod pa skyes te/_des las de nyes pa la nyes so zhes bshags nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_
[\[251a.3\]]'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu dag la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las 'di bdag la 'ong bar ma gyur cig_/ston pa 'di kho na dang 'dra ba bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji 
[\[251a.4\]]snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya 'di kho na yin te/_des der dge slong de dag la tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don gzigs kyi ring nas/_
[\[251a.5\]]nga'i ring gi bar du dud 'gro rnams las shi 'phos shing dud 'gro 'ba' zhig tu skyes so/_/da ni nga la sems dga' ba skyes pas shi 'phos te/_dus las 'das nas lhar skyes so/_/lhar gyur nas kyang nga'i thad du 'ongs te de la ngas chos bstan to/_/des nga las chos thos 
[\[251a.6\]]nas bden pa rnams mthong ngo /_/des bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/des der chos bzhin du zhal ta byas nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_bdag gis ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces 
[\[251a.7\]]byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don gzigs dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te des na dge slong de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du/_nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[251b.2\]]spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//lus 'phags zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che 
[\[251b.3\]]ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa lus 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags te/_de zla ba dgu'am 
[\[251b.4\]]bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang la/_gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba/_dpral pa'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba sna legs pa smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_
[\[251b.5\]]khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes rigs dang 'thun par ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di bram ze lus 'phags kyi bu yin pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming lhag 'phags zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u lhag 'phags 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar 
[\[251b.6\]]gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang /_bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_
[\[251b.7\]]ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur la gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad kyang tshar bcad do/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze lus 'phags kyi sems skyes pa/_mchod sbyin bya'o 
[\[252a.2\]]snyam mo/_/de'i 'og tu yang sems skyes pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin te/_'dis ni 'di lta ste/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ci yang mi gzigs pa dang mi mkhyen pa dang thugs su ma chud pa ci yang med de/_bdag 
[\[252a.3\]]gi mchod sbyin yang yan lag 'ga' tsam gyi sgo nas kyang nyams par gyur na mi rung gis/_bdag je dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du song la dri bar bya'o snyam nas/_rgod ma dkar mo dang sbyar ba'i shing rta la zhon te/_gser gyi 'khar ba dang gser gyi ril ba thogs shing bram ze'i khye'u'i 
[\[252a.4\]]tshogs kyis bskor nas/_mnyan du yod pa nas byung ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/ji srid du bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/_rkang pas kun dga' ra bar song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste 
[\[252a.5\]]phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang mngon sum du yang dag par dga' ba dang yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/_mjug brtul nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze lus 'phags kyis 'di skad ces 
[\[252a.6\]]gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma 'dir bdag gis mchod sbyin chen po brtsams te/_mchod sbyin chen po bgyi ba'i slad du/_khyu mchog lnga brgya yang sdong po la btags/_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_ma he mo dang /_bzhon pa dang /_be'u dang /_be'u chung ngu dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_srog chags 
[\[252a.7\]]phra mo rnams kyang sdong po la btags so/_/mchod sbyin bgyi ba'i slad du/_bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang bshams so/_/nyi 'og gi dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyang phyogs gzhan dang gzhan dag dang ljongs gzhan dang gzhan dag nas/_bdag gi mchod sbyin 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]de lta bu nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_mnyan du yod par lhags na/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas ci nas bdag gi mchod sbyin yan lag 'ga' tsam gyi sgo nas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 
[\[252b.2\]]mchod sbyin de kho na las brtsams nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bram ze lus 'phags dang bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[252b.3\]]bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas lhag 'phags kyis smras pa/_phyin cad bdag cag bram ze rnams ston mo stsal ci 'tshal/_bram ze lus 'phags kyis smras pa/_lhag 'phags de skad ma zer cig_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol te/_yon 
[\[252b.4\]]phul ba'i 'og tu/_de'i lhag ma las bram ze rnams la yang sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas lhag 'phags kyis smras pa/_mkhan po ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas bram ze lus 'phags stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[252b.5\]]ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/_sang bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su bshos gsol bar ci gnang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze lus 
[\[252b.6\]]'phags la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas/_bram ze lus 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas de mchod sbyin gyi gnas su 
[\[252b.7\]]phyin nas khyu mchog thams cad kyang btang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_ma he mo dang /_bzhon pa dang /_be'u dang /_be'u chung ngu dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_srog chags phra mo sna tshogs kyang btang nas smras pa/_phyogs bzhi nas rlung bsil bar ldang gis khyed song la deng phan cad rtsi mchog ma 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]nyams pa la ni zo shig_/chu ma glongs pa rnyog pa med cing dang ba la ni 'thung shig ces byas te/_des srog chags phra mo sna tshogs de dag kyang bkye nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sta gon byas 
[\[253a.2\]]nas/_nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul 
[\[253a.3\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis/_mdun du bdar te/_bram ze lus 'phags kyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 
[\[253a.4\]]'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze lus 'phags dang /_bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags kyis/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang 
[\[253a.5\]]po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas re re la ras zung re phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te bstsang sder 
[\[253a.6\]]ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de gnyis la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan 
[\[253a.7\]]las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas der bram ze thams cad khros te 'di skad du ltos dang bdag cag gi phyir mchod sbyin brtsams pa las dge sbyong gau ta ma la byin no zhes zer to/_/de nas bram ze lus 'phags kyis 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bram ze thams cad bdag cag la ji ltar khros pa de thos nas/_thos ma thag tu bram ze lus 'phags bram ze de dag gi thad du song ste smras pa/_khyed la dge sbyong gau ta ma ci gnod/_bdag gis khyed kyi yon bshams pa ni khyed la sbyin par bya'o/_/bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_nged 
[\[253b.2\]]la phyin cad khyod kyi yon mi dgos so zhes smras nas/_de spad gnyis gsad par byas so/_/de nas de spad gnyis kyis bsams pa/_'di rnams kyis bdag cag gsad du 'ong ngo snyam nas bros te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[253b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad do/_/'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag gnyis khyim na gnas pa btang ngo /_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba 
[\[253b.4\]]dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad 
[\[253b.5\]]nas de gnyis la lung yang phog go/_/de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bram ze 
[\[253b.6\]]lus 'phags dang bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags/_bram ze de dag gis dgum par bgyis pa dang /_de kho nas skyo bar gyur nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[253b.7\]]stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te 'das pa'i dus na yang /_'di gnyis bram ze 'di rnams kyis gsad par byas te/_de dag kho nas skyo bar gyur nas/_rab tu byung ste tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa 
[\[254a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams pa las/_mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze gzhan zhig gis 'thab mo brgal te de khros pas bram ze de la lag chas bsnun nas bram ze de yang lag chas bsnun 
[\[254a.3\]]pa des shi'o/_/gzhi de las bram ze thams cad khros te/_phyin cad nged khyod kyis sbyin pa longs spyad par mi byed do zer zhing bram ze ma yin par rtsis nas dmod pa la zhugs te gsad par byas so/_/de nas bram ze de spad gnyis bram ze de dag gis 'jigs nas bros te/_de gnyis 
[\[254a.4\]]drang srong smra ba'i gnas su song nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas de gnyis kyis der tshe gcig du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa las/_yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob nas de gnyis kyis 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar 
[\[254a.5\]]bdag cag gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ste/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin 
[\[254a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du 
[\[254a.7\]]sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du bram ze spad gnyis rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de gnyis ni/_bram ze lus 'phags dang lhag 'phags 'di spad gnyis kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang de gnyis bram ze rnams kyis gsad par byas 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]nas 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste rab tu byung nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/da ltar yang 'di gnyis bram ze rnams kyis gsad par byas nas 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste/_rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[254b.2\]]mngon sum du byas so/_/de gnyis der rab tu byung ste/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_bdag 
[\[254b.3\]]cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[254b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa 
[\[254b.5\]]thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_ston pa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas te/_des thabs 
[\[254b.6\]]zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim 
[\[254b.7\]]bdag de'i bu snga phyir gnyis dang gsum dang de bzhin du bu bdun btsas nas des de dag gi btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas gang gi tshe de dag 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_dgram pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_nor bu brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_spos brtag pa dang /_sman brtag pa dang /_
[\[255a.2\]]glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_go mtshon brtag pa la bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang /_klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang /_bya ba la gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/phyi zhig na phas de dag la smras pa/_
[\[255a.3\]]nga'i tshig gis khyed khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten chos shig dang /_des khyed tshe 'di dang /_tshe phyi ma'i phan pa la 'dzud par byed do zhes byas pa las/_de'i bu drug gis smras pa/_bdag cag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten bca' ci dgos zhes zer nas/_de'i tshig 
[\[255a.4\]]ma mnyan te bu gcig ni/_'od srung rdzogs byed la dga' bar gyur to/_/gnyis pa ni kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la dga' bar gyur to/_/gsum pa ni smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la dga' bar gyur to/_/bzhi pa ni mi 'pham skra'i la ba can la dga' bar gyur to/_/
[\[255a.5\]]lnga pa ni ka t+ya'i bu nog can la dga' bar gyur to/_/drug pa ni gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la dga' bar gyur to/_/bdun pa ni pha'i ngag mnyan nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten bcas te/_des de la brten pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur te/_skyabs 
[\[255a.6\]]su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i bu che bas 'od srung rdzogs byed g.yar drangs te zan byin no/_/gnyis pas ni kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu g.yar drangs te zan byin no/_/gsum pas ni smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can 
[\[255a.7\]]g.yar drangs te zan byin no/_/bzhi pas ni mi 'pham skra'i la ba can g.yar drangs te zan byin no/_/lnga pas ni ka t+ya'i bu nog can g.yar drangs te zan byin no/_/drug pas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu g.yar drangs te zan byin no/_/de nas bu bdun pas phu bo de dag la smras pa/_khyed 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]kyis rang rang gi ston pa la zan byin te/_bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gyis/_der khyed kun gyis kyang bdag gi grogs gyis shig ces byas nas/_khye'u des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so/_/spyan drangs 
[\[255b.2\]]nas de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma mang po sta gon byas te/_nang par sngar langs nas/_gdan bshams te chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/_
[\[255b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_khyim bdag gi bu de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge 
[\[255b.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag de dang bu 'khor dang bcas pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang 
[\[255b.5\]]pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/_gsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/_
[\[255b.6\]]stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de bu dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang shes pa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na 
[\[255b.7\]]khyim bdag de bu dang 'khor dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te khyim bdag des bden pa mthong nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la brten nas bdag sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams las ni phyung /_lha dang mi'i 
[\[256a.2\]]nang du ni gom pa 'dor du stsal/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho rnams ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri rnams ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bcad mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_yun ring po nas goms pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni mthar gtugs te/_zhi ba dang 
[\[256a.3\]]spangs pa dang bor bar gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu bdag las na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams bzhes par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_
[\[256a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gzhan dag gi don yang bya dgos kyis thong shig ces bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs nas khyim bdag gi bus bsams pa/_bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la rab tu byung 
[\[256a.5\]]ngo snyam nas pha ma la bzlugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[256a.6\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[256a.7\]]slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te de dgra bcom pa khams 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so 
[\[256b.2\]]yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[256b.3\]]pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag 'di'i bu drug lta ba du ma 'tshal te/_phan tshun mi 'thun par smra ba las nu bo tha [{]chungs kyis [,]chung gis [}]lta ba gcig tu 'thun pa la bkod nas/_de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[256b.4\]]spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang spun drug po 'di rnams phan tshun mi 'thun pa las/_nu bo tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'di kho nas gcig tu 
[\[256b.5\]]'thun pa la bkod nas/_de rnams kyang drang srong la rab tu phyung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul dbus kyi rgyal po bdun rang rang gi yul na rgyal po byed pa las/_de rnams phan 
[\[256b.6\]]tshun mi 'thun te dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na yul kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi blo skyes pa/_bdag gis nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'di dag thams cad thabs ci zhig gis bsdum par bya snyam mo/_/de'i tshe yul kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas 
[\[256b.7\]]byin gyi yul na dka' thub kyi gnas zhig na/_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bsams pa/_bdag gis drang srong de la bcol na/_des 'di rnams kyi bsdums byed nus par 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'gyur ro snyam nas/_drang srong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug po 'di dag thams cad ni phan tshun mi 'thun te/_dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/de bas na khyod kyis thams 
[\[257a.2\]]cad bsdum par rigs so zhes byas so/_/de nas drang srong des kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo /_/de nas kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis/_drang srong des cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/de nas phyi 
[\[257a.3\]]zhig na rgyal po drug po rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te/_yul bA rA Na sIr lhags nas/_grong khyer thams cad dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas bskor te 'khod do/_/de nas kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis drang srong de la sbran te/_de thos 
[\[257a.4\]]ma thag tu drang srong de gnas de kho na nas rgyal po drug po gang na 'khod pa der nam mkha' la song ngo /_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug po de rnams drang srong de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas drang srong ga la ba der dong ste/_lhags 
[\[257a.5\]]nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/_/de nas drang srong des de dag la chos bstan nas thams cad mjal dum byed du bcug go/_/de dag gis mjal dum byas nas drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i sems skyes so/_/de nas 
[\[257a.6\]]de dag gis gcig la gcig bzlugs nas yul yul du dong ste/_rang rang gi bu rgyal por bcug nas sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge 
[\[257a.7\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyal po drug po phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni spun drug po phan tshun mi 'thun par smra bar gyur pa 'di dag kho na yin no/_/
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nu bo tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang drang srong des phan tshun mi 'thun pa de dag bsdums nas de dag kyang rab tu byung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/da ltar yang 
[\[257b.2\]]'dis spun drug po phan tshun lta ba mi 'thun par smra ba rnams lta ba gcig tu 'thun par byas te/_de dag kyang rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[257b.3\]]btsun pa khyim bdag bu dang g.yog 'khor du bcas pa 'dis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'di rnams kyis mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis bu bdun yang 
[\[257b.4\]]rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gang du smon lam btab lags/_bka' 
[\[257b.5\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo 
[\[257b.6\]]sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na/_khyim bdag cig gnas pa de'i bu spun drug phan tshun lta ba mi 'thun par smra bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag de'i bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]ni 
[\[257b.7\]]sangs rgyas la dga' ste/_des phu bo thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la btsud nas/_de dag thams cad kyis pha ma la gsol te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas/_de dag gis der tshe gcig 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes 
[\[258a.2\]]par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/khyim bdag des kyang sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba 
[\[258a.3\]]dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/de'i tshe yang bu bdun po 'di dag nyid bdag gi bur gyur 
[\[258a.4\]]cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du 
[\[258a.5\]]sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag 'di kho na yin te/_des der sbyin pa dag byin cing bsod nams dag byas nas/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te 'chi kar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_gang dang 
[\[258a.6\]]gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_'di dag kyang 'di'i bu kho nar gyur to/_/bu 'di rnams kyis kyang tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa 
[\[258a.7\]]des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//'od srung zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dgon pa'i gnas mal zhig tu yun ring du 
[\[258b.2\]]lon te/_skra dang kha spu ring zhing gos rnyings par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos ston to/_/de nas dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 
[\[258b.3\]]thag ring po zhig nas mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la brnyas pa'i sems skyes te/_tshe dang ldan pa dge slong skra dang kha spu ring zhing gos ngan la ma brtags pa'i cha lugs can 'di ga las 'ongs zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_dge slong de 
[\[258b.4\]]dag gi bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_dge slong 'od srung 'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/_nga'i bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur te/_mdo sde dang chos mngon pa dang 'dul ba yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba yin la/_dge slong 'di rnams kyis ni 'di 
[\[258b.5\]]la shin tu brnyas pa'i sems bskyed kyis/_ma la ngas 'di rnams la gyod gdab par bya'o/_/'on kyang 'di lha dang mi dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[258b.6\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyed kyis dge slong 'di la shin tu brnyas pa'i sems ma skyed cig_/'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu nga'i bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur te/_sde snod gsum yang dag par sdud par byed cing /_chos kyi tshul 'phel bar byed do zhes 
[\[258b.7\]]gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung tshur shog 'od srung 'ongs pa legs so/_/stan phyed 'di la 'dug shig_/bdag cag gnyis las khyod sngar rab tu byung ngam/_nga sngar rab tu byung ba brtag go zhes bka' 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]stsal to/_/de nas dge slong de dag 'jigs shing skrag la 'gyod de skyi bung zhes byed nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ste/_da ston pas nyan thos la gdan gyi phyed bstabs pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od 
[\[259a.2\]]srung chen pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags/_bdag ni bcom 
[\[259a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa lags/_bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_nga ni 'od srung khyod kyi ston pa yin/_khyod 
[\[259a.4\]]ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srung khyod bdag gi stan gang yin pa la 'dug shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag par yang skyo ba bskyed 
[\[259a.5\]]par bzhed pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chos kyis thob pa'i che ba dang rgya che ba la gzhag par bzhed nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga ni gal te 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod 
[\[259a.6\]]pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_nga ni gnas des nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/
[\[259a.7\]]dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang gal te/_'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te/_gnas par 'dod na 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]yang /_dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag nga ni gal te rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig 
[\[259b.2\]]tu gyur pas/_rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te/_gnas par 'dod na yang gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag 
[\[259b.3\]]bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang gal te rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing /_nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis 
[\[259b.4\]]pa rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des/_nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag nga ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[259b.5\]]bas btang snyoms la gnas shing /_dran pa dang shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod 
[\[259b.6\]]na yang nga ni gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang gal te dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa 
[\[259b.7\]]dang shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa/_dga' ba med pa/_bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te/_gnas par 'dod na yang dge slong 'od srung yang gnas 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]des/_nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag nga ni gal te bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba 
[\[260a.2\]]yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_gnas par 'dod na yang nga ni gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam/_gnyis 
[\[260a.3\]]sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong 'od srung yang gal te bde ba spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa 
[\[260a.4\]]yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag 
[\[260a.5\]]nga ni gal te byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa gnyis su med pa tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang de bzhin du gnyis pa 
[\[260a.6\]]dang de bzhin du gsum pa dang de bzhin du bzhi pa dang bla dang 'og dang thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa gnyis su med pa tshad med pa shin tu 
[\[260a.7\]]bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/_khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_dge slong dag nga ni gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang gal te/_byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa gnyis su med pa tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/_khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te 
[\[260b.2\]]gnas par 'dod na yang dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam/_gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/de bzhin du snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyang de dang 
[\[260b.3\]]'dra bar rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag nga ni gal te rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas 
[\[260b.4\]]so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_nga ni gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang 
[\[260b.5\]]gal te rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams yang dag par nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas 
[\[260b.6\]]skye mched rdzogs par byas te/_gnas par 'dod na yang dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag nga ni gal te rnam pa thams cad du 
[\[260b.7\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_nga ni gnas des nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig gam/_nyin zhag gcig 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum 'am/_nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/_
[\[261a.2\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag nga ni gal 
[\[261a.3\]]te rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_nga ni gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis 
[\[261a.4\]]sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang gal te rnam pa thams cad du/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas 
[\[261a.5\]]par 'dod na yang /_dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag nga ni gal te rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag 
[\[261a.6\]]par 'das nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/_gnas par 'dod na yang /_nga ni gnas des/_nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 
[\[261a.7\]]'od srung yang gal te/_rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas par 'dod na yang /_dge slong 'od srung yang gnas des nyin gcig gam nyin 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so/_/dge slong dag nga ni gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma myong bar byed 'dod na yang /_nga ni gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /_mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ba dang snang bar 
[\[261b.2\]]gyur cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes mthong ba myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ri la yang mi thogs par lus kyis 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul 
[\[261b.3\]]byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste dper na sa chen po la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung 'cha' bar byed de dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar 
[\[261b.4\]]mthu che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun du nyug par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung yang gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma myong bar byed 'dod na yang /_dge slong 'od srung yang gcig tu 
[\[261b.5\]]gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /_mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes mthong ba myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ri la yang mi thogs par lus kyis 'gro 
[\[261b.6\]]ste dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste dper na sa chen po la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung 'cha' bar byed de/_dper na 'dab 
[\[261b.7\]]chags bya bzhin no/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/_/dge slong dag ngas 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ni lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa/_mi las 'das pas mi dang mi ma yin pa gnyi ga'i sgra yang ring ba gang yin pa dang nye ba gang yin pa yang thos so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung gis kyang lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa/_mi las 'das pas mi dang mi ma yin pa 
[\[262a.2\]]gnyi ga'i sgra yang ring ba gang yin pa dang nye ba gang yin pa yang thos so/_/dge slong dag ngas ni/_sems can pha rol rnams dang gang zag pha rol rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyis shes so/_/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i 
[\[262a.3\]]sems dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems dang zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dang /_bsdus pa dang /_'phros pa 
[\[262a.4\]]dang /_zhum pa dang /_bsdams pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_rgod pa ma yin pa dang /_chen por gyur pa dang /_rnam par zhi ba dang /_rnam par ma zhi ba dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_mnyam par ma gzhag pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_ma bsgoms pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par ma grol ba'i sems 
[\[262a.5\]]kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la yang shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung gis kyang sems can pha rol rnams dang /_gang zag pha 
[\[262a.6\]]rol rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyis shes so/_/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_
[\[262a.7\]]zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dang /_bsdus pa dang /_'phros pa dang /_zhum pa dang /_bsdams pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_rgod pa ma yin pa dang /_chen por gyur pa dang /_rnam par zhi ba dang /_
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]rnam par ma zhi ba dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_mnyam par ma gzhag pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_ma bsgoms pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par ma grol ba'i sems kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la 
[\[262b.2\]]yang shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dge slong dag ngas ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_'di lta ste skye ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_
[\[262b.3\]]brgyad dang /_dgu dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_skye ba brgya dang /_skye ba stong dang /_skye ba 'bum dang /_skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /_
[\[262b.4\]]'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_sems can de dag ni ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_ga ge mo 
[\[262b.5\]]zhig na bdag ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya rus ni 'di zhes bya/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /_yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/_tshe ni 'di ltar ring /_tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/_nga de nas 
[\[262b.6\]]shi 'phos nas ga ge mo zhig tu skyes/_ga ge mo zhig nas yang shi 'phos nas yang 'di lta bu zhig tu skyes so snyam du rnam pa dang bcas pa dang /_yul phyogs dang bcas pa dang /_gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/_/
[\[262b.7\]]dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung gis kyang sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te 'di lta ste/_skye ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_dgu dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]bcu dang /_skye ba brgya dang /_skye ba stong dang /_skye ba 'bum dang /_skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa 
[\[263a.2\]]dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_sems can de dag ni ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_ga ge mo zhig na bdag ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 
[\[263a.3\]]'di zhes bya/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /_yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/_tshe ni 'di ltar ring /_tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/_nga de nas shi 'phos nas ga ge mo zhig tu skyes ga ge mo zhig nas shi 'phos nas yang 
[\[263a.4\]]'di lta bu zhig tu skyes so snyam du rnam pa dang bcas pa dang /_yul phyogs dang bcas pa dang /_gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/_/dge slong dag ngas ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/_sems can rnams 'chi 
[\[263a.5\]]'pho zhing 'dug pa dang /_skye zhing 'dug pa dang /_kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_bzang po dang ngan pa dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang rung ste/_sems can rnams las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[263a.6\]]shes so/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa yin/_log par lta ba yin te/_log par lta 
[\[263a.7\]]ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des na lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gis 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yin/_yang dag par lta ba yin te/_yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des lus dang bral te/_
[\[263b.2\]]shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung gis kyang lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can rnams 'chi 'phos shing 'dug pa dang /_skye zhing 'dug pa dang /_
[\[263b.3\]]kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_bzang po dang ngan pa dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang rung ste/_sems can rnams las ci lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par 
[\[263b.4\]]spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa yin/_log par lta ba yin te/_log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen 
[\[263b.5\]]des na lus dang bral te/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyis legs 
[\[263b.6\]]par spyod pa dang ldan pa yin/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yin/_yang dag par lta ba yin te/_yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des lus dang bral te/_shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams 
[\[263b.7\]]kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag ngas ni tshe 'di nyid la zag pa rnams zad pas/_zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba/_rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/_bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad zin to/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so snyam du nyams su myong ngo /_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung gis kyang tshe 'di nyid la zag pa rnams zad pas/_zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang 
[\[264a.2\]]shes rab rnam par grol ba/_rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/_bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad zin to/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so snyam du nyams su myong ngo /_/der gang gi tshe bcom 
[\[264a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang du bdag nyid dang 'dra bar che ba dang rgya che ba la bzhag pa de'i tshe/_lhag par yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla mar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[264a.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bdag nyid dang 'dra bar che ba dang rgya che ba la bzhag pa/_de'i tshe lhag par yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla mar gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[264a.5\]]stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang /_gang gi tshe ngas 'di la bkur sti byas pa de'i tshe/_yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA 
[\[264a.6\]]rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun pa dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang 'bras sA lu dang bu 
[\[264a.7\]]ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/_bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byas so/_/rgyal po de la btsun mo mang ste btsun mo lnga brgya yod do/_/de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]spyod kyang bu med nas/_bu 'dod de lha 'o cog la gsol ba 'debs so/_/de gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed kyang bu yang ma skyes/_bu mo yang ma skyes so/_/rgyal po de la/_blon po lnga brgya yod na thams cad kyang rgyags shing bag med par gnas pa sha stag go/_/de'i blon po'i 
[\[264b.2\]]mchog mdzod ces bya ba mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa gzhung lugs can dul ba dang ldan pa bag yod pa zhig kyang yod do/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po zhig dang mi 'thun par gyur nas/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bsams pa/_
[\[264b.3\]]bdag gis blon po gang nyi 'og gi yul der bzhag na/_rgyal po de dang mjal dum byas nas/_yul srung nus par 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas des bltas na blon po'i mchog mdzod ces bya ba/_mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa/_gzhung lugs can 
[\[264b.4\]]dul ba dang ldan pa/_bag yod pa zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po de dang mjal dum byas nas/_bdag gi yul srung nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_rgyal po des de mtha' 'khob ri khrod kyi yul der bskos te/_khyod song la der 'dug ste nga'i yul srungs shig_/
[\[264b.5\]]des gsol pa/_lhas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_de ri khrod der song nas 'dug go/_/de der song nas kyang nyi 'og gi yul de bzung nas/_ci nas yul der gnod pa cung zad kyang byed mi nus par byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs 
[\[264b.6\]]pas byin rgas pa'i 'og tu chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun 
[\[264b.7\]]mar dang mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe 'gro nus par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po sems pa la zhugs te/_da ni bdag rgas pas ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur na/_bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu byis pa gzhon nu 'dis/_rgyal srid 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'dzin mi nus na 'dis na bdag shi ba'i 'og tu/_bdag gi blon po'i nang na gang zhig gis bdag gi bu dang rgyal srid srung nus zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas des bltas na blon po lnga brgya po thams cad ni rgyags shing bag med par gnas na/_gzhan su 
[\[265a.2\]]yod snyam ste/_brtags na blon po'i mchog mdzod ces bya ba mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa gzhung lugs can dul ba dang ldan pa bag yod pa des ni bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu bu dang rgyal srid srung nus so snyam mo/_/de nas des bsams pa/_
[\[265a.3\]]bdag gis ci nas de yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bkur bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bkur sti bya'o snyam nas rgyal po des de la pho nya btang ste/_nga khyod dang phrad par 'dod kyis shog cig ces spring ngo /_/de nas blon po'i mchog mdzod ces bya bas de thos 
[\[265a.4\]]ma thag tu bA rA Na sIr chas so/_/rgyal po des kyang de la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir/_lam dang grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_rang nyid kyis blon po'i mchog mdzod ces bya ba bsu nas/_rgyal po 
[\[265a.5\]]tshangs pas byin gyis bar skabs gang du de dang phrad pa'i bar skabs der/_glang po che las babs nas yang dag par dga' bar byas te/_mgul nas 'jus nas bzhon pa gcig la zhon te/_'byor pa chen po dang ldan pas grong khyer bA rA Na sIr song nas stan gcig 
[\[265a.6\]]la 'dug tu bcug ste kha zas gcig tu g.yos pa dang sder gcig tu zan zos nas nor gyi phung po chen po byin no/_/byin nas kyang rgyal po des de la smras pa/_mdzod da ni nga rgas te/_ring por mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur la/_blon po lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis 
[\[265a.7\]]nga shi ba'i 'og tu rgyal po byis pa yin snyam ste/_gzhon nu la brnyas par 'gyur du 'ong la/_nga shi ba'i 'og tu khyod kyis bu dang /_rgyal srid srung nus pas na ngas khyod la bu dang rgyal srid gtad kyis/_nga shi ba'i 'og tu 'di gnyis bsrung bar gyis shig ces byas
