[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]so/_/blon po'i mchog mdzod kyis gsol pa/_lhas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs byin nad kyis thebs nas/_de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang sos par byed ma 
[\[265b.2\]]nus nas/_des rgyal bu rgyal sar bcug ste/_blon po'i mchog mdzod la gtad nas shi ba'i 'og tu rgyal po'i bu dang yul bsrungs nas phyogs su bsgrags so/_/de nas des rgyal po bgres po shi ba'i 'og tu/_des de'i 'dab btang nas blon po lnga brgya po bsdus te bsgo ba/_
[\[265b.3\]]khyod ji ltar yang rgyal po bgres po nongs pas gzhan su yang bdag cag sdud pa med do snyam du ma sems shig_/ngas khyed kun la yul gyi bgo bsha' bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ci nas rgyal po 'di byis pa yin yang sus kyang mi tshugs par bya'o zhes byas nas/_des blon po 
[\[265b.4\]]lnga brgya po de dag la yul gyi bgo bsha' byas so/_/rgyal po'i bu de yang nang mi dang bcas par de nyid kyis bsrungs so/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_blon po'i mchog mdzod kyis gsol pa/_lha rgyal po yab kyis lha dang rgyal srid bdag la gtad nas/_
[\[265b.5\]]yab nongs pa'i 'og tu bdag gis lha dang rgyal srid bsrungs so zhes byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe blon po'i mchog mdzod ces bya bar gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang ldan par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od srung 'di kho na yin te/_
[\[265b.6\]]der yang gang gi tshe ngas bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas pa de'i tshe/_yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad kyi bla mar gyur to/_/da ltar yang gang gi tshe ngas 'di la bkur sti byas te/_bdag nyid dang 'dra bar che ba dang rgya che ba la bzhag pa de'i tshe 'di ni 'jig rten 
[\[265b.7\]]thams cad kyi bla mar gyur to//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/_gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab tu phyung ste/_chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong lobs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]thos pa 'dzin pa rnams dang thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag nyid dang 'dra bar che ba dang rgya che bar ston pa de'i tshe/_de gnyi ga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[266a.2\]]rten gyi bla mar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong 'di nyid kyis ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bstan pa'i don byed nus par 'gyur te/_gcig gis ni thos pa'i mdzod srung bar nus so/_/gcig gis ni bstan pa'i don 
[\[266a.3\]]byed nus par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer du chas te gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/_'di snyam du dgongs te gal te mi rnams 'ba' zhig la bstan pa gtad de/_mi ma yin pa 
[\[266a.4\]]rnams la ma gtad na yang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur la/_gal te mi ma yin pa rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad de mi rnams la ma gtad na yang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyis/_ma la ngas lha dang mi rnams dang dge slong de gnyis la bstan pa gtad na/_
[\[266a.5\]]lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang yongs su gzung la dge slong gnyis kyis kyang yongs su bzung bas bstan pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod nga yongs su mya ngan 
[\[266a.6\]]las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa'i don byas te/_sde snod gsum yang dag par bsdus nas dge slong kun dga' bos nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du ma byas kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/der 
[\[266a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyang drang srong nyi ma'i gung rab tu ma byung gi bar du mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/de la yang khyod kyis 'di skad ces gyis shig_/klu'i rgyal po/_hu lu ru btul te/_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]kha che'i yul btsugs nas der bstan pa gnas par byas te/_rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du khyim bdag gso ma can rab tu phyung ste/_des kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de la khyod kyis thos pa rnams ma gtad kyi 
[\[266b.2\]]bar du mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/gso ma can la yang 'di skad ces gyis shig_/khyod kyis kyang klu'i rgyal po gar mkhan dang dpa' bo gnyis btul te/_gar mkhan dang dpa' bo'i dgon pa'i gnas btsugs nas/_de bzhin du yul bcom brlag tu 
[\[266b.3\]]spos 'tshong srung ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de'i bu nye srung zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de rab tu phyung nas/_des kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/_de la yang thos pa rnams ma gtad kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/
[\[266b.4\]]nye srung la yang 'di skad ces gyis shig_/khyod kyis kyang rigs kyi bu blo ldan rab tu phyung ste des kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de la yang thos pa rnams ma gtad kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/de la yang 'di skad ces 
[\[266b.5\]]gyis shig_/khyod kyis kyang yul dmar can gyi bu zhes bya bar zas dug can gyi bsam pa ma byas kyi bar du/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma byed cig ces gyis shig ces gsungs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[266b.6\]]dga' bo stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/der 
[\[266b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod song la so so skye bo'i dge 'dun dag khrid de ljongs rgyu zhing song shig nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang de'i snga rol tu 'khrug long byed par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos so so skye bo'i dge 'dun dag khrid de ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po song nas ring po ma lon par/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig 
[\[267a.2\]]rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/_kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang rgyal po chen po bzhi po yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang dang rnam thos kyi bu rnams nga la ltar 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas lha'i dbang 
[\[267a.3\]]po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyis 
[\[267a.4\]]gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod de/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa/_dbang po dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[267a.5\]]dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/_nga yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu/_khyed kyis bstan pa bsrung bar gyis shig_/dbang po dag lo stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa nub tu cha ba'i tshe/_'jig rten na chos ma yin pa'i shas che zhing 
[\[267a.6\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las yongs su nyams par gyur pa na/_'dzam bu'i gling du mi bde ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur te/_mi bde ba'i rlung langs pas char 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/_/char ma bab pas chu klung dang khron pa rnams chu nyung bar 'gyur zhing shing ljon pa 
[\[267a.7\]]rnams kyang me tog dang 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro/_/lo tog rnams kyang 'bras bu med pa dang mthu med par 'gyur la/_de dag kyang ser bas med par byed do/_/'bru rnams kyang ma rung bar gyur pas mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mu ge byung nas mi rnams 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]zas su khre rgod za bar 'gyur te/_nyam stobs chung zhing gzi byin chung bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ka'i mi dang ya ba na dang ba lhi ka dang rgyal po dang chom rkun gyis 'jig rten rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/sha ka'i mi dang ya ba na dang ba lhi ka dang rgyal po dang chom 
[\[267b.2\]]rkun gyis gnod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor dang mche ba dang lhung bzed mchod rten dang 'dra ba rnams shar phyogs kyi yul du khyer ba'i 'og tu lho phyogs nas mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po sha ka zhes bya ba g.yog 'khor 'bum dang ldan pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[267b.3\]]dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rnams 'jig par byed cing /_mchod rten rnams 'dral bar byed la dge slong rnams kyang gsod par byed do/_/nub phyogs nas ni mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po ba lhi ka zhes bya ba g.yog 'khor 'bum dang ldan pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/_dge 
[\[267b.4\]]'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rnams 'jig par byed cing /_mchod rten rnams 'dral bar byed la dge slong rnams kyang gsod par byed do/_/byang phyogs nas ni mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po ya ba na zhes bya ba g.yog 'khor 'bum dang ldan pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug 
[\[267b.5\]]lag khang rnams 'jig par byed cing mchod rten rnams 'dral bar byed la/_dge slong rnams kyang gsod par byed do/_/des na mi dang chom rkun dang rgyal po'i nan gyis dpyas gnod par gyur nas/_dge slong rnams shar phyogs kyi yul du 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po dag 
[\[267b.6\]]de'i tshe yul kau shAM bI zhes bya bar rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba/_g.yog 'khor 'bum dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i bu lus go cha gyon pa lag pa khrag can tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur la/_de kho na'i nyin par rgyal po de'i blon po 
[\[267b.7\]]lnga brgya'i bu yang /_lus go cha gyon pa lag pa khrag can tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag btsa' bar 'gyur te/_de kho na'i nyin par yul kau shAM bIr khrag gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal pos mtshan mkhan rnams la smras na/_de dag na re lha 'di 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]ni sa steng thams cad du rgyal po gcig pur 'gyur te/_de lta lags kyis kyang sems can mang po kha 'dog par 'gyur lags so zhes lung bstan to//de nas btsas ston byas nas bu de che bar grags pa dang bzod par dka' ba zhig ste/_de'i ming 
[\[268a.2\]]bzod par dka' ba zhes bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po de dag gis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed cing shar phyogs kyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po dbang 
[\[268a.3\]]chen sdes de thos te/_'jigs shing mi dga' ba skyes nas/_de la lha rnams kyis bstan pa/_gzhon nu bzod par dka' ba rgyal sar chug shig dang /_des mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po de dag tshar chod par 'gyur ro zhes ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po dbang chen 
[\[268a.4\]]sdes mgo bo las cod pan dang dbu rgyan phud de/_gzhon nu bzod par dka' ba rgyal sar bcug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po bzod par dka' bas blon po lnga brgya'i bu de dag blon po'i mchog tu bcug nas/_blon po lnga brgya po/_de dag dang lhan cig tu go 
[\[268a.5\]]bgos te/_mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po de dag dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir 'dren par 'gyur te/_des mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po gsum po g.yog 'khor 'bum 'bum dang ldan pa de dag kha btags nas/_sa'i steng thams cad du rgyal po gcig pur 'gyur te/_
[\[268a.6\]]bka' 'og tu bcug nas phyir kau shAM bIr 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po dag de'i tshe yul dmar can gyi bu zhes bya bar bram ze mes sbyin zhes bya ba/_rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag mthar phyin pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des thabs zlar bab pa las chung 
[\[268a.7\]]ma blangs nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur la/_sems can gzhan zhig kyang de'i chung ma'i ltor 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze mo de yid la 'dod pa skyes te/_gzhung gis rtsod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu smra yang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams la bstan nas/_mtshan mkhan rnams na re lto na 'dug pa'i sems can de bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhing /_gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar chod par 'gyur te/_de'i mthus na bram ze mo'i yid la 'dod pa/_
[\[268b.2\]]gzhung gis rtsod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu smra yang ci ma rung snyam pa de lta bu skyes pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas par gyur te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_bstan bcos 
[\[268b.3\]]thams cad mthar phyin par 'gyur zhing /_gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar chod par 'gyur la/_bram ze lnga brgya bram ze'i sngags slob pa'i slob dpon byed de/_de la slob ma mang po yod pas na/_de'i ming slob ma can zhes btags so/_/de nas des pha ma la 
[\[268b.4\]]gsol nas/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing sde snod gsum lobs par 'gyur te/_rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur la 'khor mang po 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po dag de kho na'i tshe yul dmar can gyi bu zhes bya bar tshong dpon 
[\[268b.5\]]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur la/_srid pa tha ma'i sems can zhig kyang de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs nas/_bud med de bzod pa dang ldan zhing des la 
[\[268b.6\]]kha mchu nyung zhing zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshong dpon nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mtshan mkhan rnams la bstan na/_de dag na re sems can ltor zhugs pa de des par 'gyur te/_de'i mthus na chung ma 'di bzod pa dang ldan zhing des la kha mchu nyung zhing zhi bar gyur to zhes 
[\[268b.7\]]zer ro/_/de nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/_de'i ming des pa zhes 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe pha ma la gsol nas/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]'gyur te/_des nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur la/_thos pa nyung zhing 'dod pa chung la kun gyis shes pa dang bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po bzod par 
[\[269a.2\]]dka' ba'i yab dbang chen sde shi nas/_rgyal po bzod par dka' bas pha'i rus bu lag pa gnyis kyis pang du blangs te mya ngan byed cing sdug bsngal la/_smre sngags 'don par byed de su yang de'i mya ngan sel nus pa med do/_/de nas re zhig na gnas brtan 
[\[269a.3\]]slob ma can 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang yul kau shAM bIr 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de rgyal po bzod par dka' ba'i thad du song nas chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos nas rgyal po de pha'i mya ngan yang sangs par 'gyur la/_bstan pa la yang dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[269a.4\]]de dad par gyur nas dge slong rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas des dge slong rnams la smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po rnams kyis bshig nas ji srid lon/_de dag na re lo bcu gnyis lon no zhes zer ro/_/
[\[269a.5\]]de nas rgyal po des seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/_ngas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du kau shAM bIr bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa lo lnga pa'i dus ston bya'o zhes smras nas/_rgyal po des kau shAM bIr lo lnga pa'i dus ston gyi lugs gtod de/_gang gi nyin par lo lnga pa'i dus ston 
[\[269a.6\]]brtsams pa de kho na'i nyin par char 'bab par 'gyur te/_sa'i steng rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa chus ngoms par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams lhag par yang kau shAM bIr lo lnga pa'i dus ston byed du 'gro zhing /_dge slong 
[\[269a.7\]]rnams kyi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong rnams rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po la zhen nas de dag gis dad pas byin pa longs spyod par byed do/_/lung mnod par mi byed klog par mi byed/_kha ton mi byed/_nyin mo ni bre mo gtam gyis 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]dus 'da' bar byed/_mtshan mo ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis dus 'da' bar byed cing khe dang bkur sti 'dod la/_lus kyi byi dor gyis g.yen spyo zhing gos kyis brgyan pa la brtson te/_nges par 'byung ba dang nye bar zhi ba dang dben pa dang rdzogs par byang chub pa dang 
[\[269b.2\]]bral zhing /_cha byad 'ba' zhig gces par byed par 'gyur te/_dge sbyong gi yon tan dang bral ba/_dam pa'i chos kyi dgrar gyur pa/_rtsod pa'i dus kyi grogs su gyur pa de dag gis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal bar 'gyur/_bdud kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar 
[\[269b.3\]]'gyur/_chos kyi me lce gsod par 'gyur nyon mongs pa'i me sbar bar 'gyur/_chos kyi rnga 'dral bar 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo phye mar rlog par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyi rgya mtsho skems par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos kyi ri bo rnam par 'thor bar 
[\[269b.4\]]'gyur/_chos kyi grong khyer 'jigs par byed par 'gyur/_chos kyi shing ljon pa drung nas 'byin par 'gyur/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnyis spong bar byed/_tshul khrims kyi rgyan rnams gcod par byed/_lam sun 'byin par byed do/_de nas de dag la lha 
[\[269b.5\]]rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dmod par 'gyur spang bar 'gyur brgyal bar 'gyur te/_kye sems can tha chad 'di lta bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab mi mdzes par byas so zhes zer to/_/'di skad ces kyang zer te/_da ni ma 
[\[269b.6\]]bsdams ngan spyod dang /_/log par lta bas nyams pa'i bdag_/rmongs pa bdag gis bcom ldan gyi/_/bstan pa'i ljon shing bcad kyis med/_/da ni snying rje med pa dang /_/chos lugs bor zhing bden chos spangs/_/brkam chags rnams kyis bcom ldan gyi/_/
[\[269b.7\]]bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan bsnyal gyis med/_/da ni gdul dka' ma grangs pa/_/sdig pa'i las la dga' ba'i mi/_/sdig can rnams kyis thub pa yi/_/bstan pa'i zam pa bcad kyis med/_/da ni mgo reg ngan pa po/_/spyod 'chal smad pa tshul 'chos gnas/_/
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]ngan g.yo can gyis thub pa yi/_/bstan pa'i tshong 'dus bcom gyis med/_/da ni khro dang nga rgyal dang /_/rgyags pas brlams shing rnyed la zhen/_/snying rje med pa de dag gis/_/sdig pa mi byed ci yang med/_/da ni dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe/_/rtags mtshan 
[\[270a.2\]]shin tu mi bzad pa/_/dge ba rnams ni skyo 'gyur ba/_/ston pa de nyid gzigs pa po/_/drang srong dam pas gang gsungs pa/_/de dag kyang ni snang bar 'gyur/_/da ni thub pa'i bstan pa yang /_/cung zad tsam zhig lus par zad/_/thub pa'i bstan pa gang chen mtsho/_/ring 
[\[270a.3\]]por mi thogs skams par 'gyur/_/ma rabs shes rab 'chal pa dang /_/las med gnas pas gnod par byas/_/tshul can dag dang sten mi shes/_/nyes pa 'dzin cing tshul khrims spangs/_/byis pa dben pas 'jigs pa dang /_/mi dben pa dang mi 
[\[270a.4\]]mkhas dang /_/bslab nyes slob dpon ngan pa dang /_/rjes su ston pa rmongs pa dang /_/ngan pa dag la yid rton pas/_/dam chos 'di ni ma rung byas/_/de skad ces zer zhing mi mgu la ma rangs nas/_phyin cad dge slong rnams la bsrung ba dang sbed par mi byed do/_/
[\[270a.5\]]de nas zhag bdun na dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba na/_lha rnams yid mi dga' nas nam mkha' la 'khod de skad 'byin cing sgra bsgrags te/_grogs po dag da ste zhag bdun na gso sbyong gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos thab 
[\[270a.6\]]mos nub par 'gyur ro zhes zer to/_/de nas de thos nas kau shAM bI na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen lnga brgya gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams 'thab pa dang mtshang 'dru ba dang 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa byung ngo cog zhi bar byed de/_'di skad du kyi hud sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 
[\[270a.7\]]ring por mi thogs par thab mos nub par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/'di skad ces kyang zer te/_sems can kun la bde byed pa/_/shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa ni/_/dus kyi 'khor los rab bcom nas/_/myur ba nyid du 'jig par 'gyur/_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i dus bab 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]tshe/_/snying ni stong du ma gas pa/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag gi/_/snying gi lcags kyi snying po zad/_/zhi ba'i dus ni 'das par gyur/_/mi bzad dus ni byung gis med/_/shes rab can gyi mi rnams ni/_/'jig rten dag na zad par 'gyur/_/sa steng rtags rnams ci 
[\[270b.2\]]'dra bar/_/rnam pa du ma snang ba las/_/nges par thub pa'i bstan pa ni/_/ring po mi thogs 'jig par 'gyur/_/bde 'dod rnams kyis phan pa'i don/_/da ni legs par brtag par rigs/_/da ni dam pa'i chos nub pas/_/mchod pa dpag tu med pa las/_/tshad 
[\[270b.3\]]yod pa can du 'gyur ro/_/de bas na bdag cag gis longs spyod snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya'o snyam nas dge bsnyen lnga brgya po de dag gis/_gang gi nyin par dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyin par gtsug lag khang lnga brgya zhal sro bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[270b.4\]]de nas gso sbyong gi dus la bab pa na dge bsnyen lnga brgya po rnams brel te/_gtsug lag khang du 'gro mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/de nas re zhig na dge slong des pa ri spos kyi ngad ldang na gnas pa las gang du gso sbyong bya snyam ste/_'dzam bu'i gling du bltas na/_bcom ldan 
[\[270b.5\]]'das kyi nyan thos thams cad kau shAM bIr 'dus par mthong ngo /_/de nas de gso sbyong bya ba'i phyir kau shAM bIr 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/der dge slong 'bum gso sbyong la 'du bar 'gyur te/_de'i nang na dgra bcom pa ni des pa zhes bya ba gcig pu yod do/_/sde snod gsum pa 
[\[270b.6\]]ni slob ma can zhes bya ba gcig pu yod do/_/dbang po dag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa tha ma yin te/_'di lta ste/_dge slong 'bum yod do/_/de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa'i nang na/_dge slong mdzes chos 'dug pas tshul shing brims nas/_
[\[270b.7\]]gnas brtan slob ma can rnams la smras pa/_gnas brtan dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa lags kyis so sor thar pa gdon du gsol/_slob ma can gyis smras pa 'dzam bu'i gling na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'dir 'ongs te/_
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]'di lta ste dge slong 'bum yod na/_de ltar dge 'dun mang po'i nang na/_bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan yin la/_thos pas kyang mthar phyin pa yin na/_bdag kyang bslab pa 'di dag la slob par mi chud na gzhan lta lags kyang bslab pa rnams la slob 
[\[271a.2\]]par mi chud/_de lta na su'i don du bdag gis so sor thar pa gdon par bya snyam mo/_/'di skad ces kyang zer te/_do nub rgyu skar tshogs pa yi/_/bco lnga'i mtshan mo dga' ba la/_/gso sbyong 'dod pa'i dge slong dag_/shin tu bsgrims te nges par 'khod/_/'dzam 
[\[271a.3\]]gling 'di na shAkya yi/_/sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed pa/_/de dag thams cad 'dir lhags te/_/'di ni 'dus pa tha ma yin/_/dge slong dge 'dun de dag las/_/bdag ni thos pa'i mthar phyin kyang /_/bdag kyang bslab la slob mi nus/_/skye bo gzhan lta ci 
[\[271a.4\]]zhig smos/_/'on te 'di na thub dbang po/_/shAkya seng ge blo ldan gyi/_/bslab la legs bslabs 'ga' yod na/_/rang gi yon tan brjod par rigs/_/de nas dgra bcom pa des ba stan las langs te/_gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug nas/_dge 'dun la 
[\[271a.5\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_gnas brtan slob ma can la smras pa/_gnas brtan so sor thar pa gdon par gyis shig_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i tshe/_shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bslab pa yang dag par 
[\[271a.6\]]bsrungs pa de bzhin du/_bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_lo stong lhag tsam lon gyi 'og tu bstan pa yang dag par bsrungs so zhes zer ro/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_slob ma can gyis smras pa yi/_/tshig 'di thos par 
[\[271a.7\]]gyur nas ni/_/nges pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sras/_/seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed/_/bdag ni thub pa'i bslab pa rnams/_/ma 'khrugs par ni 'dzin par byed/_/bdag ni ston pa'i 'dul ba yi/_/bslab pa rnams la ji bzhin bslabs/_/de nas 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]slob ma can gyi slob ma dpung rgyan zhes bya ba 'jigs su rung ba de langs te smras pa/_khyod ni gsar bu thos pa nyung ngu yin na/_mkhan po la phyir 'khyal lam zhes byas nas/_des mtshon rnon po blangs te dgra bcom pa des pa de gsod par 'gyur ro/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_
[\[271b.2\]]slob ma can gyi slob ma ni/_/dpung rgyan zhes bya 'jigs su rung /_/de yis bde bar gshegs pa'i sras/_/dgra bcom des pa gsod par 'gyur/_/de nas der gnod sbyin zho gdong zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te des bsams pa/_dgra bcom pa gcig pu yong 
[\[271b.3\]]pa de yang ngan pa po 'dis bsad do snyam nas/_des rdo rje 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa thogs nas dge slong dpung rgyan gyi mgo bo tshal pa bdun du gshag par 'gyur ro/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_de nas gnod sbyin zho 
[\[271b.4\]]gdong gis/_/rdo rje 'bar ba thogs nas ni/_/dge slong dpung rgyan ngan pa yi/_/mgo bdun tshal par gshag par 'gyur/_/de nas dgra bcom pa des pa'i slob ma rnams stan las langs nas sde snod gsum pa slob ma can gsod par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dgra bcom 
[\[271b.5\]]pa des pa dang sde snod gsum pa slob ma can bsad nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos nub nas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing /_skar mda' dag lhung la lci ba 'byung zhing /_bar snang las lha'i rnga sgra dag sgrogs te/_
[\[271b.6\]]phyogs bzhi nas gza' mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]'byung bar 'gyur la/_lha 'bum snyed snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don cing /_kyi hud de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du bsgrubs pa'i dam pa'i chos nub kyis med do zhes zer to/_/yang bka' 
[\[271b.7\]]stsal pa/_de nas yud tsam de nyid la/_/dge slong des pa bsad pa'i tshe/_/sa steng 'di dag ma lus par/_/rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid chen po thub pa yi/_/dam chos de ni nub pa'i tshe/_/der ni srog chags mang po rnams/_/sdug bsngal ldan zhing 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]rlag par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/rgyal ba'i bstan la dga' ba rnams/_/kha sbub tu ni sgyel nas kyang /_/smre sngags 'don cing sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/de ring phyin cad 'jig rten du/_/dam pa'i chos kyang med par 'gyur/_/'dul 
[\[272a.2\]]ba so sor thar pa'ang rung /_/phyin cad spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi chu lon ral gyis med/_/chos kyi rgyun yang bzlog gis med/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho 'di yang skams/_/chos kyi ri bo [(]brnyil [,]bsnyil [)]gyis med/_/chos kyi mchod sbyin 'di yang zad/_/chos kyi mchod sdong bsnyal 
[\[272a.3\]]gyis med/_/chos kyi rkang pa bcag gis med/_/sdom pa dag kyang zad kyis med/_/deng du chos kyi sgron ma bsad/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bzlog gis med/_/bdud rtsi'i sgo yang bcad kyis med/_/chos smra rnams kyang zad kyis med/_/lam bzang ston par byed pa yi/_/
[\[272a.4\]]skyes mchog rnams kyang brlag gis med/_/mi rnams ring po mi thogs par/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi ni 'du shes 'gyur/_/zhes zer to/_/de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas nas babs nas/_snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/_kyi hud da ni nga'i bus 
[\[272a.5\]]bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi bar du bsgrubs pa'i dam pa'i chos da ni thab mos nub par byas kyis med do zhes zer ro/_/'di skad ces kyang zer te/_kye ma des pa yon tan can/_/sangs rgyas sras kyi tha [{]chungs te[,]chung ste[}]/_/dpung rgyan phrag dog zhe sdang gi/_/dbang du gyur pas 
[\[272a.6\]]bsad pa na/_/sangs rgyas yum ni brtul zhugs bzang /_/lha mo chen mo sgyu 'phrul ma/_/dam pa'i chos ni nub pa'i phyir/_/mi dga' snying rje bla bar 'gyur/_/kyi hud mi yi lha mchog gi/_/bstan pa nyams par 'gyur gyis med/_/sde snod gsum pa slob ma can/_/
[\[272a.7\]]dge slong des pa gnyis bsad pas/_/deng du zla ba gnam las lhung /_/nyi ma yang ni 'phos kyis med/_/bstan pa'i nyi ma med gyur pas/_/da ni 'jig rten snang ba med/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni/_/sgra gcan gyis ni zin pa ltar/_/deng du 'jigs pa chen po yi/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]mun pa 'jig rten byung gis med/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas 'gro ba'i/_/chos kyi gru ni de ring du/_/dpung rgyan la sogs byis pa rnams/_/snying med pas ni bsad kyis med/_/rtags tsam lhag ma lus par zad/_/chos ma yin pa snang bar 'gyur/_/bdud rnams 
[\[272b.2\]]rgyal ba'i sgra skad ni/_/bdud kyi 'khor rnams sgrogs par byed/_/seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags pa yi/_/lus 'phags ri bo de nyid du/_/da ni brgya byin 'khor dang bcas/_/mya ngan zug rngus phog par gyur/_/tshangs bcas 'jig rten de ring du/_/mgon med yi yang chad par 
[\[272b.3\]]gyur/_/'khor bcas bdud ni dgra zla med/_/rgyags pas ldan zhing bdo bar gyur/_/thar pa'i lam ni mtshon pa dang /_/mthar ston mya ngan 'das pa na/_/thub pa yi ni byang chub phyogs/_/thar pa'i lam rnams bcad kyis med/_/kauN+Di n+ya sogs gang dag tu/_/khrus byas 
[\[272b.4\]]mthar phyin rims nad med/_/byang chub yan lag me tog rgyas/_/chos kyi mtsho ni deng du skams/_/bstan pa'i tshogs de gang du song /_/bstan 'dzin 'di dag gang du dong /_/'dzam gling spro ba med gyur pa/_/mthong bas deng du yi chad do/_/sangs rgyas sras po brtul 
[\[272b.5\]]zhugs bzang /_/chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung las skyes/_/ru skya 'dzin pa nyon mongs spangs/_/smra ba'i stag rnams gang du dong /_/'jig rten dag na mgon po'i sras/_/sangs rgyas srog shing 'dzin pa rnams/_/phyag dar khrod dang ri sul dang /_/nags tshal bor te gang du dong /_/
[\[272b.6\]]de ni de yis spangs pas na/_/zla ba sgra gcan zin pa bzhin/_/dgon pa rnams kyang mi mdzes te/_/kun nas mdzes pa med par gyur/_/shes dang tshul khrims dul bar ldan/_/dad pa'i rin chen rnams kyis brgyan/_/bzod dang des pa ldan pa dang /_/dge dang mi dge rtog byed 
[\[272b.7\]]pa'i/_/dam pa'i blo can gang dag gis/_/gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal/_/mchod rten sogs pas sa steng 'di/_/brgyan pa'i skyes bu de dag med/_/'jig rten 'dren pa med mthong nas/_/shin tu sdug bsngal snying rje bas/_/lha rnams de la sogs pa yi/_/smre sngags 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'don te dong bar 'gyur/_/de nas kau shAM bI na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen lnga brgyas de thos nas/_gtsug lag khang nas byung ste lag pa bsgreng nas cho nge rdung zhing /_kyi hud bcom ldan 'das des bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du bsgrubs pa'i bstan 
[\[273a.2\]]pa deng du thab mos nub par gyur to zhes zer ro/_/yang smras pa/_'jigs su rung ba'i 'jig rten na/_/legs gsungs bral ba'i mi rnams la/_/su zhig dam chos smra bar 'gyur/_/su zhig mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/snang ba nub ste mun pas bsgribs/_/rnam 
[\[273a.3\]]par rmongs shing rgyu bar byed/_/thub pa'i gsung rab med pas na/_/dge ba'i las ni rnam spangs shing /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du skyo ba med/_/rtag tu sdig pa'i chos dang ldan/_/de nas kau shAM bI'i rgyal pos dgra bcom pa des pa dang sde snod gsum pa slob ma can bsad do zhes 
[\[273a.4\]]thos nas/_khros shing rngam la 'khrugs par 'gyur te ma rangs nas des bstan pa la gnod pa byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rnams 'jig par byed la/_mchod rten rnams 'dral bar byed cing dge slong rnams gsod par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po dag phyi ma'i 
[\[273a.5\]]dus na gang du bstan pa la gnod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/_khyed gcig tu bsdoms la bstan pa bsrung bar gyis shig_/de nas de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis ni shar phyogs nas 
[\[273a.6\]]bstan pa bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/'phags skyes pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis ni lho phyogs nas bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis ni nub phyogs nas bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa/_
[\[273a.7\]]btsun pa bdag gis ni/_byang phyogs nas bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis ni/_thams cad nas bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang kun dga' bo la bstan pa gtad pa de'i tshe/_
[\[273b.2\]]dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/_dge slong 'od srung la bstan pa gtad de/_kun dga' bo la thos pa'i mdzod gtad nas/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'di gnyis kyis 
[\[273b.3\]]bstan pa rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas dge slong 'od srung la/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang yul gtad de/_kun dga' bo la nor gyi 
[\[273b.4\]]mdzod gtad nas/_'di gnyis kyis nga shi ba'i 'og tu bsrungs te rgyal po'i pho brang rgyas par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer mi thi la na/_rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i btsun mo la bu 
[\[273b.5\]]chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags nas/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings so/_/
[\[273b.6\]]de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po de nad kyis btab nas de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang sos par byed ma nus nas/_rgyal po des bsams pa/_bdag ni nad 'dis 'chi bar 'gyur la/_bu 'di yang shin tu chung bas/_bdag shi 
[\[273b.7\]]ba'i 'og tu rgyal po byis pa yin no snyam nas/_thams cad kyis brnyas par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bdag shi ste dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'di na rgyal po'i pho brang gi gzhi 'dzin nus shing mthu dang ldan pa su yod snyam pa las/_rgyal po de la blon po'i mchog mkhas shing 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]gsal la yid gzhungs pa gzhung lugs can dul ba dang ldan pa bag yod pa/_dga' bo zhes bya ba dang nye dga' bo zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/_/de nas rgyal po lha chen pos bsams pa dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bdag shi ste dus la 'das pa'i 'og tu/_
[\[274a.2\]]rgyal po'i pho brang bsrung nus so/_/snyam nas rgyal po des blon po de gnyis pho nyas bkug ste/_bsgo ba khyed gnyis shes par gyis shig_/_nga ni ring po mi thogs par med par 'gyur gyis/_nga shi ste dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu/_khyed gnyis kyis rgyal po'i pho brang srungs 
[\[274a.3\]]shig ces bsgo nas/_rgyal po des de gnyis las gcig la ni rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i dkor mdzod gtad do/_/gcig la ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang yul gtad de/_nga 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis rgyal po'i pho brang srungs la/_rgyas par gyis shig 
[\[274a.4\]]ces bsgo nas/_rgyal po des bu rgyal sar bcug ste dus las 'das so/_/de nas de dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu blon po de gnyis kyis 'dab btang nas/_gcig gis ni rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i dkor mdzod bsrungs so/_/gcig gis ni dpung gi tshogs yan 
[\[274a.5\]]lag bzhi dang rgyal srid bsrungs so/_/de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po'i bu de shed bye zhing mthur son par gyur pa de'i tshe de la de gnyis kyis/_gcig gis ni dkor dang dkor mdzod phul lo/_/gcig gis ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang yul phul te/_lha 'di ni khyed 
[\[274a.6\]]kyi yab kyi nor lags kyis chos bzhin du rgyal po mdzod cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po bgres por gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe gang gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[274a.7\]]bzhi dang yul bsrungs pa de ni dge slong 'od srung 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe gang gis rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i dkor mdzod bsrungs pa de ni kun dga' bo 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gso ma can yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]rgas kar gcig la ni rgyal po'i bu dang dkor mdzod gtad do/_/gcig la ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang yul gtad do/_/de gnyis kyis kyang nga shi ste/_dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu/_rgyal po'i pho brang bsrungs te rgyas par byas so/_/da ltar yang ngas dus kyi tha ma la thug 
[\[274b.2\]]pa na gcig la ni thos pa'i mdzod gtad do/_/gcig la ni bstan pa gtad de/_'di gnyis kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa rgyas par byed do/_/gzhan yang dge slong kun dga' bo dang 'od srung gis smon lam btab ste/_gcig gis ni bdag de'i 
[\[274b.3\]]thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur cig_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang thos pa'i mdzod rgyas par byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/gcig gis kyang kye ma/_shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag gis 
[\[274b.4\]]de'i bstan pa'i don byed par shog ces byas so/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis gang du smon lam btab lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par 
[\[274b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab 
[\[274b.6\]]la dge slong kun dga' bo rab tu byung nas/_de su las rab tu byung ba de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par 
[\[274b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang /_shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog des thos pa 
[\[275a.2\]]'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang bdag gis thos pa'i mdzod rgyas par byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo 'di kho na yin te/_des 
[\[275a.3\]]der smon lam btab pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid 
[\[275a.4\]]kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur la/_'di yang ngas thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang thos pa rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 
[\[275a.5\]]dge slong 'od srung yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de nyid kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas/_de gang las rab tu byung ba de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/des der tshe gcig tu tshangs 
[\[275a.6\]]par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram 
[\[275a.7\]]ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]cig_/'di ltar bdag gi mkhan po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog des/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 
[\[275b.2\]]bstan par gyur cig ces byas nas/_de de nas shi 'phos te/_dus las 'das nas/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI de nyid du/_blon po'i mchog gi khyim du nying mtshams blangs nas/_de gang gi tshe btsas nas cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po kr-i kIs blon por bcug go/_/de nas gang gi tshe yang 
[\[275b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung /_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad zin nas/_lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/_rgyal po kr-i kIs de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che'i mchod rten kho ra khor 
[\[275b.4\]]yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa zhig byed du bcug ste/_rgyal po des blon po'i bu de mchod rten de'i lag dpon du bskos so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po kr-i kIs mchod rten de rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_der mchod rten gyi dus ston bya bar 'dod de/_
[\[275b.5\]]des bza' ba dang bca' ba dang gos mang po sbyar nas/_dge slong rnams la 'bod du bcug go g.yar 'dren btang ngo /_/der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun lon nas bstan pa nub ste/_de yongs su mya ngan 
[\[275b.6\]]las 'das nas/_dge slong dbang thob pa gang yin pa de dag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/so so'i skye bo gang yin pa de dag ni khyim par gyur to/_/de nas der g.yar 'dren pa de dag gis dge slong gcig kyang ma rnyed nas/_rgyal po kr-i kIs dge slong de dag gar dong zhes 
[\[275b.7\]]smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te zhag bdun lon nas bstan pa nub lags so zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/_de'i dge slong gang gis/_de'i bstan pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu gcig 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]kyang med dam zhes byas nas/_rgyal po kr-i kIs mchod rten de la bkur sti byas te song ngo /_/blon po'i bu des kyang mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la 
[\[276a.2\]]longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa 
[\[276a.3\]]la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/gzhan yang bdag gis de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_bstan pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe blon po'i bu gang yin 
[\[276a.4\]]pa de ni dge slong 'od srung 'di kho na yin te/_'dis der smon lam btab bo//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'dzin byed ces 
[\[276a.5\]]bya ba zhig gnas so/_/'dam bu sbyin zhes bya ba'i grong na ni bram ze rgyal zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de gnyis mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze rgyal chung ma dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_chung ma la bu chags nas de zla 
[\[276a.6\]]ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_ming shA ri'i bu zhes bya ba dang nye rgyal zhes bya bar btags so/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze 'dzin byed kyi chung ma la yang bu chags nas/_
[\[276a.7\]]de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'dzin byed kyi bu yin pas na/_khye'u 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]'di'i ming 'dzin byed kyi bu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u 'dzin byed kyi bu 'o ma dang mar dang zho dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_gang gi tshe de gnyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe de gnyi ga byis pa slob pa'i grwar gtad nas/_de gnyi ga yang yi ge mthar phyin par 
[\[276b.2\]]lobs te/_de gnyi gas bstan bcos thams cad lobs so/_/nye rgyal gyis ni lo bcu drug lon nas dbang po'i brda sprod pa yang lobs te gzhung gis rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad do/_/de nas phyi zhig na dka' thub kyi nags tshal du rten bcas nas/_de kun du rgyu 
[\[276b.3\]]dag gi nang du rab tu byung ngo /_/der gang gi tshe sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe bram ze'i bu shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_der de gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[276b.4\]]byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis las gcig ni shes rab che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/gcig ni rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/bram ze'i khye'u 'dzin byed kyi bu ni rgyal po'i zham ring ba dpa' bor gyur te/_rgyal po'i pho brang der rtag tu 'gro ba 
[\[276b.5\]]las de shes rab dang ldan pa'i phyir/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bskos nas/_longs spyod kyi gzhi chen po yang byin te/_'jig rten dag ni 'byor pa 'dod pa yin no/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_des kyang thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang 
[\[276b.6\]]lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod la/_des khyim gyi 'byor pa rgyas par byas te bzhag go/_/de nas des rgyal po'i khab der rgyal po la brten cing bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi nor len par byed do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la brten cing rgyal po'i nor 
[\[276b.7\]]len par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_'dzin byed kyi bu gdul ba'i dus la bab par mthong nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bram ze 'dzin 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]byed kyi bu shing ma la li ka'i 'dab na ba 'jo ba'i zhal ta byed cing 'dug pa las/_bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bus thag ring po zhig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la yan 
[\[277a.2\]]lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas khyim gyi nang du khrid de/_stan bshams pa la 'dug tu bcug ste/_kye shA ri'i bu bshos gsol la 'o ma yang gsol cig ces byas so/_/shA ri'i bu na re 'dzin byed kyi bu nga la sems dga' bar byas zin gyis des chog go/_/'dzin byed kyi 
[\[277a.3\]]bus smras pa/_kye shA ri'i bu khyod yun ring mo zhig na gdod bdag gi khyim du phyin na/_ci'i phyir zan gcig tsam yang zar mi btub/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu 'di ltar khyod ni ngang tshul 'chal cing ngang tshul nyams pa yin te/_rgyal po la brten cing bram ze dang khyim 
[\[277a.4\]]bdag rnams kyi nor len par byed la/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la brten cing rgyal po'i nor len par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'dzin byed kyi bus smras pa/_kye shA ri'i bu bdag ni khyim pa ste/_khyim na gnas pa lags pas na/_bdag gis ni bdag nyid dang pha ma dang bu 
[\[277a.5\]]dang chung ma dang bran dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang mdza' bo dang snying nye ba dang nye du dang rgan rabs kyang yang dag par bde bas tshim par bya dgos so/_/rgyal po la yang sa gzhi'i rag lus la/_lha yang rjed dgos/_sngon gyi mtshun dag kyang gtor dgos/_dge 
[\[277a.6\]]sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyang zan sbyin dgos te/_bdag gis ni chos bzhin du byed pa 'ba' zhig gis bde blag tu 'byor par mi nus so/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu 'o na khyod nyid la dri bar byas/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du de'i lan thob shig_/dper na mi 
[\[277a.7\]]zhig gis pha ma gnyis kyi phyir chos ma yin pa spyod cing log par spyod de/_de chos ma yin pa spyod cing log par spyod pa des lus dang bral te/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas/_de sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]bzung ste/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong du bcug nas/_de na re sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag bdag la gnod pa 'di dang 'di lta bu dag ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis pha ma'i phyir chos ma yin pa spyad cing log par 
[\[277b.2\]]spyad pas/_bdag chos ma yin pa spyad cing log par spyad pa des/_lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes par zad do zhes zer na/_'dzin byed kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_mi de sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams 
[\[277b.3\]]las don de 'grub par 'gyur ram/_'dzin byed kyi bus smras pa/_shA ri'i bu de ni mi 'grub bo/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bus chos dang ldan pa dang las kyi yon tan dag gis longs spyod rnams bsgrubs te/_pha ma gnyis la dus 
[\[277b.4\]]dus su yang dag par ri mo byed pa dang /_yang dag par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i bde bas sten par byed de/_sdig pa'i las kyang cung zad kyang mi byed la/_bsod nams kyi lam yang dag par blangs te/_'dug na de la pha ma yang 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs 
[\[277b.5\]]kyi bu 'di ni dad pa dang ldan zhing sgrub phod la rigs pas 'tsho ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu 'dis ni chos dang ldan pa dang /_las kyi yon tan dag gis longs spyod rnams bsgrubs nas/_dus dus su bdag cag la yang yang dag par ri mo byed/_yang dag par bsnyen bkur byed/_yang dag 
[\[277b.6\]]par bde bas sten par byed de/_sdig pa'i las kyang cung zad kyang mi byed la/_bsod nams kyi lam yang yang dag par blangs te 'dug go snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu pha ma la slar snying brtse bar byed pa de ni/_dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar re bar bya ste/_yongs 
[\[277b.7\]]su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dzin byed kyi bu/_dper na mi zhig gis bu dang chung ma dang bran dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang mdza' bo dang snying nye ba dang nye du dang rgan rabs rnams dang rgyal po dang lha rnams dang dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi phyir chos ma yin pa 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]spyod cing log par spyod de/_de chos ma yin pa spyod cing log par spyod pa des/_lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas/_de sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis bzung ste/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi 
[\[278a.2\]]bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong du bcug nas/_de na re sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag bdag la gnod pa 'di dang 'di lta bu dag ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi phyir chos ma yin pa spyad cing log par spyad par zad do zhes 
[\[278a.3\]]zer na/_'dzin byed kyi bu ji snyam du sems/_mi de sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams las don de 'grub par 'gyur ram/_'dzin byed kyi bus smras pa/_shA ri'i bu de ni mi 'grub bo/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bus chos dang ldan pa dang /_las kyi 
[\[278a.4\]]yon tan dag gis longs spyod rnams bsgrubs te/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la zas sbyin par byed de/_sdig pa'i las kyang cung zad kyang mi byed la/_bsod nams kyi lam yang yang dag par blangs te/_'dug na de la dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis dge ba'i sems kyis slar snying brtse bar 
[\[278a.5\]]byed do/_/'dzin byed kyi bu de ltar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis dge ba'i sems kyis slar snying brtse bar byas pa'i skyes bu gang zag de'i ni/_dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar re bar byas te yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras nas bram ze 'dzin 
[\[278a.6\]]byed kyi bu ngus te mchi ma blags so/_/de nas bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bus gos kyi mtha' mas mchi ma phyis nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye shA ri'i bu 'di ni bdag gi mchis brang bag sar blangs nas ring po ma lags pa zhig mchis te/_de'i slad du bdag gis 
[\[278a.7\]]bag ma mchis par sdig pa kha na ma tho ba mang po bgyis kyis/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bag sar 'di bdag gis gtan du slar btang la/_deng slan chad btsun pa shA ri'i bu las tshangs par spyod pa lnga pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par nod par 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bus bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu tshangs par spyod pa lnga pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu lho phyogs kyi ri'i nags khrod ga la ba der song ba las/_dge slong gzhan zhig 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka 
[\[278b.2\]]gnas pa nas/_lho phyogs kyi ri'i nags khrod ga la ba der song nas dge slong des thag ring po zhig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[278b.3\]]go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod da gdod ga las 'ongs/_dge slong des smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag da gzod 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa nas mchis so/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_
[\[278b.4\]]bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu shes sam/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag 'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sngon gyi khyim na gnas pa'i tshe'i grogs po lags so/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_nad 
[\[278b.5\]]med dam/_stobs dang ldan par rgyal po'i khab na gnas sam/_ston pa mthong bar dga' 'am/_chos mnyan par dga' 'am/_dge slong des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu ni ston pa blta bar yang dga'/_chos mnyan par yang dga' mod kyi/_gnod pa dang 
[\[278b.6\]]ldan zhing sdug bsngal dang ldan te nad par gyur pas gal te na nad de kho nas 'chi bar 'gyur yang srid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus chos gos snam sbyar bgos te/_bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu'i khyim ga la ba der song ba las bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bus thag ring po zhig nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[278b.7\]]shA ri'i bu mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khri las ldang du stsol lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu khri las ldang bar stsol ba mthong nas bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu la smras pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu nga 'dug pa'i stan gzhan dag kyang yod kyis/_khyod khri las ma ldang 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]cig ces byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan bshams pa la 'dug go/_/'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'dzin byed kyi bu ci khyod bzod pa dang ldan nam/_'tsho 'am/_ci khyod kyi sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_
[\[279a.2\]]mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba drag po rnams med par gyur tam/_phyir thu bar ma gyur tam/_med par gyur par mngon nam/_phyis thu bar gyur par mi mngon grang /_'dzin byed kyi bus smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa ma yin/_'tsho ba 
[\[279a.3\]]dang ldan pa ma yin te/_bdag gi lus la sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba tshabs chen po dag gis thebs te/_bdag gi tshor ba de dag phyis thu zhing phyis na bar mngon gyi med par ma gyur to/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu dper na mi stobs 
[\[279a.4\]]che rab cig gis mi nyam chung rab cig gi mgo bo 'breng ba bzang po ring pos dam du bcings na de'i mgo bo mi bzad par na bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gi mgo bo la tshor ba mi bzad cing 'dug ste/_bdag gi tshor ba de dag phyis thu zhing phyis la na bar mngon gyi med 
[\[279a.5\]]par ma gyur to/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu dper na ba lang gsod pa'am/_ba lang gsod pa'i slob mas ba lang bsha' ba'i gri rnon pos ba lang gi lto dral na de'i lto ba'i tshor ba mi bzad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gi lto ba'i nad mi bzad par 'dug ste bdag gi tshor 
[\[279a.6\]]ba de dag phyis thu zhing phyis la na bar mngon gyi med par ma gyur to/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu dper na mi stobs che rab gnyis kyis mi stobs chung rab cig dpung pa g.yas g.yon nas bzung ste/_me mdag gi nang du sreg par byed na de'i lus mi bzad par tsha bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun 
[\[279a.7\]]pa shA ri'i bu bdag gi lus shin tu tsha zhing 'dug ste/_bdag gi tshor ba de dag phyis thu zhing phyis la na bar mngon gyi med par ma gyur to/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu des na bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa ma yin/_'tsho ba dang ldan pa ma yin te/_bdag gi lus la sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_mi bzad pa 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba tshabs chen po dag gis thebs te/_bdag gi tshor ba de dag phyis thu zhing phyis la na bar mngon gyi med par ma gyur to/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu 'o na khyod nyid la dri bar byas khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/'dzin 
[\[279b.2\]]byed kyi bu ji snyam du sems/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu sems can dmyal ba pas ni dud 'gro bdam mo/_/dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu dud 'gro bas ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bdam mo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang mi gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i 
[\[279b.3\]]bu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]pas ni mi bdam mo/_/mi dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu mi bas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bdam mo/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bas ni 
[\[279b.4\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha bdam mo/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang 'thab bral gyi lha gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha bas ni 'thab bral gyi lha bdam mo/_/'thab bral gyi lha dang dga' ldan pa'i lha gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'thab bral ba'i lha bas 
[\[279b.5\]]ni dga' ldan pa'i lha bdam mo/_/dga' ldan pa'i lha dang 'phrul dga'i lha gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu dga' ldan pa'i lha bas ni 'phrul dga' ba'i lha bdam mo/_/'phrul dga' ba'i lha dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'phrul dga'i lha bas 
[\[279b.6\]]ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha bdam mo/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la gang bdam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha bas ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdam mo/_/'dzin byed kyi bu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdam zhes zer ram/_
[\[279b.7\]]btsun pa shA ri'i bu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdam zhes mchi'o/_/de nas bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu yud tsam zhig cang mi zer bar 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdam 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]par gyur na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i lam mchis sam/_'dzin byed kyi bu lam yang yod/_srang yang yod de/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bsgoms na 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spangs nas de la shas cher gnas pas tshangs 
[\[280a.2\]]pa'i 'jig rten du skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ba de ngas bshad na de khyod kyis shes par nus sam/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis shod cig dang bdag gis mnyan to/_/shA ri'i bus/_smras pa/_'dzin byed kyi bu 'di na 'phags pa nyan thos ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga sems kyi nye ba'i nyon 
[\[280a.3\]]mongs pa skyed pa/_shes rab kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa/_phongs par 'gyur ba'i phyogs mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba spangs nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_dgra zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa chen por gyur pa/_gnyis su med pa/_tshad med pa/_shin 
[\[280a.4\]]tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du phyogs gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang /_'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad byams pa dang ldan 
[\[280a.5\]]pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_dgra zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_chen por gyur pa/_gnyis su med pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms chen por 
[\[280a.6\]]gyur pa'i bar du rgyas par brjod par byas te/_'dzin byed kyi bu 'di ni lam yin/_'di ni srang yin te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bsgoms na 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spangs nas de la shas cher gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skal ba mnyam par skye bar 
[\[280a.7\]]'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par byas nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu song nas ring po ma lon par bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong shA ri'i bus bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]la de'i steng du bden pa rnams ma bshad pa ni tshar phyin pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs nas 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bram ze 'dzin byed kyi khyim du bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bus bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs par mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[280b.2\]]nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas kyang khri las langs te 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[280b.3\]]bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par mdzad nas 'dzin byed kyi bu'i khyim nas mi snang bar gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par bcom ldan 'das ches sngar 'od ma'i tshal 
[\[280b.4\]]du gshegs nas nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas ring po ma lon par bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu shi ste dus las 'das nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 
[\[280b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu tshangs 
[\[280b.6\]]pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par bgyis na da gzod de nas mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir khyod kyis bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu la de'i steng du bden pa rnams ma bstan/_ji ste bstan du zin na chos 'dul ba 'di rtogs pa zhig_/shA ri'i bu de lta mod kyi khyod 
[\[280b.7\]]song ba'i 'og tu nga 'od ma'i tshal 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bu'i khyim du 'dug nas ngas de la de'i steng du bden pa rnams bstan te/_des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas de shi ste dus las 'das nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]so/_/de ltar ngas 'dzin byed kyi bu bden pa rnams la gnas par byas nas khyod 'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par nga thog mar phyin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de ltar ngo mtshar 
[\[281a.2\]]kyi chos dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'dzin byed kyi bus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_bcom ldan 
[\[281a.3\]]'das kyang des mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/btsun pa des smon lam gang du btab lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer 
[\[281a.4\]]'thab med ces bya ba na rgyal po klu lha zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skya bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_nad dang mu ge 
[\[281a.5\]]med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/de'i tshe grong khyer 'thab med na rgyal po klu lha'i mdun na 'don phyug cing 
[\[281a.6\]]nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_nor dang gser du ma dang ldan pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po la brten cing bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi nor len par byed/_bram 
[\[281a.7\]]ze dang khyim bdag rnams la brten cing rgyal po'i nor len par byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe bram ze dbul po gzhan zhig bram ze mdun na 'don de'i thad nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa des/_bram ze mdun na 'don des rgyal po la brten cing bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi nor 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]len par byed bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la brten cing rgyal po'i nor len par byed de/_gzhi des na khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug cing skyes pa med par bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan rnams kyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod par rig go/_/de nas bram ze dbul po des bsams pa/_'di dpal 
[\[281b.2\]]'di lta bu dag nyams su myong ba ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa'i las rnam pa gsum gyi 'bras bu yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya gor ma chag_/'on kyang des 
[\[281b.3\]]dbul ba chad par 'gyur ro snyam du de lta bu'i sems skyes so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_rang sangs rgyas zhig de'i khyim sgor 'ongs so/_/de nas bram ze dbul po des thag ring po zhig 
[\[281b.4\]]nas rang sangs rgyas de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bram ze des rang sangs rgyas de la bsod snyoms phul lo/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston par byed kyi ngag gis ma yin te/_des bsod snyoms de blangs nas 
[\[281b.5\]]de kho na nas nam mkha' la song ngo /_/de nas bram ze de lhag par yang dga' ba skyes nas rkang pa la dmigs te phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye 
[\[281b.6\]]bar gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang rgyal po la brten cing bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi nor len pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la brten cing rgyal po'i nor len pa dang 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes 
[\[281b.7\]]par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bram ze dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzin byed kyi bu 'di kho na yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas de la bsod snyoms phul nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa des na gang dang 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_des der bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la brten cing rgyal po'i nor len par byed/_rgyal po la brten cing bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi nor len par byed la/_dge slong dag 
[\[282a.2\]]nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang ches lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa nga lta bu 'dis mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dge bsnyen du gyur te/_des der tshe gcig tu skyabs 
[\[282a.3\]]su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par 
[\[282a.4\]]ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'dzin byed kyi bu 'di kho na yin te/_des tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[282a.5\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[282a.6\]]'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so//_//rab bzang zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la dri za'i 
[\[282a.7\]]rgyal po rab dga' zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des lha'i dbang po brgya byin dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de dang 'brel ba'i glu dbyangs sbyor ba la zhugs so/_/de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa las rnam pa bzhi'i gzigs pas 'jig rten la gzigs 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]nas yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la smras pa/_rab dga' byang chub sems dpa' lha'i ris dga' ldan nas shi 'phos te/_yum gyi lhums su nying mtshams sbyar nas gang gi tshe de bltams te/_cher skyes pa de'i tshe bdud rtsi 
[\[282b.2\]]brnyes nas des 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad par 'gyur gyis/_khyod kyis kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor cig dang /_khyod la yang des bdud rtsi'i skal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/rab dgas smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag gis glu dbyangs sbyar ba brtsams lags te/_re zhig de 
[\[282b.3\]]lags par bgyis na slad kyis slebs so zhes zer ro/_/de nas de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi na kun tu rgyu rab bzang zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can grong khyer ku shi na gnas pa'i gyad kyi bu thams cad kyis bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing dgra bcom par bkur ba 
[\[282b.4\]]zhig yod de/_de mtsho ma dros pa'i 'gram na nyin par gnas so/_/der yang de la lha dang klu rnams kyis bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed mchod par byed do/_/de res 'ga' ni mtsho ma dros pa'i 'gram de nyid na nyin par gnas shing 'dug go/_/res 'ga' ni mtsho ma dros 
[\[282b.5\]]pa de nyid nas thag mi ring ba zhig na shing u dum bA ra'i tshal zhig yod pa der song nas 'dug go/_/de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la smras pa/_rab dga' byang chub sems dpa' bltam gyis tshur dang 
[\[282b.6\]]bdag cag gis de'i mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o/_/rab dgas smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag gis glu dbyangs sbyar ba brtsams lags te/_de re zhig de lags par bgyis nas slad kyis slebs so zhes zer ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i che ba nyid kyis u dum bA ra'i 
[\[282b.7\]]tshal der u dum bA ra'i me tog rnams kha 'bus par gyur to/_/de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis shing u dum bA ra'i me tog kha 'bus pa mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu yid dga' bar gyur te des bsams pa/_ga na'i kun tu rgyu rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/_sde tshan gyi 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]slob dpon chen po dag las bdag gis thos na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_u dum bA ra'i me tog ni brgya lam na 'byung bar zad do zhes zer ba las na/_u dum bA 
[\[283a.2\]]ra'i tshal 'dir yang bdag gi bsod nams kyis u dum bA ra rnams kyi me tog kha 'bus par gyur to snyam mo/_/der gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgan po dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba gzigs nas nags khrod du gnas bcas pa de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab 
[\[283a.3\]]dga' la smras pa/_rab dga' byang chub sems dpa' de ni rgan po dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba gzigs nas nags khrod du gnas bcas kyis/_bdag cag dong la de'i mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o/_/rab dgas smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag gis glu dbyangs sbyar ba brtsams lags 
[\[283a.4\]]te/_de re zhig lags par bgyis nas slad kyis slebs so zhes zer ro/_/der gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis chos bzhin du bskor ba de'i tshe brgya byin gyis yang dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' 
[\[283a.5\]]la smras pa/_rab dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis bskor bar bzhed kyis tshur bdag cag song la chos mnyan par bya'o/_/rab dgas smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag gis glu dbyangs sngar brtsams 
[\[283a.6\]]lags te/_re zhig de lags par bgyis nas slad kyis slebs so zhes zer ro/_/der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis bskor ba de'i tshe u dum bA ra'i tshal de dag rnam pa thams cad du me tog rgyas par gyur te/_des na dpag 
[\[283a.7\]]tshad mang por dri bsung gis rgyas par gyur te/_rgyu des na kun du rgyu rab bzang lhag par yang yid dga' bar gyur nas 'di dag ni bdag gi bsod nams las gyur pa yin no snyam mo/_/der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]chos bzhin du bskor ba de'i tshe lnga sde dang /_nye ba'i lnga sde rnams dang /_grong gi byis pa mgo mtho mtho lnga bcu btul to/_/shing bal gyi shing gi nags khrod du gshegs nas bzang sde drug cu'i pha tshan bden pa rnams la bkod do/_/sde pa'i grong du gshegs nas grong na gnas pa'i bu 
[\[283b.2\]]mo dga' ma dang /_dga' stobs ma gnyis bden pa rnams la bkod do/_/lteng rgyas su gshegs nas ral pa can stong rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/_/ga yA'i rtse mo'i mchod rten gyi drung du gshegs nas dge slong stong po de dag cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis yid ches 
[\[283b.3\]]par mdzad de g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/_bla na med pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/smyig ma'i nags khrod du gshegs nas yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'bum phrag 
[\[283b.4\]]du ma dang thabs cig tu bden pa rnams la gnas par mdzad do/_/rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas 'od ma'i tshal bzhes te/_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu g.yog 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ldan pa gnyis rab tu phyung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/_/mnyan du yod par gshegs 
[\[283b.5\]]nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal bzhes te cho 'phrul chen po bstan nas dge tshul skul byed rab tu phyung ste des kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag nas dus ma yin pa'i me tog dang 'bras 
[\[283b.6\]]bu rnams blangs shing mkhan po dang dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de mtsho ma dros pa'i 'gram du song nas de der dga' bar gyur te/_des der nyin bar gyi gnas btab pa las kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis smras pa/_grogs po 'di ni nga'i nyin bar gyi gnas yin gyis 
[\[283b.7\]]'dir ma 'dug shig_/dge tshul skul byed kyis smras pa/_'di ni thams cad kyi thun mong yin no/_/kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis smras pa/_nga dang rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gran par gyis shig dang /_de nas 'di 'o bu cag gnyis gang rgyal ba de'i nyin bar gyi gnas su bya'o zhes byas nas de gnyis rdzu 'phrul 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ston pa la zhugs pa las der dge tshul skul byed kyis kun tu rgyu rab bzang pham par byas nas de yul yul por gyur te/_u dum bA ra'i tshal de nyid du song nas 'dug go/_/der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas ku sha'i grong 
[\[284a.2\]]khyer du gshegs te/_gzims mal gyi tha mar zhugs nas bzhugs so/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_da ni de bzhin gshegs pas gdul bar bya ba kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' gnyis lus so snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas yang 
[\[284a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kun tu rgyu rab bzang ngas gdul bar sla na dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' ni rgyags shing bag med par gnas te de nga'i thad du mi 'ong gis/_nga nyid de'i thad du 'gro'o snyam du dgongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis der sprul pa zhig bzhag nas shing sa la zung gi 
[\[284a.4\]]tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du gshegs nas dri za'i rgyal po rab dga'i pho brang gi sgor byon te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_'di'i nga rgyal bcag nas gdod de'i 'og tu bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung ngo snyam du dgongs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[284a.5\]]'das kyis de gdul ba'i phyir dri za'i rgyal po zhig tu sprul nas bai dUr+ya'i pi bang rgyud stong pa zhig bsnams te/_dri za'i rgyal po rab dga'i sgo drung du gzhes nas phrin gyis bzlugs te dri za'i rgyal po zhig sgo na sdod de/_de khyod dang lhan cig tu pi bang len par 'dod do zhes byas so/_/de nas de 
[\[284a.6\]]thos ma thag tu dri za'i rgyal po rab dgas bsams pa/_ma la dri za'i rgyal po gzhan 'ga' zhig ma byung grang /_de ni bdag gis tshar gcad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_nang du bos shig dang bdag gis ci nus pa bstan to zhes byas te des de nang du bos nas pi bang len pa la 
[\[284a.7\]]zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i phyir pi bang gi rgyud gcig bcad pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rab dgas kyang de mthong nas kyang rgyud gcig bcad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mthar gyis rgyud thams cad bcad de rgyud gcig pu lus par gyur nas de las 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]kyang sgra thams cad 'byung bar mdzad do/_/de nas rab dgas kyang rgyud thams cad bcad de des kyang rgyud gcig pu de las sgra thams cad 'byung bar byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gcig pu de yang bcad de sgra thams cad kyang 'byung bar mdzad do/_/de nas dri za'i rgyal po rab 
[\[284b.2\]]dgas bsams pa/_bdag gis ni de las lhag par [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang bstan par mi nus pas na/_'di ni bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig go snyam mo/_/de nas de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_'di nga rgyal nga dang mtshungs pa su yang med do snyam du de 
[\[284b.3\]]ltar 'dzin pa de med par gyur to snyam du thugs su chud de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de nga rgyal bcag nas rang bzhin gyi skur bsgyur to/_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de shin tu dga' ba skyes te dga' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[284b.4\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs 
[\[284b.5\]]la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe u dum bA ra'i tshal de'i me tog rnams rnyis par gyur te/_kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis 
[\[284b.6\]]u dum bA ra'i tshal de'i me tog rnams rnyis par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de mya ngan chen po skyes te des bsams pa/_bdag gi bsod nams kyis u dum bA ra'i tshal 'di rnam pa thams cad du me tog rgyas par gyur pa las/_da ni bdag rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs 
[\[284b.7\]]par gyur te/_na tshod lo brgya nyi shu lon na u dum bA ra'i tshal gyi me tog 'di dag rnyis par gyur pa las na/_bdag ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas rgyu des na shin tu mya ngan byed cing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/de nas de la dga' ba'i lha zhig gis rab 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]bzang la smras pa/_u dum bA ra'i tshal 'di ni khyod kyi bsod nams kyis rnam pa thams cad du me tog rgyas par gyur pa ma yin gyi/_sa phyogs 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal gyis yin te/_gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'byung ngam/_byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[285a.2\]]ba de'i tshe ni u dum bA ra'i tshal 'dir me tog rnams kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal sar zhugs pa'am/_byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes par gyur pa de'i tshe ni u dum bA ra'i tshal 'di rnam pa thams cad du me tog rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'khor 
[\[285a.3\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po grongs su nye ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni u dum bA ra'i tshal gyi me tog 'di rnams rnyis par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po grongs sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe ni 
[\[285a.4\]]u dum bA ra'i tshal 'di'i me tog rnams skam par 'gyur te/_da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung nas de gzims mal gyi tha mar zhugs te/_do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te/_de'i dbang gis u dum bA ra'i tshal de rnyis 
[\[285a.5\]]par gyur gyis khyod de'i rgyus ha cang mya ngan ma byed cig_/sdug bsngal bar ma byed cig_/smre sngags ma 'don cig ces byas so/_/de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag chos rnams la yang the tsom yod/_bdag la re ba yang yod la/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma des kyang bdag gi the tsom de sel bar nus kyis/_
[\[285a.6\]]ma la bdag bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de ga la ba der song la der phyin nas zhu ba lung bstan par gnang na phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o snyam nas u dum bA ra'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te grong khyer ku shi na gyad kyi nye 'khor shing sa la zung gi tshal du phyin par gyur to/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni kun dga' ra 
[\[285a.7\]]ba'i sgo'i thad kyi 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag gis 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]thos na bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes grag na/_bdag chos rnams la yang the tsom mchis/_bdag la re ba yang mchis la/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma des kyang 
[\[285b.2\]]bdag gi the tsom de sel bar nus na/_gal te btsun pa kun dga' bo 'o mi brgyal na bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de ga la bzhugs pa der bzhud la/_der phyin nas gal te zhu ba'i bka' lan stsal bar gnang na phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o zhes byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang 
[\[285b.3\]]ltas la mkhas te/_des bsams na bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa zhig bzhag ste 'dul ba'i dbang gis ga zhig tu gshegs par rig nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang la smras pa/_rab bzang thong /_bcom ldan 'das ni sku mnyel/_bde bar gshegs pa ni sku mnyel gyis/_de bzhin gshegs
