[\[285b.4\]]pa la gnod pa ma byed cig ces byas so/_/de nas kun du rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo sngon gyi kun du rgyu rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa rnams las bdag gis thos na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[285b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni brgya lam brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar zad de/_dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin no zhes mchi la/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de yang do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 
[\[285b.6\]]las 'da' bar 'gyur na/_bdag chos rnams la yang the tsom mchis/_bdag la re ba yang mchis la/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma des kyang bdag gi the tsom sel bar nus na/_gal te btsun pa kun dga' bo 'o mi brgyal na/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de ga la bzhugs pa der bzhud 
[\[285b.7\]]la/_der phyin nas gal te zhu ba'i bka' lan stsal bar gnang na phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o zhes byas so/_/de nas lan gsum gyi bar du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kun tu rgyu rab bzang la smras pa/_rab bzang thong /_bcom ldan 'das ni sku mnyel/_bde bar gshegs pa ni sku mnyel gyis/_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod pa ma byed cig ces byas so/_/de nas de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur te/_gzims mal du zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa mnga' 
[\[286a.2\]]bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang de lta bu'i tshig brjod pa gsan to/_/gsan nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo thong /_kun tu rgyu rab bzang ma dgag par nang du thong la ci dang ci 'dod pa 'drir chug shig_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[286a.3\]]zhe na/_'di ni nga gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang bar skabs kyi gtam brjod pa'i tha ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di ni ngas dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ba rnams kyi tha ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas kun tu rgyu 
[\[286a.4\]]rab bzang dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs shing mgu la rab tu dga' ste/_yi rangs shing dga' ba dang bde ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu mngon sum du yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 
[\[286a.5\]]'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma 'jig rten na mu stegs kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di dag ni 'di lta ste/_'od srung rdzogs byed dang /_kun tu rgyu gnag 
[\[286a.6\]]lhas kyi bu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu de rnams kyis rang rang gis dam bcas pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_rab bzang nga ni na 
[\[286a.7\]]tshod nyi shu dgu lon na/_/legs pa gang yin tshol phyir rab tu byung bar gyur/_/rab bzang nga ni rab tu byung ba'i phyin cad nas/_/lo grangs lnga bcu'i bar du ting 'dzin bsgom pa byas/_/nga ni tshul khrims rnams dang zhabs dang rig pa dang /_/sems kyi rtse gcig btud pa dag kyang bsgom 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]pa byas/_/rigs par ldan pa'i chos kyi phyogs tsam brjod pa yang /_/'di las phyi rol pa yi dge sbyong gzhan la med/_/rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po yang med do/_/de la ni dge sbyong gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_
[\[286b.2\]]bzhi pa yang med do/_/rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa yang yod de/_de bas na 'di las phyi rol pa'i dge sbyong rnams sam bram ze rnams ni med de/_pha rol rgol ba'i 
[\[286b.3\]]dge sbyong rnams sam bram ze rnams kyis stong ngo zhes nga ni de skad du 'khor 'dir seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs so zhes gsungs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun tu rgyu rab bzang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la rnam par dag ste/_kun tu rgyu chos mthong 
[\[286b.4\]]la chos rnyed pa/_chos rtogs pa/_chos kyi gting slebs pa/_som nyi las rgal ba/_the tsom las rgal ba/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/_gzhan gyis bkrir med pa/_ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar 
[\[286b.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bos ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo slob dpon chen pos slob dpon chen po'i nye gnas su dbang bskur ba lags so/_/bdag kyang 
[\[286b.6\]]rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags te/_bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[286b.7\]]bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa kun tu rgyu 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]gi dngos por 'gyur bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu 'byung bar mdzad par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu rab bzang la dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas/_tshig de thos ma thag tu skra dang kha spu 
[\[287a.2\]]ni bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/_chos gos snam sbyar ni gyon/_spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/_lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_/de ni skra bregs 
[\[287a.3\]]lus la snam sbyar gyon/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/_/mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[287a.4\]]du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[287a.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis ston pa yongs su mya 
[\[287a.6\]]ngan las 'da' ba mthong bar bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis byin gyi rlabs rnam pa lnga byin gyis brlabs la/_de bas sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bya'o snyam nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni bdag dge slong gi cha lugs su mthong bar gyur cig_/mu stegs pa 
[\[287a.7\]]gzhan rnams kyis ni mu stegs pa'i cha lugs su mthong bar gyur cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni bde blag tu bdag gi thad du 'ong nus par gyur cig_/mu stegs pa gzhan dag zhig gis ni chu chen pos bskor bar mthong bar gyur cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni bdag 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]gi rus bu khyogs su khyer nus par gyur cig_/'di las phyi rol pa rnams kyis ni brgya'am stong gis kyang khyer mi nus par gyur cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni bdag gi rus bu bsreg pa'i me sbar nus par gyur cig_/'di las phyi rol pa rnams kyis ni brgya'am stong gis kyang sbar mi nus 
[\[287b.2\]]par gyur cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni bdag gi rus bu mthong bar gyur la/_mthong nas kyang rus bu la mchod pa byed par gyur cig_/mu stegs pa gzhan rnams kyis ni mthong bar ma gyur cig ces byas nas der tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang gis byin gyi rlabs rnam pa lnga byin gyis brlabs 
[\[287b.3\]]te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas ku shi'i grong khyer du lha rnams kyis rab bzang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes sgra bsgrags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu mu stegs pa gzhan kun tu rgyu rnams kyis ras kyi ba dan dag bsgreng ste/_lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo 
[\[287b.4\]]rnams su sgra bsgrags pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma na re phyi rol pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze med de/_pha rol smra ba rnams ni dge sbyong ngam bram zes stong ngo zhes de skad du 'khor 'dir nga yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so zhes zer la/_da ni bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'di yang yongs su 
[\[287b.5\]]mya ngan las 'das so zhes ku shi'i grong khyer thog thag tu bsgrags nas shing sa la zung gi tshal du dong ste rab bzang ga la 'dug pa der chas pa las de'i thad du 'gro ma nus so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas/_kye khyed rnams 'dir ci la 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag 
[\[287b.6\]]gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_bdag cag gis de'i rus bu la mchod pa bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni nged kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis khyed kyi ma yin no/_/ci khyed kyis skra bregs la chos gos snam sbyar gyon pa ma mthong ngam/_de dag 
[\[287b.7\]]gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis ni dbyug gu gsum dang /_ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa de lta bur mthong ngo /_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_gal te 'di khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin zhe na/_'di'i thad du sheg la mchod pa gyis shig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu mu stegs 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]pa gzhan dag rab bzang gi thad du 'gro 'dod pa las chu chen pos bskor bar mthong nas 'gro ma nus so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni nged kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis khyed kyi ma yin no/_/'di ltar nged ni 'di'i thad du bde blag tu 'gro nus pa yin 
[\[288a.2\]]te/_khyed kyang nged kyi mthus 'di'i thad du sheg cig ces byas nas de dag thams cad rab bzang gi rus bu'i thad du dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_gal te khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin zhe na/_'di'i khyogs khyer cig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu mu stegs pa gzhan 
[\[288a.3\]]kun tu rgyu de dag gis khyogs bskur zhes byas na/_gdeg par ma nus so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni nged kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te/_nged kyis 'di'i khyogs khyer te bkur sti bgyis ltos shig ces byas nas dge slong rnams kyis khyogs khyer te gang du bsreg 
[\[288a.4\]]pa'i gnas su bzhag nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_gal te 'di khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin zhe na/_rus bu bsreg pa'i me bus shig_/de nas mu stegs pa gzhan dag gis rus bu bsreg pa'i me sbar zhes byas na sbar ma nus so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[288a.5\]]'di ni nged kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te/_'di'i rus bu bsreg pa'i me bdag cag gis sbar ro zhes byas nas dge slong rnams kyis de'i rus bu bsreg pa'i me sbar ro/_/rus bu bsreg pa'i me sbar nas yang smras pa/_gal te 'di khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin zhe na/_
[\[288a.6\]]khyod kyis 'di'i rus bu bsregs pa'i me 'o mas sod cig ces byas nas/_mu stegs pa gzhan dag gis de'i rus bu bsregs pa'i me bsad ces byas na gsod ma nus so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni nged kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te/_nged kyis 'di'i rus 
[\[288a.7\]]bu bsregs pa'i me bsad do zhes byas nas dge slong rnams kyis de'i rus bu bsregs pa'i me bsad do/_/me bsad nas yang smras pa/_gal te 'di khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin zhe na/_'di'i rus bu 'di rnams long la mchod pa gyis shig_/de nas mu stegs pa gzhan kun tu 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]rgyu rnams kyis rus bu blang zhes byas nas rus bu ma mthong ngo /_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis rus bu de dag blangs te/_rus bu mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag nas bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_me tog rnams kyis bkur sti byas te dong ngo //_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_de nas 
[\[288b.2\]]dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang 'di kun gyi 'og tu rab tu byung la thog ma kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i 'og tu gdod bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na 
[\[288b.4\]]rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i tshe rgyal po kr-i kI'i mdun na 'don gyi bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_mdog bzang ba gser gyi mdog can/_mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba/_sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa/_
[\[288b.5\]]lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di'i rus 'od srung yin pas na khye'u 'di'i ming 
[\[288b.6\]]'od srung nyid du gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u 'od srung 'o ma dang /_zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe mtshan mkhan bye brag phyed pa dag gis lung bstan pa/_khye'u 'od srung 'di gal te rab tu ma byung na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[288b.7\]]rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas chos gos tshon can gyon te yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_'jig rten du grags pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]zer ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gi mdza' bo bshes pa bram ze'i khye'u mya ngan med ces bya ba zhig yod pa des de'i lung bstan pa de thos nas de thos ma thag tu smras pa/_grogs po shes par gyis la nga dang ma 'grogs par khyed dka' thub kyi tshal du ma 'gro shig ces byas so/_/
[\[289a.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'da' ba la dgongs nas nga khyod dang ma 'grogs kyi bar du mi 'gro'o zhes byas so/_/de nas der gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung gis rgan po dang /_nad pa dang shi ba gzigs nas nags tshal gyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe mya ngan med mi dga' bar gyur te/_
[\[289a.3\]]des ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du ma byas so snyam mo/_/de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bA rA Na sIr gshegs pa de'i tshe/_des der lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis 
[\[289a.4\]]chos bzhin du bskor nas de rgyal po kr-i kIs bshos la spyan drangs te/_rgyal pos de kho na'i mtshan mo lam yang mdzes par byed du bcug_/de kho na'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnams kyang sbyar te gdan bshams nas chu ra bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs 
[\[289a.5\]]tshod bskul nas rgyal po de nyid kyis bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang spos dang me tog dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams khyer te/_sil snyan gyi sgra chen po sgrogs shing drang srong smra ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung bsu nas 'byor pa chen pos bA rA Na sIr spyan drangs 
[\[289a.6\]]so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u mya ngan med kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bA rA Na sIr gshegs te/_de rgyal po kr-i kIs bshos la spyan drangs nas rgyal po des de kho na'i mtshan mo lam yang mdzes par 
[\[289a.7\]]byed du bcug_/de kho na'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnams kyang sbyar te gdan bshams nas chu ra bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul nas rgyal po de nyid kyis bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams khyer te/_sil snyan gyi sgra chen po sgrogs shing drang srong smra ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung bsu nas 'byor pa chen pos bA rA Na sIr spyan drangs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang sngon gyi mi dga' bar gyur pas thag mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug ste lta bar 
[\[289b.2\]]byed la drung du ltar 'gror mi 'dod do/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs nas/_phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste phyag gis bzung nas drangs te bka' stsal pa/_mya ngan med khyod ci'i phyir nga dang phrad du 'ong bar mi 'dod/_des gsol pa/_sngon bdag la dam bzhes pa ni 
[\[289b.3\]]nga gang du 'gro ba der khyod khrid de 'gro'o zhes khyod kyis dam bcas pa las gcig pu dka' thub kyi nags tshal du bzhud de/_sngon bdag mi dga' ba'i gzhi mchis pa'i slad du mchi mi 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bka' stsal pa/_ngas ni mya ngan las 'da' ba 
[\[289b.4\]]las bsams te smras pa yin na/_yong yang khyod der phyin du zin na ci la phan te da ni dam bcas pa de'i dus la bab bo/_/mya ngan med kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_
[\[289b.5\]]bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/_des lung de mnos pa'i 'og tu le lo byed 
[\[289b.6\]]cing 'dug pa las der gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgon pa'i bsngags pa bstan pa de'i tshe/_des yid la bya ba mnos nas dgon pa'i gnas shig tu song ste/_'dug pa las gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams 
[\[289b.7\]]cad mdzad nas gzims mal gyi tha mar zhugs pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kun tu sgra bsgrags te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung do nub nam phyed nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra bsgrags so/_/de nas 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dge slong mya ngan med kyis lha nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang de sdug bsngal chen po skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das ni mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/_bdag gis ni khyad par ci yang ma thob bo snyam nas de gzhi de las shin tu mya ngan byed cing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 
[\[290a.2\]]'don par byed do/_/de nas de la dga' ba'i lhas de mthong nas smras pa/_mya ngan med ci'i phyir khyod shin tu mya ngan byed cing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed/_gal te khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong na de la bya ba ci zhig yod/_mya ngan med kyis smras pa/_yang dag par 
[\[290a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad bya'o/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu lha des khyer te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar bab par bzhag nas/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[290a.4\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na mya ngan med kyis stan de la 'dug bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas 
[\[290a.5\]]mya ngan med kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong bar bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas mya ngan med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu yang dag par 
[\[290a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas lha des bsams pa 'dis khyad par 'di lta bu thob pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi mthu yin no snyam nas/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[290a.7\]]bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas bdag de bas sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur la/_de'i 'og tu ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]'da' bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe lhar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di kho na yin te/_des der smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[290b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur la/_bdag sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu ston pa 
[\[290b.3\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma 
[\[290b.4\]]byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/bdag sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces des der smon lam de ltar btab pa des ni 'di sngar yongs su 
[\[290b.5\]]mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus na nags khrod cig na drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas so/_/nags khrod de na lha zhig kyang gnas te/_de drang srong de dag la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe yang dag par 
[\[290b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_der gang gi tshe yang 
[\[290b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis 'du ba chen po bstan pa de'i tshe/_lha de yang 'du ba chen po der 'dus te/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig las chos thos nas nags khrod du song ste/_des drang srong de dag gi mdun du yang dag par 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu drang srong de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig mthong 'dod ches pa'i sems skyes nas de dag gis lha de nyid kyi mdun du bdar te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[291a.2\]]sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ga la ba der dong ste/_drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab 
[\[291a.3\]]pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las 
[\[291a.4\]]byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dga' ba skyes nas kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig 
[\[291a.5\]]ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_
[\[291a.6\]]khams dang shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du bden pa rtogs ma thag tu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/_
[\[291a.7\]]btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]'jig gis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog ste/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_
[\[291b.2\]]de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sga nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so 
[\[291b.3\]]so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis sangs 
[\[291b.4\]]rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed de/_gzims mal gyi tha mar bzhugs pa de'i tshe dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag gi ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 
[\[291b.5\]]lta ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis ma la bdag cag sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i 'og tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas lha des 
[\[291b.6\]]smon lam btab pa/_'di rnams kyi yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi mthu yin gyis/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab 
[\[291b.7\]]tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur la/_bdag kyang ston pa de gzims mal gyi tha mar bzhugs pa'i snga rol du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe lhar gyur pa gang yin 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]pa de ni rab bzang 'di kho na yin te/_des der smon lam btab pa des na dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis 
[\[292a.2\]]nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas nga gzims mal gyi tha mar zhugs pa na/_'di sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'das te de'i 'og tu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/
[\[292a.3\]]de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi ka'i na tsha nyams su myong ba na tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang gi skyabs mdzad de/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/_grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par mdzad pa la 
[\[292a.4\]]gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'chi ka'i na tsha nyams su myong ba na 'di 'jigs pa yod pa'i sa phyogs nas phyung ste/_'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su ji ltar bzhag pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung 
[\[292a.5\]]ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi rta cang shes mchog tu bzang ba cig yod de/_de'i mthus na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis nyi 'og gi rgyal po thams cad la dpya phab bo/_/de nas phyi zhig na rta cang shes 
[\[292a.6\]]de shi nas de'i gtam kun tu grags par gyur te rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi rta cang shes de shi'o zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu nyi 'og gi rgyal po thams cad kyis bsams pa/_des bdag cag la dpya phab pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni rta cang shes de'i drin kho nar zad de/_
[\[292a.7\]]da ni de shi zin pas da ni gal te bdag cag gis de phyi rol tu byung ba mthong ba na ni bdag cag gis de der ci dga' mgur byar yod do snyam nas de dag de la glags lta zhing 'khod do/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang ji ltar nyi 'og gi rgyal po de dag glags lta zhing 'khod pa'i gtam thos 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]nas/_thos ma thag tu de dag gis 'jigs nas grong khyer gyi nang nas phyi rol tu 'byung ba'i thugs mi thub bo/_/de nas phyi zhig na byang phyogs nas tshong pa dag gis zong du rta ded de bA rA Na sIr lhags so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis byang phyogs nas tshong pa dag gis zong du rta ded 
[\[292b.2\]]de 'ongs so zhes thos nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po des rta brtag pa la mkhas pa'i mi dag btang ste khyed deng la zong du rta ded de 'ongs pa thams cad nyos shig_/lhag par yang de dag gi nang na rta cang shes 'ga' yod kyang srid kyis ltos shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas 
[\[292b.3\]]byin gyi zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis lha bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_rta de dag thams cad nyos te de dag gis bltas na/_de'i nang na rta'i mchog gang yin pa de rta cang shes yin par gyur nas de dag gis rgyal po de la gsol to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu 
[\[292b.4\]]rgyal po de shin tu mgu bar gyur nas de rta'i tshong pa de dag la gser dang dngul mang po byin no/_/de nas phyi zhig na rta cang shes de la zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang /_nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin skyed mos tshal du byung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang dpung 
[\[292b.5\]]gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas bA rA Na sIr lhags te skyed mos tshal bskor te 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin ci bya gtol med par gyur te/_da gar 'gro bar bya snyam nas des thams cad bor te rta cang shes la zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi sa nas phyir 'byung ngo snyam pa las 
[\[292b.6\]]bltas nas skyed mos tshal thams cad pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'khor cing 'dug go/_/rta cang shes kyis ni chos nyid kyis rgyal po'i srog 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_skyed mos tshal de yang grong khyer gyi 'obs kyis chod de/_grong khyer gyi 'obs de yang zab la me tog pad mas gang 
[\[292b.7\]]bar 'dug go/_/de nas rta cang shes kyis bsams pa/_bdag gis gud du ni 'bros mi nus so snyam nas des pad ma'i 'dab ma de dag la gom pa bor te grong khyer logs su chas te song ngo /_/de nas nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams kyis mthong nas mda' ste'u kha nya rngas rta cang shes de'i 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]lto dral to/_/de nas rgyal po des kyang de mthong nas 'jigs shing skrag ste/_rta 'di chu 'di'i nang du shi nas bdag 'di kho nar bar ma dor ma rung bar mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/_/de nas rta cang shes kyis rgyal po 'jigs skrag par shes nas rgyal po'i yid gso ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de 
[\[293a.2\]]smras pa/_'di ltar g.yul du bdag gi lus/_/mdas bsnun pa ni gzigs mod kyi/_/thar bar bgyis nas gdod 'gum gyis/_/rgyal po khyod ni ma bsnyengs shig_/ces smras nas rta cang shes des rgyal po de grong khyer gyi nang du bskyal te 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bzhag nas shi'o/_/dge 
[\[293a.3\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rta cang shes su gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang nga 'chi ka'i na tshas thebs pa na/_'di 'jigs pa'i gnas dang ldan pa las bsgral 
[\[293a.4\]]te 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bzhag go/_/da ltar yang nga 'chi ka'i na tshas thebs pa na 'di 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba las bsgral te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la bzhag go/_/gzhan yang nga 'chi ka'i na tshas thebs pa na 'di 
[\[293a.5\]]'jigs pa'i gnas dang ldan pa las bsgral nas 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bzhag ste/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer kan n+ya ku ba tsa zhes bya ba na rgyal po rna ba zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_rgyal po de yang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor ba la shin tu sred nas/_de phyi zhig na dpung gi 
[\[293a.6\]]tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ba las/_chu klung zhig gi 'gram na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lnga brgya khyu gcig tu 'khod pa rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis bskor du bcug nas ci nas kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang mi 'chor ba de lta bu byas so/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]khyu mchog gis 
[\[293a.7\]]bsams pa/_bdag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu 'di'i gtso bo yin pas na bdag gis 'di rnams kyi grub pa dang /_bde ba bsam dgos so snyam nas kho ra khor yug tu bltas te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams phyogs gang logs su phyung nas thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa las/_des bltas na chu klung 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]drag po de'i 'gram ma gtogs par dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis mtshams med par bskor te chu klung gi 'gram de na ni su yang mi 'dug par mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' des bsams pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'di rnams kyis ni chu klung 'di 'bog pa'am mchong ba'am 'bros pa yang 
[\[293b.2\]]mi nus kyis de lta ma yin par nga nyid chu klung 'di'i dbus su rkang lag btsugs te 'dug par bya'o snyam nas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de rnams la khyed kyis mchongs la nga'i rgyab tu rkang lag gis brten te pha rol gyi 'gram du deng shig ces byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' des chu klung gi dbus su rkang lag 
[\[293b.3\]]btsugs te 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa yin pas na/_de chu klung des bskyod par mi nus par 'dug nas de de na 'dug pa'i rgyab tu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyis mchong zhing rkang lag btsugs te pha rol gyi 'gram du dong ngo /_/de dag dong ba'i rmig pas 
[\[293b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' de'i rgyab chod par gyur to/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tha mar lus pa des mthong nas de dogs pa skyes te bdag ni bsgral mi nus gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de dogs pa skyes par mthong nas yid gsos te/_grogs po ma 'jigs shig khyod 'chi bar dogs 
[\[293b.5\]]pa med do zhes byas nas byang chub sems dpa' des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de bsgral te pha rol du son nas byang chub sems dpa' de dus las 'das so/_/dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/
[\[293b.6\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lnga brgya por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni grong khyer ku shi na gnas pa'i gyad lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tha mar lus pa gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang nga 'chi ka'i na tsha dang ldan par gyur pa na 'di 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i gnas nas 
[\[293b.7\]]bsgral te 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bzhag go/_/da ltar yang nga 'chi ka'i na tshas thebs pa na rab bzang la sogs pa gyad lnga brgya po 'di dag 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i 'khor ba las bsgral nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/de 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis cung zad ci mthong gsol pa/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis ci mthong /_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i dbang gis sprul 
[\[294a.2\]]pa zhig bzhag ste/_ga zhig tu gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bar bya ba gnyis shig lus te/_dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' dang /_kun du rgyu rab bzang gnyis so/_/
[\[294a.3\]]de la nga 'di snyam du sems te/_kun tu rgyu rab bzang ni ngas gdul bar sla na/_dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' ni rgyags shing bag med par gnas pa yin pas ngas sprul pa bzhag ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du song nas dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' bden pa rnams la gnas par 
[\[294a.4\]]byas te 'dir 'ongs so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rab dgas las ci bgyis shing bsags na las de'i rnam par smin pas lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te dri za'i rgyal por gyur la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi 
[\[294a.5\]]mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo 
[\[294a.6\]]nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i 
[\[294a.7\]]tshe lho phyogs nas rol mo mkhan gyi slob dpon mchog cig 'ongs te bA rA Na sIr phyin to/_/de nas de slob dpon chen po yin pa'i phyir rgyal po gr-i kIs bzhes nas longs spyod kyi gzhi tshogs chen po byin no/_/'jig rten dag ni 'byor pa 'dod pa yin te/_des khyim gyi 'khor rgyas 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]par byas te bzhag go/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI de nyid na dge bsnyen dbul po zhig gnas te/_des rol mo mkhan bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba de mthong nas de'i las de la chags pa skyes te las de'i mthus 'di bde ba de lta bu nyams su myong bar gyur pa las na/_las 'di ni bzang po zhig yin no snyam nas 
[\[294b.2\]]des tshe gcig gi bar du skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig_/rol mo mkhan thams cad kyi rgyal por 
[\[294b.3\]]yang gyur cig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge bsnyen du 
[\[294b.4\]]gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' 'di kho na yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs 
[\[294b.5\]]su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[294b.6\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi ka'i na tsha dang ldan pa na gdul ba'i dbang gis 'di lta bur 'o brgyal bar gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te 'das pa'i dus na yang nga 'chi ka'i na tsha dang ldan pa na 
[\[294b.7\]]gdul bar bya ba'i phyir ji ltar sdug bsngal chen po dang ldan par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer thub med rgyal zhes bya ba na rgyal po rgyal ba po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_phyi zhig na de'i btsun mo la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di rgyal po'i sras yin pas na khye'u 'di'i ming rnam par rgyal ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/
[\[295a.2\]]de nas khye'u rnam par rgyal ba 'o ma dang /_zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_
[\[295a.3\]]glang po che zhon pa dang /_rta zhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang 'phong dang mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las thar bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyus gzung ba dang /_zhags pas gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig 
[\[295a.4\]]pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stangs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_sgra grag par 'phang ba dang /_gnad du 'phang ba dang /_gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /_tshabs cher btang ba rnams 
[\[295a.5\]]kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de phyi zhig na phas de la bsgo ba/_khyod kyi pha'i yul 'byor pa dang rgyas par 'dug gis/_yul phyogs de dag ltar song shig ces byas nas ji ltar yab kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/_de skye bo phal po ches zhabs 
[\[295a.6\]]'bring byas te yul phyogs dag ltar song ngo /_/de song ba'i 'og tu rgyal po rgyal ba po dus las 'das nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po'i bu de la pho nya btang nas/_khyod kyi yab nongs kyis slar gshegs te yab kyi rgyal srid bskyang du gsol zhes spring ngo /_/rgyal po'i bu de yang byams pa'i rang 
[\[295a.7\]]bzhin can snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can la byams pa zhig ste/_de thos ma thag tu des kyang blon po rnams la pho nya btang nas sna gcig cig rung ste/_gal te nga'i yab kyi yul khams na sems can ji snyed gnas pa de dag khyod kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod na ni ngas yab kyi 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]rgyal srid bskyang bar bya'o zhes spring ngo /_/de nas blon po rnams kyis yang pho nyas bzlugs te/_jo bo ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin du bdag cag gis bgyi bar 'tshal lo zhes spring nas/_de dag gis spyan drangs te rgyal sar bcug nas de sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs 
[\[295b.2\]]te/_zas 'dod pa la ni zas sbyin par byed/_skom 'dod pa la ni skom sbyin par byed/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos sbyin par byed/_rgyan 'dod pa la ni rgyan sbyin par byed/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa sbyin par byed/_yo byad gzhan 'dod pa la ni yo byad gzhan sbyin par byed cing nad pa 
[\[295b.3\]]gso ba'i nad brang bcas te yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/_sman pa rnams dang /_nad g.yog rnams bskos te/_nad pa rnams dang /_mgon med pa rnams kyi rim gro byed do/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang sta gon byas te/_nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /_chu na 
[\[295b.4\]]gnas pa dang /_thang la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/'jig rten dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed de/_der dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus sems can phal cher lha'i nang du skyes so/_/de dag der skyes pas lha'i 
[\[295b.5\]]gnas rnams gang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_rgyu gnyis kyis na lha'i gnas rnams gang bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang /_'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba 'di gnyis yin na/_ci da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ngam/_
[\[295b.6\]]'on te 'khor los sgyur ba 'jig rten du byung zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas des bltas na de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'jig rten du ma byung /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang 'jig rten du ma byung ngo /_/'o na su'i mthus lha'i gnas gang bar gyur snyam ste/_des bltas na rgyal po rnam par rgyal 
[\[295b.7\]]ba'i mthus de ltar gyur par mthong nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_'di ci zhig sgrub cing 'dug snyam ste/_des bltas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_re zhig 'di 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]sems can brtan po yin nam/_'on te sems can mi brtan pa yin pa de brtags la gal te sems can brtan po zhig yin na ni 'di la mchod pa bya'o/_/de ste sems can mi brtan pa zhig yin na ni 'di brtan por 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas 
[\[296a.2\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis yul der sems can mang po sprul nas sprul pa de dag gis blon po de dag la smras pa/_gal te rgyal po 'dis bdag cag zas dang skom gyis tshim par byed na ni de'i 'og tu bdag cag gis kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 
[\[296a.3\]]gnas par bya'o/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po rnam par rgyal bas sprul pa de dag bkug ste bsgo ba ngas khyed zas dang skom gyis tshim par bya'o/_/sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/_lha khyod kyis bdag cag zas dang 
[\[296a.4\]]skom gyis tshim par byed mi nus te/_bdag cag ni gsar du bsad pa'i mi sha ni za/_mi khrag ni 'thung ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_'di dag ni mi ma yin te/_'di dag ni mi ma yin pa yin la/_sha dang khrag 'di lta bu ni ma bsad kyi bar du mi rnyed do/_/'on kyang 
[\[296a.5\]]gal te 'di rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyur na/_bdag gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par bya'o snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' des sprul pa rnams la smras pa/_gal te khyed dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 
[\[296a.6\]]gnas par byed na ngas nga rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par bya'o/_/sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas lus thog thag nas sha rnams bcad de de dag la byin nas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[296a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba/_'dren pa med pa/_ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas sprul pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 
[\[296b.2\]]la bkod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni mchog tu dka' ba byas mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis 'di'i lus snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur bar byed ma nus so/_/gzhan yang 'di'i spro ba bskyed dgos so snyam nas byang 
[\[296b.3\]]chub sems dpa' de la smras pa/_grogs po dag khyod sha rnams gcod pa dang /_chu ba dang rtsa brang breng rnams gcod pa dang /_cung zad tsam yang sems mi dga' ba lta yod dam/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kye nga ni sha rnams gcod pa dang /_chu ba dang rtsa brang 
[\[296b.4\]]breng rnams gcod pa na cung zad kyang sems mi dga' ba med de bdag nyid phongs pa mthong na lhag par yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye ba'i sems can rnams la snying rje skyes so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po khyod ji ltar yid 
[\[296b.5\]]ches par rung /_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_ngas grogs po khyed bden pa bskul bas rangs par bya'o zhes byas nas byang chub sems dpas bden pa bskul ba byas te/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis ji ltar bdag gi sha rnams gcod pa dang /_chu ba dang /_
[\[296b.6\]]rtsa brang breng rnams gcod pa na cung zad kyang sems mi dga' ba med na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus 'di snga mkho bzhin du gyur cig ces byas nas/_de skad brjod ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus de snga mkho bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po 
[\[296b.7\]]brgya byin gyis rang bzhin gyi gzugs su bsgyur te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod par gsol te/_grogs po khyod la ngas gtse ba'i bsam pas gnod pa byas pa bzod par mdzod cig_/de lta mod kyi khyod nyid spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir khyod la gnod pa byas par zad do zhes smras nas lha'i dbang 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpar gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de'i tshe na yang nga 'dul ba'i dbang gis sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar 
[\[297a.2\]]yang nga 'dul ba'i dbang gis sdug bsngal bar gyur to//_//yon rabs zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing 
[\[297a.3\]]dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/phyi zhig na des sangs rgyas la dad pa dang /_chos la dad pa dang /_dge 'dun la dad par gyur nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs so/_/de'i khyim 
[\[297a.4\]]de khron pa dang 'dra bar gyur te/_nyin gcig bzhin du de'i khyim du dge 'dun gyi phyir bskos pa'i dge slong rnams zan za'o/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te/_des de dag la bza' ba dang bca' ba 
[\[297a.5\]]gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/_bstsang sder ni gyu/_phyag ni bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de 
[\[297a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na khyim bdag des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu 
[\[297a.7\]]ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]te gshegs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na dge slong gsar du dgra bcom pa zhig khyim der dge 'dun gyi phyir bskos pa'i mchod ston gyi res la bab ste 'ongs so/_/de phyi bzhin du gtsug lag khang gi sna la gtogs pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba zhig kyang 'ongs so/_/de nas khyim bdag des de gnyis 
[\[297b.2\]]la zan sbyin par byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_dge slong des ni khyim bdag de la yon gyi rabs gdon par mi nus so snyam nas khyim de'i nang du song ste stan bshams pa la 'dug nas/_dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la gsol ba btab ste/_gnas brtan 
[\[297b.3\]]yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim der yon gnas tshogs pa mthong nas/_de kho na dang 'thun pa'i yon gyi rabs bton nas bdag gis ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i tshad rgyas par brjod par mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni thams 
[\[297b.4\]]cad gzigs pa yin pas 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen to zhes smras te/_des yon gyi rabs bton nas khyim bdag de'i chung ma la yang de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na khyim bdag de dang chung mas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[297b.5\]]shA ri'i bus chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa bdag khyim na gnas pas chog gis/_
[\[297b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas bza' bran gnyi gas sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas de dgra 
[\[297b.7\]]bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[298a.2\]]ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa 'di bza' bran gnyis kyis sngon las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[298a.3\]]kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bka' 
[\[298a.4\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med 
[\[298a.5\]]pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas der 'di gnyis kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon 
[\[298a.6\]]lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i 
[\[298a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gnyis kyis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i bza' bran de gnyis ni rab tu byung ba 'di gnyis kho na yin te/_de gnyis kyis der rab tu byung nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod 
[\[298b.2\]]pa bsrungs nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon 
[\[298b.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu drug pa/_rgan zhugs gnyis zhes bya ba de la/_rgan zhugs dang po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de na gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[298b.4\]]zas sbyin gyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gtsug lag khang rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed du bcug nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/_sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs pa de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa de nyid na 
[\[298b.5\]]khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa des bsams pa/_bdag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di sbyin pa gtong bas zil gyis non par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod snyam mo/_/de nas des bsams pa/_ma la bdag gis rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba'i don bsgrubs la/_
[\[298b.6\]]gal te bdag gis der rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub par gyur te phyir 'ongs na ni de lta na bdag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sbyin pa gtong bas zil gyis gnon par nus so snyam mo/_/de nas de rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas rin po che'i gling du 'gro ba 
[\[298b.7\]]bsgrubs te rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub nas mnyan du yod par phyin to/_/de der 'ongs nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs nas/_'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zil gyis mnan par ma nus so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dris pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu thabs ci zhig gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dge ba bgyis pas zil gyis gnon par nus/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni bsod nams 
[\[299a.2\]]can che bar grags pa yin te/_des ni gter bdag po yod pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_chu na yod pa dang /_skam la yod pa dang /_ring ba dang /_nye ba rnams kyang mthong bas na de ni khyod kyis sbyin pa btang bas zil gyis gnon par mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[299a.3\]]kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung na de 'ba' zhig gis khyod kyis zil gyis mnan par nus so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag des sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung ste/_brtson pa dang /_bsgrub 
[\[299a.4\]]pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[299a.5\]]tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas 
[\[299a.6\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis khyod zil gyis mnan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs 
[\[299a.7\]]pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so zhes thos so/_/de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' bar gyur te/_dge slong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_khyod rab tu byung bas bdag zil gyis 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]non par gyur to/_/da bdag gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /_zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang /_sman zong rnams ci bzhed pa bstab par bgyi'o zhes byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun 
[\[299b.2\]]pa khyim bdag 'dis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sbyin pa gtong bas zil gyis mnan par 'tshal ba las zil gyis gnon par ma nus te rab tu byung bas zil gyis non par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma 
[\[299b.3\]]bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang khyim bdag 
[\[299b.4\]]'dis khyim bdag chu stod zil gyis gnon par bya'o snyam pa las zil gyis mnan par ma nus te/_rab tu byung bas zil gyis mnan nas de der rab tu byung ste/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par 
[\[299b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye 
[\[299b.6\]]bar shog shig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu 
[\[299b.7\]]byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis khyim bdag chu 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]stod sbyin pa gtong ba zil gyis mnan par bya'o snyam pa las zil gyis gnon par ma nus nas rab tu byung bas zil gyis non par gyur la/_da ltar yang 'dis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sbyin pa gtong bas zil gyis mnan par bya'o snyam pa las 
[\[300a.2\]]zil gyis gnon par ma nus nas rab tu byung bas zil gyis non par gyur to/_/des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad 
[\[300a.3\]]kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de 
[\[300a.4\]]kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa dge slong 'di ni rgya chen po la mos te/_
[\[300a.5\]]gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par 'tshal la bdag ni gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'tshal ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ji ltar rgya chen po la mos te/_gzhan rnams 
[\[300a.6\]]zil gyis gnon par 'dod la/_bdag ni gzhan gyis zil gyis mnan par mi 'dod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[300a.7\]]rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]de gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyal po'i pho brang bde ldan du byon te/_de'i phyir rgyal po bde bas rang gi skyed mos tshal du gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams te/_des der gzhon nu rnams dang /_
[\[300b.2\]]blon po rnams dang /_dpa' bo'i sde tshan rnams dang /_grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang /_yul gyi mi rnams dang /_skye bo mang po thams cad bsags nas bsgo ba/_khyed las su 'dir nor shin tu mang por bskyed nus pa des gtsug lag khang 'di rtsigs shig ces 
[\[300b.3\]]byas so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis rgyal po de dag dang gong nas gong du nor bskyed pa la zhugs te/_gser bye ba phrag dgu la thug par bskyed do/_/de nas des de yan chad du bskyed pa'i thugs ma thub ste/_'di ni rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin te/_
[\[300b.4\]]'di 'dis skyengs par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas bskyed pa de btang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po bde bas gtsug lag khang de rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas gser thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul te/_smon lam btab pa/_
[\[300b.5\]]kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/ston pa 'di kho na dang 'dra ba mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la 
[\[300b.6\]]rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di rgya chen po la mos te/_
[\[300b.7\]]gzhan rnams zil gyis gnon par 'dod la/_bdag ni gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'dod par gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'di ni rgya chen po la mos te gzhan rnams ni zil gyis gnon par 'dod la/_bdag ni gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'dod par gyur to//_//
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]rgan zhugs gnyis pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_der gang gi tshe mi blun po 'phags skyes pos/_shAkya rnams kha btag pa de'i tshe yul ser skya'i gnas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu pha ma gnyis dang bral te ser skya'i gnas na mgon med par 'khyam 
[\[301a.2\]]zhing 'dug go/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i khyim bdag cig de gnyis kyi pha'i grogs por gyur pa de bya ba zhig la yul ser skya'i gnas su phyin te des khye'u de gnyis mthong ma thag tu ngo shes nas dris te/_bu khyed gnyis kyi pha ma ga la 'khod ces byas so/_/khye'u de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[301a.3\]]skyes pos bsad de/_de gnyis dang bral bas bdag cag gnyis mgon med de phan tshun 'khyam zhing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag des smras pa/_gal te khyed gnyen 'dun rnams kyis bskyang ba med na mnyan du yod par deng shig dang /_btsun pa kun dga' bo de khyed gnyis kyi zhang po yin te/_de yang gnyen la 
[\[301a.4\]]mnyes gshin pas des khyed gnyis bskyang bar 'gyur ro/_/khye'u gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro ba'i lam mi shes na der 'gro ba'i lam gang yin/_khyim bdag des smras pa/_bu gnyis tshur shog dang re zhig nga yul ser skya'i gnas su don cig bsgrubs la 
[\[301a.5\]]de nas ngas khyed gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bkri'o zhes byas nas khyim bdag der song ngo /_/des bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad bsgrubs nas khye'u de gnyis khrid de mnyan du yod par 'ongs nas de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bzhag ste bsgo ba/_khyed gnyis kyi zhang po 
[\[301a.6\]]dka' thub kyi gnas 'di na 'dug ste des khyed gnyis bskyang bar 'gyur ro zhes byas nas khyim bdag de song ngo /_/de song nas khye'u de gnyis kyis sgo gang gi nang du zhugs te 'khod pa las kun dga' bos ngo ma shes te dris pa/_bu khyed gnyis su yin ga las 'ongs/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_yul ser 
[\[301a.7\]]skya'i gnas kyi shAkya che ge mo zhig gi bu lags so/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_khyed gnyis kyi pha ma gar song /_khye'u gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags skyes pos bsad de bdag cag gnyis dwar lus nas mgon ma mchis par gyur pas de'i slad du bdag cag gnyis phan tshun 'khyam zhing mchis so/_/
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]bdag cag gnyis kyis thos na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di na bdag cag gnyis kyi zhang po 'dug go zhes grag nas bdag cag gnyis de'i thad du mchis so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas da ji ltar bya snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa/_
[\[301b.2\]]btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir yi mug par gyur/_kun dga' bos smras pa/_khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi sring mo'i bu yin te/_'di gnyis pha ma med par gyur pas 'dir 'ongs te bdag gis 'di gnyis mthong nas yi mug par gyur te bdag gis 'di gnyis ji ltar bskyang bar bya/_bcom 
[\[301b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis kyang dad pas byin pa chud gsan par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so snyam mo/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_phan 'dogs pa la sbyin par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs sam/_'di gnyis kyis kyang bdag cag la lhung bzed kyi bya bta' dang /_me tog 
[\[301b.4\]]dang /_'bras bu rnams kyis phan thogs par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de gnyis blangs te bskyang bar byas so/_/dge slong rnams kyis kyang kha zas cung zad tsam dag khyer te 'ong zhing de gnyis la sbyin par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ni bsod snyoms 
[\[301b.5\]]gang blangs shing de gnyis la phyed sbyin par byed do/_/phyed ni bdag nyid za bar byed de/_de'i rgyus kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur 
[\[301b.6\]]pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ci'i phyir dge slong kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur/_dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sring mo'i bu gnyis blangs nas 
[\[301b.7\]]des bsod snyoms gang ba blangs shing phyed ni bdag nyid 'tshal/_phyed ni de gnyis la stsol bar bgyid de/_btsun pa rgyu ni de lags/_rkyen ni de lags te/_des na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu ma mchis par gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khye'u 'di gnyis rab tu 'byung ngam/_gsol pa/_rab tu 'byung lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi zas ni rab tu 
[\[302a.2\]]'byung ba la ltos par ngas gnang ngo /_/ci rigs pa'i las lhung bzed kyi bya bta' dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_so shing rnams kyang 'bul du chug shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi zas zar gnang ste/_de gnyis de za zhing 'dug pa dang 
[\[302a.3\]]rtsed mo la zhugs shing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod na re khye'u 'di gnyis rab tu 'byung ngo zhe na/_ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'o na rab tu dbyung na 
[\[302a.4\]]ci nyes/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag lo bco lnga ma lon pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal te/_'di gnyis lo bdun las ma lags na bdag gis 'di gnyis ji ltar rab tu dbyung lags/_bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khye'u 'di gnyis 
[\[302a.5\]]dge 'dun gyi kha zas bshams pa las bya rog skrod nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das rngo thogs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de bas na lo bdun lon pa bya rog skrod nus pa rab tu 'byung bar ngas gnang gis rab tu phyung shig_/de nas de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis lo bdun lon pa bya rog skrod nus pa rab tu 
[\[302a.6\]]'byung bar gnang gis rab tu phyung shig ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khye'u de gnyis rab tu phyung ste kha ton slob tu bcug go/_/de nas bdag gi gnyen yin snyam ste byams pa snyems pas slob tu mi btub nas nyin par ni bre mo gtam gyis dus 'das par byed do/_/mtshan mo ni rmugs 
[\[302a.7\]]pa dang gnyid kyis dus 'das par byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/_kun dga' bo khye'u 'di gnyis ci'i phyir mi slob/_kun dga' bos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di gnyis bdag la nyam bu shed 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]bgyid de bdag kyang byams pa'i dbang du gyur nas tshar gcad mi phod do/_/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_kun dga' bo khyod byams pa'i dbang du gyur te slob mi phod na dge slong gzhan dag la gtod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po su zhig rang gi dge ba'i phyogs 
[\[302b.2\]]bor te 'di gnyis slob tu btub/_des smras pa/_khyod kyi bshes gang yin pa de la tshol cig_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_btsun pa khyod nyid bdag gi bshes lags so zhes byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khye'u de gnyis lag pa nas bzung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la phul 
[\[302b.3\]]nas smras pa/_bu khyed gnyis nga la slob tu mi btub na btsun pa 'di la slobs shig ces byas so/_/de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi srun pa zhig yin gor ma chag_/de bas deng bdag cag gnyis 'di la gtad do snyam nas brtson 'grus su slob par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal 
[\[302b.4\]]gyi bu chen po yang des shing 'grogs na bde bar khye'u de gnyis kyis shes nas nyam bu shed byed de de'i thad du slob tu mi btub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khye'u 'di gnyis ci'i slad du mi slob/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag la yang 'di 
[\[302b.5\]]gnyis kyis nyam bu shed byed de bdag la slob tu mi btub bo/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_'di gnyis skyo ba bskyed 'tshal lo/_/de ltar ma bgyis na 'di gnyis slob tu mi btub bo/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas/_maud gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u de gnyis 
[\[302b.6\]]khrid de 'chag tu song nas des de gnyis skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir sems can dmyal ba zhig sprul to/_/de nas khye'u de gnyis 'chag pa'i sa nas thag mi ring ba zhig nas 'jigs pa chen po'i sgra grag ste/_de thos nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[302b.7\]]pos de gnyis la dris pa/_bu gnyis sgra 'di ci zhig gi sgra/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_slob dpon sgra chen po 'di ci zhig gi sgra lags pa bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang glo bar ma chud do/_/maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/_khyed gnyis deng la sgra chen po 'di ga las byung ba ltos shig_/
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]de nas de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te phyogs der song ngo /_/de gnyis kyis der song ste bltas na sems can dmyal ba mang po dag gcad pa dang /_gtub pa dang /_brdeg pa dang /_'tshed pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams nyams 
[\[303a.2\]]su myong ba mthong nas dris pa/_khyed su dag cig_/sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/_sems can dmyal ba pa yin no/_/de gnyis kyis de nyid na lcags kyi rdza bum chen po zhig khol zhing 'dug pa mthong la/_de'i nang du 'tshed pa ni 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo /_/de ltar mthong nas dris pa/_ci'i phyir 
[\[303a.3\]]lcags kyi rdza bum 'di don med par khol zhing 'dug_/sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni don med pa ma yin gyi kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas dad pas byin pa spyod la le lo byed cing 'dug pa de gnyis shi ba'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar 'gyur te/_de gnyis kyi phyir lcags kyi rdza bum 'di 
[\[303a.4\]]khol zhing 'dug go/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/_de gnyis 'jigs shing skrag nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ngo /_/de nas maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris pa/_bu gnyis sgra chen po 'di ga las byung /_de nas 
[\[303a.5\]]khye'u de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/_bu gnyis de ni ngas khyed gnyis la byas na khyed gnyis nga la yid mi ches te/_da ni don de khyed cag gnyis kyis mngon sum du mthong ba yin gyis 
[\[303a.6\]]de'i phyir khyed gnyis sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis brtson 'grus su slob pa la zhugs so/_/de nas de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de gal te de snga dro dran par gyur na ni de gnyis zan stor bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[303a.7\]]ste phyem red dran par gyur na ni ci zos pa yang skyug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu des na de gnyis nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de gnyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la dris pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]ci'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis nyam chung zhing rid la sbeg cing lus kyi mthu med par gyur/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de la smras pa/_'di gnyis ha cang mi dga' ches te bru bas gzir bar gyur na 
[\[303b.2\]]na bar 'gyur du 'ong gis spro ba bskyed dgos so/_/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_khyod ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u de gnyis la smras pa/_stan khyer la 'chag tu 'dong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag 
[\[303b.3\]]gnyi ga 'chag pas chog lags so/_/bdag cag gnyis ni 'di nyid na mchis shing slob par 'tshal lo/_/maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_bu gnyis bdag cag 'chag sa de logs su mi 'dong bar 'chag sa gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes byas nas khye'u de gnyis khrid de 'chag sa gzhan du dong 
[\[303b.4\]]nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir thag mi ring ba zhig tu mtho ris zhig sprul te/_de na lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_lha'i bu mo dag gis bskor ba dag pheg rdob par byed de rtse zhing dga' 
[\[303b.5\]]la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas khye'u de gnyis 'chag pa'i sa nas thag mi ring ba zhig nas pheg rdob pa'i sgra grag ste/_de thos nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris pa/_bu gnyis sgra 'di ci zhig gi sgra/_
[\[303b.6\]]de gnyis kyis smras pa/_slob dpon sgra 'di ci zhig gi sgra lags pa bdag cag gnyis kyis glo bar ma chud do/_/maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/_khyed gnyis deng la sgra 'di ga las byung ba ltos shig_/de nas de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsgo ba bzhin du 
[\[303b.7\]]mnyan te phyogs der song ngo /_/de gnyis der song ste bltas na lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_lha'i bu mo dag gis bskor ba dag pheg rdob par byed de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa mthong nas dris pa/_khyed su dag cig_/sprul 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]pa rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yin no/_/de gnyis kyis de nyid na seng ge'i khri gnyis lha'i bu mo mang po dag gis bskor cing 'dug pa mthong la/_de'i steng na lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug go/_/de ltar mthong nas de gnyis ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/ngo mtshar du gyur nas dris pa/_ci'i 
[\[304a.2\]]phyir seng ge'i khri 'di gnyis stong par 'dug ste 'di gnyis lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug_/sprul pa rnams kyis smras pa/_kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas brtson 'grus brtsams shing 'dug ste de gnyis nam shi 'phos te dus las 'das pa de'i tshe 'dir skye bar 'gyur te/_de gnyis 
[\[304a.3\]]dang bdag cag lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ba'i seng ge'i khri yin no/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis dga' bar gyur nas bdag cag gnyis kyi brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras bu chen po thob par gyur te/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba las kyang thar la lhar skye ba 
[\[304a.4\]]yang thob par gyur to snyam du rig nas sems dga' bzhin du maud gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ngo /_/de nas maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis mthong nas dris pa/_bu gnyis sgra 'di ga las byung /_de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la thams cad rgyas par 
[\[304a.5\]]bsnyad do/_/de nas maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/_bu gnyis de ni ngas khyed gnyis la byas na khyed gnyis nga la yid mi ches te/_da ni don de khyed cag gnyis kyis mngon sum du mthong ba yin gyis/_de'i phyir lhag par yang brtson 'grus brtsam par gyis shig_/de nas de 
[\[304a.6\]]thos ma thag tu khye'u de gnyis lhag par yang brtson 'grus su slob pa la zhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis 'khor lo ltar bsdus pa'i mdo brtsams te de gnyis kyis de thos nas 'di snyam sems te/_'khor ba na 'khor phan chad zo chun rgyud mo'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du yang dang 
[\[304a.7\]]yang du sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha dang mir 'khor dgos pas na bdag cag gnyis la lhar skye ba yang mi dgos/_mir skye ba yang mi dgos kyis bdag cag gnyis kyis dngos po med pa nyid du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis yid skyo bar gyur par rig nas yid la bya ba'i lung phog ste/_de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 
[\[304b.2\]]'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[304b.3\]]par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de gnyis kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyis gnas tha dad pa 
[\[304b.4\]]gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro zhing dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams dang 'bras bu rnams blangs te dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed do/_/de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag gis tshor te/_'di gnyis ni mthu che ba yin no snyam mo/_/de ltar mthong nas de rnams bdag cag gnyis la skyo ba 
[\[304b.5\]]skyes te/_lo bdun lon pa 'di gnyis kyis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu thob na/_bdag cag skra'i mdog lan gsum gyur gyi bar du bdag cag gis ci yang ma thob bo snyam ste skyo bar gyur nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams 
[\[304b.6\]]kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge tshul 'di gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas lo bdun lon pa na rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[304b.7\]]pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i phyi zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos
